 title jerusalem delivered

 author torquato tasso

 posting date august 4 2008 ebook #392
 release date january 1995
 last updated march 26 2012

 language english

 character set encoding ascii

 *** start project gutenberg ebook jerusalem delivered ***




 produced douglas b killings








 gerusalemme liberata
 "jerusalem delivered"



 torquato tasso
 15441595




 published 1581 parma italy

 translated edward fairfax 15601635
 translation first published london 1600





 first book

 argument
 god sends angel tortosa
 godfrey unites christian peers knights
 lords princes renown
 choose duke rule wares fights
 mustereth host whose number known
 sends fort sion hights
 aged tyrant juda's land guides
 fear trouble resist provides



 sacred armies godly knight
 great sepulchre christ free
 sing much wrought valor foresight
 glorious war much suffered
 vain 'gainst hell oppose might
 vain turks morians armed
 soldiers wild brawls mutinies prest
 reduced peace heaven blest

 ii
 heavenly muse fading bays
 deckest thy brow heliconian spring
 sittest crowned stars' immortal rays
 heaven legions bright angels sing
 inspire life wit thoughts upraise
 verse ennoble forgive thing
 fictions light mix truth divine
 fill lines praise thine

 iii
 thither thou know'st world best inclined
 luring parnass sweet imparts
 truth conveyed verse gentle kind
 read perhaps move dullest hearts
 children young diseased find
 anoint sweets vessel's foremost parts
 make taste potions sharp give
 drink deceived deceived live

 iv
 ye noble princes protect save
 pilgrim muses ship defend
 rock ignorance error's wave
 gracious eyes upon labor bend
 tales love conquest brave
 dedicate work send
 muse hereafter shall perhaps unfold
 fights battles combats bold

 v
 christian princes ever strive
 win fair greece tyrants' hands
 usurping ismaelites deprive
 woful thrace captived stands
 must realms seas turks forth drive
 godfrey chased juda's lands
 legend glorious deed
 read whilst arm arm whilst read

 vi
 six years run since first martial guise
 christian lords warraid eastern land
 nice assault antioch surprise
 fair rich conquered stand
 defended noblest wise
 'gainst persian knights many valiant band
 tortosa lest winter might shend
 drew holds coming spring attend

 vii
 sullen season come gone
 forced late cease noble war
 god almighty form lofty throne
 set parts heaven purest
 far clear stars every one
 hence highest star
 looked world beheld
 land city country town field

 viii
 things viewed last syria stayed
 upon christian lords gracious eye
 wondrous look wherewith oft surveyed
 men's secret thoughts concealed lie
 cast puissant godfrey assayed
 drive turks sion's bulwarks high
 full zeal faith esteemed light
 worldly honor empire treasure might

 ix
 baldwin next spied another thought
 spirits proud vain ambition move
 tancred saw life's joy set naught
 woebegone pains love
 boemond conquered folk antioch brought
 gentle yoke christian rule prove
 taught laws statutes customs new
 arts crafts obedience religion true

 x
 care busy work plied
 naught else acting thoughts bent
 young rinaldo fierce desires spied
 noble heart rest impatient
 wealth sovereign power naught applied
 wits virtue excellent
 patterns rules skill courage bold
 took guelpho fathers old

 xi
 thus lord discovered seen
 hidden secrets worthy's breast
 hierarchies angels sheen
 gentle gabriel called rest
 'twixt god souls men righteous
 ambassador forever blest
 commands heaven's eternal king
 'twixt skies earth doth bring

 xii
 lord thus spake "godfredo find
 name ask doth rest
 arms ease peace resigned
 frees jerusalem distrest
 peers counsel call baser mind
 let stir chieftain rest
 choose earth shall allow
 fellows late shall subjects now"

 xiii
 said angel swift prepared
 execute charge imposed aright
 form airy members fair imbared
 spirits pure subject sight
 like man show shape fared
 full heavenly majesty might
 stripling seemed thrive five winters old
 radiant beams adorned locks gold

 xiv
 silver wings took shining pair
 fringed gold unwearied nimble swift
 parts winds clouds air
 seas earth doth lift
 thus clad cut spheres circles fair
 pure skies sacred feathers clift
 libanon first foot set
 shook wings rory may dews wet

 xv
 tortosa's confines swiftly sped
 sacred messenger headlong flight
 eastern wave appeared red
 rising sun yet scantly half sight
 godfrey e'en morndevotions said
 custom titan bright
 appeared angel shape divine
 whose glory far obscured phoebus' shine

 xvi
 "godfrey" quoth "behold season fit
 war thou waited hast long
 serves time thou o'erslip
 free jerusalem thrall wrong
 thou thy lords council quickly sit
 comfort feeble confirm strong
 lord hosts general doth make thee
 chieftain shall gladly take thee

 xvii
 "i messenger everlasting jove
 great name thus behests tell
 oh sure hope conquest ought thee move
 zeal love thy bosom dwell"
 said vanished seats
 height clearness rest excel
 fell duke joints dissolved asunder
 blind light strucken dead wonder

 xviii
 recovered considered
 man manner message said
 erst wished longed sore
 end war whereof lord made
 swelled breast uncouth pride therefore
 heaven charge laid
 great creator would
 increased fire augmenteth flame

 xix
 captains called forthwith every tent
 unto rendezvous invites
 letter letter post post sent
 entreatance fair counsel unites
 noble courage could augment
 sleeping spark valor incites
 used thoughts honor raised
 praised paid counselled pleased

 xx
 captains soldiers save boemond came
 pitched tents fields without
 green boughs slender cabins frame
 lodged tortosa's streets
 host chief worth name
 assembled senate grave stout
 godfrey silence kept space
 lift voice spake princely grace

 xxi
 "warriors god elected hath
 worship true sion restore
 still preserved danger harm scath
 many sea many unknown shore
 subjected lately faith
 provinces rebellious long
 conquests great
 erected trophies cross name

 xxii
 "but homes first forsook
 native soil marched far
 us dangerous seas betook
 exposed hazard far sought war
 glory vain gain idle smook
 lands possess wild barbarous
 conquests mean prey
 shed bloods work souls' decay

 xxiii
 "but scope former thought
 sion's fort scale noble wall
 christian folk bondage brought
 wherein alas long lived thrall
 palestine empire wrought
 godliness might reign perpetual
 none left pilgrims might denay
 see christ's tomb promised vows pay

 xxiv
 "what hour successively done
 full peril honor small
 naught first designment shun
 purposed end lie fixed
 boots us wares begun
 europe raised make proud asia thrall
 beginnings ending known
 kingdoms raised armies overthrown

 xxv
 "not list erect empires new
 frail foundations laid earthly mould
 faith country
 among thousands stout pagans bold
 naught behoves us trust greece untrue
 western aid far removed behold
 buildeth thus methinks buildeth
 work sepulchre

 xxvi
 "turks persians conquered antiochia
 glorious acts full glorious praise
 heaven's mere grace prowess done
 conquests achieved wondrous ways
 directed course run
 god battles thus us lays
 loving kindness shall lose doubt
 byword lands

 xxvii
 "let blessings sent
 abused split profane wise
 let issue correspondent prove
 good beginnings enterprise
 gentle season might courage move
 every passage plain open lies
 lets us great jerusalem
 valiant squadrons round hem

 xxviii
 "lords protest hearken
 ye times ages future present past
 hear ye blessed heavens sit
 time achievement hasteneth fast
 longer rest worse season fit
 sureties shall doubt overcast
 forslow siege well foresee
 egypt pagans succored be"

 xxix
 said hermit peter rose spake
 sate counsel great lords among
 "at request war undertake
 private cell erst lived closed long
 godfrey wills question make
 cast doubts truth plain strong
 acts trust correspond speech
 yet one thing would gladly teach

 xxx
 "these strifes unless far mistake thing
 discords raised oft disordered sort
 disobedience ill managing
 actions lost want due support
 refer justly spring
 spring sedition strife oppression tort
 mean commanding power sundry given
 thought opinion worth estate uneven

 xxxi
 "where divers lords divided empire hold
 causes gifts justice tried
 offices falsely bought sold
 needs must lordship virtue slide
 friendly parts one body uphold
 create one head rest rule guide
 one regal power sceptre give
 henceforth may king sovereign live"

 xxxii
 therewith stayed speech gracious muse
 kindling motions breasts fry
 grace divine hermit's talk infuse
 hearts words may fructify
 virtuous concord choose
 contentions began die
 princes multitude agree
 godfrey ruler wars

 xxxiii
 power gave princely right
 command judge good ill
 laws impose lands subdued might
 maken war
 hold due subjection every wight
 valors guided skill
 done report displays telltale wings
 ear news tidings brings

 xxxiv
 told soldiers allowed meet
 well deserving sovereign place
 first salutes acclamations sweet
 received love gentle grace
 reverence done kind regreet
 requited mild cheerful face
 bids armies following day
 fair plains standards proud display

 xxxv
 golden sun rose silver wave
 beams enamelled every green
 arose warrior bold brave
 glistering filed steel armor sheen
 jolly plumes crests adorned
 tofore chieftain mustered
 mountain cast curious sight
 every footman every knight

 xxxvi
 mind time's enemy oblivion's foe
 disposer true noteworthy thing
 oh let thy virtuous might avail
 troop captain great may sing
 glorious war famous grow
 forgot till time's evil handling
 work derived treasures dear
 let times hearken never age outwear

 xxxvii
 french came foremost battailous bold
 late led hugo brother king
 france isle rivers four infold
 rolling streams descending spring
 hugo dead lily fair gold
 wonted ensign tofore bring
 clotharius great captain good
 hardy knight ysprong princes' blood

 xxxviii
 thousand strong armors clad
 next marched forth another band
 number nature instruction
 like fight far charge hand
 valiant normans lord robert lad
 native duke renowned land
 two bishops next standards proud upbare
 called reverend william good ademare

 xxxix
 jolly notes chanted loud clear
 merry mornings mass divine
 horrid helms high heads bear
 fierce courage war incline
 first four hundred horsemen gathered near
 orange town lands confine
 ademare poggian youth brought
 number like hard assays stout

 xl
 baldwin ensign fair next dispread
 among bulloigners noble fame
 brother gave troops lead
 commander field became
 count carinto straight succeed
 grave advice well skilled mars game
 four hundred brought many thrice
 led baldwin clad gilden arms price

 xli
 guelpho next land place possest
 whose fortunes good great acts agree
 italian sire fro house est
 well could bring noble pedigree
 german born rich possessions blest
 worthy branch sprung guelphian tree
 'twixt rhene danubie land contained
 ruled swaves rhetians whilom reigned

 xlii
 mother's heritage right
 added conquest got
 thence approved men passing might
 brought death danger feared
 wont feasts spend night
 pass cold days baths houses hot
 five thousand late scantly
 third part left chance war

 xliii
 nation crisped locks fair
 dwell seas arden wood
 mosel streams rhene meadows wear
 battel soil grain pasture good
 islanders oft repair
 earthen bulwarks 'gainst ocean flood
 flood elsewhere ships barks devours
 drowns cities countries towns towers

 xliv
 one troop thousand
 another robert fierce run
 english squadron soldiers stout tall
 william led sovereign's younger son
 archers come withal
 people near northern pole wone
 ireland sent loughs forests hoar
 divided far sea europe's shore

 xlv
 tancredi next 'mongst one
 rinald except prince greater might
 majesty noble countenance shone
 high thoughts heart bold fight
 shameful vice worth overgone
 fault love unadvised sight
 bred dangers adventurous arms
 nursed griefs sorrows woes harms

 xlvi
 fame tells everblessed day
 christian swords persian blood dyed
 furious prince tancredi fray
 coward foes chased forests wide
 till tired fight heat way
 sought place rest wearied side
 drew near silver stream played
 among wild herbs greenwood shade

 xlvii
 pagan damsel unwares met
 shining steel save visage fair
 hair unbound made wanton net
 catch sweet breathing cooling air
 gaze longing looks set
 sight wonder wonder love love bred care
 love wonder love new born new bred
 groan armed champion captive led

 xlviii
 helm virgin donned wight
 feared might come aid fought
 courage earned assailed knight
 yet thence fled uncompanied unsought
 left image heart ypight
 sweet idea wandered thought
 shape gesture place mind
 kept blew love's fire wind

 xlix
 well might read sickness eyes
 banks full tide flow
 help far hurt within lies
 hopes unstrung cares fit mow
 eight hundred horse champain came guies
 champain land wealth ease pleasure grow
 rich nature's pomp pride tirrhene main
 woos hills hills woo valleys plain

 l
 two hundred greeks came next fight well tried
 surely armed steel iron strong
 glaive pendant side
 bows quivers shoulders hung
 horses well inured chase ride
 diet spare untired labor long
 ready charge retire
 though broken scattered fled skirmish still

 li
 tatine guide except tatine none
 greeks went christian host
 sin shame greece accurst alone
 fatal war affront thy coast
 yet safest thou idle lookeron
 glad attendest side lost
 thou bondslave vile become
 wrong god's righteous doom

 lii
 order last first worth fame
 unfeared fight untired hurt wound
 noble squadron adventurers came
 terrors tread asian ground
 cease orpheus thy minois arthur shame
 boast lancelot thy table round
 antique times laurel drest
 far exceed thee rest

 liii
 dudon consa guide lord
 worth birth alike
 chose captain free accord
 acts done battles seen
 grave man years looks word
 locks gray yet courage green
 worth might noble badge bore
 old scars grievous wounds received yore
 liv
 came eustace well esteemed man
 godfrey's sake brother
 king norway's heir gernando
 proud father's title sceptre crown
 roger balnavill engerlan
 hardy knights approved known
 besides numbered warlike train
 rambald gentonio gerrards twain

 lv
 ubaldo puissant rosimond
 lancaster heir rank succeed
 let none forget obizo tuscain land
 well worthy praise many worthy deed
 three brethren lombards fierce yond
 achilles sforza stern palamede
 otton's shield conquered stowres
 snake naked child devours

 lvi
 guascher raiphe valor like
 one guido famous
 germer eberard overpass
 foul oblivion would muse loth
 gildippes dear edward alas
 loving pair war among go'th
 bond virtuous love together tied
 together served together died

 lvii
 school love things taught see
 learned maid arms ireful guise
 still side faithful guard went
 one truelove knot lives together ties
 would one alone could dangerous
 smart other's anguish tries
 one hurt felt sore
 lost blood spent life therefore

 lviii
 rinaldo far exceeds
 star sphere diamond ring
 nest courage sweet mercy breeds
 comet worthy eye's wondering
 years fewer noble deeds
 fruit ripe soon blossoms spring
 armed mars might coyest venus move
 disarmed god love

 lix
 sophia adige's flowery bank bore
 sophia fair spouse bertoldo great
 fit mother pearl
 tender imp weaned teat
 princess maud took virtue's lore
 brought fit worthy feat
 till wares golden trump hears
 soundeth glory fame praise ears

 lx
 though scantly three times five years old
 fled alone many unknown coast
 o'er aegean seas many greekish hold
 till arrived christian host
 noble flight adventurous brave bold
 whereon valiant prince might justly boast
 three years served field scant begin
 golden hairs deck ivory chin

 lxi
 horsemen past voidleft stations fill
 bands foot reymond beforn
 tholouse lord lands near piraene hill
 garound streams salt sea billows worn
 four thousand foot brought well armed skill
 pains travels borne
 stout men arms guide power
 like troy's old town defenced ilion's tower

 lxii
 next stephen amboise five thousand lead
 men prest tours blois late
 hard assays unfit unsure need
 yet armed point wellattempted plate
 land like people breed
 soil gentle smooth soft delicate
 boldly charge soon retire doubt
 like fire straw soon kindled soon burnt

 lxiii
 third alcasto marched
 boaster brought six thousand switzers bold
 audacious looks faces grim
 strong castles alpine clifts hold
 shares coulters broke armors trim
 change metal cast warlike mould
 band late herds flocks guide
 kings realms threatened defied

 lxiv
 glorious standard last heaven sprad
 peter's keys ennobled crown
 seven thousand stout camillo
 embattailed walls iron brown
 adventure occasion glad
 revive romans' old renown
 prove least wiser thought
 hearts fertile land although unwrought

 lxv
 passed every regiment
 band troop person worth regard
 godfrey lords counsel went
 thus duke princely declared
 "i day next clears firmament
 ready host haste prepared
 closely march sion's noble wall
 unseen unheard undescried

 lxvi
 "prepare travel strong light
 fierce combat glad victory"
 word warning soon dight
 soldier longing near coming glory
 impatient morning bright
 honor pricked memory
 yet chieftain conceived fear
 within heart kept secret

 lxvii
 faithful spial assured
 egypt's king forward way
 arrive gaza old procured
 fort syrian frontiers lay
 thinks man wars inured
 aught forslow journey stay
 well knew dangerous foe
 herald called spake

 lxviii
 "a pinnace take thee swift shaft bow
 speed thee henry greekish main
 arrive letters know
 one never aught reports vain
 valiant youth virtues flow
 help us great conquest obtain
 prince danes brings war
 troop arctic star

 lxix
 "and doubt greekish monarch sly
 use wonted craft
 stay passage divert awry
 elsewhere forces first journey laft
 herald good messenger well try
 see succors us beraft
 send thence convenient speed
 honor stands need

 lxx
 "return thou legier stay behind
 move greekish prince send us aid
 tell kingly promise doth bind
 give us succors covenant made"
 said thus instruct letters signed
 trusty herald took longer stayed
 sped thence done lord's behest
 thus duke reduced thoughts rest

 lxxi
 aurora bright crystal gates unbarred
 bridegroomlike forth stept glorious sun
 trumpets loud clarions shrill heard
 every one rouse fierce begun
 sweet music heart war prepared
 soldiers glad heaps harness run
 drought endangered grain
 poor ploughmen joy thunders promise rain

 lxxii
 shirts mail coats plate put
 donned cuirass corslet bright
 halbert habergeon
 every one arms quickly dight
 wonted guide soldier tends upon
 loose wind waved banners light
 standard royal toward heaven spread
 cross triumphant pagans dead

 lxxiii
 meanwhile car bears lightning brand
 upon eastern hill mounted high
 smote glistering armies stand
 quivering beams dazed wondering eye
 phaetonlike fired sea land
 sparkles seemed skies fly
 horses' neigh clattering armors' sound
 pursue echo dale

 lxxiv
 general due care provide
 save men ambush train
 troops horse lightly armed ride
 sent scour woods forests main
 pioneers busy work applied
 even paths make highways plain
 filled pits smoothed rougher ground
 opened every strait closed found

 lxxv
 meet forces gathered foe
 towers defenced rampire moat wall
 stream wood mountain could forslow
 hasty pace stop march
 banks prince rivers po
 doth overswell breaks hideous fall
 mossy rocks trees o'ergrown age
 aught withstands fury rage

 lxxvi
 king tripoli every hold
 shut men munition treasure
 straggling troops sometimes assail would
 save durst move displeasure
 stayed rage presents gifts gold
 led land ease leisure
 keep realm peace rest chose
 conditions godfrey list impose

 lxxvii
 mount seir neighboreth east
 holy city faithful folk one
 hill descended least
 christian duke heaps gone
 welcome joy feast
 smile gaze alone
 guides faithful day
 hesperus leads sun way

 lxxviii
 along sands armies safe guide
 ways secure well known
 upon tumbling billows fraughted ride
 armed ships coasting along shore
 camp might every day provide
 bring munition good victuals store
 isles greece sent provision meet
 store wine scios came crete

 lxxix
 great neptune grieved underneath load
 ships hulks galleys barks brigantines
 midearth seas left road
 wherein pagan bold sails untwines
 spread huge armado wide broad
 venice genes towns confines
 holland england france sicil sent
 juda ready bound bent

 lxxx
 together combined knit
 surest bonds love friendship strong
 together sailed fraught things fit
 service done land might belong
 occasion served disbarked
 sailed asian coasts isles along
 thither speed hasty course plied
 christ lord offences died

 lxxxi
 brazen trump ironwinged fame
 mingleth faithful troth forged lies
 foretold heathen christians came
 thitherward conquering army hies
 every knight sounds worth name
 troop band squadron descries
 threat'neth death fire sword slaughter
 held captived israel's fairest daughter

 lxxxii
 fear ill exceeds evil fear
 present harms still annoy us
 mind prest open every ear
 hear new tidings though way joy us
 secret rumor whispered everywhere
 town christians destroy us
 aged king coming evil knew
 cursed thoughts false heart renew

 lxxxiii
 aged prince ycleped aladine
 ruled care new sovereign state
 tyrant erst fell engine
 graver somewhat mitigate
 heard western lords would undermine
 city's wall lay towers prostrate
 former fear adds newcome doubt
 treason fears within force without

 lxxxiv
 nations twain inhabit dwell
 sundry faith together town
 lesser part christ believed well
 termagent mahown
 king made conquest fell
 brought region subject crown
 burdens set paynims large
 poor christians laid double charge

 lxxxv
 native wrath revived new thought
 age years weakened yore
 madness cruel bosom wrought
 ever blood thirsteth
 stings snake fire brought
 harmless lay benumbed cold
 lion rage renewed hath
 though fame moved wrath

 lxxxvi
 "i see" quoth "some expectation vain
 false christians new content
 common loss trust gain
 laugh weep joy lament
 perchance treason train
 murder us secretly consent
 otherwise work us harm woe
 ope gates let foe

 lxxxvii
 "but lest effect cursed
 let us destroy serpent nest
 young old let us people kill
 tender infants mothers' breast
 houses burn holy temples fill
 bodies slain loved best
 tomb hold much price
 let's offer priests sacrifice"

 lxxxviii
 thus thought tyrant traitorous mind
 durst follow decreed
 yet innocents mercy find
 cowardice truth proceed
 noble foes durst craven kind
 exasperate bloody deed
 need grace could got
 thus peace broke loosed knot

 lxxxix
 villain heart cursed rage restrained
 thoughts bent fierce desire
 suburbs first flat earth plained
 burnt buildings devouring fire
 loth wretch frenchman gained
 help ease finding aught entire
 cedron bethsaida watering else
 empoisoned fountains springs wells

 xc
 wary wise child darkness
 city's self strongly fortifies
 three sides site well defenced
 that's weak northward lies
 mighty bars long enduring brass
 steelbound doors iron gates ties
 lastly legions armed well provides
 subjects born hired aid besides



 second book

 argument
 ismeno conjures charms vain
 aladine kill christians ire
 sophronia olindo would slain
 save rest king grants desire
 clorinda hears fact fortunes plain
 pardon gets keeps fire
 argantes aletes' speeches
 despised defies duke mortal war



 thus tyrant bends thoughts arms
 ismeno gan tofore sight appear
 ismen dead bones laid cold graves warms
 makes speak smell taste touch see hear
 ismen terror mighty charms
 makes great dis deepest hell fear
 binds looses souls condemned woe
 sends devils errands fro

 ii
 christian macon adores
 could quite wonted faith forsake
 wicked arts oft implores
 help lord aid pluto black
 deep caves acheron's dark shores
 circles vain spells used make
 advise king extremes come
 achitophel counselled absalom

 iii
 "my liege" says "the camp fast hither moves
 axe laid unto cedar's root
 let us work valiant men behoves
 boldest hearts good fortune helpeth
 princely care kingly wisdom proves
 well labored well foreseen
 perform charge duty
 nought grave conquer shall foe

 iv
 "from surest castle secret cell
 come partaker good ill
 counsel sage magic's sacred spell
 may profit us perform
 sprites impure bliss whilom fell
 shall service bow constrained skill
 must begin enterprise
 highness thus brief advise

 v
 "within christian's church light skies
 hidden alter stands far sight
 image consecrated lies
 christ's dear mother called virgin bright
 hundred lamps aye burn eyes
 slender veil tinsel dight
 every side great plenty doth behold
 offerings brought myrrh frankincense gold

 vi
 "this idol would removed away
 thence princely hand transport
 macon's sacred temple safe lay
 enchant wondrous sort
 image church doth stay
 strength arms shall win noble fort
 shake puissant wall passing might
 spells charms said aright"

 vii
 advised thus king impatient
 flew fury house god
 image took words unreverent
 abused prelates deed forbode
 swift prey away tyrant went
 god's sharp justice naught feared rod
 chapel vile image laid
 enchanter charms witchcraft said

 viii
 phoebus next unclosed wakeful eye
 rose sexton place profane
 missed image used lie
 sough grief fear vain
 king loss gan descry
 sore enraged killed pain
 straight conceived malicious wit
 christian bade great offence commit

 ix
 whether act mortal hand
 else prince heaven's eternal pleasure
 mercy would wretch withstand
 let vile chest hold treasure
 yet conjecture hath fully scanned
 godliness let us action measure
 truth purest faith fitly prove
 rare grace came heaven

 x
 busy search tyrant gan invade
 house hold temple tent
 fault faulty one bewrayed
 hid promised gifts punishment
 idle charms false enchanter said
 maze still wandered miswent
 heaven decreed conceal
 make miscreant feel shame

 xi
 angry king discovered
 guilty hand sacrilege wrought
 ireful courage boiled vengeance hot
 christians faulters thought
 ruth compassion mercy forgot
 staff beat dog long sought
 "let die" quoth "kill great small
 shall offender perish sure withal

 xii
 "to spill wine poison mixed spares
 slay righteous faulty one
 destroy field yieldeth naught tares
 thorns vineyard overgone
 among wretches one cares
 us laws religion
 dear subjects fire weapon take
 burn murder kill traitors sake"

 xiii
 herod thus would bethlem's infants kill
 christians soon direful news receave
 trump death sounds hearing shrill
 weapon faith fortress grave
 courage time device
 fight fly excuse pardon crave
 stood prepared die yet help find
 whence least hope knots heaven unbind

 xiv
 among dwelt parents' joy pleasure
 maid whose fruit ripe overyeared
 beauty esteemed treasure
 field love plough virtue eared
 labor goodness godliness leisure
 house heaven full moon aye cleared
 lovers' eyes withdrawn alone
 virgin beams spotless cynthia shone

 xv
 availed resolution chaste
 whose soberest looks whetstones desire
 love consents beauty's field lie waste
 visage set olindo's heart fire
 subtle love thousand wiles thou hast
 humble suit service hire
 win maiden's hold thing soon done
 nature framed women

 xvi
 sophronia olindo hight youth
 one town one faith taught
 fair full bashfulness truth
 loved much hoped little desired nought
 durst speak suit purchase ruth
 saw marked wist sought
 thus loved thus served long regarded
 unseen unmarked unpitied unrewarded

 xvii
 came message murderment
 wherein guiltless friends hopeless starve
 noble wise fair gent
 cast might harmless lives preserve
 zeal spring whence flowed hardiment
 maiden shame yet loth swerve
 yet courage ta'en sure hold
 boldness shamefaced shame made bold

 xviii
 forth went shop merchandise
 full rich stuff none sale exposed
 veil obscured sunshine eyes
 rose within sweetness closed
 ornament seemly lies
 curious chance careless art composed
 neglects curious prove
 beauty's helped nature heaven love

 xix
 admired went noble maid
 presence king gained
 swelled ire afraid
 fierce wrath fearless grace sustained
 "i come" quoth "but thine anger stayed
 causeless rage 'gainst faultless souls restrained
 come show thee bring thee
 wight whose fact hath made thy heart wroth"

 xx
 molest boldness lightning ray
 sweet beauty streamed face
 struck prince wonder dismay
 changed cheer cleared moody grace
 eyes disposed looks play
 king snared love's strong lace
 wayward beauty doth fancy move
 frown forbids smile engendereth love

 xxi
 amazement wonder delight
 although love moved cruel sense
 "tell on" quoth "unfold chance aright
 thy people's lives grant recompense"
 "behold faulter sight
 hand committed supposed offence
 took image mine fault fact
 mine glory virtuous act"

 xxii
 spotless lamb thus offered blood
 save rest christ's selected fold
 noble lie ever truth good
 blest lips leasing told
 thoughtful awhile remained tyrant wood
 native wrath gan space withhold
 said "that thou discover soon
 aid counsel had'st thou ill"

 xxiii
 "my lofty thoughts" answered "envied
 another's hand work high desire
 thirst glory partner bide
 mine self alone conspire"
 "on thee alone" tyrant replied
 "shall fall vengeance wrath ire"
 "'tis right" quoth "i yield consent
 mine honor mine punishment"

 xxiv
 wretch new enraged
 asked hid image conveyed
 "not hid" quoth "but quite consumed flame
 idol eternal maid
 least preserved
 hands profane eft betrayed
 lord thing thus stolen demand
 see thief scorneth death therefor

 xxv
 "and yet theft sin
 brought unjustly took"
 heard tyrant rage begin
 whet teeth bend frowning look
 pity youth fairness grace could win
 joy comfort hope virgin forsook
 wrath killed remorse vengeance stopped mercy's breath
 love's thrall hate beauty's slave death

 xxvi
 ta'en damsel without remorse
 king condemned guiltless fire
 veil mantle plucked force
 bound tender arms twisted wire
 dumb silver dove corse
 hungry kites plucked rich attire
 deal perplexed sprite
 damask late changed purest white

 xxvii
 news mishap spread far near
 people ran young old gaze
 olindo also ran gan fear
 lady partner case
 found bound stript gear
 vile tormentors ready saw place
 broke throng presence brast
 thus bespake king rage haste

 xxxviii
 "not grief shall bear away
 honor noble feat
 durst could convey
 massy substance idol great
 sleight wardens betray
 strength heave goddess seat
 lord sails wind"
 ah thus loved yet love unkind

 xxix
 added "where shining glass
 lets light amid temple's side
 broken byways inward pass
 window made postern wide
 shall therefore illadvised lass
 usurp glory fact betide
 mine bonds mine flames pure
 glorious death glorious sepulture"

 xxx
 sophronia raised modest looks ground
 lover bent eyesight mild
 "tell fury conceit unsound
 presenteth death sweet child
 sufficient courage found
 bear anger tyrant wild
 hath fond love thy heart overgone
 wouldst thou live let die alone"

 xxxi
 thus spake nymph yet spake wind
 could alter wellsettled thought
 miracle strife wondrous kind
 love virtue contention wrought
 death victor meed assigned
 neglect other's safety sought
 thus king provoked ire
 strife bellows served anger's fire

 xxxii
 thinks thoughts selfguiltiness finds
 scorned power therefore scorned pain
 "nay nay" quoth "let strife doubt
 shall win fit reward obtain"
 sergeants hent young man stout
 bound likewise worthless chain
 back back fast stake ties
 two harmless turtles dight sacrifice

 xxxiii
 pile fagots sticks hay
 bellows raised newlykindled flame
 thus olindo doleful lay
 begun late bootless plaints frame
 "be bonds hopedfor day
 join longdesired dame
 fire alike burn hearts
 ah hard reward lovers' kind desarts

 xxxiv
 "far flames bonds kind lovers prove
 thus fortune casts hapless die
 death hath exchanged shafts love
 cupid thus lets borrowed arrows fly
 hymen say fury doth thee move
 lend thy lamps light tragedy
 yet contents die thee
 thy flames mine death torment

 xxxv
 "yet happy death mine ending blest
 torments easy full sweet delight
 could obtain breast breast
 thy bosom might receive yielded sprite
 thine heaven's pure clothing drest
 clearest skies might take united flight"
 thus complained gently reproved
 sweetly spake thus loved

 xxxvi
 "far plaints dear friend tears laments
 time place estates require
 think thy sins man's old foe presents
 judge quits soul hire
 name suffer pain torments
 whose prayers throne aspire
 behold heavens thither thine eyesight bend
 thy looks sighs tears intercessors send"

 xxxvii
 pagans loud cried god man
 christians mourned silent lamentation
 tyrant's self thing unused began
 feel heart relent mere compassion
 disposed ruth mercy
 sped thence home habitation
 sophronia stood grieved discontented
 saw lamented

 xxxviii
 lovers standing doleful wise
 warrior bold unwares approached near
 uncouth arms yclad strange disguise
 countries far new arrived
 savage tigress helmet lies
 famous badge clorinda used bear
 wonts every warlike stowre win
 bright sign well known fair inn

 xxxix
 scorned arts silly women use
 another thought nobler humor fed
 lofty hand would refuse
 touch dainty needle nice thread
 hated chambers closets secret news
 broad fields preserved maidenhead
 proud looks yet sweet though stern stout
 dam dove thus brought eagle

 xl
 young used tender hand
 foaming steed froary bit steer
 tilt tourney wrestle sand
 leave speed atlanta swift arear
 forests wild unfrequented land
 chase lion boar rugged bear
 satyrs rough fauns fairies wild
 chased oft oft took oft beguiled

 xli
 lusty lady came persia late
 christians encountered eft
 flesh opened many gate
 faithful souls bodies left
 eye first presented state
 poor souls hope help bereft
 greedy know mind man
 cause death swift fire ran

 xlii
 people made room twain
 piercing eyes fiery weapons dart
 silent saw one 'plain
 weaker body lodged nobler heart
 yet saw lament pain
 grief sorrow another's smart
 keep silence eyes
 dumb orators entreat skies

 xliii
 clorinda changed ruth warlike mood
 silver drops vermeil cheeks depaint
 sorrow speechless stood
 silence prevailed complaint
 asked aged man seemed grave good
 "come say sir" quoth "what hard constraint
 would murder love's queen beauty's king
 fault fare doth death bring"

 xliv
 thus inquired answer short gave
 chance large disclosed
 wondered case virgin brave
 guiltless fault supposed
 noble thought cast might save
 means suit battle reposed
 quick fire ran quenched
 thus bespake sergeants rout

 xlv
 "be one among dare
 hateful office aught proceed
 till return court take care
 reap displeasure making speed"
 men prepare
 faint hearts looks terror breed
 court went pardon would get
 way courteous king met

 xlvi
 "sir king" quoth "my name clorinda hight
 fame perchance pierced ears ere
 come try wonted power might
 defend land town
 hard assays esteem eath light
 great acts reach small things bow
 fight field defend wall
 point list naught refuse all"

 xlvii
 king "what land far remote
 asia's coasts phoebus' glistering rays
 glorious virgin recordeth
 thy fame thine honor worth renown praise
 since side thy succors got
 need fear aged days
 thine aid hope trust
 whole armies soldiers brave

 xlviii
 "now godfrey stays long fears ween
 thy courage great keeps foes awe
 thee actions far unworthy
 greatest danger draw
 commandress therefore princess queen
 forces thy word law"
 said virgin gan beaver vail
 thanked first thus began tale

 xlix
 "a thing unused great monarch may seem
 ask reward service yet come
 virtuous bounty esteem
 presume intreat groom
 silly maid danger redeem
 condemned burn unpartial doom
 excuse pity much youth
 come mercy ruth

 l
 "yet give leave tell highness
 blame christians thoughts acquite
 displeased say judge amiss
 every shot look hit white
 enchanter persuade
 lore macon's sacred rite
 us commandeth mighty mahomet
 idols temple pure set

 li
 "to therefore wonder done refar
 give praise honor thing
 us gods benign careful
 lest customs strange church bring
 let ismen squares trigons war
 weapons staff glass ring
 let us manage war blows like knights
 praise arms honor lies fights"

 lii
 virgin held peace said
 though pity never framed thought
 yet king admired noble maid
 purpose deny aught
 "i grant life" quoth "your promised aid
 frenchmen hath pardon bought
 seek offences
 guiltless quit guilty set free"

 liii
 thus loosed happiest humankind
 olindo blessed act thine
 true witness thy great heavenly mind
 sun moon stars love faith virtue shine
 forth went left pale death behind
 joy bliss marriage rites divine
 would died content
 live would brent

 liv
 king wicked thoughts suspicious
 supposed fast tree virtue grew
 blessed lord pharaoh vicious
 thus tyrannize upon thy hebrews true
 perform vile malicious
 exiled faithful crew
 strong body stout mind
 kept wives children pledge behind

 lv
 hard division harmless sheep
 must leave lambs hungry wolves charge
 labor's virtues watching ease sleep
 trouble best wind drives salvation's barge
 christians fled whither took keep
 strayed wild among forests large
 emmaus christian host
 conquer would houses lost

 lvi
 emmaus city small lies
 sion's walls distant little way
 man early morn doth rise
 may thither walk ere third hour day
 oh christian lord town espies
 merry hearts fresh gay
 sun inclined fast west
 night would chieftain take rest

 lvii
 canvas castles quickly rear
 build city hour's space
 lo disguised unusual gear
 two barons bold approachen gan place
 semblance kind mild gestures
 peace hands friendship face
 egypt's king ambassadors come
 many squire attends many groom

 lviii
 first aletes born lowly shed
 parents base rose sprung brier
 branches egypt spread
 plant pharaoh's garden prospered higher
 pleasing tales lord's vain ears fed
 flatterer pickthank liar
 cursed estate got many crime
 yet oft stair men climb

 lix
 argantes called knight
 stranger came late egypt land
 advanced honor's height
 stout courage strong hand
 bold heart restless sprite
 fierce stern outrageous keen sharpened brand
 scorner god scant friend
 pricked reason weapon's end

 lx
 two entreatance made might heard
 petition long denied
 gallants quickly made court guard
 brought sate famous guide
 whose kingly look princely mind declared
 noblesse virtue troth valor bide
 slender courtesy made argantes bold
 one prince salute another wold

 lxi
 aletes laid right hand heart
 bent head cast eyes full low
 reverence made courtly grace art
 humble lore know
 sober lips softly part
 whence pure rhetoric whole streams outflow
 thus said christian lords
 fell mildew sugared words

 lxii
 "o worthy earth fears
 high god defend thee heavenly shield
 humble hearts thy peers
 stiff necks thy sweet yoke may yield
 sheaves honor's harvest bears
 seed thy valiant acts world field
 egypt headland heaped lies
 thy fame worth justice wisdom victories

 lxiii
 "these altogether doth sovereign hide
 secret storehouse princely thought
 prays may long accordance bide
 great worthy wonders wrought
 oppose coming tide
 proffered love taught
 christian faith though divers kind
 loving vine elm twined

 lxiv
 "receive therefore unconquered hand
 precious handle cup love
 religion virtue band
 'twixt fasten friendship move
 mighty king doth understand
 mean power 'gainst juda land prove
 would threatened tempest fell
 mind princely first tell

 lxv
 "his mind prays thee contented
 joy peace conquests thou hast got
 thy death sion's fall lamented
 forbear land judea trouble
 things done haste leisure repented
 withdraw thine arms trust uncertain lot
 oft see least think betide
 thy friend 'gainst world beside

 lxvi
 "true labour vineyard thy lord
 ere prime thou hast imposed daywork done
 armies conquered perished thy sword
 cities sacked kingdoms hast thou
 ears mazed tongues thine acts record
 hands quake fear feet dread run
 though realms may thraldom bring
 higher praise glory spring

 lxvii
 "thy sign apogaeon placed
 moveth next must needs descend
 chance uncertain fortune double faced
 smiling first frowneth end
 beware thine honor disgraced
 take heed thou mar thou think'st mend
 folly fortune's play
 'gainst doubtful certain much 'gainst small lay

 lxviii
 "yet still sail prosperous blows wind
 till secret rock unwares light
 sea glory hath banks assigned
 wont win every fight
 still feed fire inflames thy mind
 bring nations subject thy might
 makes thee blessed peace light hold
 like summer's flies fear winter's cold

 lxix
 "they bid thee follow path made
 plain easy enter fortune's gate
 thy scabbard sheathe famous blade
 till settled thy kingdom estate
 till macon's sacred doctrine fall fade
 till woeful asia lie desolate
 sweet words grant baits allurements sweet
 greatest hopes oft greatest crosses meet

 lxx
 "for thy courage blind thine eyes
 clouds fury hide reason's beams
 may'st thou see desperate enterprise
 field death watered danger's streams
 high state bed misfortune lies
 mars unfriendly kind seems
 climbeth high earth hardest lights
 lowest falls attend highest flights

 lxxi
 "tell great counsel arms gold
 prince egypt war 'gainst prepare
 valiant turks persians bold
 unite forces cassanoe's heir
 oh marble pillar shall uphold
 falling trophies conquest fair
 trust monarch greekish land
 reed break breaking wound hand

 lxxii
 "the greekish faith like halfcut tree
 men take wild elephants inde
 thousand times hath beguiled thee
 firm waves seas leaves wind
 erst denied passage free
 passage men free use kind
 fight sake trust
 spend blood could scarce spare dust

 lxxiii
 "but hope trust perchance laid
 strong troops thee environ round
 yet foes unite soon dismayed
 strength erst divided found
 besides hour thy bands weaker made
 hunger slaughter lodging cold ground
 meanwhile turks seek succors king
 thus fade thy helps thus thy cumbers spring

 lxxiv
 "suppose weapon thy valor's pride
 subdue force thou may'st
 admit steel hurt wound thy side
 heaven hath thee favor done
 'gainst famine yet shield canst thou provide
 strength resist sleight wrath shun
 go shake spear draw thy flaming blade
 try hunger weaker made

 lxxv
 "the inhabitants pasture plain
 destroyed field waste laid
 fenced towers bestowed grain
 thou cam'st kingdom invade
 horse foot canst sustain
 whence comes thy store whence thy provision made
 thy ships bring perchance assigned
 oh live long please wind

 lxxvi
 "perhaps thy fortune doth control wind
 doth loose bind blasts secret cave
 sea pardie cruel deaf kind
 hear thy call still raging wave
 armed galleys assigned
 aid ships turks persians
 say hope left thy slender fleet
 dare flocks crows flight eagles meet

 lxxvii
 "my lord double conquest must make
 achieve renown emprize
 fleet navy chase take
 want victuals camp dies
 land field forsake
 vain sea hope victories
 could ships restore lost estate
 steed stolen shut door late

 lxxviii
 "in estate thou esteemest light
 proffered kindness egyptian king
 give leave say oversight
 beseems thee virtues spring
 heavens vouchsafe guide mind aright
 gentle thoughts peace quiet bring
 poor asia complaints may cease
 enjoy conquests got peace

 lxxix
 "nor ye part adventures
 part glory partners harms
 let blind fortune minds deceive
 stir try fierce alarms
 like sailor 'scaped wave
 peril person arms
 staying safe home stay
 better sit still men say rise fall"

 lxxx
 said aletes murmur rose
 showed dislike among christian peers
 angry gestures mislike disclose
 much speech offends noble ears
 lord godfrey's eye three times environ goes
 view countenance every warrior bears
 lastly egyptian baron stayed
 duke thus answer said

 lxxxi
 "ambassador full threats praise
 thy doubtful message hast thou wisely told
 thy sovereign love us says
 tell sows reap hundred fold
 thy talk coming storm displays
 threatened warfare pagans bold
 answer cousin
 plainest phrase lest intent thou miss

 lxxxii
 "know till suffered much pain
 lands seas storms tempests fall
 make passage easy safe plain
 leads us venerable wall
 might reward heaven obtain
 free town longer thrall
 grievous good end
 honors kingdoms lives goods spend

 lxxxiii
 "nor hope praise thirst worldly good
 enticed us follow emprise
 heavenly father keep sacred brood
 foul infection great vice
 zeal aye plague withstood
 let pleasures us sin entice
 grace mercy powerful hand
 keep us safe hurt sea land

 lxxxiv
 "this spur makes coursers run
 harbor safe danger's floods
 bield blustering winds shun
 guide forests deserts woods
 summer's shade winter's sun
 wealth treasure goods
 engine towers overthrows
 spear hurts sword wounds foes

 lxxxv
 "our courage hence hope valor springs
 trust shield spear
 succors france grecia brings
 weak posts list buildings rear
 defend us power kings
 chance war makes weak hearts fear
 hungry troops manna feed
 make seas land passage need

 lxxxvi
 "but sins us help deprive
 high justice let mercy fall
 yet deaths us contentment give
 die christ received burial
 might die envying live
 would die unrevenged
 turks christians perish
 cause joy complain much

 lxxxvii
 "think wars love strife affect
 hate sweet peace rest denay
 think sovereign's friendship reject
 list conquests stay
 seems would jews protect
 pray us thought aside lay
 us forbid town realm gain
 peace rest joy long may reign"

 lxxxviii
 answer given argantes wild drew nar
 trembling ire waxing pale rage
 could hold wrath increased far
 thus inflamed bespake captain sage
 "who scorneth peace shall fill war
 thought wisdom thy fury 'suage
 well show joy take fight
 makes prize love friendship light"

 lxxxix
 said took mantle's foremost part
 gan together fold wrap
 spake fell spiteful heart
 lions roar enclosed train trap
 "thou proud despiser inconstant mart
 bring thee war peace closed lap
 take quickly one thou hast time muse
 peace rest fight war thou choose"

 xc
 semblance fierce speechless proud provoke
 soldiers "war war" cry
 could tarry till chieftain spoke
 knight inflamed hereby
 lap opened spread forth cloak
 "to mortal wars" says "i defy"
 uttered fell rage hate
 seemed janus' church undo gate

 xci
 seemed fury discord madness fell
 flew lap unfolds
 glaring eyes anger's venom swell
 like brand foul alecto flame
 looked like huge tiphoius loosed hell
 shake heaven's everlasting frame
 built tower shinaar
 threat'neth battle 'gainst morning star

 xcii
 godfredo "depart bid king
 haste hitherward else within short
 gladly accept war bring
 let expect us banks nile"
 entertained banqueting
 gifts presented pagans vile
 aletes helmet rich gay
 late found nice among conquered prey

 xciii
 argant sword whereof web steel
 pommel rich stone hilt gold approved touch
 rarest workmanship forged weel
 curious art excelled substance much
 thus fair rich sharp see feel
 glad paynim enjoy
 said "how gift use wield
 soon shall see first meet field"

 xciv
 thus took congee angry knight
 thus fellow parleyed way
 "go thou day let walk night
 go thou egypt sion stay
 answer given thou canst unfold aright
 need say
 among arms go wreak spite
 let paris court hector loved fight"

 xcv
 thus late arrived messenger
 departs foe act word thought
 law nations lore war
 transgresses recketh naught
 thus parted ere wandered far
 friendly starlight walls brought
 yet fell heart thought long little way
 grieved stop tormented stay

 xcvi
 spread night spangled canopy
 summoned every restless eye sleep
 beds tender grass beasts lie
 fishes slumbered silent deep
 unheard serpent's hiss dragon's cry
 birds left sing philomen weep
 noise heaven's rolling circles kest
 sung lullaby bring world rest

 xcvii
 yet neither sleep ease shadows dark
 could make faithful camp captain rest
 longed see day hear lark
 record hymns chant carols blest
 yearned view walls wished mark
 journeys long addressed
 heart attends longing eye beholds
 beam eastern window first unfolds



 third book

 argument
 camp great jerusalem arrives
 clorinda gives battle breast
 fair erminia tancred's love revives
 jousts unknown loved best
 argant th' adventurers guide deprives
 stately pomp lay lord chest
 godfrey commands cut forest
 make strong engines assault town



 purple morning left crimson bed
 donned robes pure vermilion hue
 amber locks crowned roses red
 eden's flowery gardens gathered new
 camp murmur shrill spread
 arm arm cried arm arm trumpets blew
 merry noise prevents joyful blast
 hum small bees swarms cast

 ii
 captain rules courage guides heat
 forwardness stayed gentle rein
 yet easy haply feat
 stop current near charybdis main
 calm blustering winds mountains great
 fierce desires warlike hearts restrain
 rules yet ranks haste
 well knows disordered speed makes waste

 iii
 feathered thoughts feet wings dight
 swiftly marched yet tired thereby
 willing minds make heaviest burdens light
 gliding sun mounted high
 jerusalem behold appeared sight
 jerusalem view see spy
 jerusalem merry noise greet
 joyful shouts acclamations sweet

 iv
 troop jolly sailors row
 newfound land country descry
 dangerous seas stars unknowe
 thrall faithless waves trothless sky
 wished shore begun show
 salute joyful cry
 show land haste
 forgetting quite pains perils past

 v
 delight first sight breed
 pleased secret thought
 deep repentance forthwith succeed
 reverend fear trembling brought
 scantly durst feeble eyes dispreed
 upon town christ sold bought
 sins faultless suffered pain
 died lived

 vi
 soft words low speech deep sobs sweet sighs salt tears
 rose hearts joy pleasure mixed
 thus fares lord aright fears
 fear devotion joy faith fixed
 noise passions make one hears
 hoarse sea waves roar hollow rocks betwixt
 wind holts shady greaves
 murmur makes among boughs leaves

 vii
 naked feet trod dusty way
 following ensample zealous guide
 scarfs crests plumes feathers gay
 quickly doffed willing laid aside
 molten hearts wonted pride allay
 along watery cheeks warm tears slide
 secret speech used
 one accused

 viii
 "flower goodness root lasting bliss
 thou well life whose streams purple blood
 flowed cleanse soul amiss
 sinful men behold brutish flood
 melting heart distilled
 receive gree tears lord good
 never wretch sin overgone
 fitter time greater cause moan"

 ix
 wary watchman looked
 tops sion's towers hills dales
 saw dust fields pastures cover
 thick mists arise moory vales
 last sunbright shields gan discover
 glistering helms violence none fails
 metal shone like lightning bright skies
 man horse amid dust descries

 x
 loud cries "o dust ariseth
 shines shields targets clear
 arms valiant heart despiseth
 threatened storm death danger near
 behold foes" thus deviseth
 "haste haste vain delay increaseth fear
 horrid clouds dust yonder fly
 coming foes hide hide sky"

 xi
 tender children fathers old
 aged matrons virgin chaste
 durst shake spear target hold
 devoutly temples placed
 rest members strong courage bold
 hardy breasts harness donned haste
 walls gates dight
 king meanwhile directs aright

 xii
 things well ordered withdrew speed
 turret high two ports
 might near every need
 overlook lands furrows green
 thither sweet erminia lead
 court entertained
 since christians antioch bondage bring
 slew father thereof king

 xiii
 foes clorinda sallied
 many baron bold side
 within postern stood argantes stout
 rescue ill mote betide
 speeches brave cheered warlike rout
 bold words heartened ride
 "let us brave act" quoth "this day
 asia's hopes groundwork found lay"

 xiv
 folk thus spake virgin brave
 thereby behold forth passed christian band
 toward camp herds cattle drave
 morn forayed land
 fierce virago would booty save
 commander singled hand hand
 mighty man arms guardo hight
 far weak match fight

 xv
 met low dust guardo laid
 'twixt either army sell kest
 pagans shout joy hopeful said
 good beginnings would endings blest
 rest went noble maid
 broke helm pierced armed breast
 men paths rode made sword
 pass stream found ford

 xvi
 soon prey hands recovered
 step step frenchmen gan retire
 till little hill last hovered
 whose strength preserved clorinda's ire
 tempest hath long covered
 watery clouds breaks sparkling fire
 strong squadron lord tancredi came
 heart rage eyes courage flame

 xvii
 mast great spear gallant bore
 warlike pride made shake
 winds tall cedars toss mountains hoar
 king wondered bravery spake
 near seated
 felt heart love's hot fever quake
 "well shouldst thou know" quoth "each christian knight
 long acquaintance though armor dight

 xviii
 "say shows great worthiness
 rides rank bends lance fell"
 princess said less
 heart sighs eyes tears swell
 sighs tears wisely could suppress
 love passion dissembled well
 strove love hot desire cover
 till heart sighs eyes tears ran

 xix
 last spoke crafty sleight
 secret love disguised clothes hate
 "alas well" says "i know knight
 saw force courage proved late
 late viewed power might
 shook pillar cassanoe's state
 alas wounds gives fierce fell
 physic helps cure magic's spell

 xx
 "tancred hight macon would wear
 thrall ere fates life deprive
 hateful head spite bear
 would reave cruel heart live"
 thus said complainings hear
 sense wishes credit give
 sighed withal construed amiss
 thought wished kill longed kiss

 xxi
 forth pricked clorinda throng
 'gainst tancredi set spear rest
 upon helms cracked lances long
 head gilden casque kest
 every lace broke every thong
 dust threw plumed crest
 shoulders shone golden locks
 like sunny beams alabaster rocks

 xxii
 looks fire eyes lightning blaze
 sweet wrath would smile
 tancred whereon think'st thou dost thou gaze
 hast thou forgot short
 shape whose sweet face
 god love thy heart compile
 left thee cooling stream
 safe sun's heat scorched beauty's beam

 xxiii
 prince well knew though painted shield
 golden helm marked
 saved head axe well steeled
 assailed knight knight forbore
 'gainst foes proved field
 yet refrained ne'er
 following "turn thee" cried ireful wise
 threats kill twice

 xxiv
 baron lifts armed hand
 strike maid gazing eyes
 lordly cupid seemed arms stand
 way ward shun blows tries
 softly says "no stroke thy strong hand
 vanquish tancred thy conquest lies
 fair eyes fiery weapons dart
 find lighting place except heart"

 xxv
 last resolved although hoped small grace
 yet ere tell much loved
 pleasing words women's ears find place
 gentle hearts humble suits moved
 "o thou" quoth "withhold thy wrath space
 thou long see valor proved
 better warlike rout
 withdrawn somewhere alone fight

 xxvi
 "so singled may courage try"
 clorinda motion yielded glad
 helmless forestward gan hie
 whither prince right pensive wend sad
 virgin gan soon defy
 one blow strucken warded
 cried "hold ere prove might
 first hear thou conditions fight"

 xxvii
 stayed desperate love made bold
 "since fight thou wilt respite give
 covenants be" said "that thou unfold
 wretched bosom heart rive
 given thee long since thou cruel would
 dead let longer live
 pierce breast world may say
 eagle made turtledove prey

 xxviii
 "save thy grace let thine anger kill
 love hath disarmed life defence
 easy labor harmless blood spill
 strike punish none offence"
 said prince perchance
 declared move cruel sense
 ill time pagans thither came
 troop christians pursued

 xxix
 pagans fled valiant foes
 dread craft skills know
 soldier wild careless win lose
 saw locks damsel flew
 back proffereth goes
 strike disarmed view
 tancred cried "oh stay thy cursed hand"
 ward blow lift brand

 xxx
 yet cutting steel arrived
 fair neck adjoined noble head
 light wound amber hair
 purple drops railed bloody red
 rubies set flaming gold appear
 lord tancredi pale rage lead
 flew villain flight bound
 smart though received wound

 xxxi
 villain flies full rage ire
 pursues stood wondered
 yet follow showed desire
 stray far would perchance loth
 quickly turned fierce flaming fire
 foes wreaked anger wroth
 every side kills amain
 flies turns

 xxxii
 swift ure volga's rolling flood
 chased plains mastiff curs toforn
 flies succor neighbor wood
 often turns dreadful horn
 dogs imbrued sweat blood
 bite till beast flight return
 moors strange tennice run
 defenced flying balls unhurt shun

 xxxiii
 ran clorinda foes pursued
 approached city's wall
 lo pagans fierce wrath renewed
 cast ring wheeled
 'gainst christians' backs sides showed
 courage fierce new combat fall
 hill argantes came fight
 like angry mars aid trojan knight

 xxxiv
 furious tofore foremost rank
 sturdy steel forth stept warrior bold
 first smote saddle sank
 next steel lay mould
 saracen's spear worthies shrank
 breastplate could cursed tree outhold
 broke precious sword drew
 hit felled hurt slew

 xxxv
 clorinda slew ardelio aged knight
 whose graver years would labor yield
 age full puissance might
 two sons guard noble eild
 first far father's care sight
 called alicandro wounded lay field
 poliphern younger side
 nobly fought surely died

 xxxvi
 tancred strove overtake
 villain hurt dear
 vain pursuit last returned back
 brave troop discomfit saw well near
 thither spurred gan huge slaughter make
 shock steed blow knight could bear
 dead strikes lights upon
 thunders break high trees lebanon

 xxxvii
 dudon squadron adventurers brings
 aid worthy tired crew
 residue young rinaldo flings
 swift fiery lightning kindled new
 argent eagle silver wings
 field azure fair erminia knew
 "see sir king" says "a knight bold
 brave son peleus old

 xxxviii
 "he wins prize joust tournament
 acts numberless though years
 europe six likes war sent
 among thousand strong christian peers
 syria lost lost orient
 lands southern ocean wears
 conquered hot afric's tawny kings
 dwells nilus' unknown springs

 xxxix
 "rinaldo name armed fist
 breaks stone walls rams engines fail
 turn eyes would wist
 lord green golden mail
 dudon hight guideth list
 adventurers' troop whose prowess seld doth fail
 high birth grave years practise long war
 fearless heart make renowned far

 xl
 "see big man brown bound
 gernando called king norway's son
 prouder knight treads grass ground
 pride hath lost praise prowess
 kind pair white armed round
 edward gildippes begun
 love hazard fierce war prove
 famous arms famous love"

 xli
 thus tell foemen's worthiness
 slaughter rageth plain large
 tancred young rinaldo break press
 bruise helm press sevenfold targe
 troop dudon led performed less
 come give furious charge
 argantes' self fell one single blow
 inglorious bleeding lay earth full low

 xlii
 boaster ever risen
 rinaldo's horse e'en fell
 fall leg opprest sore
 space must algates dwell
 meanwhile pagan troops nigh forlore
 swiftly fled glad escaped well
 argantes clorinda stout
 bank bulwark served save rout

 xliii
 fled last force sustained
 christians' rage followed near
 scattered troops safety well trained
 residue fled brunt bear
 dudon pursued victory gained
 tigranes nobly broke spear
 sword headless ground cast
 gardeners branches lop spring fast

 xliv
 algazar's breastplate fine temper made
 corban's helmet forged magic art
 could save owners lord dudon's blade
 cleft corban's head pierced algazar's heart
 proud souls infernal shade
 amurath mahomet depart
 strong argantes thought life sure
 could safely fly fight secure

 xlv
 angry pagan bit lips teen
 ran stayed fled turned
 last unmarked unviewed unseen
 dudon almansor newly slain
 within side sheathed weapon keen
 fell worthy dusty plain
 lifted feeble eyes uneath
 opprest leaden sleep iron death

 xlvi
 three times strove view heaven's golden ray
 raised feeble elbow thrice
 thrice tumbled lowly lay
 three times closed dying eyes
 speaks word yet makes signs pray
 sighs faints groans dies
 argantes proud spoil corpse disdained
 shook sword blood dudon stained

 xlvii
 turning christian knights cried
 "lordlings behold bloody reeking blade
 last night given noble guide
 tell proof thereof day made
 needs must please well betide
 well use martial trade
 rare gift present
 tell workman fits instrument

 xlviii
 "if proof thereof long see
 say still thirsts would heartblood drink
 haste encounter
 say find least doth think"
 christians words enraged
 shun ire doth safely shrink
 shelter neighbor wall
 well guarded troops soldiers

 xlix
 like storms hail stones fell high
 cast bulwarks flankers ports towers
 shafts quarries engines fly
 thick falling drops april showers
 french withdrew list press nigh
 saracens escaped powers
 rinaldo earth upleapt
 leg steed long kept
 l
 came breathed vengeance breast
 'gainst noble dudon late slain
 come thus spoke rest
 "warriors stand gazing vain
 pale death valiant leader opprest
 come wreak loss bootless complain
 walls weak keep cowards
 rampier withstand courage stout

 li
 "of double iron brass adamant
 wall built flaming fire
 yet pagan vile fortress want
 shroud coward head safe mine ire
 come follow bid base fear avaunt
 harder work deserves greater hire"
 word close walls starts
 fears arrows quarries stones darts

 lii
 waves neptune lift eyes
 chide winds trojan ships opprest
 countenance calmed seas winds skies
 looked rinaldo shook crest
 walls pagan fears flies
 dreadful sight trembling stayed least
 dread awful visage cast
 seem poor doves goshawks' sight aghast

 liii
 herald ligiere godfrey came
 stay calm courage hot
 "retire" quoth "godfrey commands
 wreak ire season fitteth not"
 though loth rinaldo stayed stopped flame
 boiled hardy stomach hot
 bridled fury grew thereby fell
 rivers stopped banks swell

 liv
 hands retire dangered foes
 retreat wise wary
 murdered dudon lamenting goes
 wonted use ruth list vary
 upon friendly arms soft impose
 noble burden corpse carry
 meanwhile godfredo mountain great
 beheld sacred city seat

 lv
 hierusalem seated two hills
 height unlike turned side side
 space gentle valley fills
 mount mount expansed fair wide
 three sides sure imbarred crags hills
 rest easy scant rise espied
 mighty bulwarks fence plainer part
 art helps nature nature strengtheneth art

 lvi
 town stored troughs cisterns made
 keep fresh water country seems
 devoid grass unfit ploughmen's trade
 fertile moist rivers wells streams
 grow trees make summer's shade
 shield parched land scorching beams
 save wood stands six miles town'
 aged cedars dark shadows brown

 lvii
 east among dusty valleys glide
 silver streams jordan's crystal flood
 west midland sea bounders tied
 sandy shores joppa whilom stood
 north samaria stands side
 golden calf reared bethel wood
 bethlem south christ incarnate
 pearl steel diamond set brass

 lviii
 thus duke every side descried
 city's strength walls gates
 saw least fortified
 weakest seemed walls keep
 ermina armed rode spied
 thus bespake heathen tyrant stout
 "see godfrey purple clad gold
 stately port princely look behold

 lix
 "well seems born honor crowned
 well lore knows regiment
 peerless fight counsel grave sound
 double gift glory excellent
 among armies warrior found
 graver speech bolder tournament
 raymond pardie counsel match might
 tancred young rinaldo like fight"

 lx
 king "he likes well therefore
 knew whilom court france
 egypt went ambassador
 saw break many sturdy lance
 yet chin sign manhood bore
 youth forward governance
 words actions portance brave
 future virtue timely tokens gave

 lxi
 "presages ah true" space
 sighed grief said "fain would know
 man red knightly grace
 worthy lord seemeth show
 like godfrey looks face
 like person somedeal low"
 "baldwin" quoth "that noble baron hight
 birth brother match might

 lxii
 "next look seems counsel fit
 whose silver locks betray store days
 raymond hight man wondrous wit
 toulouse lord wisdom praise
 forethinks doth looks hit
 stratagems good success always
 gilded helm beyond rides mild
 good prince william england's king's dear child

 lxiii
 "with guelpho noble mate
 birth acts arms alike rest
 know well since beheld late
 broad shoulders squared breast
 proud foe quite hath ruinate
 high estate antioch opprest
 see boemond death bring
 mine aged lord father king"

 lxiv
 thus talked meanwhile godfredo went
 troops valley stayed
 vain thought labor spent
 assail parts mountains laid
 northern gate force bent
 gainst camped gainst engines played
 felt fury angry power
 gates lies corner tower

 lxv
 town's third part little less
 fore duke glorious ensigns spread
 great compass forteress
 round could environed
 narrow siegenor babel's king guess
 whilom took army led
 ways kept foe
 might city come go

 lxvi
 care next cast trenches deep
 preserve resting camp night
 lest city soldiers sleep
 might assail untimely flight
 done went lords princes weep
 dire complaints murdered knight
 dudon dead lay slaughtered ground
 soldiers sat lamenting round

 lxvii
 wailing friends adorned mournful bier
 woful pomp whereon corpse laid
 saw bulloigne prince draw near
 felt new grief new sorrow made
 withouten show change cheer
 springing tears within fountains stayed
 rueful looks upon corpse cast
 awhile thus bespake last

 lxviii
 "we need mourn thee laid rest
 earth thy bed grave skies
 thy soul cradle nest
 live thy glory never dies
 like christian knight champion blest
 thou didst live die feed thine eyes
 thy redeemer's sight crowned bliss
 thy faith zeal merit welldeserving

 lxix
 "our loss thine provokes plaints tears
 lost thee ship mast

 though thy death far army hears

 thou wilt procure help divine reaps
 sows godly sorrow joy heaps

 lxx
 "for god lord armipotent
 armed angels aid send
 dothan prophet sent
 thou wilt come well defend
 host thy sacred weapons bent
 gainst sion's fort gates bulwarks rend

 may temples praise christ thee"

 lxxi
 thus complained sable shade
 ycleped night thick enveloped
 sun veil double darkness made
 sleep eased care rest brought complaint bed
 night wary duke devising laid
 high wall best battered
 strong engines might aptly frame
 whence get timber fit build

 lxxii
 lark sorrowful duke arose
 mourner chief dudon's burial
 cypress sad pile friends compose
 hill o'ergrown cedars tall
 beside hearse fruitful palmtree grows
 ennobled since great funeral
 dudon's corpse softly laid ground
 priest sung hymns soldiers wept around

 lxxiii
 among boughs bestow
 ensigns arms witness praise
 pagan lords owe
 prosperous fights happy frays
 shield fixed hole
 distich underwrit says
 "this palm stretched arms doth overspread
 champion dudon's glorious carcase dead"

 lxxiv
 work performed advisement good
 godfrey carpenters men skill

 convoy meet guard safe ill
 within valley deep forest stood
 christian eyes unseen unknown

 chosen workmen timber went

 lxxv

 echo sighed groves unseen
 weeping nymphs fled bowers exiled
 fell shady tops shaking treen
 came sacred palms ashes wild
 funeral cypress holly ever green
 weeping fir thick beech sailing pine
 married elm fell fruitful vine

 lxxvi
 shooter grew broadleaved sycamore
 barren plantain walnut sound
 myrrh foul sin doth still deplore
 alder owner waterish ground
 sweet juniper whose shadow hurteth sore
 proud cedar oak king forests crowned
 thus fell trees noise deserts roar
 beasts caves birds nests forlore



 fourth book

 argument
 satan fiends spirits assembleth
 sends forth work christians woe
 false hidraort aid hell doth call
 sends armida entrap foe
 tells birth fortune fall
 asks aid allures wins worthies
 consent enterprise prove
 wins deceit craft beauty love



 thus work went lucky speed
 reared rams horned fronts advance
 ancient foe man mortal seed
 wannish eyes upon bent askance
 saw labors well succeed
 wept rage threatened dire mischance
 choked curses spake
 noise wild bulls softly bellow make

 ii
 last resolving damned thought
 find let stop warlike feat
 gave command princes brought
 throne infernal seat
 fool thing naught
 god resist change purpose great
 foes doth thunder ire
 whose arrows hailstones coals fire

 iii
 dreary trumpet blew dreadful blast
 rumbled lands kingdoms
 wasteness wide roared hollows vast
 filled deep horror fear wonder
 half dreadful noise tempests cast
 fall skies storms hail thunder
 half loud whistling winds sing
 broke earthen prisons king

 iv
 peers pluto's realm assembled
 amid palace angry king
 hideous forms shapes tofore unseen
 fear death terror amazement bring
 ugly paws trample green
 gnaw snakes shoulders hing
 forked tails stretch forth high
 tear twinkling stars trembling sky

 v
 silenus' foul loathsome route
 sphinxes centaurs gorgons fell
 howling scillas yawling round
 serpents hiss sevenmouthed hydras yell
 chimera spues fire brimstone
 polyphemus blind supporteth hell
 besides ten thousand monsters therein dwells
 misshaped unlike like naught else

 vi
 princes took wonted seat
 thrones redhot ybuilt burning brass
 pluto middest heaved trident great
 rusty iron huge forged
 rocks salt sea billows beat
 atlas' tops clouds height pass
 compared huge person molehills
 rough front horns lifted

 vii
 tyrant proud frowned lofty cell
 looks made monsters tremble
 eyes full rage venom swell
 two beacons seem men arms assemble
 feltered locks bosom fell
 rugged mountains briars thorns resemble
 yawning mouth foamed clotted blood
 gaped like whirlpool wide stygian flood

 viii
 mount etna vomits sulphur
 cliffs burning crags fire smoke
 mouth flew kindled coals
 hot sparks smells man beast would choke
 gnarring porter durst whine doubt
 still furies sovereign spoke
 swift cocytus stayed murmur shrill
 thus murderer thundered

 ix
 "ye powers infernal worthier far sit
 sun whence offspring take
 whilom welkin flit
 tumbled headlong empty lake
 former glory still remember
 bold attempts war make
 gainst rules starry sphere
 like traitors lie damned

 x
 "and instead clear gladsome sky
 titan's brightness glorious
 deep darkness lo helpless lie
 hopeless joy former bliss
 makes griefs multiply
 sinful creature man elected
 place heavens possess must
 vile man begot clay born dust

 xi
 "nor sufficed also gave
 son darling slain
 conquer hell death sin grave
 man condemned restore
 brake prisons would algates save
 souls dwell woe pain
 heaven live always
 endless glory crowned lasting praise

 xii
 "but recount thus passed harms
 remembrance fresh makes weakened sorrows strong
 expulsed injurious arms
 due honors us right belong
 let us leave speak alarms
 bend forces gainst present wrong
 ah see attempted hath
 bring lands nations faith

 xiii
 "then let us careless spend day night
 without regard haps comes goes
 let asia subject christians' might
 prey sion conquering foes
 let adore christ aright
 nations whilom chose
 brazen tables lore ywrit
 let tongues lands acknowledge

 xiv
 "so shall sacred altars
 holy idols tumbled mould
 wretched man sinful
 shall pray offer incense myrrh gold
 temples shall costly deckings miss
 naked walls pillars freezing cold
 tribute souls shall end estate
 pluto reign kingdoms desolate

 xv
 "oh courage perished clean
 whilom dwelt within haughty thought
 armed shining fire weapons keen
 angels proud heaven fought
 grant fell phlegrean green
 yet good cause though fortune naught
 chance assisteth oft ignobler part
 lost field yet lost heart

 xvi
 "go strength hope spirits go
 western rebels power withstand
 pluck weeds overgrow
 gentle garden hebrews' land
 quench spark kindles
 asia burn consumed brand
 use open force secret guile unspied
 craft virtue gainst foe defied

 xvii
 "among knights worthies train
 let like outlaws wander uncouth ways
 let slain field let
 make oracles women's yeas nays
 pine foolish love let complain
 godfrey's rule mutinies gainst raise
 turn one's sword fellow's heart
 thus kill spoil greatest part"

 xviii
 words tyrant ended
 lesser devils arose ghastly roar
 thronged forth world gad
 land filled river stream shore
 goblins fairies fiends furies mad
 ranged flowery dales mountains hoar
 every trembling leaf sit
 solid earth welkin flit

 xix
 world spread forth far wide
 filling thoughts ungodly heart
 secret mischief anger hate pride
 wounding lost souls sin's empoisoned dart
 say muse recount whence first tried
 hurt christian lords part
 thou knowest things performed long agone
 latter age hears little truth none

 xx
 town damascus lands
 ruled hidraort wizard grave sage
 acquainted well damned rout
 pluto's reign even tender age
 yet war could figure
 wished ending success presage
 neither stars powers hell
 skill art charm devil could tell

 xxi
 yet thoughtoh vain conceit man
 thou wishest judgest things come
 french host sure destruction ran
 condemned quite heaven's eternal doom
 thinks force withstand vanquish
 egyptian strength therefore would
 prey glory fight
 upon syrian folk would haply light

 xxii
 held frenchmen's worth prize
 feared doubtful gain bloody war
 closely false slyly war
 cast might annoy far
 gan upon point devise
 counsellors ill still nearest
 hand satan ready ere men need
 think make deed

 xxiii
 counselled best hunt game
 dart cast net toil pitch
 niece nice tender dame
 peerless wit nature's blessings rich
 deceit could beauty frame
 false fair young virgin witch
 told sum emprise
 praised thus fair wise

 xxiv
 "my dear underneath locks gold
 native brightness thy lovely hue
 hidest grave thoughts ripe wit wisdom old
 skill mine arts untrue
 thee purpose great must unfold
 enterprise thy cunning must pursue
 weave thou end web begin
 distaff hold come thou spin

 xxv
 "go christians' host assay
 subtle sleights women use love
 shed brinish tears sob sigh entreat pray
 wring thy fair hands cast thine eyes
 mourning beauty hath much power men say
 stubborn hearts pity frail move
 look pale dread blush sometime shame
 seeming truth thy lies soonest frame

 xxvi
 "take bait lord godfrey thou may'st
 frame snares look strains alluring speech
 love conquest thou hast
 thus purposed war thou may'st ease impeach
 else lead lords deserts waste
 hold slaves far leader's reach"
 thus taught conclusion saith
 "all things lawful lands faith"

 xxvii
 sweet armida took charge hand
 tender piece beauty sex age
 sun sunken underneath land
 began wanton pilgrimage
 silken weeds trusteth withstand
 conquer knights warlike equipage
 night ambling dame syrians prated
 good bad loved hated

 xxviii
 within days nymph arrived
 puissant godfrey tents ypight
 upon strange attire visage clear
 gazed soldier gazed every knight
 comet doth skies appear
 people stand amazed light
 wondered sought
 mister wight whence ybrought

 xxix
 yet never eye cupid's service vowed
 beheld face lovely pride
 tinsel veil amber locks shroud
 strove cover could hide
 golden sun behind silver cloud
 streameth beams every side
 marble goddess set cnidos naked
 seemed unclothed awaked

 xxx
 gamesome wind among tresses plays
 curleth growing riches short
 spareful eye spread beams denays
 keeps shot cupid keeps fort
 rose lily cheek assays
 paint true fairness bravest sort
 lips blooms naught single rose
 still blush still kiss still close

 xxxi
 breasts two hills o'erspread purest snow
 sweet smooth supple soft gently swelling
 lies milken dale
 love youth gladness whiteness make dwelling
 breasts half hid half laid show
 wanton clad much
 please eye rest unseen touch

 xxxii

 spy storehouse springtime gold

 alas hope left quench fire

 xxxiii
 thus passed praised wished wondered
 among troops encamped lay
