 breaking faith eternal shame
 godfrey whose careful eyes beloved
 never turned saw marked
 viewed wounded county bleed
 sighed feared perchance need

 cv
 words threatening eyes
 stirred captains revenge wrong
 forthwith spurred courser forward hies
 within rests put lances long
 either side squadron brave flies
 boldly made fierce encounter strong
 raised dust overspread begun
 shining arms far shining sun

 cvi

 lay horse another field

 sighed sobbed prayed cried

 fiercer fewer still wasted

 cvii

 breaking ranks ranges long
 therewith passage made place

 take revenge late received disgrace
 greedy wolf seemed would assuage
 raymond's blood hunger rage

 cx
 "there enter hottest fight
 thy force left wing strongly bend"
 said brave onset gave knight
 many paynim bold made end

 could power lives defend

 men horse heaps together lay

 cxi
 o'erthrown likewise away right wing ran
 one turned face
 save bold argantes else fled every man
 fear drove thence heaps headlong chase
 stayed alone battle new began
 five hundred men weaponed sword mace
 great resistance never could made
 argantes single blade

 cxii
 strokes swords thrusts many spear
 shock many joust long sustained
 seemed strength enough charge bear
 time strike gained
 armors broke members bruised

 foes upon pressed fast
 weight bore back last

 cxiii

 whose headlong fury bore backward still
 like one fled one mourned
 foes greater ill
 threatening eyes like flaming torches burned
 courage thirsted yet blood spill
 every way every mean sought
 stay flying mates naught

 cxiv

 bands troops ease safe retired
 yet coward dread lacks order fear wants art
 deaf attend commanded desired

 cxv

 set heaven end mortal war
 western lords time borne away
 prize travelled far
 devils saw sure decay
 false kingdom bloody war

 come follow good fortune guide"

 music deafed trembling ground



 eighth book

 argument
 messenger godfrey sage doth tell
 prince denmark's valour death end
 italians trusting signs untrue well
 think rinaldo slain wicked fiend
 breeds fury breasts bosoms swell
 ire hate war strife forth send
 threaten godfrey prays lord
 calms fury look word



 skies storms tempests cleared
 lord aeolus shut winds hold
 silvermantled morning fresh appeared
 roses crowned buskined high gold
 spirits yet tempests reared
 malice would still unfold
 one astragor named
 speeches thus foul alecto framed

 ii
 "alecto see could stop stay
 knight foes new tidings brings
 hands escaped life away
 great prince chief pagan kings
 comes fall slain lord say
 death loss tells sad things
 great news brings greatest dangers
 bertoldo's son shall called home

 iii
 "thou knowest would befall bestir thee
 prevent craft force could withstand
 turn evil speeches man
 weapon wound godfredo's hand
 kindle debate infect poison wan
 english switzer italian band
 great tumult move make brawls quarrels rife
 set camp uproar strife

 iv
 "this act beseems thee well deed
 much may'st thou boast lord king"
 thus said sprite persuasion small need
 monster grants undertake thing
 meanwhile knight whose coming thus dread
 camp weary limbs doth bring
 wellnigh breathless "warriors bold" cried
 "who shall conduct famous guide"

 v
 hundred strove stranger's guide
 hearken news knights heaps assemble
 man fell lowly upon knee
 kissed hand made proud babel tremble
 "right puissant lord whose valiant acts" quoth
 "the sands stars number best resemble
 would god gladder news might unfold"
 paused sighed thus told

 vi
 "sweno king denmark's heir
 stay staff declining eild
 longed among squadrons fair
 christ's faith serve spear shield
 weariness storms sea air
 contents crowns sceptres yield
 dear entreaties kind sire
 could bosom quench glorious fire

 vii
 "he thirsted sore learn warlike art
 thee great lord master
 ashamed noble heart
 never act deserved fame
 besides news tidings part
 young rinaldo's worth praises came
 courage stirred hath
 zeal religion godliness faith

 viii
 "he hasted forward without delay
 took knights chosen band
 directly toward thrace took way
 byzance old chief fortress land
 greek monarch gently prayed stay
 herald sent fand
 antioch first declared
 defended nobly afterward

 ix
 "defended gainst corbana valiant knight
 persian armies guide
 brought many soldiers bold fight
 void men left kingdom wide
 told thine acts thy wisdom thy might
 told deeds many lord beside
 speech length young rinaldo passed
 told great achievements first last

 x
 "and noble camp late
 besieged town sort
 prayed participate
 last conquest noble fort
 hardy sweno opened gate
 worthy anger brave report
 hour seemed five years long
 till fighting pagans strong

 xi
 "and herald told fights frays
 cowardice reproved thought
 stay counsels prays
 hears else heard regardeth naught
 fears perils whilst delays
 lest last work without help wrought
 doubt danger lies
 hazard else fears peril spies

 xii
 "thus hasting hasted death
 death us fatal guide
 rising morn appeared yet aneath
 armed fit ride
 nearest way seemed best o'er hold heath
 went deserts waste forests wide
 streets ways openeth goes
 sets land free intruding foes

 xiii
 "now want food dangerous ways find
 open war ambush closely laid
 yet passed forth perils left behind
 foes dead run away afraid
 victory happy blew wind
 careless heedless made
 one day tents happed rear
 palestine approached near

 xiv
 "there scouts return bring us news
 dreadful noise horse arms hear
 deemed sundry signs shows
 mighty host pagans near
 sad tidings many changed hues
 looked pale dread shook fear
 noble lord altered naught
 look face gesture thought

 xv
 "but said 'a crown prepare possess
 martyrdom happy victory
 hope wish less
 greater merit greater glory
 brethren camp shortly guess
 temple sacred memory
 holy men future age
 view graves shall come pilgrimage'

 xvi
 "this said set watch order right
 guard camp along trenches deep
 armed every knight
 willed back arms keep
 stillness quiet night
 drowned world silence sleep
 suddenly heard dreadful sound
 deafed earth tremble made ground

 xvii
 "'arm arm' cried prince sweno
 glistering shining steel leaped foremost
 visage shone noble looks flame
 kindled brand courage bold stout
 lo pagans assault us came
 huge numbers hemmed us round
 forest thick spears us grew
 us cloud arrows flew

 xviii
 "uneven fight unequal fray
 enemies twenty men one
 every side slain wounded lay
 unseen naught glistering weapons shone
 number dead could man say
 place darkness overgone
 night mantle black upon spreads
 hiding losses valiant deeds

 xix
 "but hardy sweno midst train
 great acts well descried wot
 darkness could valor's daylight stain
 wondrous blows every side smote
 stream blood bank bodies slain
 made bulwark mote
 soe'er turned fatal brand
 dread looks death sate hand

 xx
 "thus fought till morning bright appeared
 strewed roses azure sky
 lamp night's thick darkness cleared
 wherein bodies dead buried lie
 sad cries heaven grief reared
 loss apparent descry
 camp destroyed almost
 people wellnigh slain lost

 xxi
 "of thousands twain hundred scant survived
 sweno murdered saw valiant knight
 know heart sunder rived
 dear compassion woful sight
 showed change said 'since deprived
 friends chance fight
 come follow path heaven blood
 marks angels made martyrs good'

 xxii
 "this said glad think death hand
 signs heavenly joy shone eyes
 saracens mighty band
 fearless heart constant breast flies
 steel could shield cutting brand
 hits without recure dies
 never struck felled killed foe
 wounded top toe

 xxiii
 "not strength courage preserved live
 hardy champion fortress faith
 strucken strikes still stronger strive
 hurt doth scathe
 toward furious knight gan drive
 members huge fierce looks full wrath
 aid many pagan crew
 long fight last prince sweno slew

 xxiv
 "ah heavy chance fell valiant youth
 mongst us one strong appear
 revenge death truth
 dear blood noble bones swear
 life care ruth
 wounds shunned blows would bear
 heaven wished end denied
 even willing died

 xxv
 "alive fell among fellows slain
 yet wounded one thought dead
 foes since explain
 sore amazed heart head
 opened first mine eyes
 night's curtain black upon earth spread
 darkness feeble sight
 appeared twinkling slender light

 xxvi
 "not much force judgement lies
 discern things seen mistake
 saw like ope shut eyes
 turns half asleep half awake
 body eke another torment tries
 wounds began smart hurts ache
 every sore member pinched
 night's sharp air heaven's frost earth's cold grass

 xxvii
 "but still light approached near near
 whispering murmur run
 till side arrived
 spread feeble eyes begun
 two men behold vestures long appear
 lamp hand said 'o son
 dear lord helps servants trust
 ere ask grants things just'

 xxviii
 "this said one sacred blessings flings
 upon corse broad ourstretched hand
 mumbled hymns psalms holy things
 could neither hear understand
 'arise' quoth wings
 whole sound leaped land
 oh miracle sweet gentle strange true
 limbs new strength received vigor new

 xxix
 "i gazed like one whose heart denieth
 think done sees strangely wrought
 till one said thus 'o thou little faith
 doubts perplex thy unbelieving thought
 one us living body hath
 christ's chosen servants fear us naught
 avoid world's allurements vain
 wilful penance hermits poor remain

 xxx
 "'us messengers comfort thee elect
 lord hath sent rules heaven hell
 often doth blessed effect
 weak means wonder tell
 body lie neglect
 wherein noble soul lately dwell
 uprisen
 shall united lasting bliss

 xxxi
 "'i say lord sweno's corpse prepared
 tomb according worth
 honor shall far declared
 praises spread south north"
 lift thine eyes heavens ward
 mark yonder light like sun shines forth
 shall direct thee beams clear
 find body thy master dear'

 xxxii
 "with saw cynthia's silver face
 like falling star beam slide
 bright golden line marked place
 lightened clear streams forest wide
 latmos shone phoebe left chase
 laid endymion's side
 light well discern could
 shape wounds face though dead yet bold

 xxxiii
 "he lay grovelling knight
 ever heavenly things desire
 toward heaven prince lay bolt upright
 like upward still sought aspire
 right hand closed held weapon bright
 ready strike execute ire
 left upon breast humbly laid
 men might know died prayed

 xxxiv
 "whilst wounds bootless tears wept
 neither helped eased care
 one aged fathers stepped
 forced hand needless weapon spare
 'this sword' quoth 'hath yet good token kept
 pagans' blood drunk share
 blusheth still could save lord
 rich strong sharp never better sword

 xxxv
 "'heaven therefore though prince slain
 used erst wield precious brand
 brave blade unused remain
 pass strong stronger hand
 like force wield
 longer shall grace fortune stand
 shall bitter vengeance take
 sweno slew sweno's sake

 xxxvi
 "'great solyman killed sweno solyman
 sweno's sake upon sword must die
 take blade haste thee
 thither godfrey doth encamped lie
 fear thou shall
 stop thy way lead thy steps awry
 doth thee message send
 thee hand shall guide keep defend

 xxxvii
 "'arrived blessed
 true report thou declare tell
 zeal strength courage skill
 thy beloved lord late dwell
 christ's sake came blood spill
 sample left well
 future ages may admire deed
 courage take brave end read

 xxxviii
 "'it resteth thou know gentle knight
 sword shall thy master's heir
 rinaldo young might
 martial skill champion may compare
 give say "the heavens bright
 revenge commit care"
 thus listened old man said
 wonder new speech us stayed

 xxxix
 "for whereas wounded body lay
 stately tomb curious work behold
 wondrous art built clay
 rising round carcass enfold
 words engraven marble gray
 warrior's name worth praise told
 gazing stood often read
 epitaph dear master dead

 xl
 "'among soldiers' quoth hermit 'here
 must sweno's corpse remain marble chest
 heaven flown spirits dear
 live endless joy forever blest
 funeral thou hast many tear
 accompanied high time rest
 come guest morning ray
 shall light world take thy way'

 xli
 "this said led holts hags
 thorns bushes scant legs drew
 till underneath heap stones crags
 last brought secret mew
 among bears wild boars wolves stags
 dwelt safe disciple true
 feared treason force hurt
 guiltless conscience castle's wall

 xlii
 "my supper roots bed moss leaves
 weariness little rest found ease
 purple morning night bereaves
 late usurped rule lands seas
 loathed couch wakeful hermit leaves
 pray rose please
 congee took ended
 hitherward advised came"

 xliii
 dane woful tale done thus
 good prince godfrey answered "sir knight
 thou bringest tidings sad dolorous
 heavy camp laments right
 since brave troops dear friends us
 one hour hath spent one unlucky fight
 appeared hath thy master stout
 lightning doth kindled quenched

 xliv
 "but death end exceedeth
 conquests vain realms spoils gold
 aged rome's proud stately capital
 ever triumph yet like behold
 sit heaven thrones celestial
 crowned glory conquest bold
 hurts think shows
 glories bloody wounds blows

 xlv
 "but thou hast part thy race run
 haps hazards world ytost
 rejoice high honors
 cannot chance fortune crossed
 thou askest bertoldo's son
 know wandereth banished host
 till new tidings man tell
 within camp deem best thou dwell"

 xlvi
 words many soul renewed
 sweet remembrance fair sophia's child
 salt tears cheeks bedewed
 lest evil betide mongst pagans wild
 every one valiant prowess showed
 battles stories long compiled
 telling dane acts conquests past
 made ears amazed heart aghast

 xlvii
 remembrance youth wrought
 tender pity softened mind
 behold returned home caught
 bands forage late assigned
 abundance great brought
 flocks herds every sort kind
 corn although much hay feed
 noble steeds coursers need

 xlviii
 also brought misadventure sad
 tokens signs seemed apparent true
 rinaldo's armor frushed hacked
 oft pierced blood besmeared new
 camp always rumors bad
 farthest spread woful tidings flew
 thither assembled straight high low
 longing see loth know

 xlix
 heavy hauberk seen known
 brand shield wherein displayed flies
 bird proves chickens
 looking gainst sun open eyes
 shield pagans often shown
 many hard hardy enterprise
 many gash many stroke
 see sigh see frushed broke

 l
 soldiers whispered hand
 fault cause lay
 godfrey called aliprand
 captain brought late prey
 man points virtue stand
 blameless words true whate'er say
 "say" quoth duke "where armor
 hide truth tell good bad"

 li
 answered "as far hence think
 two days speedy post well rideth
 gazaward little plain doth lie
 among steepy hills hideth
 slow falling mountains high
 rolling brook twixt bush bramble glideth
 clad thick shade boughs broadleaved treen
 fit place men lie wait unseen

 lii
 "thither seek flocks herds went
 perchance close hid greenwood shaw
 found springing grass blood besprent
 warrior tumbled blood saw
 arms though dusty bloody hacked rent
 yet well knew near corse draw
 view face vain started
 body fair head parted

 liii
 "his right hand wanted eke many wound
 trunk pierced back breast
 little empty helm found
 silver eagle shining crest
 spy ask gazed round
 churl toward us steps addressed
 us armed corse spied
 ran away fearful face hide

 liv
 "but pursued took spake fair
 till comforted last answer made
 day saw repair
 band soldiers forest shade
 one carried golden hair
 head late cut murdering blade
 face fair young chin
 sign heard bud yet begin

 lv
 "and sindal wrapt away bore
 head hung saddlebow
 murtherers arms wore
 soldiers camp well know
 carcass disarmed weeping sore
 guessed harness owe
 away brought first order gave
 noble body laid grave

 lvi
 "but trunk believe
 nobler tomb worth deserveth well"
 said good aliprando took leave
 certain troth tell
 sore sighed duke news grieve
 fears heart doubts bosom dwell
 yearned know find learn truth
 punish would slain youth

 lvii
 night dispread lazy wings
 o'er broad fields heaven's bright wilderness
 sleep soul's rest ease careful things
 buried happy peace less
 thou argillan alone sorrow stings
 still wakest musing great deeds guess
 sufferest thy watchful eyes creep
 sweet repose mild gentle sleep

 lviii
 man strong limb 'says
 bold ready tongue working sprite
 near trento born bred brawls frays
 jars quarrels civil fight
 exiled hills public ways
 filled blood robberies day night
 asia's wars last came
 boldly served purchased fame

 lix
 closed eyes last day drew near
 yet slept senseless lay opprest
 strange amazedness sudden fear
 false alecto breathed breast
 working powers within deluded
 stone still quiet lay yet took rest
 thought fiend presented
 strange visions weak brain tormented

 lx
 murdered body huge beside stood
 head right hand lately spoiled
 left hand bore head whose visage good
 pale wan dust gore defoiled
 yet spake though dead whose sad words blood
 forth lips huge abundance boiled
 "fly argillan false camp fly far
 whose guide traitor captains murderers

 lxi
 "godfrey hath murdered treason vile
 favor hope trusty friends
 villain heart full fraud guile
 destruction thoughts bends
 yet thou thirst praise noble stile
 thy strength thou trust thy strength ends
 hard assays fly first blood
 appease ghost wandering lethe flood

 lxii
 "i thy weapon whet inflame thine ire
 arm thy right hand strengthen every part"
 said even spake inspire
 fury rage wrath troubled heart
 man awaked eyes like fire
 poisoned sparks headstrong madness start
 armed forth gone
 gathered italian bands one

 lxiii
 gathered lay arms late
 good rinaldo's semblance stout
 furious words foreconceived hate
 bitter speeches thus vomits
 "is people barbarous ingrate
 truth finds place faith takes rout
 whose thirst unquenched blood gold
 yoke boweth bridle none hold

 lxiv
 "so much suffered seven years long
 servile unworthy yoke
 thorough rome italy wrong
 thousand years hereafter shall spoke
 count cilicia's kingdom strong
 subdued prince tancredi's stroke
 false baldwin land bereaves
 virtue's harvest fraud reaped sheaves

 lxv
 "nor speak hour every need
 quick ready resolute assays
 fire sword hasted forth speed
 bore brunt fights frays
 performed done deed
 ease leisure divide preys
 reaped naught travel toil
 praise realms gold spoil

 lxvi
 "yet season willing blind
 offended unrevenged wronged unwroken
 light griefs could provoke quiet mind
 alas mortal blow stroken
 rinaldo slain law kind
 arms nations high heaven broken
 doth heaven kill fire thunder
 swallow cleaves earth asunder

 lxvii
 "they rinaldo slain sword shield
 christ's true faith unrevenged lies
 still unrevenged lieth field
 noble corpse feed crows pies
 murdered shall us certain yield
 sees although wanted eyes
 knows italian chivalry
 proud godfrey false baldwin envy

 lxviii
 "what need proof heaven heaven swear
 consent herein beguiled
 night saw murdered sprite appear
 pale sad wan wounds blood defiled
 spectacle full grief fear
 godfrey murdering ghost reviled
 saw dream mine eyes
 howe'er look still still methinks flies

 lxix
 "what shall shall governed still
 false hand contaminate blood
 else depart travel forth
 euphrates come sacred flood
 dwells people void martial skill
 whose cities rich whose land fat good
 kingdoms great may ease provide
 far frenchmen's malice pride

 lxx
 "then let us go revengement take
 brave knight though lie power
 courage rather newly wake
 never sleeps fear dread one hour
 pestiferous serpent poisoned snake
 knights hath destroyed flower
 first let us slay deserved end
 example make kills friend

 lxxi
 "i courageous force
 dareth much well perform
 tear cursed heart without remorse
 nest treason false guile enorm"
 thus spake angry knight headlong course
 rest followed furious storm
 "arm arm" cried arms soldiers ran
 run "arm arm" cried every man

 lxxii
 mongst alecto strowed wasteful fire
 envenoming hearts least
 folly disdain madness strife rancor ire
 thirst shed blood every breast increased
 ill spread far till set fire
 rage italian lodgings never ceased
 thence unto switzers' camp went
 last infected every english tent

 lxxiii
 public loss beloved knight
 alone stirred rage wrath untamed
 foreconceived griefs quarrels light
 ire still nourished still inflamed
 awaked former cause spite
 frenchmen cruel unjust named
 bold threats made hatred known
 hate seld kept close oft unwisely shown

 lxxiv
 like boiling liquor seething pot
 fumeth swelleth high bubbleth fast
 till o'er brims among embers hot
 part broth scum cast
 rage wrath appeased
 wisdom yet remained taste
 camillo william tancred away
 whose greatness might madness stay

 lxxv
 headlong ran harness heat
 furious people heaps confused
 roaring trumpets battle gan threat
 time mortal war used
 messengers ran godfredo great
 bade arm noise mused
 baldwin first well clad iron hard
 stepped side sure faithful guard

 lxxvi
 murmurs heard heaven lift een
 wont god aid fled
 "o lord thou knowest right hand mine
 abhorred ever civil blood shed
 illumine dark souls light divine
 repress rage hellish fury bred
 innocency guiltless mind
 thou knowest make know fury blind"

 lxxvii
 tis said felt infused vein
 sacred heat heaven distilled
 heat man courage could constrain
 brave look awful boldness filled
 well guarded forth went meet train
 would revenge rinaldo killed
 though threats heard saw bent
 arms every side yet went

 lxxviii
 hauberk strong coat ware
 embroidered fair pearl richest stone
 hands naked face bare
 wherein lamp majesty bright shone
 shook golden mace wherewith dare
 resist force rebellious foe
 thus appeared thus gan teach
 shape angel god speech

 lxxix
 "what foolish words threats hear
 noise arms dares tumults move
 honored stand fear
 late obedience love
 godfrey's falsehood witness bear
 dare accusations prove
 perchance look entreaties bring
 sue favors excuse thing

 lxxx
 "ah god forbid lands hear see
 disgraced whose great name quake
 sceptre noble acts
 true defence world make
 yet sharp justice governed shall
 clemency vengeance take
 offence rinaldo's love
 pardon hereafter wiser prove

 lxxxi
 "but argillano's guilty blood shall wash
 stain away kindled debate
 led hasty rage fury rash
 disorders first undid gate"
 thus spoke lightning beams flash
 eyes majesty state
 argillanwho would thought itshook
 fear terror conquered look

 lxxxii
 rest indiscreet foolish wrath
 threatened late words shame pride
 whose hands ready harm scath
 brandished bright swords every side
 hushed still attend godfrey saith
 shame fear bashful looks hide
 argillan let chains bound
 although weapons environed round

 lxxxiii
 lion shakes dreadful mane
 beats tail courage proud wroth
 commander come first took pain
 tame youth lofty crest goeth
 threats feareth obeys rein
 thralldom base serviceage though loth
 sharp teeth armed paws
 force rebel ruler's laws

 lxxxiv
 fame winged warrior beheld
 semblant fierce furious look stood
 left hand splendent shield
 wherewith covered safe chieftain good
 hand naked sword wield
 distilling fell lukewarm blood
 blood pardie many realm town
 whereon lord wrath poured

 lxxxv
 thus tumult without bloodshed ended
 arms laid strife exile sent
 godfrey thoughts greater actions bended
 homeward rich pavilion went
 assault fortress intended
 second third day spent
 meanwhile timber wrought oft surveyed
 whereof ram engines great made



 ninth book

 argument
 alecto false great solyman doth move
 night christians tents kill
 god intents saw
 sends michael sacred hill
 spirits foul hell angels drove
 knights delivered witch
 destroy pagans scatter host
 soldan flies bands lost



 grisly child erebus grim
 saw tumults done tempest spent
 gainst stream grace ever strove swim
 thoughts heaven's wisdom bent
 departed bright titan's beams dim
 fruitful lands waxed barren went
 sought rest infernal crew
 new storms raise new broils tumults new

 ii
 well wist sisters enticed
 false arts far christian host
 tancred rinaldo rest best prized
 martial skill might esteemed
 said discords strifes advised
 "great solyman day light hath lost
 christians shall assail sudden war
 kill thus strive jar"

 iii
 solyman remained flew
 found arabian bands
 great solyman christ's foes untrue
 boldest courage mightiest hands
 like none earthbred crew
 heaped mountains aemonian sands
 turks sovereign nice seat
 late dwelt ruled kingdom great

 iv
 lands forenenst greekish shore held
 sangar's mouth crooked meander's fall
 phrygia mysia lydia dwelled
 bithynia's towns pontus' cities
 hearts christian princes swelled
 rose arms make proud asia thrall
 lands sceptre wield
 twice beaten pitched field

 v
 fortune oft vain assayed
 spent forces availed naught
 egypt's king close conveyed
 welcomed could best thought
 glad heart inly well apayed
 court great lord brought
 decreed armies huge bring
 succor juda land juda's king

 vi
 ere open war proclaimed would
 solyman kindle first fire
 huge sums false enticing gold
 arabian thieves sent forth hire
 asian lords morians hold
 unites soldan desire
 outlaws ready aye gold fight
 hope gain hath alluring might

 vii
 thus made captain destroy burn
 juda land entered far
 ways whereby return
 godfrey's people kept stopped
 gan former losses mourn
 wound hit elder scar
 great adventures ran hardy thought
 naught assured yet resolved naught

 viii
 alecto came semblant bore
 one whose age great whose looks grave
 whose cheeks bloodless whose locks hoar
 mustaches strouting long chin close shave
 steepled turban head wore
 garment wide side glaive
 gilden quiver shoulders hung
 hand bow stiff strong

 ix
 "we have" quoth "through wildernesses gone
 sterile sands strange paths uncouth ways
 yet spoil booty gotten none
 victory deserving fame praise
 godfrey meanwhile ruin stick stone
 fair town battery sore assays
 awhile rest shall behold
 glorious city smoking lie mould

 x
 "are sheepcotes burnt preys sheep kine
 cause solyman bands arm
 canst thou kingdom lately lost thine
 recover thus thus redress thy harm
 heaven's small candles next shall shine
 within tents give bold alarm
 believe araspes old whose grave advice
 thou hast exile proved proved nice

 xi
 "he feareth naught doubts sudden broil
 illarmed worsehearted bands
 thinks people used rob spoil
 exploit dares lift hands
 thy courage put foil
 fearless camp thus secure stands"
 said poison breast hides
 shapeless air unseen glides

 xii
 soldan cried "o thou thought
 increased hast rage fury
 seem'st wight mortal metal wrought
 follow thee whereso thee list go
 mountains men dint sword brought
 thou shalt behold seas red blood flow
 where'er go thou guide
 sable night azure skies shall hide"

 xiii
 said mustered crew
 reproved cowards allowed bold
 forward camp inspired courage new
 ready dight follow would
 alecto's self warning trumpet blew
 wind standard great unrolled
 thus marched thus went
 approach speed news prevent

 xiv
 alecto left person dight
 like one came tidings new tell
 time first rising night
 sparkling diamonds poureth forth sell
 sion come marched right
 juda's aged tyrant used dwell
 solyman's designment bold
 place manner time told

 xv
 mantle dark grisly shadows spread
 stained spots deepest sanguine hue
 warm drops blood earth's black visage shed
 supplied place pure precious dew
 moon stars fear sprites fled
 shrieking goblins eachwhere howling flew
 furies roar ghosts fairies yell
 earth filled devils empty hell

 xvi
 soldan fierce horror went
 toward camp redoubted foes
 night half consumed spent
 headlong western hill goes
 distant scant mile godfrey's tent
 let people awhile repose
 victualled boldly spoke
 words rage courage might provoke

 xvii
 "see camp full stuffed spoils preys
 half strong false report recordeth
 see storehouse captain lays
 treasures stolen asia's wealth hoardeth
 chance ball unto racket plays
 take vantage good luck affordeth
 arms horses gold treasure
 without loss harm displeasure

 xviii
 "nor camp great victorious host
 slew persian lords nice hath
 long war spent lost
 dregs wine outrun
 left drowned dead almost
 heavy sleep labor half done
 send headlong avernus deep
 little differs death heavy sleep

 xix
 "come come sword passage open shall
 camp bodies slain
 pass o'er rampire wall
 blade scythes cut fields grain
 shall cut christ's kingdom shall fall
 asia freedom shall praise obtain"
 thus inflamed soldiers fight
 led silence night

 xx
 sentinel starlight lo descried
 mighty soldan host draw near
 found hoped christians' guide
 unware ne yet unready gear
 scouts huge army descried
 ran back gan shouts 'larum rear
 watch stert drew weapons bright
 busked bold battle fight

 xxi
 arabians wist could come unseen
 therefore loud jarring trumpets sound
 yelling cries heaven upheaved
 horses thundered solid ground
 mountains roared valley green
 echoes sighed caves around
 alecto brand kindled hell
 tokened david's tower dwell

 xxii
 rest forth pricked soldan fast
 watch yet order
 swift hideous boreas' hasty blast
 hollow rocks first storms outburst
 raging floods trees rocks cast
 thunders towns towers drive dust
 earthquakes tear world twain threat
 naught compared fury great

 xxiii
 struck blow foe hit
 never hit made grievous wound
 never wounded death followed
 yet peril hurt harm found
 weapon hardened helmet bit
 puissant stroke senses astound
 yet like bell tinkling helmet rung
 thence flew flames fire sparks among

 xxiv
 well nigh put watch flight
 jolly troop frenchmen strong stout
 arabians came heaps fight
 covering like raging floods fields
 beaten christians run away full light
 pagans mingled flying rout
 entered camp filled stood
 tents ruin slaughter death blood

 xxv
 high soldan's helm enamelled laid
 hideous dragon armed many scale
 iron paws leathern wings displayed
 twisted knot forked tail
 triple tongue seemed hissed brayed
 jaws froth venom trail
 stirred foes hit
 flames cast fire seemed spit

 xxvi
 strange light soldan fierce appeared
 dreadful round
 poor sailors huge storms reared
 lightning flash rafting seas seen
 fled away strength feared
 bolder gainst bent weapons keen
 forward night evils mischiefs pleased
 dangers hid dangers still increased

 xxvii
 among rest strove merit praise
 old latinus born tiber's bank
 whose stout heart fights bloody frays
 eild base fear yet never sank
 five sons comforts days
 side adventure shrank
 long time iron strong
 clad members tender soft young

 xxviii
 bold ensample father's might
 weapons whetted wrath increased
 "come let us go" quoth "where yonder knight
 upon soldiers makes bloody feast
 let slaughter hearts affright
 danger appears fear least
 honor dwells hard attempts sons
 greatest praise greatest peril wons"

 xxix
 tender brood forest's savage queen
 ere crests rugged manes appear
 mouths nature armed
 paws strength silly lamb tear
 leadeth forth prey makes keen
 learns ensample naught fear
 hunter desert woods takes
 lesser beasts whereon feast makes

 xxx
 noble father hardy crew
 fierce solyman every side invade
 six upon soldan flew
 lances sharp strong encounters made
 broken spear eldest boy threw
 boldly overboldly drew blade
 wherewith strove strove therewith vain
 pagan's steed unmarked slain

 xxxi
 mountain cape land
 assailed storms seas every side
 doth unremoved steadfast still withstand
 storm thunder lightning tempest wind tide
 soldan withstood latinus' band
 unremoved justs abide
 hapless youth hurt steed
 chin cleft twain head

 xxxii
 kind aramante saw brother slain
 hold stretched forth friendly arm
 oh foolish kindness oh pity vain
 add proper loss other's harm
 prince let fall sword cut twain
 brother twined child's weak arm
 saddles together slide
 together mourned together died

 xxxiii
 done sabino's lance nimble force
 cut twain 'gainst stripling bold
 spurred steed underneath horse
 hardy infant tumbled mould
 whose soul squeezed bruised corpse
 ugly painfulness forsook hold
 deeply mourned sweet cage
 left bliss joys youthful age

 xxxiv
 picus yet lawrence live
 one birth mother fair brought
 pair whose likeness made parents strive
 oft joyed doubt
 birth undistinguished give
 soldan's rage made known picus stout
 headless one huge blow laid dust
 breast gentle brother thrust

 xxxv
 father father alas
 noble sons slain
 five deaths often murdered
 know life could sustain
 except heart forged steel brass
 yet still lived pardie saw plain
 dying looks although deaths knows
 ease behold woes

 xxxvi
 wept night curtain spread
 cause weeping eyes
 still mourned sharp vengeance fed
 thinks conquers revenged dies
 thirsts soldan's heathenish blood shed
 yet less naught doth prize
 tell whether liefer would
 die kill pagan bold

 xxxvii
 last "is right hand" quoth "so weak
 thou disdain'st gainst use thy might
 naught tongue nothing speak
 may provoke thine ire thy wrath spite"
 struck anger great wreak
 blow pierced mail metal bright
 flank set ope floodgate wide
 whereat blood streamed side

 xxxviii
 provoked cry blow
 turk upon gan blade discharge
 cleft breastplate first pierced
 lined seven bulls' hides mighty targe
 sheathed weapons guts
 wretched latinus issue large
 mouth poured vital blood
 sprinkled murdered brood

 xxxix
 apennine like sturdy tree
 winds makes resistance stout
 storm overturned
 falls breaks trees plants
 latine fell felled
 slew nearest pagans' rout
 worthy end fit man fame
 dying slew conquered overcame

 xl
 meanwhile soldan strove rage
 satisfy blood christian spilled
 arabians heartened captain stern
 murder every tent cabin filled
 henry english knight olipherne
 fierce draguto thy hands killed
 gilbert philip ariadene
 slain born upon banks rhone

 xli
 albazar mace ernesto slew
 algazel engerlan fell
 huge murder meaner crew
 manner deaths tongue tell
 godfrey first heathen trumpets blew
 awaked heard fear could make dwell
 armed ere long
 marched forward squadron strong

 xlii
 well heard rumor cry
 marked tumult still grow
 arabian thieves judged
 soldiers made battle sore
 forayed countries nigh
 spoiled fields duke knew well
 yet thought hardiment
 assail armed tent

 xliii
 suddenly heard went
 cityward "arm arm" cried
 noise upreared firmament
 dreadful howling filled valleys wlde
 clorinda king forth sent
 battle argantes side
 duke heard guelpho turned prayed
 lieutenant said

 xliv
 "you hear new alarm yonder part
 town breaks much rage
 us needeth much valor art
 calm fury heat 'suage
 go thither take part
 brave soldiers mine equipage
 residue champions bold
 drive wolves fold"

 xlv
 parted agreed
 divers paths lord guelpho hill
 godfrey hasted arabians keen
 men like silly sheep destroy kill
 went troops increased
 every part people flocked still
 grown strong enough 'proached nigh
 fierce turk caused many christian die

 xlvi
 top vesulus cold
 sandy valleys tumbleth po
 whose streams fountain rolled
 still stronger wax puissance go
 horned like bull forehead bold
 lifts o'er broken banks doth flow
 horns pierce sea assays
 proffereth war tribute pays

 xlvii
 duke men fast flying espy
 thither ran thus displeased spake
 "what fear oh whither fly
 see pursuit make
 heartless band dare battle try
 wounds dare neither give take
 turn stern eye's threatening sight
 angry look put flight"

 xlviii
 said spurred forth solyman
 destroyed christ's vineyard like savage boar
 streams blood dust dirt ran
 o'er heaps bodies wallowing gore
 squadrons close sword ope began
 broke ranks behind beside
 goes feet treads
 armed saracens barbed steeds

 xlix
 slaughterhouse angry mars passed
 thousands dead halfdead dying
 hardy soldan saw come haste
 yet neither stepped aside shrunk fear
 busked bold fight aloft cast
 blade prepared strike stepped near
 noble princes twain fortune wrought
 world's end met fought

 l
 virtue fury strength courage strove
 asia's mighty empire tell
 strange force cruel blows drove
 sore combat fierce fell
 great deeds wrought other's harness clove
 yet still darkness ruth dwell
 night acts black veil covered
 acts whereat sun world might wonder

 li
 christians guide's ensample hearted
 best armed made squadron strong
 defend chieftain forth started
 pagans also saved knight wrong
 fortune favors twixt evenly parted
 fierce encounter bloody doubtful long
 lost lost
 loss equal even numbers slain

 lii
 equal rage southern wind
 meeteth battle strong northern blast
 sea air neither resigned
 cloud gainst cloud wave gainst wave cast
 skirmish neither part declined
 fought kept footings fast
 oft furious shock together rush
 shield gainst shield helm gainst helm crush

 liii
 battle eke sionward grew hot
 soldiers slain hardy knights killed
 legions sprites limbo's prisons got
 empty air hills valleys filled
 hearting pagans shrinked
 till stood dearest blood spilled
 new rage argantes inspire
 whose heat flames whose burning need fire

 liv
 came put shameful flight
 fearful watch o'er trenches leaped
 even ground made rampire's height
 murdered bodies ditch unheaped
 greedy mates labor light
 amid tents bloody harvest reaped
 clorinda went proud circassian
 piece two chained bullets fly

 lv
 fled frenchmen lucky hour
 arrived guelpho helping band
 made turn stormy shower
 bold face wicked foes withstand
 sternly fought wounds downpour
 streams blood run either hand
 lord heaven meanwhile upon fight
 high throne bent gracious sight

 lvi
 whence grace goodness compassed round
 ruleth blesseth keepeth wrought
 air fire sea ground
 sense wit reason thought
 persons three power glory crowned
 one god made things naught
 whose feet subjected grace
 sit nature fortune motion time place

 lvii
 place whence like smoke dust
 frail world wealth pomp power
 tosseth tumbleth turneth lust
 guides life death end hour
 eye however virtuous pure
 view brightness glorious bower
 every side blessed spirits
 equal joys though differing degree

 lviii
 harmony celestial song
 palace echoed chambers pure
 last michael called harness strong
 never yielding diamonds armed sure
 "behold" quoth "to despite wrong
 dear flock mercy hath cure
 satan hell's loathsome prison sends
 ghosts sprites furies fiends

 lix
 "go bid depart leave care
 war soldiers doth best pertain
 bid forbear infect earth air
 darken heaven's fair light bid refrain
 bid acheron's black flood repair
 fit house house grief pain
 let king torment
 command go tell mine intent"

 lx
 said winged warrior low inclined
 creator's feet reverence due
 spread golden feathers wind
 swift thought away angel flew
 passed light shining fire assigned
 glorious seat selected crew
 mover first circle crystalline
 firmament fixed stars shine

 lxi
 unlike working shape show
 left hand saturn left jove
 untruly errant called trow
 since errs doth guide move
 fields passed whence hail snow
 thunder rain fall clouds
 heat cold dryness moisture strive
 whose wars creatures kill slain revive

 lxii
 horrid darkness shadows dun
 dispersed eternal wings
 flames heavenly eyes outrun
 beguiled earth sable things
 storm spreadeth forth sun
 rays binds clouds golden strings
 stillness moonshine even
 falling star glideth heaven

 lxiii
 infernal troop 'proached near
 still pagans' ire rage provoke
 angel wings bear
 shook lance thus last spoke
 "have learned yet know fear
 lord's wrath thunder's dreadful stroke
 torments endless ill
 still fierce still proud rebellious still

 lxiv
 "the lord hath sworn break iron bands
 brazen gates sion's fort close
 sacred withstands
 wrath dares oppose
 go hence cursed appointed lands
 realms death torments woes
 deeps infernal lake
 battles fight triumphs make

 lxv
 "there tyrannize upon souls find
 condemned woe double still pains
 complain teeth grind
 howl weep clank iron chains"
 said fled stayed behind
 sharp lance driveth constrains
 sighing left lands silver sheep
 hesperus doth lead doth feed keep

 lxvi
 toward hell lazy wings display
 wreak malice damned ghosts
 birds follow titan's hottest ray
 pass great flocks warmer coasts
 leaves great numbers fall away
 winter nips newcome frosts
 earth delivered foul annoy
 recalled beauty resumed joy

 lxvii
 fierce argantes' breast
 lessened rancor decreased ire
 although alecto left infest
 hot brands infernal fire
 round armed head trenchant blade blest
 thick ranks seemed moist entire
 breaks strong high weak low
 equalized murdering blow

 lxviii
 far amid blood dust
 heads arms legs clorinda strewed wide
 sword berengarius' breast thrust
 quite heart life doth chiefly bide
 fell blow struck sure
 back life blood forth glide
 even mouth smote albinus
 cut twain visage man

 lxix
 gernier's right hand arm divided
 whereof late received wound
 hand sword still held although guided
 fingers half alive stirred ground
 serpent slain tail divided
 moves grass rolleth tumbleth round
 championess wounded left knight
 gainst achilles turned weapon bright

 lxx
 upon neck light unhappy blow
 cut sinews throat twain
 head fell upon earth
 soiled dust visage plain
 headless trunk woful thing know
 still saddle seated remain
 steed felt reins large
 leaps flings burden discharge

 lxxi
 thus fair fierce bellona slew
 western lords put troops flight
 gildippes raged mongst pagan crew
 low dust laid many worthy knight
 like sex beauty hue
 like youth courage might
 yet fortune would battle try
 mightier foes framed die

 lxxii
 yet wished oft strove vain meet
 great betwixt press throng
 hardy guelpho gainst clorinda sweet
 ventured sword work harm wrong
 cutting blow greet
 side blood streamed along
 thrust answer sharp made
 'twixt ribs colored somedeal blade

 lxxiii
 lord guelpho struck hit
 strong osmida haply passed
 meant another's wound got
 cleft front twain eye
 near guelpho battle waxed hot
 troops led gan thither hie
 thither drew eke many paynim knight
 fierce stern bloody deadly waxed fight

 lxxiv
 meanwhile purple morning peeped o'er
 eastern threshold half land
 argillano great uproar
 prison loosed fand
 arms hent field bore
 resolved take chance came hand
 great acts amid pagan host
 would win reputation lost

 lxxv
 fierce steed 'scaped stall large
 long kept warlike need
 runs fields unto flowery marge
 green forest used feed
 curled mane shoulders broad doth charge
 lofty crest doth spring spreed
 thunder feet nostrils fire breathe
 neigh world resounds

 lxxvi
 argillan rushed forth sparkled eyes
 front high lifted fear therein
 lightly leaps skips seems flies
 left sign dust imprinted thin
 coming near foes sternly cries
 one forced strength pin
 "you outcasts world men naught
 hath boldness newly wrought

 lxxvii
 "too weak bear helm shield
 unfit arm breast iron bright
 run halfnaked trembling field
 blows feeble hope flight
 facts actions wield
 darkness hides bulwark night
 gone fights succeed
 better arms better hearts need"

 lxxviii
 thus spoke gave cruel stroke
 algazel's throat might main
 would answered spoke
 stopped words cut jaws twain
 upon eyes death spread misty cloak
 chilling frost congealed every vein
 fell teeth earth tore
 raging death full rage

 lxxix
 puissance mighty saladine
 proud agricalt muleasses died
 one wondrous blow weapon fine
 adiazel two parts divide
 breast wounded ariadine
 dying sharp taunts gan deride
 lifting uneath feeble eyes
 proud scorns thus answereth ere dies

 lxxx
 "not thou whoe'er thou art shall glory long
 thy happy conquest death trow
 like chance awaits thee hand strong
 side shortly lay thee low"
 smiled said "of mine hour short long
 let heaven take care meanwhile die thou
 pasture wolves crows" foot
 set drew sword life

 lxxxi
 among squadron rode gentle page
 soldan's minion darling delight
 whose fair chin springtime age
 yet blossomed flowers small light
 sweat spread cheeks heat rage
 seemed pearls morning dews lilies white
 dust therein uprolled adorned hair
 face seemed fierce sweet wrathful fair

 lxxxii
 steed white white purest snow
 falls tops aged apennine
 lightning storm 'swift trow
 run stop turn twine
 dart right hand shaked prest throw
 cutlass thigh short hooked fine
 braving turkish pomp shone
 purple robe o'erfret gold stone

 lxxxiii
 hardy boy thirst warlike praise
 bewitched unadvised thought
 gainst every band childish strength assays
 little danger found though much sought
 till argillan watched fit time always
 swift turns strike fought
 unawares snowwhite courser slay
 master tumbling lay

 lxxxiv
 gainst face love pity stand
 pray rich throne beauty spare
 cruel man stretched forth murdering hand
 spoil gifts whereof share
 seemed remorse sense brand
 lighting flat hurt lad forbare
 naught gainst point bent
 edge spared pierced rent

 lxxxv
 fierce solyman godfredo strived
 first enter conquest's glorious gate
 left fray thither headlong drived
 first saw lad estate
 brake press soon enough arrived
 take revenge aid late
 saw lesbine slain lost
 like sweet flower nipped untimely frost

 lxxxvi
 saw wax dim starlight eyes
 ivory neck upon shoulders fell
 pale looks kind pity's image lies
 death even mourned hear passing bell
 marble heart soft impression tries
 midst wrath manly tears outwell
 thou weepest solyman thou beheld
 thy kingdoms lost one tear could yield

 lxxxvii
 murderer's sword hapt view
 dropping blood lesbino dead
 pity vanished ire rage renew
 leisure bootless tears shed
 blade argillano flew
 cleft shield helmet head
 throat worthy blow
 solyman strength wrath show

 lxxxviii
 content horse
 lights dead carcass rent tore
 like fierce dog takes angry course
 bite stone hit
 oh comfort vain grief great force
 wound senseless earth feels sore
 mighty godfrey 'gainst soldan's train
 spent force blows vain

 lxxxix
 thousand hardy turks affront
 sturdy iron armed head foot
 resolved adventures good bad
 actions wise execution stout
 solyman arabia lad
 kingdom first cast
 living wild exiled guide
 extremes faithful bide

 xc
 thickest order sure unite
 godfrey's valor small nothing shrank
 corcutes first face smite
 wounded strong rosteno flank
 one blow selim's head stroke quite
 rossano's arms every rank
 boldest knights chosen crew
 felled maimed wounded hurt slew

 xci
 thus killed many saracine
 fierce assaults unhurt sustained
 ere fortune wholly turks decline
 still hoped much though small gained
 behold cloud dust wherein doth shine
 lightning war midst thereof contained
 whence unawares burst forth storm swords
 tremble made pagan knights lords
 xcii
 fifty champions mongst stands
 silver field ensign christ's death
 mouths tongues briareus hands
 voice iron tough iron breath
 harm troop wrought heathen bands
 knights slew could recount uneath
 vain turks resist arabians fly
 fly slain fight die

 xciii
 fear cruelty grief horror sorrow pain
 run field disguised divers shapes
 death might see triumphant plain
 drowning blood blows escapes
 king meanwhile parcel train
 comes hastily sure conquest gapes
 bank whereon stood beheld
 doubtful hazard bloody field

 xciv
 saw pagans shrink away
 sounded retreat gan desire
 messengers behalf pray
 argantes clorinda retire
 furious couple said nay
 even drunk shedding blood mad ire
 last went recomfort thought
 stay troops flight nought

 xcv
 govern cowardice fear
 host already begun fly
 cast shields cutting swords arrear
 defended made slow thereby
 hollow dale city's bulwarks near
 west south outstretched long doth lie
 thither fled mist dust
 toward walls run throng thrust

 xcvi
 bank disordered thus ran
 christian knights huge slaughter made
 climb hill gan
 old aladine came fiercely aid
 steep brae lord guelpho would
 hazard folk soldiers stayed
 safe within city's walls king
 relics small sharp fight bring

 xcvii
 meanwhile soldan latest charge
 done much human force able
 sweat blood appeared members large
 breath short courage waxed unstable
 arm grew weak bear mighty targe
 hand rule heavy sword unable
 bruised cut blunted blade
 lost use sword made

 xcviii
 feeling weakness gan musing stand
 troubled thought question tossed
 murder hand
 none else conquest boast
 save life land
 lay slain pride subdued host
 "at last fortune's power" quoth "i yield
 flight let trophies build

 xcix
 "let godfrey view flight smile see
 mine unworthy second banishment
 armed soon shall hear
 proud head unsettled crown rent
 wrongs wrath etern shall
 every hour bow war new bent
 rise foe fierce bold
 though dead though slain though burnt ashes cold"



 tenth book

 argument
 ismen sleep awakes soldan great
 sion brings prince night
 sad king sits fearful seat
 emboldeneth excites fight
 godfredo hears lords knights repeat
 escaped armida's wrath spite
 rinaldo known live peter foresays
 offspring's virtue good deserts praise


 gallant steed thus soldan said
 came trotting without lord guide
 quickly hand upon reins laid
 weak weary climbed ride
 snake crest hot fire outbraid
 quite cut helm lost pride
 coat rent harness hacked cleft
 kingly pomp sign left

 ii
 savage wolf chased fold
 hide head runs holt wood
 though filled might hold
 greedy paunch yet hungreth food
 sanguine tongue forth lips outrolled
 jaws licks foam blood
 bloody fray soldan hied
 rage unquenched wrath unsatisfied

 iii
 fortune would scaped free
 thousand arrows flew
 swords lances instruments
 certain death safe withdrew
 unknown unseen disguised travelled
 desert paths ways used
 rode revolving troubled thought
 course take yet resolved naught

 iv
 thither last meant take way
 egypt's king assembled host
 join assay
 win fight oft lost
 determined thus made longer stay
 thitherward spurred forth steed post
 need guide way right well could
 leads sandy plains gaza old

 v
 though smarting wounds torment oft
 body weak wounded back side
 yet rested armor doffed
 day long o'er hills dales doth ride
 night cast shade aloft
 earth's colors strange sables dyed
 light could wounds upbound
 shook ripe dates palm found

 vi
 supped amid field
 rest weary limbs awhile sought
 made pillow broken shield
 ease griefs distempered thought
 little ease could hard lodging yield
 wounds smarted slept right naught
 breast proud heart rent twain
 two inward vultures sorrow disdain

 vii
 length midnight silence deep
 heaven earth hushed still quiet make
 sore watched weary began steep
 cares sorrows oblivion's lake
 little short unquiet sleep
 small repose fainting spirits take
 slept voice grave severe
 unawares thus thundered ear

 viii
 "o solyman thou farrenowned king
 till better season serve forbear thy rest
 stranger doth thy lands thraldom bring
 nice slave christian yoke oppressed
 sleepest thou forgetful thing
 thy friends lie slain laid chest
 whose bones bear witness thy shame scorn
 wilt thou idly attend morn"

 ix
 king awoke saw eyes
 man whose presence seemed grave old
 writhen staff steps unstable guies
 served feeble members uphold
 "and art thou" prince scorn replies
 "what sprite vex poor passengers bold
 break sleep thee belongs
 shame loss vengeance wrongs"

 x
 "i man thine intent" quoth
 "and purpose new sure conjecture hath
 better thou weenest know thee
 proffer thee service faith
 speeches therefore sharp biting
 quick words whetstones wrath
 accept gree lord words spoke
 spurs thine ire courage provoke

 xi
 "but visit egypt's mighty king
 unless judgment fall prepared
 prophesy needless thing
 suffer shall voyage long hard
 though stay monarch great bring
 new assembled host judaward
 place service cause fight
 gainst foes use force might

 xii
 "but follow within wall
 christian arms hemmed every side
 withouten battle fight stroke
 even noonday safely guide
 delight rejoice glory shall
 perils great see prowess tried
 noble town may preserve shield
 till egypt's host come renew field"

 xiii
 thus parleyed aged guest
 turk words looks admire
 haughty eyes furious breast
 laid apart pride rage ire
 humbly said "i willing prest
 follow thou leadest reverend sire
 advice best fits angry vein
 tells greatest peril greatest pain"

 xiv
 old man praised words air
 late received wounds worse disposes
 quintessence therein poured fair
 stops bleeding incision closes
 beholding apollo's chair
 fresh aurora violets strewed roses
 "it's time" says "to wend titan bright
 wonted labor summons every wight"

 xv
 chariot beside stand
 ascended solyman
 took reins mastering hand
 ruled steeds whipped
 wheels horses' feet upon land
 left sign token ran
 coursers pant smoke lukewarm sweat
 foaming cream iron mouthfuls eat

 xvi
 air round wondrous thing
 heaps solid thickness drew
 chariot hiding environing
 subtle mist mortal eye could view
 yet stone engine cast sling
 could pierce cloud proof true
 yet seen within ride
 heaven earth without clear beside

 xvii
 beetle brows turk amazed bent
 wrinkled front wildly stared
 upon cloud chariot went
 speed cynthia's car right well compared
 seeing astonishment
 bewondered fared
 suddenly name prince gan call
 awaked thus spoke withal

 xviii
 "whoe'er thou art worldly wit
 hast high wondrous marvels brought
 know'st deep intents hidden sit
 secret closet man's private thought
 thy skilful heart lot writ
 tell event things end unbrought
 say issue ends stars
 allot asia's troubles broils wars

 xix
 "but tell first thy name art
 thou dost wonders strange skill
 full marvel troubled heart
 tell leave amazed still"
 wizard smiled answered "in part
 easy satisfy thy
 ismen hight called enchanter great
 skill magic's secret feat

 xx
 "but sure events unfold
 things come destinies foretell
 rash desire wish bold
 mortal heart knowledge never fell
 wit strength us bestowed hold
 shun evils harms mongst dwell
 make fortune stout wise
 wit rules heavens discretion guides skies

 xxi
 "that puissant arm thine well rend
 godfrey's brow new usurped crown
 alone protect save defend
 fierce people besieged town
 gainst fire sword strength courage bend
 adventure suffer trust tread perils
 content encourage thee
 know cloud foresee

 xxii
 "i guess overgliding sun
 shall many years mete weeks days
 prince shall fertile egypt
 shall fill asia prosperous frays
 speak acts quiet done
 policy rule wisdom's praise
 let suffice christians shall
 fight subdued fly conquered fall

 xxiii
 "and great empire usurped state
 shall overthrown dust ashes lie
 woful remnant angle strait
 compassed sea shall fortify
 thee shall spring lord war fate"
 whereto great solyman gan thus reply
 "o happy man great praise ybore"
 thus rejoiced yet envied

 xxiv
 said "let chance good bad aspect
 upon look sacred heaven's decree
 heart never subject
 ever conquered shall look
 moon chariot shall awry direct
 ere course diverted be"
 thus spake seemed breathed fire
 fierce courage hot ire

 xxv
 thus talked till arrived
 nigh place godfrey's tents reared
 woful spectacle yseen
 death thousand ugly forms appeared
 soldan changed hue grief teen
 sad book shame loss lead
 ah grief men friends found
 standards proud inglorious lie ground

 xxvi
 saw one visage wellknown friend
 foul despite rascal frenchman tread
 another ragged peasant rend
 arms garments champion dead
 stately pomp heaps wend
 christians slain roll webs lead
 lastly turks slain arabians brought
 heaps saw burn fire naught

 xxvii
 deeply sighed naked sword
 coach leaped mire
 ismen called angry lord
 grave words appeased foolish ire
 prince content remounted sword
 toward hill drove aged sire
 hasting forward bank pass
 till far behind christian leaguer

 xxviii
 alight took way foot
 empty chariot vanished sight
 yet still cloud environed
 left hand went height
 sion's hill till approached route
 side west looketh right
 ismen stayed eyesight bent
 upon bushy rocks thither went

 xxix
 hollow cave craggy stone
 wrought hand number years tofore
 long way walked none
 vault hid plants bushes hoar
 wizard stooping thereat gone
 thorns aside scratching brambles bore
 right hand sought passage cleft
 guide gave prince left

 xxx
 "what" quoth soldan "by privy mine
 hidden vault behoves creep
 sword find better way thine
 although foes passage guard keep"
 "let not" quoth "thy princely foot repine
 tread secret path though dark deep
 great king herod used tread
 arms whilom great fame

 xxxi
 "this passage made would suppress
 subjects' pride bondage hold
 could small forteress
 antonia called antony bold
 convey folk unseen less
 even middest temple old
 thence hither privy ways begin
 bring unseen whole armies

 xxxii
 "but saye world lives none
 knows secret darksome place
 come aladine sits throne
 lords princes set grace
 feareth fitteth one
 signs doubt show cheer face
 fitly come hear see keep still
 till time season serve speak fill"

 xxxiii
 said narrow entrance passed knight
 creeps camel needle's eye
 ways black darkest night
 followed rule guie
 strait way first withouten light
 amplify
 upright walked ease men
 ere passed half secret den

 xxxiv
 privy door ismen unlocked last
 clomb littleused stair
 thereat day feeble beam cast
 dim light nothing clear air
 hollow cave length passed
 goodly hall high broad fair
 crowned gold purple clad
 sate sad king among nobles sad

 xxxv
 turk close hollow cloud imbarred
 unseen prease behold
 heavy speeches king heard
 thus lofty siege pleasure told
 "my lords last day state much impaired
 friends slain killed soldiers bold
 great helps greater hopes us bereft
 aught aid egypt land left

 xxxvi
 "and well see far distant aid
 upon heels danger treadeth still
 advice assembly made
 thinketh speak will"
 whisper soft arose said
 gentle winds groves murmur fill
 bold face high looks merry cheer
 argantes rose rest talk forbear

 xxxvii
 "o worthy sovereign" thus began say
 hardy young man tyrant wise
 "what words fears dismay
 knows need advice
 hand hope conquest lay
 loss true virtue damnifies
 make shield pray us succors give
 without let us wish live

 xxxviii
 "nor say aught misdeem
 egypt's promised succors fail us might
 doubtful great master's words seem
 neither lawful right
 speak words spurs esteem
 waken dull fearful sprite
 make hearts resolved assays
 win honor die praise"

 xxxix
 thus much argantes said said
 case clear spoke
 orcano rose princely stem ybore
 whose presence 'mongst bore mighty stroke
 man esteemed well arms yore
 coupled new marriage yoke
 young babes fight made loth
 husband father

 xl
 "my lord" quoth "i reprehend
 earnest zeal audacious speech
 courage sprung seld close ypend
 swelling stomach without violent breach
 though good circassian friend
 terms bold fervent oft doth preach
 yet hold good warlike feat
 great deeds respond speeches great

 xli
 "but beseem graver age
 long experience hath made wise sly
 rule heat youth hardy rage
 somewhat misled knight awry
 equal balance ponder gauge
 hopes far distant perils nigh
 town's old walls rampires new compare
 godfrey's forces engines rare

 xlii
 "but may say think unblamed
 town strong nature site art
 engines huge instruments framed
 gainst defences adverse part
 thinks secure eathest shamed
 hope best yet fear unconstant mart
 siege long pent
 famine doubt store spent

 xliii
 "for store cattle grain
 yesterday within walls brought
 proud foes triumphant plain
 naught shedding blood conquest thought
 little city sustain
 raise siege unless means sought
 must last till prefixed hour
 raised egypt's aid power

 xliv
 "but appointed day miss
 else ere expect came
 victory yet
 oh save town ruin us shame
 godfrey still warfare
 armies soldiers captains
 oft amid dusty plain
 turks persians syrians arabians slain

 xlv
 "and thou argantes wotest
 oft hast thou fled victorious host
 thy shoulders often hast thou let see
 thy feet hath thy safeguard
 clorinda bright fled eke thee
 none fellows cause boast
 blame every fight
 showed courage valor strength might

 xlvi
 "and though hardy knight certain threat
 nearapproaching death hear disdain
 yet state loss danger great
 strong foe see tokens plain
 fort strong soe'er art seat
 hinder godfrey reign
 makes sayto witness heaven bring
 zeal state love lord king

 xlvii
 "the king tripoli well advised
 purchase peace preserve crown
 solyman godfrey's love despised
 either dead deep prison thrown
 else fearful run away disguised
 scant life left
 yet gifts tribute gold
 might peace empire still hold"

 xlviii
 thus spake orcanes inkling gave
 doubtful words would said
 sue peace yield slave
 durst openly king persuade
 words soldan gan rave
 gainst wrapt cloud stayed
 ismen thus bespake "how bear
 words lord reproaches hear"

 xlix
 "oh let speak" quoth "with ire scorn
 burn gains thus hid stay"
 said smoky cloud cleft torn
 like veil upon stretched lay
 open heaven forthwith borne
 left prince view lightsome day
 princely look amid press shined
 sudden thus declared mind

 l
 "of speak behold soldan
 neither afraid run away dread
 slanders lies fables
 hand shall prove upon coward's head
 shed sea blood well near
 heaped mountains high christians dead
 camp still maintained fray
 men murdered run away

 li
 "if coward vile beside
 false faith country dares reply
 speak concord yon men pride
 good leave sir king shall die
 lambs wolves shall one fold abide
 doves serpents one nest shall lie
 one town us christians shall
 peace love unite within one wall"

 lii
 thus spoke broad trenchant sword
 hand held high aloft threatening guise
 dumb stood knights dreadful word
 storm front fire eyes
 turned last sion's aged lord
 calmed visage stern humbler wise
 "behold" quoth "good prince aid bring
 since solyman joined juda's king"

 liii
 king aladine rich throne upstart
 said "oh joy thy face view
 noble friend lesseneth part
 grief slaughter subjects true
 weak estate stablish come thou art
 mayest thine time renew
 heavens consent" soldan bold
 dear embracements long enfold

 liv
 greetings done king resigned throne
 solyman set beside
 rich seat adorned gold stone
 ismen sage elbow bide
 asked way two gone
 declared betide
 clorinda bright solyman addressed
 salutations first rest

 lv
 among rose ormusses' valiant knight
 late soldan convoy sent
 hot bloody fight
 secret paths blind byways went
 till aided silence night
 safe city's walls pent
 refreshed corn cattle store
 pined soldiers famished nigh

 lvi
 surly countenance disdainful grace
 sullen sad sat circassian stout
 like fierce lion grumbling place
 fiery eyes turns rolls
 durst orcanes view soldan's face
 still upon floor pore tout
 thus lords peers counselling
 turkish monarch sat juda's king

 lvii
 godfrey gave victory rein
 following straits opened
 soldiers captains slain
 celebrates stately funeral
 told camp within day twain
 would assault city's mighty wall
 heathen enclosed doth threat
 fire sword death danger great

 lviii
 noble squadron known
 last fight brought great aid
 lords princes
 followed late sly enticing maid
 tancred late thrown
 prison deep false witch betrayed
 hermit private friends
 worthies lords knights sends

 lix
 thus said "some one declare
 fortunes whether good blamed
 assist us valors rare
 great need coming framed"
 blush ground amazed stare
 virtue little guilt ashamed
 last english prince countenance bold
 silence broke thus errors told

 lx
 "we elect exploit lot
 secret flight hence withdrew
 following false cupid deny
 enticed forth love beauty's hue
 jealous fire burnt stomachs hot
 close ways passed least view
 words looks alas know late
 nursed love jealousy hate

 lxi
 "at last gan approach woful clime
 fire brimstone heaven sent
 take revenge sin shameful crime
 gainst kind commit nould repent
 loathsome lake brimstone pitch lime
 o'ergoes land erst sweet redolent
 moves thence stench smoke flies
 dim welkin infect skies

 lxii
 "this lake yet never might
 aught hath weight sink bottom
 like cork leaves feathers light
 stones iron men fleet never drown
 therein castle stands sight
 o'er narrow bridge way known
 hither us brought welcomed us witch
 house within stately pleasant rich

 lxiii
 "the heavens clear wholsome air
 high trees sweet meadows waters pure good
 thickest shade myrtles fair
 crystal spring poured silver flood
 amid herbs grass flowers rare
 falling leaves pattered wood
 birds sung hymns love yet speak naught
 gold marble rich richly wrought

 lxiv
 "under curtain greenwood shade
 beside brook upon velvet grass
 massy vessel pure silver made
 banquet rich costly furnished
 beasts birds beguiled fowler's trade
 fish floods seas pass
 dainties made art table
 hundred virgins served husbands able

 lxv
 "she sweet words false enticing smiles
 infused love among dainties set
 empoisoned cups souls beguiles
 made knight god forget
 rose turned within short whiles
 changed looks wrath anger met
 charming rod book brings
 mumbled strange secret things

 lxvi
 "she read change felt thought
 longed change life place biding
 virtue strange pleasure wrought
 leapt flood hiding
 legs feet one brought
 mine arms hands shoulders sliding
 skin full scales like shields brass
 made fish late knight

 lxvii
 "the rest like shape like garments wore
 dived quicksilver stream
 mind remembrance bore
 vain foolish things men dream
 last shade pleased restore
 full wonder fear seem
 ireful look angry maid
 thus threatened us made us thus afraid

 lxviii
 "'you see' quoth 'my sacred might skill
 subject rule power
 endless thraldom damned
 torment keep tower
 make birds trees craggy hill
 bide bitter blasts storm shower
 harden rocks mountains old
 melt flesh bones rivers cold

 lxix
 "'yet may well avoid mine ire wrath
 yielding hearts bend
 must forsake christendom faith
 gainst godfredo false crown defend'
 refused speedy death prayeth
 save false rambaldo became friend
 dungeon deep helpless cast
 misery iron chained fast

 lxx
 "then alone say falls mishap
 within short prince tancred thither came
 unwares surprised trap
 short stayed wily dame
 folds mischiefs would upwrap
 hidraort hundred horsemen came
 whose guide baron bold egypt's king
 us disarmed bound fetters bring

 lxxi
 "now way way death ride
 providence divine thus us wrought
 rinaldo whose high virtue guide
 great exploits exceeding human thought
 met us guard defied
 ere left fight earth brought
 harness armed us place
 late late disgrace

 lxxii
 "i hardy champion knew
 saw valor voice heard
 rumor death untrue
 life safe good fortune long guard
 three times golden sun hath risen new
 since us left rode antiochward
 first armors broken hacked cleft
 unfit service doft left"

 lxxiii
 thus spake briton prince humble cheer
 hermit sage heaven cast eyne
 color countenance changed
 heavenly grace looks visage shine
 ravished zeal soul approached near
 seat angels pure saints divine
 learned things haps come
 give foreknowledge true certain doom

 lxxiv
 last spoke human sound
 told things wisdom great foresaw
 thundering voice folk around
 attentive stood trembling awe
 "rinaldo lives" said "the tokens found
 women's craft false beginnings draw
 lives heaven long preserve days
 greater glory greater praise

 lxxv
 "these trifles yet though asia's kings
 shrink name tremble view
 well foresee shall greater things
 wicked emperors conquer subdue
 shadow eagle's wings
 shall holy church preserve sacred crew
 caesar's bird shall sable train
 pluck break talons sharp twain

 lxxvi
 "his children's children hardiness
 great attempts shall take example fair
 emperors unjust distress
 shall defend state peter's chair
 raise humble pride suppress
 help innocents shall care
 bird east shall fly conquest great
 far moon gives light sun gives heat

 lxxvii
 "her eyes behold truth purest light
 thunders peter's aid brings
 christ christian faith men fight
 forth spreadeth victorious wings
 virtue nature gives might
 lure home presence hings
 happy end great enterprise
 heaven decrees command skies"

 lxxviii
 words prince rinaldo's death
 troubled hearts fear rased
 joy yet godfrey smiled uneath
 wise thought care heed placed
 deeps regions underneath
 night's veil arose sun's bright lustre chased
 full sweetly cabins slept
 save whose thoughts eyes still open kept



 eleventh book

 argument
 grave procession songs psalms devout
 heaven's sacred aid christian lords invoke
 done scale wall kept
 fort almost gates nigh broke
 godfrey wounded clorinda stout
 lost day's conquest stroke
 angel cures returns fight
 lost labor day lost light



 christian army's great puissant guide
 assault town thoughts bent
 ladders rams engines huge provide
 reverend peter gravely went
 drawing sober grace aside
 words severe thus told high intent
 "right well lord earthly strengths move
 let us first begin heaven

 ii
 "with public prayer zeal faith devout
 aid assistance help obtain
 blessed heavenly rout
 whose support conquest sure may gain
 first let priests thine armies stout
 sacred hymns holy voices strain

 iii

 xxxii

 within little thorp stayed last

 till term sixteen months brought end
 thou begun little children
 half clipped words prattle go

 xxxiii
 "but passed august mine age
 half tap life run

 wet weary last arrive

 xxxvi
 "i took thee dream night
 buried world sleep shade

 said 'i charge thee execute aright
