 xxxvii
 "'i keep defend save protect
 made waters mild tigress tame
 wretch heavenly warnings dost reject'
 warrior vanished said
 rose journeyed way direct
 blushing morn tithon's bed forth came
 faith true sure ween
 dreams false still unchristened

 xxxviii
 "a pagan therefore thee fostered
 thy birth truth ever tell
 since increased courage brave
 sex nature'sself excel
 full many realm made bond slave
 fortunes last remember well
 peace war joy teen
 servant tutor

 xxxix
 "last morn skies ere stars exiled
 deep deathlike sleep senses drowned
 selfsame vision appear
 stormy wrathful looks thundering sound
 'villain' quoth 'within short thy dear
 must change life leave sinful ground
 thine loss torment care'
 said fled skies clouds air

 xl
 "hear joy hope darling hear
 high heaven dire misfortune threatened hath
 displeased pardie thee lere
 lore repugnant thy parents' faith
 ah sake bold attempt forbear
 put sable arms appease thy wrath"
 said wept pensive stood sad
 like dream lately

 xli
 cheerful smile answered last
 "i faith observe seems true
 cradle age thou taught hast
 change religion new
 vain shows fear dread aghast
 enterprise forbear pursue
 death dreadful face
 wherewith scareth mankind kept place"

 xlii
 approachen gan time thus spake
 wherein ought dreadful hazard try
 argantes went partake
 renown praise die
 ismen words hasty still make
 virtue great fly
 two balls gave made hollow brass
 wherein enclosed fire pitch brimstone

 xliii
 forth went dale hill
 hasted forward speedy pace
 unseen unmarked undescried
 beside engine close place
 new courage swelling hearts fill
 rage breasts fury shown face
 yearned blow fire draw sword
 watch descried gave word

 xliv
 silent passed watch begun
 rear huge alarm hideous cries
 therewith hardy couple forward run
 execute valiant enterprise
 cannon roaring gun
 noise flame bullet flies
 run give charge begin fray
 foes break spoil slay

 xlv
 passed first thousand thousand blows
 performed designment bold
 fiery ball engine throws
 stuff dry fire took quickly hold
 furious upon timberwork grows
 increased cannot well told
 crept piece skies
 burning sparks towering smoke upflies

 xlvi
 mass solid fire burning bright
 rolled smouldering fumes bursteth
 blustering winds add strength might
 gather close sparsed flames
 frenchmen trembled dreadful light
 arms haste fear ran rout
 fell piece dreaded much war
 thus long days make one hour doth mar

 xlvii
 two christian bands came place
 speedy haste beheld fire
 argantes cried scornful grace
 "your blood shall quench flames quench mine ire"
 said maid sober pace
 drew back banks retire
 faster brooks falling showers increase
 foes augment faster press

 xlviii
 gilden port opened forth stepped
 soldiers bold turkish king
 ready aid two force kept
 fortune home conquest bring
 bars hardy couple leapt
 band christians fling
 solyman drove back courage stout
 shut gate shut clorinda

 xlix
 alone shut forth hour
 wherein closed port virgin went
 full heat wrath strength power
 gainst arimon struck erst bent
 slew knight argant stowre
 wist parting fierce intent
 fight press night darksome skies
 care heart ta'en sight eyes

 l
 appeased angry mood
 fury calmed settled head
 saw gates shut stood
 amid foes held dead
 none marked last thought good
 save life path tread
 feigned one close drew
 amid press none saw knew

 li
 wolf guilty misdeed
 flies grove hide view
 favored night secret speed
 dissevered press damsel flew
 tancred alone escape took heed
 quarter arrived new
 arimon killed thither came
 saw marked pursued dame

 lii
 deemed man mickle might
 person would worship win
 hills nymph journey dight
 toward another port get
 hideous noise fast spurred knight
 heard stayed thus words begin
 "what haste hast thou ride softly take thy breath
 bringest thou" answered "war death"

 liii
 "and war death" quoth "here mayest thou get
 thou battle come" stayed
 tancred ground foot haste set
 left steed foot saw maid
 courage hot ire wrath whet
 either champion drew trenchant blade
 together ran together stroke
 like two fierce bulls rage love provoke

 liv
 worthy royal lists brightest day
 worthy golden trump laurel crown
 actions wonders fray
 sable knight dark bosom drown
 yet night consent acts display
 make deeds future ages known
 records long enduring story
 enrol praise fame worth glory

 lv
 neither shrunk vantage sought ground
 traverse skipped part part
 blows neither false feigned found
 night rage would let use art
 swords together clash dreadful sound
 feet stand fast neither stir start
 move hands steadfast feet remain
 blow loin struck thrust vain

 lvi
 shame bred desire sharp revenge take
 vengeance taken gave new cause shame
 haste little heed strake
 fuel enough feed flame
 last close battle fierce make
 could wield swords nigh came
 used hilts rushed
 helm helm shield shield crushed

 lvii
 thrice strong arms folds waist
 thrice forced let virgin go
 disdained embraced
 lover would strained mistress
 took swords enchased
 deep wounds soft flesh strong foe
 till weak weary faint alive uneath
 retired took breath

 lviii
 long beheld leaning stood
 upon swords whose points earth pight
 daybreak rising eastern flood
 put forth thousand eyes blindfold night
 tancred beheld foe's outstreaming blood
 gaping wounds waxed proud sight
 oh vanity man's unstable mind
 puffed every blast friendly wind

 lix
 joy'st thou wretch oh shall thy gain
 trophy conquest is't thou rears
 thine eyes shall shed case thou slain
 every drop blood sea tears
 bleeding warriors leaning thus remain
 one speak one word long time forbears
 tancred silence broke last said
 would know fight made

 lx
 "evil chance hard fortune
 silence shade debate
 light sun witness miss
 prowess praise dilate
 words arms find place yet grant
 tell thy name thy country estate
 may know dangerous combat done
 conquered hath won"

 lxi
 "what nill tell ask" quoth "in vain
 moved prayer constrained power
 thus much know one twain
 late kindled fire destroyed tower"
 tancred proud words swelled disdain
 "that hast thou said" quoth "in evil hour
 thy vaunting speeches thy silence
 uncivil wretch hath made heart wroth"

 lxii
 ire chafed breasts renewed fray
 fierce fight though feeble might
 strength gone cunning away
 fury stead maintained fight
 swords points edges sharp embay
 purple blood whereso hit light
 weak life yet bosoms lie
 lived disdained die

 lxiii
 aegean seas storms calmed
 rolled tumbling waves troublous blasts
 yet tempests past shows retain
 swelling billows casts
 though strength gone might vain
 first fierceness still fury lasts
 wherewith sustained tackling stood
 heaped wound wound blood blood

 lxiv
 alas fatal hour arrives
 sweet life must leave tender hold
 sword bosom deep drives
 bathed lukewarm blood iron cold
 breasts cruel weapon rives
 curious square embossed swelling gold
 knees grow weak pains death feels
 like falling cedar bends reels

 lxv
 prince hand upon shield doth stretch
 low earth wounded damsel layeth
 fell weak woful speech
 prayers last last complaints sayeth
 spirit new prayers teach
 spirit hope charity faith
 though life christ rebellious
 yet died child handmaid dear

 lxvi
 "friend thou hast pardon thee save
 body torments endure
 save soul baptism dying crave
 come wash away sins waters pure"
 heart relenting nigh sunder rave
 woful speech sweet creature
 rage wrath anger died
 cheeks salt tears ruth slide

 lxvii
 murmur loud mountain's side
 little runnel tumbled near place
 thither ran filled helmet wide
 quick returned work grace
 trembling hands beaver untied
 done saw seeing knew face
 lost therewith speech moving quite
 oh woful knowledge ah unhappy sight

 lxviii
 died strength unites
 virtues gave heart guard
 bridling grief water requites
 life bereft iron hard
 sacred words knight recites
 nymph heaven joy prepared
 life decays joys increase
 smiled said "farewell die peace"

 lxix
 violets blue mongst lilies pure men throw
 paleness midst native white begun
 looks heaven cast eyes trow
 downward pity bent heaven sun
 naked hand gave knight show
 love peace speech alas done
 thus virgin fell endless sleep
 love beauty virtue darling weep

 lxx
 saw gentle soul went
 manly courage relent began
 grief sorrow anguish sadness discontent
 free empire got lordship man
 life within heart close pent
 death senses visage ran
 like dead lady dead seemed tancred good
 paleness stillness wounds streams blood

 lxxi
 weak sprite unbodied
 fleshly prison free ceaseless strived
 followed fair soul lately fled
 christian squadron arrived
 seek fresh water thither haply led
 found princess dead deprived
 signs life yet knight remain
 live nigh dead slain

 lxxii
 guide far prince knew shield
 thither hasted full grief fear
 dead seeming beheld
 strange mishap shed many tear
 would leave corpses fair field
 food wolves though pagan
 arms soldiers uphent
 lamenting brought tancred's tent

 lxxiii
 dear burdens camp pass
 yet would dead seeming knight awake
 last deeply groaned token
 feeble soul flight yet take
 lay still heavy mass
 spirit earthen cage forsake
 thus brought thus placed
 sundry rooms yet adjoining near

 lxxiv
 skill art careful servants used
 life dying lord bring
 last eyes unclosed tears suffused
 felt hands heard whispering
 thither came long time mused
 mind astonished everything
 gazed squires fine knew
 weak woful thus plaints threw

 lxxv
 "what live yet breathe see
 accursed day hateful light
 spiteful ray still upbraideth
 accursed deed night
 ah coward hand afraid should'st thou
 thou instrument death shame despite
 should'st thou fear sharp trenchant knife
 cut thread bloodguilty life

 lxxvi
 "pierce bosom cruel heart
 pieces cleave break every string vein
 thou slaughters vile used art
 think'st pity ease pain
 luckless love therefore torments' smart
 sad example must still remain
 woful monster unhappy love
 still must live lest death comfort prove

 lxxvii
 "still must live anguish grief care
 furies guilty conscience torment
 ugly shades dark night troubled air
 grisly forms slaughter still present
 madness death bed repair
 hell gapeth wide swallow tent
 swift run fear
 yet still hell within bear

 lxxviii
 "but alas relics sweet
 wherein dwelt late love joy good
 fury left cast open street
 beast hath torn flesh licked blood
 ah noble prey savage beast unmeet
 ah sweet sweet far precious food
 ah seely nymph night darksome shade
 beasts far worse beasts betrayed

 lxxix
 "but still wend
 gather relics dear least
 beast hath hills descend
 tender bowels made feast
 let fell monster pieces rend
 deep entomb hollow chest
 buried shall
 stately tomb rich costly grave"

 lxxx
 thus mourned knight squires told last
 tears shed
 beam comfort dim eyes outcast
 like lightning thick clouds darkness spread
 heavy burden limbs haste
 mickle pain drew forth bed
 scant strength stand move go
 thither staggered reeling fro

 lxxxi
 came breast espied
 handiwork deep cruel wound
 sweet face leaden paleness dyed
 beauty late spread forth beams around
 trembled nere squires beside
 hold sunk ground
 said "o face death still sweet fair
 thou canst sweeten yet grief care

 lxxxii
 "o fair right hand pledge faith love
 given late late sign peace
 haps thou canst stir move
 dear limbs laid rest ease
 cruel blade floodgate rove
 pains end torments never cease
 hands cruel eyes accursed alike
 gave wound gave light strike

 lxxxiii
 "but thither run forth guilty blood
 whither plaints sorrows cannot wend"
 said passion wood
 inforced gan tear rend
 hair face wounds purple flood
 side rolling streams descend
 slain pain woe
 bereft senses preserved

 lxxxiv
 cast bed squires recalled sprite
 execute hateful charge
 tattling fame sorrows knight
 hard mischance told large
 godfrey lords worth might
 ran thither duty would discharge
 friendship true sweet words rage
 bitter grief woe would assuage

 lxxxv
 mortal wound doth smart
 searched handled sought
 sweet words afflicted heart
 grief anguish pain torment brought
 reverend peter would set apart
 care sheep good shepherd ought
 vanity grave advice reproved
 told mourning christian knights behoved

 lxxxvi
 "o tancred tancred far different
 thy beginnings good follies
 makes thee deaf hath thy eyesight blent
 mist cloud thus overshadeth thee
 warning good heaven sent
 yet advice thou canst hear see
 calleth conducts thee way
 thou willing dost witting stray

 lxxxvii
 "to worthy actions achievements fit
 christian knights would thee home recall
 thou hast left course changed
 make thyself heathen damsel's thrall
 see thy grief sorrow's painful fit
 made rod scourge thy sins withal
 thine good thyself means makes
 thou mercy goodness grace forsakes

 lxxxviii
 "thou dost refuse heaven proffered
 gainst still rebel sinful ire
 oh wretch oh whither doth thy rage thee chase
 refrain thy grief bridle thy fond desire
 hell's wide gate vain sorrow doth thee place
 sorrow misfortune's son despair's foul fire
 oh see thine evil thy plaint woe refrain
 guides death hell endless pain"

 lxxxix
 said die patient
 abandoned second death feared
 words comfort heart went
 dark night sorrow somewhat cleared
 yet grief deep sighs forth sent
 voice shrill plaints sad laments oft reared
 murdered love
 spoke heard perchance heaven

 xc
 till phoebus' rising evening fall
 mourns calls cries
 nightingale children small
 churl takes parents' eyes

 tires complaints seas shores skies
 till sweet sleep morning bright

 xci
 clad starry veil amid dream
 whose sweet sake mourned appeared maid
 fairer erst yet heavenly beam

 looks ruth eyes celestial seem

 "behold fair glad thy love appears
 sake dear forbear tears

 xcii
 "thine thanks soul thou madest flit
 unawares earthly nest

 still love thee tancred fit
 seat prepared among blest
 eternal joy eternal light
 thou shalt thy love enjoy knight

 xciii
 "unless thyself thyself heaven's joys envy
 thy vain sorrow thee bliss deprive
 live know love thee nill deny

 said zeal love forth eye
 hundred glorious beams bright shining drive

 xciv

 surgery cure wounds sought
 meanwhile dear love relics sweet

 yet cunning hand scopas wrought

 lively shape portrait maid

 xcv
 sacred burning lamps order long
 mournful pomp corpse brought ground

 xcvi

 woful prison living sprite
 pale cold sad comfortless sense deprived

 "o marble dear dear mistress placed
 flames within without tears thou hast

 xcvii
 "not dead bones art thou mournful grave
 quick love fortress hold
 still heart thy wonted brands
 bitter far alas cold
 receive sighs kisses sweet receive
 liquid drops melting tears enrolled
 give body pure chaste
 thy bosom cold entombed thou hast

 xcviii
 "for happy soul eye doth bend
 sweet body lately dressed
 love thy pity cannot offend
 anger wrath angels blessed
 pardon trespass friend
 hope relieves griefs oppressed
 hand knows hath sinned
 living loved love die

 xcix
 "and loving die oh happy day
 whene'er chanceth oh far blessed
 thy polished sides stray
 bones within thy hollow grave might rest
 together heaven spirits stay
 together bodies lie chest
 happy death join life doth sever
 death life sweet blessed ever"

 c
 meanwhile news besieged town
 mishap whispered
 forthwith spread true known
 woful loss talked everywhere
 mingled cries plaints heaven upthrown
 city's self new taken
 conquering foes flame fire
 house church street left entire

 ci
 men's eyes arsetes bent

 woful eyes tear went

 silver locks dust foul besprent
 knocked breast face rent tare

 cii
 "i would first knew hardy maid
 excluded among christian foes

 suit waste speech vain

 ciii
 "ah gone would danger free

 let revenge could save

 civ
 "jerusalem hear argantes saith

 cv
 said people joyful shout
 applaud speeches words approve
 calmed grief hope boaster stout
 would kill prince late slain love
