 men purpose high gods dispose
 underneath sword boaster died
 thus scorned threatened pride



 thirteenth book

 argument
 ismeno sets guard forest old
 wicked sprites whose ugly shapes affray
 put flight men whose labor would
 dark shades let heaven's golden ray
 thither goes tancred hardy faithful bold
 foolish pity lets assay
 strength courage heat christian power
 annoys refresh god sends shower



 scant dissolved ashes cold
 smoking tower fell scorched grass
 new device found enchanter old
 town besieged secured
 timber fit foes deprive would
 terror bred late consumed mass
 strength sion's walls shake
 turrets rams engines make

 ii
 godfrey's camp grove little way
 amid valleys deep grows sight
 thick old trees whose horrid arms display
 ugly shade like everlasting night
 sun spreads forth clearest ray
 dim thick uncertain gloomy seems light
 evening day darkness strive
 foe horizon drive

 iii
 sun chair seas doth steep
 night horror darkness thick place invade
 veil mortal eyes blindness deep
 sad terror make weak hearts afraid
 thither groom drives forth tender sheep
 browse ease faint cooling shade
 traveller pilgrim enter
 awful seems forest old dare venture

 iv
 united ghosts goblins meet
 frolic mates silent night
 dragons' wings cleave welkin fleet
 nimbly run o'er hills valleys light
 wicked troop allurements sweet
 draws sinful man good right
 hellish pomp banquets brought
 solemnize thus vain parians thought

 v
 twist twig bough branch therefore
 saracens cut sacred spring
 yet christians spared ne'er
 trees earth cutting steel bring
 thither went ismen old tresses hoar
 night earth spread forth wing
 silence deaf mirksome shade
 characters circles vain made

 vi
 circle set one foot unshod
 whispered dreadful charms ghastly wise
 three times witchcraft loveth numbers odd
 toward east gaped westward thrice
 struck earth thrice charmed rod
 wherewith dead bones makes grave rise
 thrice ground naked foot smote
 thus cried loud thundering note

 vii
 "hear hear spirits whilom fell
 cast heaven dint roaring thunder
 hear amid empty air dwell
 storms showers pour kingdoms
 hear devils lie deepest hell
 rend torments damned ghosts asunder
 lands death pain fear
 thou monarch great great dis great pluto hear

 viii
 "keep forest well keep every tree
 numbered give truly told
 souls men bodies clothed
 every plant sprite shall hide hold
 trembling fear make christians flee
 presume cut cedars old"
 said charms gan repeat
 none say use like feat

 ix
 strange speeches still night's splendent fires
 quenched lights shrunk away doubt
 feeble moon silver beams retires
 wrapt horns folding clouds
 ismen sprites come speed requires
 "why come ever damned rout
 tarry long pardie stay
 till stronger charms greater words say

 x
 "i yet forgot want use
 dreadful terms belong sacred feat
 tongue still stubborn hearts refuse
 much dreaded name well repeat
 heard great dis cannot excuse
 hither run eternal seat
 great fearful"more would said
 saw sturdy sprites obeyed

 xi
 legions devils thousands thither come
 sparsed air biding make
 thousands also heavenly doom
 condemned lie deep avernus lake
 slow came displeased
 woods keeping take
 yet obeyed took charge hand
 every branch leaf stand

 xii
 thus cursed work performed
 wizard king declared feat
 "my lord let fear let doubt sorrow pass
 henceforth safety stands regal seat
 foe supposed mean
 build rams engines great"
 told large part part
 late performed wondrous art

 xiii
 "besides help another hap" quoth
 "will shortly chance brings profit small
 within days mars sun see
 fiery beams unite leo shall
 extreme scorching heat
 neither rain quench dews fall
 placed planets high low
 heat fire burning heavens foreshow

 xiv
 "so great us warmth therefore
 garamants inde
 yet nill grieve us town sore
 sweet shade waters cold kind
 foes abroad tormented
 shield refreshing find
 heaven vanquish first egypt's crew
 destroy quite weak weary faint

 xv
 "thou shalt sit still conquer prove
 doubtful hazard uncertain fight
 argantes bold hates sore
 cause quiet peace though right
 provoke thee forth battle
 find means calm rage fierce knight
 shortly heaven send thee ease peace
 war trouble mongst thy foes increase"

 xvi
 king assured speeches fair
 held godfrey's power might strength scorn
 walls gan part repair
 late ram bruised iron horn
 wise foresight well advised care
 fortified breach bulwark torn
 folk men women children small
 endless toil repaired wall

 xvii
 godfrey nould bring forth power
 give assault fort vain
 till builded new dreadful tower
 reared high downfallen rams
 workmen therefore despatched hour
 hew trees forest main
 went scant wood appeared sight
 wonders new fearful hearts affright

 xviii
 silly children dare bend eye
 told strange bugbears haunt place
 new monsters bed lie
 fearful thoughts present face
 feared fled yet wist
 pursued fearful chase
 except fear perchance thus fled
 new chimeras sphinxes like monsters bred

 xix
 swift camp turned back dismayed
 words confused uncertain tales told
 heard scorned said
 reports lies fables hold
 chosen crew shining arms arrayed
 duke godfrey thither sent soldiers bold
 guard men faint arms provoke
 cut dreadful trees hardy stroke

 xx
 drawing near wood close ypent
 wicked sprites sylvan pinfolds
 eyes upon shades sooner bent
 frozen dread pierced entrails dear
 yet stalked still went
 bold semblance hiding coward fear
 far wandered forth trembling pace
 till approached nigh enchanted place

 xxi
 grove fearful sound outbreaks
 earthquake hill mountain tore
 wherein southern wind rumbling makes
 like sea waves scraggy shore
 lions grumble hiss scaly snakes
 howl wolves rugged bears roar
 trumpets shrill heard thunders fell
 sounds one sound expressed well

 xxii
 upon faces pale well might note
 thousand signs heartamating fear
 reason gone device wot
 press nigh stay still
 sudden dread breasts smote
 courage weak shield proof could bear
 last fled one bold
 excused flight thus wonders told

 xxiii
 "my lord one us grant
 dares cut one branch yonder spring
 think dwells sprite every plant
 keeps court great dis infernal king
 hath heart hardened adamant
 without trembling dares attempt thing
 sense wanteth hardy
 hear forest thunder roar hiss"

 xxiv
 said alcasto words gave heed
 alcasto leader switzers grim
 man void wit void dreed
 feared loss life loss limb
 savage beasts deserts wild feed
 ugly monster could dishearten
 whirlwind thunder earthquake storm aught
 world strange fearful thought

 xxv
 shook head smiling thus gan say
 "the hardiness wood fell
 proud trees low dust lay
 wherein grisly fiends monsters dwell
 roaring ghost courage dismay
 shriek birds beast's roar dragon's yell
 forest wend
 although deepest hell paths descend"

 xxvi
 thus boasted leave go desired
 forward went joyful cheer
 viewed wood thick shades admired
 heard wondrous noise rumbling shrill
 yet one foot audacious man retired
 scorned peril pressing forward still
 till forest's outmost marge stepped
 flaming fire entrance kept

 xxvii
 fire increased built stately wall
 burning coals quick sparks embers hot
 bright flames wood environed
 tree twist alcasto got
 higher stretched flames seemed bulwarks tall
 castles turrets full fiery shot
 slings engines strong every sort
 mortal wight durst scale strange fort

 xxviii
 oh strange monsters battlement
 loathsome forms stood defend place
 frowning looks upon knight bent
 threatened death shot sword mace
 last fled though slow went
 lions jolly hunters chase
 yet fled man sad fear withdrew
 though fear till never felt knew

 xxix
 fled long time never wist
 far run discoverd
 wonder hand blist
 bitter sorrow heart bit
 amazed ashamed disgraced sad silent trist
 alone would day darkness sit
 durst look man worth fame
 pride late great greater made shame

 xxx
 godfredo called found delays
 causes cabin keep
 length perforce comes naught says
 talks like babble sleep
 shamefacedness godfrey plain bewrays
 flight sighs sadness deep
 whereat amazed "what chance this" quoth
 "these witchcrafts strange nature's wonders

 xxxi
 "but courage champion move
 try hazard dreadful spring
 give leave adventure great prove
 news may report us thing"
 said lords attempt charmed grove
 yet nothing back fear flight bring
 inforced trembling retire
 sight sound monsters fire

 xxxii
 happed woful tancred left bed
 lay marble cold mistress dear
 lively color cheek fled
 limbs weak helm targe bear
 nathless need high attempts led
 labor would shun danger fear
 valor boldness heart courage brave
 faint body strength vigor gave

 xxxiii
 exploit forth went venturous knight
 fearless yet heedful silent well advised
 terrors forest's dreadful sight
 storms earthquakes thunders cries despised
 feared nothing yet motion light
 quickly vanished heart arised
 lo charmed wood
 fiery city high heaven stood

 xxxiv
 knight stepped back took sudden pause
 "what help arms" quoth
 "if fire monster's gaping jaws
 headlong cast boots
 common profit country's cause
 hazard life none
 exploit weight hold
 lose prince champion bold

 xxxv
 fly pagans say
 retire shall cut spring
 godfredo attempt every day
 knight perform thing
 flames uprisen forestall way
 perchance terror far danger bring
 hap shall" said forward stepped
 fire oh wondrous boldness leapt

 xxxvi
 bolted neither warmth heat
 felt sign fire scorching flame
 yet wist dismayed conceit
 fire came
 first touch vanished monsters great
 stead clouds black night frame
 hideous storms showers hail rain
 yet storms tempests vanished straight

 xxxvii
 amazed afraid champion good
 stood still tempest passed spied
 entered boldly forbidden wood
 forest secrets eyed
 walk sprite phantasm stood
 stopped way passage free denied
 save growing trees thick set
 oft sight passage oft let

 xxxviii
 length fair spacious green spied
 like calmest waters plain like velvet soft
 wherein cypress clad summer's pride
 pyramidwise lift tops aloft
 whose smooth bark upon evenest side
 strange characters found viewed oft
 like priests egypt erst instead
 letters used none could read

 xxxix
 mongst picked words last
 writ syriac tongue well could
 "oh hardy knight woods hast passed
 death palace court doth hold
 oh trouble souls quiet placed
 oh cruel thy heart bold
 pardon ghosts deprived heavenly light
 spirits dead men living fight"

 xl
 found graven tender rind
 mused uncouth writ
 thought heard softly whistling wind
 blasts amid leaves branches knit
 frame sound like speech human kind
 full sorrow grief woe
 whereby gentle thoughts filled
 pity sadness grief compassion fear

 xli
 drew sword last gave tree
 mighty blow made gaping wound
 rift red streams trickling see
 bebled verdant plain around
 hair start yet stroke
 nould give till end found
 adventure plaint moan
 hollow grave heard one groan

 xlii
 "enough enough" voice lamenting said
 "tancred thou hast hurt thou didst drive
 body noble maid
 lived late kept live
 within woful cypress laid
 tender rind thy weapon sharp doth rive
 cruel is't enough thy foes kill
 graves wilt thou torment still

 xliii
 "i clorinda imprisoned
 yet alone within plant dwell
 every pagan lord christian peer
 city's walls last day fell
 bodies new graves wot clear
 confined magic's spell
 tree hath life sense bough
 murderer thou cut one twist art thou"

 xliv
 sick man sleep doth see
 ugly dragon chimera new
 though suspect half persuaded
 idle dream monster true
 yet still fears quakes strives flee
 fearful wondrous form view
 feared knight yet knew thought
 illusions false witchcraft wrought

 xlv
 cold trembling waxed frozen heart
 strange effects passions torment
 feeble hand weapon start
 wits nigh went
 wounded saw thought pain smart
 lady weep complain mourn lament
 could suffer dear blood see
 hear sighs deep far fetched

 xlvi
 thus fierce heart death scorned oft
 strange shape monster could dismay
 feigned shows tender love made soft
 spirit false vain plaints betray
 whirling wind sword heaved aloft
 forest bare quite away
 o'ercome retired prince came
 sword found repossessed

 xlvii
 yet nould return mind try
 courage forests green
 godfrey's tent proached nigh
 spirits waked thoughts composed
 "my lord" quoth "a witness true
 wonders strange believe scant though seen
 fire shades dreadful sound
 heard true proof found

 xlviii
 "a burning fire deserts charmed
 built like battled wall heaven reared
 whereon darts dreadful weapons armed
 monsters foul misshaped whole bands appeared
 passed unhurt unharmed
 flame threatened blow felt feared
 rain night found straight
 day night sunshine turned rain

 xlix
 "what would tree wood
 hath sense hath life hath speech like human kind
 heard words grove stood
 mournful voice still still bear mind
 flesh purple blood
 every blow streams wounded rind
 else trow
 hath power cut one leaf one branch one bough"
 l
 thus said christian's noble guide
 felt uncouth strife contentious thought
 thought perzon tried
 witchcrafts strange bring charms naught
 deemed elsewhere provide
 timber easier got though sought
 study last abraid
 called hermit old said

 li
 "leave thy hardy thought another's hands
 plants wood dispoilen shall
 fatal ship conquest lands
 sails struck silver anchors fall
 champion broken hath worthless bands
 looseth soil held thrall
 time draws nigh proud foes field
 shall slaughtered lie sion's fort shall yield"

 lii
 said visage shone beams divine
 mortal voice's sound
 godfredo's thought acts incline
 working brain never idle found
 crab bright titan shine
 scorched scalding beams parched ground
 made unfit toil warlike feat
 soldiers weak labor faint sweat

 liii
 planets mild lamps benign quenched
 cruel stars heaven signorize
 whose influence cast fiery flames
 hot impressions earth skies
 growing heat still gathered deeper rout
 noisome warmth lands kingdoms flies
 harmful night hurtful day succeeds
 worse next morn light outspreads

 liv
 phoebus rose left golden weed
 donned gite deepest purple dyed
 sanguine beams forehead spread
 sad presage ill betide
 vermeil drops even tresses bleed
 foreshows future heat ocean wide
 next rose thus increased still
 present harms dread future ill

 lv
 thus bent gainst earth scorching rays
 burnt flowers burnt clytie dear
 leaves grew wan upon withered sprays
 grass growing herbs parched
 earth cleft rifts floods streams decays
 barren clouds lightning bright appear
 mankind feared lest climenes' child
 driven awry sire's illguided wain

 lvi
 furnace flew smoke skies
 smoke damned sodom brent
 within caves sweet zephyr silent lies
 still air rack came went
 o'er lands lukewarm breathing flies
 southern wind sunburnt afric sent
 thick warm interrupted blasts
 upon bosoms throats faces casts

 lvii
 yet comfort brought gloomy night
 thick shades burning heat uprolled
 sable mantle embroidered bright
 blazing stars gliding fires gold
 refresh sad earth thy thirsty sprite
 niggard moon let fall may dews cold
 dried vital moisture
 trees plants herbs flowers grass

 lviii
 sleep quiet dales exiled fled
 unquiet nights oft vain
 soldiers restless sought god bed
 thirst mourned complain
 juda's tyrant strong poison shed
 poison breeds woe deadly pain
 acheron stygian waters bring
 every fountain cistern well spring

 lix
 little siloe store bestows
 purest crystal christian bands
 pebbles naked channel shows
 scantly glides scorched sands
 po may o'er banks flows
 ganges waterer indian lands
 sevenmouthed nile yields egypt drink
 quench thirst men sufficient think

 lx
 gliding rivers erst seen
 adown verdant channels gently rolled
 falling streams valleys green
 distilled tops alpine mountains cold
 desired vain new torments
 augmented thus wish comforts old
 waters cool drank vain conceit
 increased thirst increased heat

 lxi
 sturdy bodies warriors strong
 neither marching far tedious way
 weighty arms shoulders hung
 could weary make death dismay
 weak feeble cast limbs along
 unwieldly burdens burned clay
 vein smouldering fire dwelt
 dried flesh solid bones melt

 lxii
 languished steed late fierce proffered grass
 fodder erst despised cast
 step stumbled lofty
 high advanced fell crest
 conquests gotten forgotten pass
 desire glory swelled breast
 spoils foe late rewards
 neglects despiseth naught regards

 lxiii
 languished faithful dog wonted care
 dear lord cabin forgot
 panting laid gathered fresher air
 cool burning entrails hot
 breathing wise nature prepare
 suage stomach's heat booted
 little ease alas small help win
 breathe forth air scalding fire suck

 lxiv
 thus languished earth estate
 lay woful thousands christians stout
 faithful people grew nigh desperate
 hoped conquest shameful death doubt
 distress talk oft debate
 sad complaints heard camp throughout
 "what hope hath godfrey shall still lie
 till soldiers armies die

 lxv
 "alas device strength thinks
 scale walls strong fort get
 whence hath engines new doth see
 wrathful heaven gainst us sword doth whet
 tokens shown true signs witness
 angry god proud attempts doth let
 scorching sun hot beams outspreads
 cooling inde aethiop needs

 lxvi
 "or thinks eath little thing
 us despised neglected disdained
 like abjects vile death thus bring
 empire may still maintained
 great bliss king
 wears crown blood stained
 buys sceptre people's lives
 see whither glory vain fond mankind drives

 lxvii
 "see see man called holy good
 courteous meek humble would thought
 yet never cared distress stood
 vain honor diminished naught
 dried us spring flood
 water must jordan streams brought
 sits feasts banquets sweet
 mingleth waters fresh wines crete"

 lxviii
 french thus murmured greekish knight
 tatine war weary grown
 "why die here" quoth "slain without fight
 killed subdued murdered overthrown
 upon frenchmen let penance light
 godfrey's folly let save mine own"
 said without farewell knight
 comet stole away night

 lxix
 bad example many troop prepares
 imitate escape know
 clotharius band ademare's
 whose guides dust buried low
 discharged duty's chains bondage snares
 free oath none service owe
 concluded secret flight
 shrunk away thousands every night

 lxx
 godfredo heard saw knew
 yet nould death chastise though mought
 faith wherewith could renew
 steadfast hills seas dry naught
 prayed lord upon flock rue
 ope springs grace ease drought
 looks shone zeal devotion faith
 hands eyes heaven heaves saith

 lxxi
 "father lord deserts waste
 thou hadst compassion thy children dear
 craggy rock moses cleft brast
 drew forth flowing streams waters clear
 like mercy lord like grace us cast
 though merits less appear
 thy grace supply want though
 thy firstborn son thy children yet we"

 lxxii
 prayers humble hearts forth sent
 nothing slow climb starry sky
 swift winged bird present
 father heavens high
 lord accepted gently bent
 upon faithful host gracious eye
 pain distress laid
 saw grieved see thus said

 lxxiii
 "mine armies dear till suffered woe
 distress danger hell's infernal power
 enemy hath world foe
 happy actions hour
 begin blessed end shall go
 refresh gentle shower
 rinaldo shall return egyptian crew
 shall encounter conquer subdue"

 lxxiv
 high words great heaven began shake
 fixed stars planets wandering still
 trembled air earth ocean quake
 spring fountain river forest dale hill
 north east lightning flash outbrake
 coming drops presaged thunders shrill
 joyful shouts soldiers plain
 tokens bless longdesired rain

 lxxv
 sudden cloud helias prayed
 dry earth exhaled phoebus' beams
 arose moist heaven windows open laid
 whence clouds heaps rush watery streams
 world o'erspread gloomy shade
 like dark mirksome even seems
 crashing rain molten skies fell
 o'er banks brooks fountains swell

 lxxvi
 summer season cloudy sky
 upon parched ground doth rain send
 duck mallard furrows dry
 merry noise promised showers attend
 spreading broad wings displayed lie
 keep drops plumes descend
 streams swell gathered lake
 therein dive sweet refreshing take

 lxxvii
 streaming showers shouts cries
 salute heaven shed thirsty lands
 falling liquor dropping skies
 catcheth lap barehead stands
 bright helm drink therein unties
 fresh streams dives sweaty hands
 faces temples wet
 keep drops large vessels set

 lxxviii
 man alone ease burning sore
 herein doth dive wash hereof drinks
 earth weak feeble faint
 whose solid limbs cleft rifts chinks
 received falling showers gathered store
 liquor sweet veins sinks
 moisture new infused largely
 trees plants herbs flowers grass

 lxxix
 earth like patient whose lively blood
 hath overcome last sickness strong
 whose feeble limbs bait food
 whereon strange disease depastured long
 restored health welfare stood
 sound erst fresh fair young
 forgetting grief pain
 pleasant robes crowns takes

 lxxx
 ceased rain sun began shine
 fruitful sweet benign gentle ray
 full strong power vigor masculine
 beams april may
 happy zeal trusts help divine
 world's afflictions thus drive away
 storms appease times seasons change
 conquer fortune fate destiny strange



 fourteenth book

 argument
 lord godfrey dream doth show
 rinaldo must return last
 asking pardon sue
 two knights find prince sent haste
 peter vision foreknew
 sendeth searchers wizard placed
 deep vault first large declares
 armida's trains shun snares


 fresh soft tender bed
 still mother gentle night flew
 fleeting balm hills dales shed
 honey drops pure precious dew
 verdure green forests spread
 virgin primrose violet blue
 sweetbreathed zephyr spreading wings
 sleep ease repose rest peace quiet brings

 ii
 thoughts troubles broadwaking day
 softly dipped mild oblivion's lake
 whose godhead heaven earth doth sway
 eternal light watch wake
 bent godfrey gracious ray
 bright eye still ope godfrey's sake
 silent dream lord sent
 told pleasure intent

 iii
 far east golden gate beside
 whence phoebus comes crystal port
 ere sun broad doors open wide
 beam springing day uncloseth
 hence comes dreams heaven's sacred guide
 reveals man high degrees
 hence toward godfrey ere left bed
 vision strange golden plumes bespread

 iv
 semblances shapes portraits fair
 never yet dream sleep appear
 forms sea earth air
 signs heaven stars every sphere
 wondrous uncouth strange rare
 vision well presented
 dream placed crystal wide
 beset golden fires top bottom side

 v
 wondereth circles vast
 stars motions course harmony
 knight shining rays fire embraced
 presents unwares eye
 voice far sweetness passed
 human speech thus said approaching nigh
 "what godfrey knowest thou thy hugo
 come embrace thy friend fellow dear"

 vi
 answered "thy glorious shining light
 thine eyes glistering beams doth place
 estranged hath foreknowledge quite
 thy countenance thy favor thy face"
 said three times stretched hands outright
 would friendly arms knight embrace
 thrice spirit fled thrice twined
 naught folded arms air wind

 vii
 lord hugo smiled "not think" quoth
 "i clothed flesh earthly mould
 spirit pure naked soul see
 citizen celestial hold
 place heaven room thee
 prepared among christ's champions bold"
 "ah when" quoth "these mortal bonds unknit
 shall peace ease rest sit"

 viii
 hugo replied "ere many years shall run
 amid saints bliss shalt thou reign
 first great wars must thy hand done
 much blood shed many pagans slain
 holy city assault
 land set free servile yoke
 wherein thou shalt christian empire frame
 thee shall baldwin rule

 ix
 "but increase thy love great desire
 heavenward blessed place behold
 shining lamps globes living fire
 turned guided moved rolled
 angels' singing hear choir
 bend thine eyes yonder earth mould
 mass globe compass see
 land sea spring fountain man beast grass tree

 x
 "how vile small slender price
 reward goodness virtue's gain
 narrow room glory vain upties
 little circle doth pride contain
 earth like isle amid water lies
 sea sometime called sometime main
 yet naught therein responds name great
 lake pond marish strait"

 xi
 thus said one bended
 looks ground half scorn smiled
 saw earth sea flood castle town
 strangely divided strangely compiled
 wondered folly man far drown
 set heart things base vild
 servile empire searcheth dumb fame
 scorns heaven's bliss yet proffereth heaven

 xii
 wherefore answered "since lord yet
 free spirit cage clay
 lest worldly error vain voyage let
 teach heaven best surest way"
 hugo replied "thy happy foot set
 true path passage stray
 exile young rinaldo call
 give thee charge else naught

 xiii
 "for lord hosts king bliss
 hath chosen thee rule faithful band
 thy stratagems appointed
 execute shall win land
 first thine second place
 thou art army's head hand
 champion place supply
 thou doth thy state deny

 xiv
 "the enchanted forest charmed treen
 cutting steel shall earth hew
 thy weak armies feeble
 scale walls reinforced new
 fainting lie dispersed green
 shall take new strength new courage view
 highbuilt towers eastern squadrons
 shall conquered shall fly shall die shall fall"

 xv
 held peace godfrey answered
 "oh presence would recomfort
 man's hidden thoughts perceive know
 say truth love see
 say messengers shall go
 shall speeches errand
 shall entreat else command man
 credit neither well perform can"

 xvi
 "the eternal lord" knight replied
 "that many graces hath thee blest
 among troops thou hast guide
 thou honored feared least
 speak thou lest blemish betide
 thy sacred empire thou make request
 suit thou moved art ruth
 yield forgive home recall youth

 xvii
 "guelpho shall pray thee god shall inspire
 pardon offence fault commit
 hasty wrath rash headstrong ire
 call knight yield thou
 though youth enwrapped fond desire
 far hence love looseness idle sit
 year fear shall return speed
 wish need

 xviii
 "your hermit peter whose sapient heart
 high heaven secrets opens tells shews
 messengers direct part
 prince shall hear certain news
 learn way manner art
 bring back thy warlike crews
 thy soldiers wandered misgone
 heaven may unite join one

 xix
 "but conclusion shall speeches end
 know blood shall mixed thine
 whence barons bold worthies shall descend
 many great exploits shall bring fine"
 said vanished sleeping friend
 like smoke wind mist titan's shine
 sleep fled likewise troubled thought
 wonder pleasure joy marvel fought

 xx
 duke looked saw azure sky
 argent beams silver morning spread
 started praise axed virtue lie
 toil travel sin shame bed
 arms took sword girt thigh
 pavilion lords sped
 council grave princes sit
 strength wisdom war ruled wit

 xxi
 lord guelpho within whose gentle breast
 heaven infused new sudden thought
 pleasing words thus duke addressed
 "good prince mild though unasked kind unbesought
 oh let thy mercy grant request
 pardon fault rage malice wrought
 great offence grant late commit
 suit hasty perchance unfit

 xxii
 since godfrey meek benign kind
 prince rinaldo bold humbly sue
 suitor's self behind
 thy greatest friends state friendship true
 trust shall thy grace mercy find
 acceptable crew
 oh call home trespass amend
 shall blood godfrey's service spend

 xxiii
 "and else dares undertake
 enchanted wood cut one tree
 gainst death danger dares battle make
 bold face fearless heart
 beat walls gates pieces break
 leap o'er rampires high thou shalt see
 restore therefore desirous band
 wish hope strength shield hand

 xxiv
 "to nephew thyself restore
 trusty help strength hand thou needs
 idleness let consume
 recall noble acts deeds
 known worth strength yore
 wher'er thy standard broad cross outspreads
 oh let fame praise spread far wide
 thou lord teacher guidel"

 xxv
 thus entreated rest approve
 words friendly murmurs whispered low
 godfrey though suit mind move
 whereon never thought tell
 "how heart" quoth "if love
 request suit bend bow
 let rigor go right justice
 wherein consent agree

 xxvi
 "rinaldo shall return let restrain
 henceforth headstrong wrath hasty ire
 hardy deeds let take pain
 correspond hope desire
 guelpho thou must call home knight
 see speed tents retire
 messengers appoint likes thy mind
 teach young man find"

 xxvii
 start dane bare prince sweno's brand
 "i will" quoth "that message undertake
 refuse pains sea land
 give knight sword kept sake"
 man bold courage strong hand
 guelpho glad proffer make
 "thou shalt" quoth "ubaldo shalt thou
 go thee knight stout wise grave"

 xxviii
 ubaldo youth known seen
 fashions strange many uncouth land
 travelled realms
 arctic circle hot meroe's strand
 man whose wit guide
 customs use could tongues understand
 forthy spent youthful seasons
 lord guelpho entertained held dear

 xxix
 committed charge care
 find bring champion bold
 guelpho commands fort repair
 boemond doth seat sceptre hold
 public fame said bertoldo's heir
 lived dwelt stayed hermit old
 knew misled false report
 among came parleyed sort

 xxx
 "sir knights" quoth "if intend ride
 follow report fond people say
 follow rash truthless guide
 leads vain men amiss makes stray
 near ascalon go salt seaside
 swift brook fails hideous sway
 aged sire friend shall find
 saith keep mind

 xxxi
 "of great voyage undertake
 much skill much mine advise
 hath foreknown welcome sake
 shall man kind wise"
 instructed thus question make
 twain elected enterprise
 humbly yielded obey word
 hermit said said lord

 xxxii
 took leave journey went
 could brook stay zeal let
 ascalon voyage straight bent
 whose broken shores brackish waves wet
 heard gainst cliffs besprent
 bitter foam roaring surges bet
 tumbling brook passage stopped stayed
 latefall'n rain proud puissant made

 xxxiii
 proud banks grew
 fields ran swift shaft bow
 stopped stood drew
 aged sire grave benign show
 crowned beechen garland gathered new
 clad linen robe raught low
 right hand rod flood
 stream marched dry shod yode

 xxxiv
 rhene winter's freezing cold
 congeals streams thick hardened glass
 beauties fair shepherds' daughters bold
 wanton windlays run turn play pass
 river passed wizard old
 although unfrozen soft swift
 thither stalked warriors stayed
 greetings done spoke said

 xxxv
 "great pains great travel lords begun
 cunning guide great need stand
 far alas great bertoldo's son
 imprisoned waste desert land
 soil remains must run
 promontory rock sea shore sand
 search must stretch prince found
 beyond world beyond half ground

 xxxvi
 yet vouchsafe see cell pray
 hidden caves vaults though builded low
 great wonders strange things bewray
 things good hear fit know"
 said bids river make way
 flood retired backward gan flow
 two crystal mountains rise
 fled red sea jordan thrice

 xxxvii
 took hands led headlong
 flood vast hollow deeps
 light shadows brown
 thickest deserts feeble cynthia peeps
 spacious caves saw overflown
 waters pure great neptune keeps
 thence moisten earth brings
 seas rivers floods lakes fountains wells springs

 xxxviii
 whence ganges indus volga ister po
 whence euphrates whence tigris' spring view
 whence tanais whence nilus comes also
 although head till creature knew
 wealthy stream doth go
 sulphur yields ore rich quick new
 sunbeams doth polish purge fine
 makes silver pure gold divine

 xxxix
 banks rich wealthy stream
 hath fair beset pearl precious stone
 like stars sky lamps stage seem
 darkness day night gone
 sparkled clothed azurebeam
 heavenly sapphire jacinth shone
 carbuncle flamed diamond sheen
 glistered bright smiled emerald green

 xl
 amazed knights amid wonders passed
 fixed deep marvels thought
 one word uttered till last
 ubaldo spake thus guide besought
 "o father tell skill thou hast
 wonders done place us brought
 well know wake sleep
 heart drowned amazement deep"

 xli
 "you within hollow womb" quoth
 "of fertile earth nurse things made
 brought guided
 sacred entrails could wight invade
 palace shortly shall splendent see
 glorious light though built night shade
 pagan born yet lord
 grace baptism hath soul restored

 xlii
 "nor yet help devil aid hell
 uncouth work wondrous feat
 lord forbid use charm spell
 raise foul dis infernal seat
 herbs every spring well
 hidden power know virtue great
 kind hath hid mortal sight
 stars motions might

 xliii
 "for caves dwell buried still
 sight heaven often resort
 tops lebanon carmel hill
 liquid air disport
 mars venus behold
 bare erst vulcan took short
 rest roll glide move see
 aspects benign froward be"

 xliv
 "and underneath feet clouds view
 thick thin bright iris' bow
 frost snow rain hail dew
 winds whence come whence blow
 jove thunder makes lightning new
 bolt strikes earth
 comate crinite caudate stars framed
 knew skill pride heart inflamed

 xlv
 "so learned cunning wise thought
 supposed wit high might climb
 know things god framed wrought
 fire air sea earth man beast sprite place time
 hermit baptism brought
 soul washed sin crime
 perceived sight blindness still
 wit folly ignorance skill

 xlvi
 "then saw like owls shining sun
 gainst beams truth souls blind
 smile begun
 heart puffed folly's wind
 yet still arts done
 practised hermit's mind
 thus hath changed thoughts heart
 rules mine art knowledge skill

 xlvii
 "in rest thoughts depend
 lord teacher guide
 noble work strives bring end
 architect workmen
 hardy youth home camp send
 prison strong care charge shall
 commands ere foretold
 coming oft seek champion bold"

 xlviii
 said brought champions twain
 vault wherein dwells lies
 cave high wide large ample plain
 goodly rooms halls chambers galleries
 bred rich precious vein
 wealthy earth hid mortal eyes
 shines fair adorned every part
 riches grown kind framed art

 xlix
 hundred grooms quick diligent neat
 attendance gave strangers bold
 wall stood cupboard great
 massive plate silver crystal gold
 precious wines costly meat
 filled thus spake wizard old
 "now fits time sir knights tell show
 desire hear long know

 l
 "armida's craft sleight hidden guile
 partly wot acts arts untrue
 camp came wile
 greatest lords princes thence drew
 know turned first monsters vile
 kept since closed secret mew
 lastly gazaward bonds sent
 young rinaldo rescued went

 li
 "what chanced since large declare
 unknown story strange true
 first prey got pain care
 escaped gone witch perceived knew
 hands wrung grief clothes tare
 full woe heavy words outthrew
 'alas knights slain prisoners free
 yet conquest never boast shall

 lii
 "'he place shall serve sustain
 plagues torments suffer sorrows bear
 absence shall lament vain
 wail loss many tear'
 thus talking ordain
 false wicked guile shall hear
 thither hasted valiant knight
 overcome slain men fight

 liii
 "rinaldo dolt left
 back pagan's harness tied
 perchance deemed pass unknown
 arms less noted false ride
 headless corse fight late overthrown
 witch forsaken arms hide
 brook exposed sand
 whither wished would come christian band

 liv
 "their coming might dame foreknow right well
 secret spies sent forth thousand ways
 every day news camp might tell
 parted thence booties search preys
 beside sprites conjured sacred spell
 asks doubts reveals says
 body therefore placed part
 furthered best sleight craft art

 lv
 "and near corpse varlet false sly
 left attired shepherd's homely weed
 taught counterfeit lie
 time required performed deed
 soldiers spoke jealousy
 false suspect mongst strewed seed
 since brought forth fruit strife jar
 civil brawls contention discord war

 lvi
 "and wished soldiers thought
 godfrey's practice prince slain
 yet vanished suspicion false naught
 truth spread forth silver wings
 false devices thus armida wrought
 first deceit foremost train
 next practised shall hear tell
 knight thereof befell

 lvii
 "armida hunted wood plain
 till orontes' flowery banks stayed
 stream part meet
 midst gentle island made
 pillar fair pight beside main
 near little frigate floating laid
 marble white prince long behold
 inscription read writ gold

 lviii
 "'whoso thou art chance doth bring
 happy steps flood orontes' sides
 know world hath strange thing
 twixt east west small island hides
 pass see without tarrying'
 hasty youth pass stream provides
 cogs narrow small strait
 alone rowed bade squires wait

 lix
 "landed stalks yet naught sees
 verdant groves sweet shades mossy rocks
 caves fountains flowers herbs trees
 words read takes mocks
 green isle sweet degrees
 wherewith enticed sits unlocks
 closed helm bares visage fair
 take sweet breath cool gentle air

 lx
 "a rumbling sound amid waters deep
 meanwhile heard thither turned sight
 tumbling troubled stream took keep
 strong waves together rush fight
 whence first saw golden tresses peep
 rising visage virgin bright
 neck breasts low
 shame could see could show

 lxi
 "so twilight sometimes appear
 nymph goddess fairy queen
 though siren sprite
 yet beauty seemed
 one sisters false haunted near
 tyrrhene shores kept waters sheen
 like face voice sound
 thus sung pleased skies ground

 lxii
 "'ye happy youths april fresh may
 attire flowering green lusty age
 glory vain virtue's idle ray
 tender limbs toil engage
 calm streams fishes birds sunshine play
 followeth pleasure sage
 nature saith yet gainst sacred
 still rebel strive still

 lxiii
 "'o fools youth possess yet scorn
 precious shortabiding treasure
 virtue idle name
 prized world 'bove reason measure
 honor glory praise renown fame
 men's proud harts bewitch tickling pleasure
 echo shade dream flower
 wind blasted spoiled every shower

 lxiv
 "'but let happy souls joy possess
 ivory castles bodies fair
 passed harms salve forgetfulness
 haste coming evils thought care
 regard blazing star burning tress
 storm threatening sky thundering air
 wisdom good life worldly bliss
 kind teacheth us nature commands us this'

 lxv
 "thus sung spirit false stealing sleep
 tunes enticed heavy eyes
 step step senses creep
 still every limb therein unmoved lies
 thunders loud could slumber deep
 quiet death true image make rise
 ambush forth armida start
 swearing revenge threatening torments smart

 lxvi
 "but looked face awhile
 saw sweet breathed still lay
 fair eyes though closed seemed smile
 first stayed astound great dismay
 sat love art beguile
 sat looked fled fast away
 wrath forehead gazed maid
 spring narcissus tooting laid

 lxvii
 "and veil wiped
 fair cheeks globes silver sweat
 cool air gathered trembling fan
 mitigate rage melting heat
 thus would think hot eyeglance
 cold frost dissolve hardness great
 late congealed heart fair dame
 late foe lover became

 lxviii
 "of woodbines lilies roses sweet
 proudly flowered wanton plain
 platted fast well knit joined meet
 framed soft surely holding chain
 wherewith bound neck hands feet
 thus bound thus taken prince remain
 coach two old dragons drew
 laid sleeping knight thence flew

 lxix
 "nor turned damascus' kingdoms large
 fort built asphalte's lake
 jealous dear precious charge
 love ashamed way take
 wide ocean whither skiff barge
 us doth seld never voyage make
 frolic love awhile
 chose waste sole desert isle

 lxx
 "an isle fellows bears name
 fortunate temperate air mould
 mountain high alight dame
 hill obscured shades forests old
 upon whose sides witch art frame
 continual snow sharp frost winter cold
 top fresh pleasant sweet green
 beside lake palace built queen

 lxxi
 "there perpetual sweet flowering spring
 lives ease joys lord
 hardy youth strange prison bring
 valors must directed skill
 overcome monster thing
 guards palace keeps hill
 shall want guide engines fit
 bring mount conquer

 lxxii
 "beside stream yparted shall find
 dame visage young old years
 curled locks front twined
 partycolored robe silk wears
 shall conduct swift air wind
 flit bird jove's hot weapon bears
 faithful pilot cunning trusty sure
 tiphys skilful palinure

 lxxiii
 "at hill's foot whereon witch doth dwell
 serpents hiss cast poison vilde
 ugly boars rear bristles fell
 gape bears roar lions wild
 yet rod easily quell
 rage wrath make meek mild
 yet top height hill
 greatest danger lies greatest ill

 lxxiv
 "there welleth fair clear bubbling spring
 whose waters pure thirsty guests entice
 liquors cold secret sting
 strange deadly poison closed lies
 one sup thereof drinker's heart doth bring
 sudden joy whence laughter vain doth rise
 strange merriment stops stays
 till laughter's end end days

 lxxv
 "then deadly wicked streams refrain
 thirsty lips despise dainty cheer
 find exposed upon grassy plain
 false damsels vouchsafe hear
 melodious tunes voices strain
 whose faces lovely smiling sweet appear
 looks voice songs despise
 enter fair armida's paradise

 lxxvi
 "the house builded like maze within
 turning stairs false doors winding ways
 shape whereof plotted vellum thin
 give sleights bewrays
 midst garden lies many gin
 net catch frail hearts false cupid lays
 verdure arbors green
 brave champion lies wanton queen

 lxxvii
 "but haply riseth knight
 hath withdrawn presence place
 take shield diamonds bright
 hold young man's face
 may glass therein garments light
 wanton soft attire view case
 sight shame disdain may move
 heart leave base servile love

 lxxviii
 "now resteth naught needful tell
 go secure safe sure bold
 unseen palace may enter well
 pass dangers foretold
 neither art charm magic spell
 stop passage steps withhold
 shall armida guarded
 coming aught foreknow foresee

 lxxix
 "and eke safe enchanted fort
 shall return scape unhurt away
 time doth us rest exhort
 must rise peep springing day"
 said led narrow port
 lodging fair wherein lay
 glad full thoughts left guests
 wonted bed old man rests



 fifteenth book

 argument
 well instructed knights forsake host
 come strange bark harbor lay
 setting sail behold egypt's coast
 monarch's ships armies array
 wind pilot good seas post
 pass long journeys make short way
 farsought isle find armida's charms
 scorn shun sleights despise arms



 rosyfingered morn gladsome ray
 rose task old tithonus' lap
 grave host came warriors lay
 brought shield rod map
 "arise" quoth "ere lately broken day
 bright arms round world fold wrap
 promised brought
 enough bring armida's charms naught"

 ii
 started every tender limb
 sturdy steel stubborn plate dight
 old man stalked followed
 gloomy shades sad sable night
 vaults obscure entries dim
 way came steps remeasured right
 flood arrived "farewell" quoth
 "good luck aid guide good fortune be"

 iii
 flood received bottom low
 lilt billows thin
 waters east branch bough
 violence first plunged dived therein
 upon shore waves throw
 knights fair guide look begin
 gazing round little bark spied
 wherein damsel sate stern guide

 iv
 upon front locks curled new
 eyes courteous full peace love
 look saint angel bright show
 visage grace virtue strove
 robe seemed sometimes red sometimes blue
 changed still stir move
 look oft man's eye beheld
 oft colors changed went came

 v
 feathers tender soft plain
 dove's smooth neck close couched
 one color never long remain
 change hue gainst glimpse phoebus' sheen
 rubies bright vermeil chain
 make carknet rich emeralds green
 mingle alter turn change
 thousand colors rich pure fair strange

 vi
 "enter boat happy men" says
 "wherein raging waves secure ride
 tempest storm wind obeys
 burdens light benign stream tide
 lord rules journeys ways
 hath sent servant guide"
 said shallop drove gainst sand
 anchor cast amid steadfast land

 vii
 entered anchors upwound
 launched forth sea pinnace flit
 spread wind sails broad unbound
 helm sat govern
 swelled flood banks drowned
 bear greatest ship burthen fit
 yet fatigue little swift light
 lowest ebb bear might

 viii
 swifter thought friendly wind forth bore
 sliding boat upon rolling wave
 curded foam froth billows hoar
 cable murmur roar rave
 last came watery store
 flood one deep channel engrave
 forth greedy seas streams sent
 waves name spent

 ix
 wondrous boat scant touched troubled main
 sea still hushed quiet
 vanished clouds ceased wind rain
 tempests threatened overblow pass
 gentle breathing air made even plain
 azure face heaven's smooth lookingglass
 heaven smiled skies
 calm clearness earth love

 x
 ascalon sailed forth drived
 toward west speedy course frame
 sight gaza till bark arrived
 little port first took name
 since others' loss well thrived
 city great rich became
 shores borders land
 found full armed men sand

 xi
 passengers landward turned sight
 saw pitched many stately tent
 soldier footman captain lord knight
 shore city came went
 huge elephants strong camels coursers light
 horned hoofs sandy ways outrent
 many ship boat
 mighty anchors fastened swim float

 xii
 spread sails strong oars sweep
 waters smooth brush buxom wave
 breasts sunder cleave yielding deep
 broken seas anger foam rave
 thus guide began "sir knights take keep
 shores spread squadrons brave
 troops hardy knights yet sands
 monarch scant hath gathered half bands

 xiii
 "of egypt forces
 aid lands attend
 twixt noonday sun morning star
 realms command bow bend
 trust shall return far
 bring journey long wished end
 king lieutenant shall
 armies bring zion's conquered wall"

 xiv
 thus said soaring eagles fly
 mongst birds securely air
 mounting behold wakeful eye
 radiant beams old hyperion's hair
 gondola passed swiftly
 twixt ship ship withouten fear care
 follow trouble stop stay
 forth sea made lucky speed way

 xv
 fornenst old raffia's town fand
 town first sailors doth appear
 syria pass egypt land
 sterile coasts barren rhinocere
 passed seas casius hill doth stand
 trees o'erspreads waters near
 whose roots breaketh brackish wave
 jove temple pompey hath grave

 xvi
 damiata next behold
 sea tribute nilus pays
 seven mouths renowned stories old
 hundred ignoble ways
 pass town built grecian bold
 called alexandria till days
 pharaoh's tower isle removed yore
 far land joined shore

 xvii
 crete rhodes left north unseen
 sailed along coasts afric lands
 whose sea towns fair realms inward
 full monsters desert sands
 five cities left cyrene
 old temple false hammon stands
 next ptolemais sacred wood
 whence spring silent streams lethe flood

 xviii
 greater syrte sailors often cast
 peril great death loss extreme
 compassed round safely passed
 cape judeca flood magra's stream
 tripoli gainst malta placed
 low hid lurk seas doth seem
 little syrte alzerhes isle
 dwelt folk lotos ate erewhile

 xix
 next tunis crooked shore spied
 whose bay rock either side defends
 tunis towns beauty wealth pride
 far libya's bounds extends
 gainst fair sicilia's fertile side
 rugged front great lilybaeum bends
 dame pointed sometime stood
 rome's stately rival whilom carthage proud

 xx
 great carthage low ashes cold doth lie
 ruins poor herbs height scant pass
 cities fall perish kingdoms high
 pride pomp lies hid sand grass
 mortal man repine die
 whose life air breath wind body glass
 thence seas next bisert's walls cleft
 far sardinia right hand left

 xxi
 numidia's mighty plains coasted
 wandering shepherds used flocks feed
 bugia argier infamous den
 pirates false oran left speed
 tingitan swiftly overren
 elephants angry lions breed
 realms fez maroc
 gainst granada's shores coasts see

 xxii
 first sea brake
 great alcides' help stories feign
 true may floods begin
 whilom firm solid main
 sea passage win
 parted afric land spain
 abila hence thence calpe great upsprings
 power hath time change face things

 xxiii
 four times sun spread morning ray
 since first dame launched forth wondrous barge
 never yet took port creek bay
 fairly forward bore knights charge
 strait jolly ship made way
 boldly sailed upon ocean large
 sea midst earth great
 oh wherein earth hath seat

 xxiv
 deep engulphed mighty flood
 saw gades mountains near
 fled land towns land stood
 heaven covered sea sea seemed heavens bear
 "at last fair lady" quoth ubaldo good
 "that endless main dost guide us
 ever man sailed tell
 lands wherein men dwell"

 xxv
 "great hercules" quoth "when quailed
 monsters fierce afric spain
 along coasts countries sailed
 yet durst assay ocean main
 within pillars would impaled
 overdaring wit mankind vain
 till lord ulysses bounders pass
 see know desirous

 xxvi
 "he passed pillars open wave
 broad sea first bold sails untwined
 yet greedy ocean grave
 naught helped skill gainst tide wind
 witness voyage brave
 lies buried truth thereof find
 storm hath forced way since
 drowned unreturned thence

 xxvii
 "so mighty sea yet unsought
 thousand isles kingdoms lie unknown
 void men vainly thought
 peopled well wonned like
 land fertile ground scant well wrought
 air wholesome temperate sun grass proudly grown"
 "but" quoth ubaldo "dame pray thee teach
 hid world laws speech"

 xxviii
 "as diverse nations" answered
 "their tongues rites laws different
 pray beasts stone tree
 earth sun morning star
 meats unwholesome vile hateful
 eat man's flesh captives ta'en war
 calpe's mountain west dwell
 faith profane life rude fell"

 xxix
 "but gracious god" knight replied
 "that blood sinful men hath bought
 truth forever gospel hide
 lands yet unknown unsought"
 "oh no" quoth "his name far wide
 shall known learning thither brought
 shall long tedious ways forever
 world lands kingdoms sever

 xxx
 "the time shall come sailors shall disdain
 talk argue alcides' streat
 lands seas nameless yet remain
 shall well known boundaries site seat
 ships encompass shall solid main
 far seas outstretch waters great
 measure world sun
 earth globe compass run

 xxxi
 "a knight genes shall hardiment
 upon wondrous voyage first wend
 winds waves ships sunder rent
 seas unused strange clime pool unkenned
 peril astonishment
 makes frail hearts men bow bend
 within abilas' strait shall keep hold
 noble spirit sailor bold

 xxxii
 "thy ship columbus shall canvas wing
 spread o'er world yet concealed lies
 scant swift fame looks shall bring
 though thousand plumes thousand eyes
 let bacchus alcides sing
 thee future age let suffice
 thine acts forewarning give
 shall verse noble story live"

 xxxiii
 thus talking swift twixt south west run
 sliced twixt froth foam way
 saw setting sun
 behind rising beam springing day
 morn drops dews begun
 scatter broad upon flowering lay
 far hill mountain high spied
 whose top clouds environ clothe hide

 xxxiv
 drawing near hill ease view
 clouds molten fallen fled
 whose top pyramidwise pointed show
 high narrow sharp sides yet outspread
 thence fire flame smoke outflew
 hill whereunder lies bed
 enceladus whence imperious sway
 bright fire breaks night black smoke day

 xxxv
 hill lay islands small
 rocks crags cliffs mountains stood
 isles fortunate elder time call
 high heaven reigned kind good
 blessings rich liberal
 without tillage earth gives corn food
 grapes swell sweet precious wine
 without pruning yields fertile vine

 xxxvi
 olive fat ever buds flowers
 honeydrops hollow oaks distil
 falling brook silver streams downpours
 gentle murmur native hill
 western blast tempereth dews showers
 sunny rays lest heat blossoms kill
 fields elysian fond heathen sain
 souls men bliss remain

 xxxvii
 pilot steered "and now" quoth
 "your voyage long end brought wellnear
 happy isles fortune see
 great fame little truth hear
 sweet wholesome pleasant fertile fat
 yet rich fame reports were"
 said toward island fresh bore
 first ten lies next afric's shore

 xxxviii
 charles thus "if worthy governess
 good speed tarriance let
 upon isle heaven fair doth bless
 view place land awhile us set
 know folk god confess
 whereby man's heart may knowledge get
 may tell wonders therein seen
 another day say been"

 xxxix
 answered "well fits high desire
 thy noble heart yet cannot consent
 heaven's decree firm stable entire
 thy wish repugns gainst thy bent
 yet time hath titan's gliding fire
 met forth prefixed discoverment
 lawful ocean main
 secrets know known explain

 xl
 "to withouten needle map card
 given pass seas arrive
 strong prison lies knight imbarred
 prey must witch deprive
 aspire prepared
 vain gainst fate heaven's decree strive"
 thus said first seen isle gave place
 high rough second showed face

 xli
 saw eastward stretched order long
 happy islands sweetly flowering lay
 seas betwixt isles enthrong
 shouldered land land away
 seven people rude among
 shady trees sheds built clay
 rest lay waste unless wild beasts unseen
 wanton nymphs roamed mountains green

 xlii
 secret place found one
 cleft shore sea bosom takes
 'twixt stretched arms doth fold close
 ample bay rock makes
 main doth broad back oppose
 whereon roaring billow cleaves breaks
 two crags like turrets high
 point forth port sail thereby

 xliii
 quiet seas lie safe still
 green wood like garland grows aloft
 sweet caves within cool shades waters shrill
 lie nymphs moss ivy soft
 anchor needs hold frigate still
 cable twisted sure though breaking oft
 desert silent quiet glad
 entered dame made

 xliv
 "the palace proudly built" quoth "behold
 sits top yonder mountain's height
 christ's true faith lies champion bold
 idleness love fancy folly light
 phoebus shall rising beams unfold
 prepare gainst hill mount upright
 let stay bold hearts breed care
 save one hours unlucky

 xlv
 "but yet evening make good speed
 hill's foot daylight might pass"
 thus said dame guide agreed
 took leave leaped forth grass
 found way hill doth lead
 softly went neither tired
 mountain's foot arrived
 sun team waters dived

 xlvi
 saw crags clefts
 proud stately pleasant top grew
 sides clad frost snow
 height green herbs flowerets sout
 like hairy locks trees grow
 rocks ice keep watch ward
 tender roses lilies new
 thus art nature change kind subdue

 xlvii
 within thick dark shady plot
 hill's foot night warriors dwell
 sun rays bright shining hot
 dispread golden light eternal well
 "up up" cried fiercely got
 climbed boldly gainst mountain fell
 forth crept whence cannot say
 ugly serpent forestalled way

 xlviii
 armed golden scales head crest
 lifted high neck swelled great ire
 flamed eyes hiding breast
 broad path poison breathed fire
 reached forth folds forward pressed
 would back rolls heaps retire
 thus presents guard place
 knights pressed forward assured pace

 xlix
 charles drew forth brand strike snake
 ubaldo cried "stay companion dear
 sword weapon battle make
 monster affronts us here"
 said gan charmed rod shake
 serpent durst hiss fear
 fled dead dread fell grass
 passage plain eath open

 l
 little higher way met
 lion fierce hugely roared cried
 crest reared high open set
 broadgaping jaws furnace wide
 stern back oft smote rage whet
 sacred staff espied
 trembling fear bold heart spread
 native wrath gone swift fled

 li
 hardy couple way forth wend
 met host roar gape
 savage beasts tofore unseen unkend
 differing voice semblance shape
 monsters hot afric doth forthsend
 twixt nilus atlas southern cape
 met wild beasts besides
 hyrcania breeds hyrcane forest hides

 lii
 yet fierce strange savage host
 could presence worthies stand
 fled away heart courage lost
 lord ubaldo shook charming wand
 let passage stopped crossed
 till mountain's top land
 save ice frost drifted snow
 oft made feeble weary faint slow

 liii
 passed frozen ground
 overgone winter sharp keen
 warm mild pleasant gentle sky found
 overspread large ample green
 winds breathed spikenard myrrh balm around
 blasts firm unchanged stable
 elsewhere winds rise fall
 phoebus aye shines sets

 liv
 elsewhere sunshine bright showers
 heat cold interchanged
 everlasting spring mild heaven pours
 rain storm clouds appear
 nursing fields grass grass flowers
 flowers smell trees leaves bear
 lake stately palace stands
 overlooks mountains seas lands

 lv
 passage hard mountain steep
 travellers faint weary made
 grassy plains scantly creep
 walked rested oft went stayed
 rocks seemed joy weep
 feet dropping crystal played
 enticing drink flowers
 plenteous spring thousand streams pours

 lvi
 united springing grass
 ate forth channel tender green
 underneath eternal shade pass
 murmur shrill cold pure scantly seen
 yet transparent perceived
 bottom rich sands golden
 brims silken grass aloft
 proffered seats sweet easy fresh soft

 lvii
 "see stream laughter see spring"
 quoth "of danger deadly pain
 fond desire must fair governing
 ruled lust bridled wisdom's rein
 ears stopped sirens sing
 notes enticing man pleasure vain"
 thus passed forward stream make
 ample pond large spacious lake

 lviii
 table dainty food
 sea earth liquid air could give
 crystal laughing flood
 saw two naked virgins bathe dive
 sometimes toying sometimes wrestling stood
 sometimes speed skill swimming strive
 underneath dived rose
 ticing baits laid forth lust love

 lix
 naked wantons tender fair white
 moved far warriors' stubborn hearts
 shapes gazed delight
 nymphs applied sweet alluring arts
 one waters quite
 lift head breasts higher parts
 might weak eyes subdue take
 lower beauties veiled gentle lake

 lx
 morning star escaped fled
 greedy waves dewy beams flies
 queen love new born bred
 ocean's fruitful froth first arise
 vented golden locks forth shed
 round pearls crystal moist therein lies
 eyes upon knights cast
 start feigned sight aghast

 lxi
 fair locks knot tied
 high crown 'gan large unfold
 falling long thick spreading wide
 ivory soft white mantled gold
 thus fair skin dame would clothe hide
 hid less fair hold
 thus clad waves locks eyes divine
 ashamed turn twine

 lxii
 withal smiled blushed withal
 blush smilings smiles blushing graced
 face amber tresses fall
 whereunder love ambush placed
 last warbled forth treble small
 sweet looks sweet songs interlaced
 "oh happy men grace" quoth
 "this bliss heaven paradise see

 lxiii
 "this place wherein may assuage
 sorrows past joy bliss
 flourished antique golden age
 needs law none doth aught amiss
 put arms fear mars rage
 sword shield helmet needless
 consecrate endless rest
 shall love's champions soldiers blest

 lxiv
 "the fields combat beds
 heaped lilies shady brakes
 come see queen golden crown
 servants blest happy makes
 admit gently
 numbered joy partakes
 first within lake dust sweat
 wash table sit eat"

 lxv
 thus sung sister lured nigh
 many gesture kind loving show
 music's sound dames court apply
 cunning feet dance swift slow
 still knights unmoved passed
 vain delights wicked charms know
 could heavenly voice angel's look
 surprise hearts eye ear took

 lxvi
 sweetness touched hearts
 proffered kindle cupid's fire
 straight armed reason charge starts
 quencheth lust killeth fond desire
 thus scorned dames wiles arts
 palace gates knights retire
 stream damsels dived sad
 ashamed disgraced repulse



 sixteenth book

 argument
 searchers pass palace bright
 sweet prison lies rinaldo pent
 much full rage spite
 goes sad shamed discontent
 plaints prayers retain knight
 armida strives hears thence went
 forlorn palace great fair
 destroys grief flies thence air



 palace great builded rich round
 centre inmost hold
 lies garden sweet fertile ground
 fairer grew trees gold
 cunning sprites buildings reared around
 doors entries false thousandfold
 labyrinth made fortress brave
 like daedal's prison porsenna's grave

 ii
 knights passed castle's largest gate
 though round hundred ports shine
 doorleaves framed carved silverplate
 upon golden hinges turn twine
 stayed view work wit state
 workmanship excelled substance fine
 shapes rich metal wrought
 save speech living bodies wanted naught

 iii
 alcides sat telling tales spun
 among feeble troops damsels mild
 fiery gates hell
 heaven upheld false love stood smiled
 armed club fair iole forth run
 club blood monsters foul defiled
 back lion's skin
 rough bark tender tree

 iv
 beyond made sea whose azure flood
 hoary froth crushed surges blue
 wherein two navies great well ranged stood
 warlike ships fire arms outflew
 waters burned vessels good
 flames gold therein enchased threw
 caesar romans hence asian kings
 thence antony indian princes brings

 v
 cyclades seemed swim amid main
 hill gainst hill mount gainst mountain smote
 great fury met armies twain
 burnt ship sunk bark boat
 darts wildfire flew drowned slain
 princes dead bodies fleet float
 caesar wins yonder conquered
 eastern ships fled egyptian queen

 vi
 antonius eke flight betook
 empire lost would aspire
 yet fled fight fear forsook
 followed drawn fond desire
 well might see within troubled look
 strive contend love courage shame ire
 oft looked back oft gazed fight
 oftener mistress flight

 vii
 secret creeks fruitful nile
 cast lap would sad death await
 pleasure lovely smile
 sweeten bitter stroke cursed fate
 art curious hand compile
 rich metal princely gate
 knights stories viewed first last
 seen forward pressed passed

 viii
 channel crooked meander glides
 turns twines rolls fro
 whose streams run forth salt sea sides
 back return springward go
 crooked paths ways palace hides
 yet maze map described
 labyrinth got fine
 theseus ariadne's line

 ix
 passed troubled ways
 garden sweet spread forth green show
 moving crystal fountains plays
 fair trees high plants strange herbs flowerets new
 sunshiny hills dales hid phoebus' rays
 groves arbors mossy caves view
 beauty moat wonder brought
 nowhere appeared art wrought

 x
 rude polished mingled
 natural seemed every part
 nature would craft counterfeiting pass
 imitate imitator art
 mild air skies clear glass
 trees whirlwind felt tempest smart
 ere fruit drop blossom comes
 springs falls ripeneth blooms

 xi
 leaves upon selfsame bough hide
 beside young old ripened fig
 fruit green ripe vermeil side
 apples new old grew one twig
 fruitful vine arms spread high wide
 bended underneath clusters big
 grapes tender hard young sour
 purple ripe nectar sweet forth pour

 xii
 joyous birds hid greenwood shade
 sung merry notes every branch bough
 wind leaves waters played
 murmur sweet sung whistled
 ceased birds wind loud answer made
 sung rumbled soft low
 thus hap cunning chance art
 wind strange music bore part

 xiii
 partycolored plumes' purple bill
 wondrous bird among rest flew
 plain speech sung lovelays loud shrill
 leden like human language true
 much talked wit skill
 strange seemed much good knew
 feathered fellows stood hush hear
 dumb wind waters silent

 xiv
 "the gently budding rose" quoth "behold
 first scant peeping forth virgin beams
 half ope half shut beauties doth upfold
 dear leaves less seen fairer seems
 spreads forth broad bold
 languisheth dies last extremes
 seems decked bed bower
 many lady late paramour

 xv
 "so passing day doth pass
 bud blossom life man
 e'er doth flourish like grass
 cut becometh withered pale wan
 oh gather rose time thou hast
 short day done scant began
 gather rose love yet thou mayest
 loving loved embracing embraced"

 xvi
 ceased approving spoke
 choir birds heavenly tunes renew
 turtles sighed sighs kisses broke
 fowls shades unseen pairs withdrew
 seemed laurel chaste stubborn oak
 gentle trees earth grew
 seemed land sea heaven
 breathed fancy sweet sighed love

 xvii
 music rare strong consent
 strange allurements sweet bove mean measure
 severe firm constant still knights forthwent
 hardening hearts gainst false enticing pleasure
 twixt leaf leaf sight sent
 crept ease leisure
 till beheld queen set knight
 besides lake shaded boughs sight

 xviii
 breasts naked day hot
 locks unbound waved wanton wind
 deal sweat tired game wot
 sweatdrops bright white round like pearls ind
 humid eyes fiery smile forthshot
 like sunbeams silver fountains shined
 o'er looks hung soft breast
 pillow love took rest

 xix
 hungry eyes upon face fed
 feeding pined away
 declining often head
 lips cheeks eyes kissed lay
 wherewith sighed soul fled
 frail breast would stay
 beloved sprite armed pair
 follies beheld hot fare

 xx
 lovers' side pendent
 crystal mirror bright pure smooth neat
 rose mistress held glass
 noble page graced service great
 glad looks inflamed alas
 beauty love beheld one seat
 yet sundry objects espies
 glass saw eyes

 xxi
 command serve pleased knight
 proud bondage empire
 "my dear" said "that blessest thy sight
 even blessed angels turn thine eyes
 painted heart portrayed right
 thy worth thy beauties perfections
 form shape fashion best
 glass seen breast

 xxii
 "and thou disdain yet content
 least behold thy lovely hue
 thereon thy looks fixed bent
 thy happy eyes may see view
 rare shape crystal present
 glass contain heaven beauties true
 oh let skies thy worthy mirror
 dear stars try shape image see"

 xxiii
 word smiled ne'ertheless
 lovetoys still used pleasures bold
 hair done twisted tress
 looser locks silken laces rolled
 curles garlandwise updress
 wherein like rich enamel laid gold
 twisted flowers smiled white breast
 lilies spring roses dressed

 xxiv
 jolly peacock spreads half fair
 eyed feathers pompous train
 golden iris bends air
 twentycolored bow clouds rain
 yet ornaments strange rich rare
 girdle price beauty stain
 scorn tuscan guilla lost
 igor venus ceston could match cost

 xxv
 mild denays tender scorns sweet
 repulses war peace hope despair joy fear
 smiles jests mirth woe grief sad regreet
 sighs sorrows tears embracements kisses dear
 mixed first weight measure meet
 easy fire attempered
 wondrous girdle armida frame
 would loved wore

 xxvi
 wooing fit brought end
 congee took kissed went way
 used every day wend
 bout affairs spells charms say
 youth remained yet power bend
 one step thence used stray
 mongst sweet birds every walk grove
 alone save hermit false called love

 xxvii
 silence deep friendly shade
 recalled lovers wonted sport
 fair room pleasure built laid
 longest nights joys made sweet short
 queen household things surveyed
 left lord garden disport
 twain hidden bushes
 prince glistering arms appear

 xxviii
 fierce steed age withdrawn war
 wherein glorious beast always wone
 vile rest fight sequestered far
 feeds mares large service done
 arms see hear trumpet's jar
 neigheth loud thither fast doth run
 wiseth back armed knight
 longing jousts tournament fight

 xxix
 fared rinaldo glorious light
 bright harness glistered eyes
 noble sprite awaked sight
 blood began warm heart rise
 though drunk ease devoid wonted might
 sleep till weakened virtue lies
 ubaldo forward stepped hield
 diamonds clear pure precious shield

 xxx
 upon targe looks amazed bent
 therein wanton habit spied
 civet balm perfumes redolent
 locks smoked mantle wide
 sword many pagan stout shent
 bewrapped flowers hung idly side
 nicely decked seemed knight
 wore fashion's sake fight

 xxxi
 sleep idle dreams abraid
 man awaked calls home wits
 beholding attire played
 yet view could sustain
 looks downward cast naught said
 grieved shamed sad would died fain
 oft wished earth ocean wide
 would swallow errors hide

 xxxii
 ubaldo took time thus begun
 "all europe asia war
 christ adore fame
 battle strong syria fighting
 thee alone bertoldo's noble son
 little corner keeps exiled far
 world buried sloth shame
 carpet champion wanton dame

 xxxiii
 "what letharge hath drowsiness uppenned
 thy courage thus sloth doth thee infect
 camp godfrey thee send
 thee fortune praise victory expect
 come fatal champion bring happy end
 enterprise begun sect
 oft thou shaken hast earth full low
 thy sharp brand strike kill overthrow"

 xxxiv
 said noble infant stood space
 confused speechless senseless illashamed
 shame disdain gave place
 fierce disdain courage sprung untamed
 another redness blushed face
 whence worthy anger shone displeasure flamed
 nice attire scorn rent tore
 bondage vile witness bore

 xxxv
 done hasted charmed fort
 maze passed searchers twain
 armida mount chiefest port
 wondered find furious keeper slain
 awhile feared knew short
 dear lord fled saw plain
 ah woful sight gates man
 haste fear wrath anger ran

 xxxvi
 "whither cruel leavest thou alone"
 would cried grief speeches stayed
 woful words backward gone
 heart bitter echo made
 poor soul greater skill one
 whose knowledge thus joy conveyed
 wist well yet desire prove
 art could keep charms recall love

 xxxvii
 witches thessalia land
 lips unpure yet ever said spake
 words could make heaven's rolling circles stand
 draw damned ghosts limbo lake
 well knew yet time fand
 use knowledge charms make
 left arts forth ran prove
 single beauty best charm love

 xxxviii
 ran honor took regard
 oh vaunts triumphs
 love's empire great late made marred
 subjects humbly bend bow
 pride mixed scorn hard
 loved loved yet whilst woo
 lovers hates pleased
 conquer men conquered kill

 xxxix
 disdained abandoned
 ran fled scorn
 despised beauty labored
 humble plaints prayers adorn
 ran hasted fled
 frost snow brier bush thorn
 sent cries message
 reached till reached shore

 xl
 "oh thou leav'st half behind" quoth
 "of poor heart half thee dost carry
 oh take part render
 else kill ah tarry tarry
 hear last words parting kiss thee
 crave fit thee marry
 keep unkind fear'st thou thou stay
 thou may'st deny well run away"

 xli
 rinaldo stopped stood still stayed
 came sad breathless weary faint weak
 woebegone never nymph maid
 yet beauty's pride grief could break
 looked gazed naught said
 would could durst speak
 looked glanced
 glances shamefaced close secret hid

 xlii
 cunning singers ere strain high
 loud melodious tunes gentle voice
 prepare hearers' ears harmony
 feignings sweet low notes warbles choice
 yet forgot pardie
 wonted shifts sleights cupid's toys
 sequence first sighs sobs forthcast
 breed compassion dear spake last

 xliii
 "suppose cruel come vow
 pray ladies loves lords
 late thou disdain
 scorn grant grace love affords
 least yet enemy listen thou
 sworn foes sometimes talk chaffer words
 ask thee may'st thou grant right well
 lessen naught thy wrath anger fell

 xliv
 "if thou hate hate delight
 come appease thee hate still
 like like bore great hate spite
 gainst christians chiefly wish thee ill
 pagan born might
 godfredo bent mine art skill
 followed thee took thee bore thee far
 strange isle kept thee safe war

 xlv
 "and thy hate may justly move
 thy loss thy shame grief
 thee inchanted allured love
 wicked deceit craft worthy sharp reprief
 mine honor gave thee gifts
 beauties made thee lord chief
 suitors old denayed
 gave thee lover new unprayed

 xlvi
 "but reckon among faults let
 many wrongs provoke thee wrath
 hence thou run naught thou set
 pleasant house many joys hath
 go travel pass seas fight conquest get
 destroy faith shall say faith
 ah longer thy shrine
 alone pray thou cruel saint mine

 xlvii
 "all let go thee unkind
 small request although thy foe
 spoiler seldom leaves prey behind
 triumphs lets captives go
 among thy prisoners poor armida bind
 let camp increase thy praises
 thy beguiler thou couldst beguile
 point thy thrall bondslave vile

 xlviii
 "despised bondslave since lord doth hate
 locks keep hold dear
 come cut servile state
 habit answer may gear
 follow thee spite death fate
 battles fierce dangers appear
 courage strength enough perchance
 lead thy courser spare bear thy lance

 xlix
 "i bear thy shield
 defend thy life lose mine
 breast bosom soft shall thy bield
 gainst storms arrows darts weapons thrown
 thy foes pardie encountering thee field
 spare strike thee mine affection known
 lest wound sharp vengeance take
 thee despised beauty's sake

 l
 "o wretch dare still vaunt help invoke
 poor beauty scorned disdained"
 said tears speeches broke
 eyes like streams springs rained
 would caught hand cloak
 stepped backward restrained
 conquered heart ruth softened
 plaints issue love entrance got

 li
 love entered kindle breast
 reason late quenched wonted flame
 yet entered pity place least
 love's sister chaste sober dame
 stirred hardly suppressed
 springing tears eyes came
 yet even plaints repressed
 could looked feigned cheer

 lii
 "madam" quoth "for distress grieve
 would amend might could
 wise heart fond affection drive
 cannot hate scorn though would
 seek vengeance wrongs forgive
 servant foe hold
 truth erred estate forgot
 great hate love hot

 liii
 "but common faults faults kind
 excused nature sex years
 erred likewise pardon find
 none condemn trespass hears
 dear remembrance keep mind
 joys woes comforts hopes fears
 call soldier knight far
 christian faith permits asia's war

 liv
 "ah let faults follies take end
 let errors past satisfy
 angle world ypend
 let fame shame thereof die
 earth known kenned
 wish fact still concealed lie
 yet following poor knight disgrace
 worth beauty princely race

 lv
 "stay peace go wend may
 guide fellowship denies
 stay hence depart better way
 calm thoughts sage wise"
 thus spoke passions found stay
 turned rolled eyes
 staring face awhile last
 thus foul terms bitter wrath forth brast

 lvi
 "of sophia fair thou never wert child
 azzain race ysprung thou art
 mad seawaves thee hare tigress wild
 caucasus' cold crags nursed thee apart
 ah cruel man l token mild
 appears pity ruth tender heart
 could griefs woes plaints
 one sigh strain thy breast one tear make fall

 lvii
 "what shall say renew speech
 scorns leaves bids call mine
 victor hath foe within reach
 yet pardons merits death pine
 hear counsels preach
 like chaste xenocrates gainst love divine
 heavens gods men shame
 thus spoil temples blaspheme name

 lviii
 "go cruel go go peace rest
 joy comfort thou leavest
 angry soul discharged weak breast
 shall haunt thee ever attend thee near
 furylike snakes firebrands dressed
 shall aye torment thee late held dear
 thou 'scape seas rocks sands
 come fight among pagan bands

 lix
 "there lying wounded mongst hurt slain
 wrongs thou shalt vengeance bear
 oft armida shalt thou call vain
 thy last gasp hope soon hear"
 fainted sorrow grief pain
 latest words scant well expressed
 swoon earth outstretched lies
 stiff frozen limbs closed eyes

 lx
 thou closed thine eyes armida heaven envied
 ease thy grief comfort thy woe
 ah open see tears slide
 kind eyes thou esteem'st thy foe
 thou hadst heard sighs mollified
 thine anger hard sighed mourned
 could sad rueful look
 leave thee last farewell took

 lxi
 leave naked sand
 woful lady half alive half dead
 kindness forbade pity withstand
 hard constraint alas thence lead
 away went west wind blew land
 mongst rich tresses pilot's head
 golden sail waves cleft
 land looked till land unseen left

 lxii
 waked trance foresaken speechless sad
 armida wildly stared gazed
 "and gone" quoth "nor pity
 leave thus twixt life death doubt
 could stay could traitorlad
 last trance help recall
 love still sand
 still unrevenged still mourn still weeping stand

 lxiii
 "fie complaints farewell arms art
 pursue death spiteful knight
 earth's low centre sea's deepest part
 heaven hell shield might
 o'ertake take cleave heart
 vengeance fits wronged lover's spite
 cruelty cruel knight surpass
 avail vain words alas

 lxiv
 "o fool thou shouldest cruel
 cruel well deserved thine ire
 thou prison hadst entrapped man
 dead cold late thou askest fire
 though wit cunning nothing
 means shall work heart's desire
 thee beauty thine wrongs
 vengeance thee thee revenge belongs

 lxv
 "thou shalt reward murdering brand
 dare traitor head deprive
 lovers rock doth stand
 castle love strive
 sole heir damascus land
 revenge kingdom give
 price cannot gain
 nature gives beauty fortune wealth vain

 lxvi
 "but thee vain gift vain beauty thee scorn
 hate kingdom give
 hate rue born
 hope sweet revenge live"
 thus raging fell ire gan return
 bare shore haste homeward drive
 true witness frantic ire
 locks waved loose face shone eyes sparkled fire

 lxvii
 came home called outcries shrill
 thousand devils limbo deep
 black clouds skies horrid darkness fill
 pale dread became eclipsed sun

 might heard palace wide
 spirits howled barked hissed cried

 lxviii
 shadow blacker mirkest night
 environed place darkness sad
 wherein firebrand gave dreadful light
 kindled hell tisiphone mad
 vanished shade sun appeared sight
 pale beams air nothing glad

 great work left one stone

 lxix
 oft clouds frame shapes castles great
 amid air little time last
 dissolved wind titan's heat
 like vain dreams soon made sooner past
 palace vanished seat
 left aught rocks crags kind placed

 sate used away flew

 lxx
 broke clouds cleft yielding sky
 bout gathered tempest storm wind
 lands view south pole flew

 straits hercules passed lie

 north south still forward ride

 lxxi

 guided asphaltes' lake chair
 stood castle ends flight

 till grief shame wrath gave place last

 lxxii
 "i hence" quoth "till egypt's lord
 aid zion's king host shall move
 use helps charms afford
 change shape sex behove
 well handle bow lance sword
 worthies aid love
 seek revenge obtain
 farewell regard honor farewell shame

 lxxiii
 "nor let mine uncle protector

 bent deeds maidens ill became

 lxxiv
 said knights ladies pages squires
 assembleth journey fit
 fair arms vestures attires
