 till came eastern bands
 kings princes lay gaza's sands



 seventeenth book

 argument
 egypt's great host battleray forth brought
 caliph sends godfrey's power fight
 armida rinaldo's ruin sought
 adjoins syria's might
 satisfy cruel thought
 gives kills knight
 takes fatal arms shield
 ancestors great deeds beheld



 gaza city frontier stands
 juda's realm men egypt ride
 built near sea beside dry sands
 huge wildernesses lie deserts wide
 strong winds lift parched lands
 toss like roaring waves roughest tide
 storms poor passengers almost
 refuge find drowned lost

 ii
 within town turks yore
 strong garrison king egypt placed
 nearer fitted
 high emprise thoughts cast
 left great memphis gaza bore
 regal throne countries vast
 huge empire puissant host
 assembled mustered coast

 iii
 come say muse manner times
 times stood state things
 power monarch arms bear
 nations subject friends brings
 lands southern ocean near
 morning star came princes dukes kings
 thou half world wellnigh
 armies lords captains canst descry

 iv
 egypt greekish emperor
 rebelled first christ's true faith denied
 mahomet's descent warrior
 set throne ruled kingdom wide
 caliph hight caliphs since hour
 successors named beside
 nilus old kings long time seen
 ptolemies pharaohs called

 v
 established kingdom short
 grew great asia's lands
 lybia's realms stretched many mile
 syria's coasts far cirene sands
 southward passed gainst course nile
 hot clime burnt syene stands
 hence bounded sandy deserts waste
 thence euphrates' rich flood embraced

 vi
 maremma myrrh spices doth bring
 rich red sea comprehends
 lands toward morning spring
 lie beyond gulf far extends
 great empire greater king
 rules whose worth land amends
 makes famous lord thereof blood
 wisdom valor virtues good

 vii
 turks persians war oft wage
 oft sometimes lost field
 could adverse fortune aught assuage
 valor's heat make proud heart yield
 grew unfit war age
 sheathed sword laid aside shield
 yet warlike mind laid
 great thirst rule praise renown

 viii
 knights still cruel wars maintained
 wise words quick wit appears
 kingdom large o'er reigned
 charge seemed weighty years
 greatness afric's lesser kings constrained
 tremble name ind fears
 realms would friendship hold
 armed soldiers sent gifts gold

 ix
 mighty prince assembled flower
 realms frenchmen stout
 break rising empire power
 sure conquest fear doubt
 armida came even hour
 plains old gaza's walls without
 lords leaders armies bring
 battleray mustered king

 x
 throne set height
 clomb hundred ivory stairs first told
 pentise wrought silver bright
 trod carpets made silk gold
 robes best beseemen might
 king great grave rich old
 twined sixty ells lawn
 turban strange adorned tresses hoar

 xi
 right hand precious sceptre wield
 beard gray looks severe grave
 eyes yet made dim eild
 sparkled former worth vigor brave
 gestures majesty upheild
 state old age empire crave
 phidias carved apelles pardie
 erst painted jove jove thundering sky

 xii
 either side stood noble lord
 whereof first held upright hand
 severe justice unpartial sword
 bare seal causes scanned
 keeping folk peace good accord
 termed lord chancellor land
 marshal first used lead
 armies forth war oft good speed

 xiii
 bold circassians halberts long

 richly armed gilden corslets strong
 sides crooked swords hing
 thus set thus seated grave lords among
 hosts armies great beheld king
 every band throne went
 ensigns low inclined arms bent

 xiv
 squadrons first men egypt show
 four troops several guide
 high country two two low
 nile salt seaside

 hardened firm land plough bide
 egypt still increased within far placed
 part ships erst anchor cast

 xv

 alexandria's rich fertile plain
 along western shore whence nile expelled
 greedy billows swelling main

 wit craft strength warlike pain
 place ambush close devise
 treason false none sly wise

 xvi
 people next gainst morning rays
 along coasts asia seat

 ennobled high birth titles great

 xvii

 thousand streets contain

 next gazel marched plough
 fertile lands town lie

 xx

 stony sent happy araby
 never felt cold frost snow

 midst perfumes rich flowerets brave
 birth burial cradle hath grave

 xxi
 clothes rich garments gay
 weapons like egyptian troops

 house home mansion good bad

 place place wandering cities gad

 christ's sacred faith wars outstepped

 passage sandy dry plain

 thee great altamore chaste bed

 tore locks smote breast shed

 "than mild looks thy kind spouse's face

 mighty king samarcand
 captain wise well skilled feats war

 cunning leader soldier bold

 mongst go set king judah free

 l

 lii

 gainst thy foe courage hot fire

 alone famous

 lix

 lxiv

 looked portraits bent sight

 lxvi
 cunning workman little space
 infinite shapes men well expressed
 described worthy race
 pedigree house est

 flowed pure streams crystals east west

 wars hermit battles told

 lxvii
 showed caius first first prey

 savage goths land

 italy burn flame

 lxxx

 lxxxii

 lxxxiii

 "young knight" quoth "take good luck sword

 loved deed belongs"

 lxxxiv
 answered "god mercy's sake
 grant hand holds weapon good

 may cleave pagan's heart shed blood"
 short reply charles make

 lxxxv

 said coach ascend

 lxxxvi
 silent night's dark shade fly

 "of thy great house thy race thine offspring high

 lxxxvii
 "would god drawn forgetful lap
 antique time thine elders shown
 could catalogue unwrap

 ere light view fate hap
 might foretell chance thrown
 like thine elders thou mightst behold
 thy children many famous stout bold

 lxxxviii
 "but art skill things future
 plain truth revealed told
 although knowledge doubtful dark obscure
 coming haps clouds uprolled
 cause know sure
 dare foretell father old
 hermit peter learned much
 withouten veil heaven's secrets great doth see

 lxxxix
 "but revealed grace divine
 declared thee say
 never race greek barbarous latine
 great times past famous day
 richer hardy knights thine

 xc
 "but mongst rest chose alphonsus bold
 virtue first second place name
 shall born frail world grows old
 corrupted poor bare men fame

 thine offspring's glory thy house's light

 xci
 "his younger age foretokens true shall yield
 future valor puissance force might
 rock savage beast shall shield
 tilt tourney match shall knight

 great armies win spoils single fight
 locks rewards knightly praise

 xcii
 "his graver age well eild fits
 shall happy peace preserve quiet blest
 neighbors strong mongst sits
 shall keep cities safe wealth rest
 shall nourish arts cherish pregnant wits
 make triumphs great feast subjects best
 reward good evil pains torment
 shall dangers foresee seen prevent

 xciii
 "but hap wicked bands
 sea earth invest blood war
 wretched times noble lands
 give laws peace false unjust
 sent drive guilty hands
 christ's pure altars high temples far
 oh revenge vengeance shall bring
 false sect accursed king

 xciv
 "too late moors late turkish king
 gainst arm troops legions bold

 beyond frozen tops taurus cold

 cross eagle white lily gold

 xcv
 thus said hermit prophecy
 prince accepted content pleasure

 xcvi

 "see bright phoebus clears darksome skies

 tents towns hills dales descries

 danger safe travel lies
 hence without fear harm doubt foe

 xcvii
 thus took leave made quick return
 forward went champions three foot
 marching right rising morn
 ready passage camp found
 meanwhile speedy fame tidings borne
 tents approached barons stout
 starting throne kingly seat
 entertain rose godfredo great



 eighteenth book

 argument
 charms spirits false therein lie
 rinaldo chaseth forest old
 host egypt comes vafrin spy
 entereth camp stout crafty wise bold
 sharp fight bulwarks high
 ports zion assault hold
 godfrey hath aid heaven force town
 pagans slain walls beaten



 arrived godfrey embrace stood
 "my sovereign lord" rinaldo meekly said
 "to venge wrongs gernando proud
 honor's care provoked wrath unstayed
 displeased chieftain good
 thoughts yet grieve heart still dismayed
 come prest exploits try
 make gracious gracious eye"

 ii
 kneeled folding friendly arms
 neck duke answer gave
 "let pass speeches sad passed harms
 remembrance life grief grave
 forgetfulness amends arms
 wonted valor use courage brave
 alone happy end must bring
 strong enchantments charmed spring

 iii
 "that aged wood whence heretofore got
 build scaling engines timber fit
 fearful seat none wot
 ugly fiends damned spirits sit
 cut one twist thereof adventureth
 boldest knight without
 wall battered others doubt
 venture thou show thy courage stout"

 iv
 thus said knight speeches
 proffered service attempt thing
 hard assays courage willing flew
 praise spur words sting
 dear friends embraced crew
 welcome came ring
 guelpho tancred rest
 stood camp greatest chief best

 v
 prince lords iterate
 welcomes oft oft dear embrace
 toward rest lesser worth state
 turned received gentle grace
 merry soldiers bout shout prate
 cries joyful cheerful face
 triumph's chariot bright sun
 returned afric asia

 vi
 thus marched tent champion good
 sat friends around
 war asked wood
 answered demand list propound
 left ease stood
 hermit fit time speak found
 "my lord" said "your travels wondrous
 far strayed erred wandered far

 vii
 "much bound god brought
 safe false armida's charmed hold
 thee straying sheep bought
 hath reduced fold
 gainst heathen foes men naught
 hath chosen thee place next godfrey bold
 yet mayest thou polluted thus sin
 high service war fight begin

 viii
 "the world flesh infection vile
 pollute thoughts impure thy spirit stain
 po ganges sevenmouthed nile
 wide seas wash thee clean
 purge faults thee defile
 blood hath power thy sins slain
 help therefore invoke bewray
 thy secret faults mourn weep complain pray"

 ix
 said knight first witch unchaste
 idle loves follies vain lamented
 kneeling low heavy looks downcast
 sins confessed repented
 meekly pardon craved first last
 hermit zeal well contented
 said "on yonder hill next morn go pray
 turns forehead gainst morning ray

 x
 "that done march wood whence one brings
 news furies goblins fiends sprites
 giants monsters dreadful things
 thou shalt subdue dark grove unites
 let strange voice mourns sweetly sings
 beauty whose glad smile frail hearts delights
 within thy breast make ruth pity rise
 false looks prayers false despise"

 xi
 thus advised hardy knight
 prepared gladly enterprise
 thoughtful passed day sad night
 ere silver morn began rise
 arms took coat dight
 color strange cut warlike guise
 way sole silent forth went
 alone left friends left tent

 xii
 time gainst breaking day
 rebellious night yet strove still repined
 east appeared morning gray
 yet lamps jove's high palace shined
 mount olivet took way
 saw round eyes twined
 night's shadows hence thence morning's shine
 bright dark earthly divine

 xiii
 thus thought many bright
 splendent lamps shine heaven's temple high
 day hath golden sun moon night
 fixed wandering stars azure sky
 framed creator's might
 still live shine ne'er shall die
 till moment last day's brand
 burn burn sea air land

 xiv
 thus mused top went
 kneeled reverence fear
 eyes upon heaven's eastern face bent
 thoughts heavens uplifted
 "the sins errors repent
 mine unbridled youth father dear
 remember let thy mercy fall
 purge faults mine offences all"

 xv
 thus prayed purple wings upflew
 golden weed morning's lusty queen
 begilding radiant beams threw
 helm harness mountain green
 upon breast forehead gently blew
 air balm nardus breathed unseen
 o'er head let clearest skies
 cloud pure precious clew flies

 xvi
 heavenly dew garments spread
 compared clothes pale ashes seem
 sprinkled paleness fled
 thence purest white bright rays outstream
 cheered flowers late withered
 sweet comfort morning beam
 returned youth serpent old
 adorns new native gold

 xvii
 lovely whiteness changed weed
 prince perceived well long admired
 toward forest marched speed
 resolved adventures great required
 thither came whence shrinking back dread
 strange desert's sight first retired
 fearful loathsome made
 forest sweet pleasant shade

 xviii
 forward passed mid grove
 heard sound strange sweet pleasing
 rolled crystal brook gentle roar
 sighed winds leaves pass
 nightingale wrongs deplore

 lute harp cittern human voice heard
 sounds one sound right well declared

 xix
 dreadful thunderclap last heard
 aged trees plants wellnigh rent
 yet heard nymphs sirens afterward

 whereat amazed stayed well prepared

 way passage aught withstood
 except quiet still transparent flood

 xx
 green banks fair stream inbound

 large desert bosom held

 exchanged moisture shade

 like sudden brooks increased molten snow

 nineteenth book

 iii

 xix

 xx

 pagan ran whole streams blood

 xxi

 terrible erst" herewith grew

 said "dar'st thou vantage speak think

 xxii
 "use use thy vantage thee fortune
 scorn punish thy foolish pride"
 hot brand flames ere forth go'th
 dying blazeth bright every side

 would latest hour drew nigh
 illustrate end nobly die

 xxiii
 joined left hand sister strong
 let fall weighty blade
 tancred ward blow sword slung
 smote aside stayed
 shoulder side along
 glanced many wounds made
 yet tancred feared naught heart
 found coward dread place fear part

 xxiv
 fearful blow doubled spent
 force waste strength vain
 tancred blow bent
 leaped aside stroke fell plain
 thine weight o'erthrown earth thou went
 argantes stout could'st thyself sustain
 thyself thou threwest happy man
 upon whose fall none boast triumph

 xxv
 gaping wounds fall set open wide
 streams blood made lake
 helped left hand one knee tried
 rear new defence make
 courteous prince stepped back "yield thee" cried
 hurt proffered blow strake
 meanwhile stealth pagan false gave
 sudden wound threatening speeches brave

 xxvi
 herewith tancredi furious grew said
 "villain dost thou mercy despise"
 therewith thrust thrust blade
 ventil pierced dazzled eyes
 argantes died yet complaint made
 furious lived careless dies
 bold proud disdainful fierce void fear
 motions last last looks last speeches

 xxvii
 tancred put sword praises glad
 gave god saved fight
 yet bloody conquest feebled
 much conqueror's force strength might
 way feared homeward led
 strength enough walk upright
 yet could steps thence bent
 foot foot heavy pace forthwent

 xxviii
 legs could bear little stound
 hastes tired less speed
 right hand last laid ground
 leaned hand weak like shaking reed
 dazzled eyes world wheels ran round
 day wrapped brightness sable weed
 length swooned victor knight
 naught differed conquered foe fight

 xxix
 lords private fight pursue
 made fierce cruel secret hate
 victor's ire destroyed faithless crew
 street street chased gate gate
 sacked town image true
 describe paint woful state
 fit words spectacle express
 tell city's great distress

 xxx
 blood murder death street house church defiled
 heaps slain appear mountains high
 underneath unburied hills uppiled
 bodies dead living buried lie
 sad mother tender child
 doth tear tresses loose complain fly
 spoiler amber hair
 draws lust virgin chaste fair

 xxxi
 way westhill yood
 whereon old stately temple stands
 soiled gore wet lukewarm blood
 rinaldo ran chased pagan bands
 heads heaved curtlax good
 life grace death lay hands
 helm target strong blows bears
 best armed seemed arms wears

 xxxii
 gainst armed foes bends
 force scorns naked folk wound
 courage arms arms defends
 chased looks dreadful sound
 oh tell far force extends
 scorns threats lays ground
 unequal harm equal fear
 fled well armed naked

 xxxiii
 fast fled people weak
 squadron strong temple gone
 burned builded oft still keeps name
 first founder wise king solomon
 prince stately house whilom frame
 cedar trees gold marble stone
 rich yet strong sure
 turrets high thick walls doors brass

 xxxiv
 knight arrived warklike sort
 men ample church fortified
 closed found wicket gate port
 top defences ready spied
 left frowning looks twice fort
 high top groundwork eyed
 entrance sought twice swift foot
 mighty place measured

 xxxv
 like wolf closed fold
 rangeth night hoped prey get
 enraged hunger malice old
 kind 'twixt harmless sheep hath set
 searched high low hold
 might enter without stop let
 great court stayed foes
 attend assault would fortune prove

 xxxvi
 lay chance posted tree thereby
 kept needful use whate'er
 armed galleys thick high
 tall lofty masts genes uprear
 beam knight gates made fly
 strong hands weights lift bear
 like light lance tree shook tossed
 bruised gate threshold post

 xxxvii
 marble stone metal strong outbore
 wondrous might redoubled blow
 brazen hinges wall tore
 broke locks laid doors low
 iron ram engine could
 cannons great thunderbolts forth throw
 people like flowing stream inthrong
 entered victor strong

 xxxviii
 woful slaughter black loathsome made
 house sometime sacred house god
 heavenly justice thou delayed
 wretched sinners sharper falls thy rod
 place profaned invade
 thou kindled ire mercy forbode
 hearts' blood pagans vile
 temple washed late defile

 xxxix
 solyman fast sped
 fort david's tower named
 soldiers left led
 gainst entrance new defences framed
 tyrant aladine eke thither fled
 soldan thus far exclaimed
 thyself within fortress safe uplock

 xl
 "for well fortress shall thee thy crown
 defend awhile may safe remain"
 "alas" quoth "alas fair town
 cruel war beats even plain
 life done mine empire trodden
 reigned lived live reign
 alas behold fatal hour
 ends life ends kingly power"

 xli
 "where virtue wisdom grave
 courage stout" angry soldan said
 "let chance kingdoms take erst gave
 yet hearts kingly worth laid
 come fort person save
 refresh weary limbs strength decayed"
 thus counselled safety bring
 within fort weak aged king

 xlii
 iron mace hands hent
 thigh trusty sword tied
 entrance fierce fearless went
 kept strait french defied
 blows mortal gave lent
 hit slew else side
 laid low earth fled place
 beheld great dreadful mace

 xliii
 old raymondo hardy crew
 chance came thither great mishap
 defended path old man flew
 scorned blows kept gap
 struck foe blow blood forth drew
 front caught rap
 swoon low dust laid
 wide open trembling arms displayed

 xliv
 pagans gathered heart last though fear
 courage weak put flight late
 conquerors repulsed
 beaten back else slain gate
 soldan mongst dead beside near
 saw lord raymond lie estate
 cried men "within bars" quoth
 "come draw knight let captive be"

 xlv
 forward rushed execute word
 hard dangerous emprise found
 none raymond's men forsook lord
 guide's defence flocked round
 thence fury fights hence pity draws sword
 strive vile cause light ground
 life freedom champion brave
 spoil would preserve kill save

 xlvi
 yet last longer fought
 hardy soldan would field
 gainst thundering mace availed naught
 helm temper fine sevenfold shield
 side great succor brought
 weak foes fit faint yield
 aid help
 sovereign duke young rinaldo came

 xlvii
 shepherd raging round
 sees storm wind hail thunder rain
 gloomy clouds day's bright eye put
 tender flocks drives open plain
 thick grove mountain's shady foot
 heaven's fierce wrath may unhurt sustain
 hook whistle cries
 drives forth fleecy charge flies

 xlviii
 fled soldan gan descry
 tempest come angry war forthcast
 armor clashed lightened gainst sky
 side swords weapons fire outbrast
 sent folk fortress high
 shun furious storm stayed last
 yet danger gave place length
 wit courage wisdom ruled strength

 xlix
 scant knight safe gate within
 scant closed doors broke
 bars rinaldo doth assault begin
 port wicket stroke
 matchless might great desire win
 oath promise doth wrath provoke
 sworn word vain
 kill man prince sweno slain

 l
 armed hand castle great
 would assaulted shortly
 safe pardie soldan seat
 found fatal foes' sharp wrath shun
 godfredo sounded retreat
 dark shades shroud earth begun
 within town duke would lodge night
 morn renew assault fight

 li
 cheerful look thus folk said
 "high god hath holpen well children dear
 work done rest night delayed
 doth little labor bring less doubt fear
 tower foe's weak hope latest aid
 conquer sun shall next appear
 meanwhile love tender ruth go see
 comfort hurt wounded

 lii
 "go cure wounds boldly ventured
 lives spilt bloods get hold
 fitteth host christ forth led
 thirst vengeance desire gold
 much ah much blood day shed
 much haste spoil behold
 command spoil kill
 let trumpet publish forth will"

 liii
 said went raymond panting lay
 waked swoon wherein late
 solyman countenance less gay
 bespake troops kept grief unseen
 "my friends unconquered day
 spite fortune still hope green
 underneath great shows harm fear
 dangers small losses little

 liv
 "burnt houses people slain
 yet safe town though walls gone
 sovereign
 consists city lime stone
 king safe safe train
 strong fort defended fone
 empty conquest let boast
 till town lives lost

 lv
 "and heads loss last light
 good fortune proud insolent
 spoil murder spend day night
 riot drinking lust ravishment
 may amid preys little fight
 ease overthrown killed slain spent
 carelessness egyptian host
 upon fall draws near coast

 lvi
 "meanwhile highest buildings town
 may shake stones ears
 darts spears engines thrown
 command hill christ's sepulchre bears"
 thus comforts hopes hearts cast
 awakes valors exiles fears
 things hapt thus vafrino goes
 unknown amid ten thousand armed foes

 lvii
 sun nigh set brought end day
 vafrine went pagan host spy
 passed unknown close secret way
 traveller false cunning crafty sly
 past ascalon saw morning gray
 step o'er threshold eastern sky
 ere bright titan half course run
 camp mighty host show begun

 lviii
 tents infinite standards broad spies
 red white blue purple
 hears strange tongues stranger harmonies
 trumpets clarions wellsounding brass
 elephant brays camel cries
 horses neigh fro pass
 seen heard said within thought
 hither asia afric brought

 lix
 viewed camp awhile site seat
 ditch trench rampire strong
 close secret ways work feat
 longer sought hid throng
 entered gates broad royal great
 oft asked answered oft among
 questions wise answers short sly
 bold look eyes quick front lifted high

 lx
 every side pried
 marked way passage tent
 knights notes steeds arms bear
 names armor government
 greater secrets hopes learn hear
 hidden purpose close intent
 long walked wandered till spied
 way approach great pavilions' side

 lxi
 looked saw canvas rent
 voice found eath open way
 close lodgings regal tent
 inmost closet captain lay
 emireno spake forth went
 sound listen say
 vafrine watched saw thought
 mend breach stood wrought

 lxii
 captain great within bareheaded stood
 body armed clad purple weed
 two pages bore shield helmet good
 leaning bending lance gave heed
 big man whose looks fierce proud
 parleyed haughty deed
 godfredo's name vafrine watched heard
 made give heed take regard

 lxiii
 thus spake chieftain surly sir
 "art thou sure godfrey shall slain"
 "i am" quoth "and swear ne'er retire
 except first killed court
 prevent conspire
 guerdon ask pain
 may hang harness brave
 gair words engrave

 lxiv
 "'these arms ormondo took noble fight
 godfrey proud spoiled asia's lands
 took life high
 memory thereof trophy stands'"
 duke replied "ne'er shall deed bold knight
 pass unrewarded sovereign's hands
 thou demandest shall gladly grant
 gold guerdon shalt thou wish want

 lxv
 "those counterfeited armors prepare
 day fight approacheth fast"
 "they ready are" quoth forbare
 talk speeches last
 vafrine great things heard grief care
 remained astound thoughts oft cast
 treason false feigned
 arms yet doubt could clear

 lxvi
 thence parted broad waking lay
 long night slumbered slept
 camp peep springing day
 banner spread knights horseback leapt
 marched forth meet array
 pitched lodged kept
 tent tent stalked
 hear see learn secret

 lxvii
 searching rich throne fand
 armida set dames knights around
 sullen sat sighed seemed scanned
 weighty matters thoughts profounds
 rosy cheek leaned lily hand
 eyes love's twinkling stars bent ground
 weep knows yet appears
 humid eyes even great child tears

 lxviii
 saw set adrastus grim
 seemed scant live move respire
 fixed mistress trim
 gazed fed fond desire
 tisiphern beheld
 quaked sometime love sometime ire
 cheeks color went came
 wrath's fire burnt shone love's flame

 lxix
 garland fair virgins bright
 mongst lay enclosed rose altamore
 hot desire hid kept sight
 looks ruled cupid's crafty lore
 left eye viewed hand face right
 watched beauties hid secret store
 entrance found thin veil bewrayed
 milkenway breasts laid

 lxx
 eyes armida lift earth last
 cleared front visage sad
 midst clouds woe looks overcast
 lightened forth smile sweet pleasant glad
 "my lord" quoth "your oath promise passed
 hath freed heart griefs
 hope sweet revenge lives
 joy ease desired vengeance gives"

 lxxi
 "cheer thy looks" answered indian king
 "and sweet beauty's sake appease thy woe
 cast feet ere expect thing
 present head thy strong foe
 else shall hand person captive bring
 cast prison deep" boasted
 rival heard well yet answered naught
 bit lips grieved secret thought

 lxxii
 tisipherne damsel turning right
 "and say noble lord" quoth
 taunting said "i slow fight
 follow far behind worth see
 terrible puissant knight"
 scornful words bitter scoff gave
 "good reason" quoth king "thou come behind
 e'er compare thee prince ind"

 lxxiii
 lord tisiphernes shook head said
 "oh power free like courage
 liberty use blade
 slow weakest soon seen
 thou thy great vaunts make afraid
 cruel love fear fair queen"
 said challenge king forth leapt
 mistress start twixt stepped

 lxxiv
 "will thus rob gift" quoth
 "which hath vowed give word oath
 champions let title
 bond love peace
 displeased displeased
 grieved wroth"
 thus warned hearts ire nigh broke
 forced peace rest thus bore love's yoke

 lxxv
 heard vafrine stood beside
 learned truth left tent
 treason christian's guide
 contrived wist yet wist went
 words questions far tried
 find truth difficult bent
 know resolved die
 secret close intent spy

 lxxvi
 sly intelligence proved ways
 crafts wiles thoughts abide
 yet vain man wit assays
 know false compact practice hid
 chance wisdom could tell bewrays
 fortune doubt knots undid
 prepared godfrey's last mishap
 ease found net spied trap

 lxxvii
 thither turned seated
 angry lover 'twixt friends lords
 troop much talk thought would pass
 great assembly store news affords
 sided lusty lovely lass
 courtly terms wench boards
 feigns acquaintance bold appears
 known virgin twenty years

 lxxviii
 said "would sweet lady grace
 chose champion friend knight
 proud godfrey's rinaldo's head trow
 feel sharpness curtlax bright
 ask head fair mistress foe
 beauty wooed might"
 began meant speeches wise
 wade thus broke ice

 lxxix
 therewith smiled smiling gan frame
 looks old native grace
 towards another virgin came
 heard beheld bashful face
 said "for thy mistress choose dame
 thy love service place
 take thee champion apart
 would reason thee knight thou art"

 lxxx
 withdrawn thus began "vafrine pardie
 know thee well thou knowest old"
 last trump drove subtle spy
 smiling towards turned bold
 "ne'er wot saw thee erst eye
 yet thy worth eyes thee behold
 thus much know right well
 erst gave different name

 lxxxi
 "my mother bore near bisertus wall
 name lesbine mine almansore"
 "i knew long since" quoth "what men thee call
 thine estate dissemble
 thy friend hide thyself
 betray thee let die therefore
 erminia daughter prince
 tancred's slave thy fellowservant since

 lxxxii
 "two happy months within prison kind
 thy guard rejoiced dwell
 thee keeper meek good find
 behold well"
 squire lovely beauty called mind
 marked visage fair "from thee expel
 fear" says "for live safe sure
 thy safety thy harm procure

 lxxxiii
 "but yet pray thee thou dost return
 dear prison lead home
 hateful freedom even morn
 sigh sorrow mourn weep pain
 spy perchance thou sojourn
 great hap thou hast know secrets plain
 treasons false false trains say
 beside tell none betray"

 lxxxiv
 gazed silent stood
 armida's sleights knew trains unjust
 women tongues craft hearts guile
 fools trust
 speech death hell smile
 last said "if hence depart lust
 guide conclude
 speech till fitter time forbear"

 lxxxv
 forthwith ere thence camp remove ride
 resolved flight season fits
 vafrine departs dames beside
 returns thorns awhile sits
 new knight talks till time tide
 scape unmarked find forth gets
 thither vafrine unseen abode
 took horse camp rode

 lxxxvi
 deserts waste wild arrived
 far camp far resort sight
 vafrine began "gainst godfrey's life contrived
 false compacts trains unfold aright"
 treasons spring derived
 repeats brings hid deceits light
 "eight knights" says "all courtiers brave
 ormond strong rest surpasseth far

 lxxxvii
 "these whether hate hope gain move
 conspired framed treason
 day emiren fight shall prove
 win lost asia christian foe
 cross scored arms
 armed like frenchmen disguised go
 like godfrey's guard gold white wear
 shall habit gear

 lxxxviii
 "yet bear token crest
 friends pagans may know
 close fight soldiers best
 shall mingled give fatal blow
 keep near pierce godfredo's breast
 faithful guard bear false show
 swords dipped poison strong
 wound shall bring sad death ere long

 lxxxix
 "and chieftain wist knew guise
 garments ensigns arms carry
 feigned arms forced devise
 small naught vary
 unjust commands thoughts despise
 within camp therefore list tarry
 heart abhors hand defile
 spot treason act guile

 xc
 "this cause cause alone"
 ceased blushed main
 cast eyes last words scant outgone
 would stopped durst pronounce plain
 squire concealed would know one
 breast secret thoughts could strain
 "of little faith" quoth "why would'st thou hide
 causes true thy squire guide"

 xci
 fetched sigh sad sore deep
 lips words slow trembling came
 "fruitless" said "untimely hard keep
 vain modesty farewell farewell shame
 hope restless love bring sleep
 strive fires quench sweet cupid's flame
 cares respects beseem
 great ladies wandering maids naught esteem

 xcii
 "that night fatal antioch town
 made prey commanding foe
 loss greater seen known
 ended thence began woe
 light loss friends realm crown
 state lost also
 ne'er found lost
 wit sense heart soul almost

 xciii
 "through fire sword blood death vafrine
 friends burn kill chase
 thou know'st ran thy dear lord mine
 first entered father's place
 kneeling salt ears swollen eyne
 'great prince' quoth 'grant mercy pity grace
 save kingdom life said
 save mine honor let die maid'

 xciv
 "he lift trembling hand ground
 stayed till humble speech done
 said 'a friend keeper hast thou found
 fair virgin vain run'
 sweetness strange sweet voice's sound
 pierced heart breast's weak fortress
 creeping bosom soft became
 wound sickness quenchless flame

 xcv
 "he visits speeches kind grave
 sought ease grief sorrows' smart
 said 'i give thee liberty receive
 thine thy depart'
 alas robbed thought gave
 free erminia captived heart
 mine body soul mind
 gave cage kept bird behind

 xcvi
 "but hide desire love suppress
 oft worth thee talk strove
 thou trembling fit well could'st guess
 fever held saidst 'thou art love'
 denied maids less
 yet sighs thy sayings true prove
 instead speech looks tears mine eyes
 told flame fire thy mistress fries

 xcvii
 "unhappy silence well might told
 woes harms sought relief
 since pains plaints utter bold
 none hears help ease grief
 parted close upfold
 wounds within bosom death chief
 hopes helps till love's sweet flame
 plucked bridle respect shame

 xcviii
 "and caused ride seek lord knight
 made sick could make sound
 ambush mischanced light
 cruel men armour clothed round
 hardly scaped hand mature flight
 fled wilderness desert ground
 lived groves forests wild
 gentle grooms shepherds' daughters mild

 xcix
 "but hot love fear late suppressed
 revived nould longer sit
 rode way came e'er took rest
 till like danger like mishap hit
 troop forage spoil addressed
 encountered could fly
 thus ta'en caught
 egyptians gaza brought

 c
 "and present captain gave
 entreated besought well
 mine honor great care save
 since fair armida let dwell
 thus taken oft escaped oft
 ah see haps passed dangers fell
 often captive free oft
 still first bands keep still first chain

 ci
 "and chain surely bind
 heart none loose
 let say 'go wandering damsel find
 home thou shalt bide me'
 let welcome speeches kind
 wonted prison set free"
 thus spake princess thus guide
 talked day night journey ride

 cii
 highways vafrino would pass
 path secret safe short knew
 close city's wall
 sun set night east upflew
 drops blood besmeared found grass
 saw lay warrior murdered new
 bebled ground face skies
 turns seems threat though dead lies

 ciii
 harness habit betrayed
 pagan forward went squire
 saw whereas another champion laid
 dead land soiled blood mire
 "this christian knight" vafrino said
 marking well arms rich attire
 loosed helm saw visage plain
 cried "alas lies tancredi slain"

 civ
 woful virgin tarried gave heed
 fierce looks proud saracine
 till high cry full sad fear dread
 pierced heart sorrow grief pine
 tancred's name thither ran speed
 like one half mad drunk much wine
 saw face pale bloodless dead
 lighted nay stumbled steed

 cv
 springs tears looseth forth cries
 "hither bring'st thou ah fortune blind
 dead lived comfort lies
 war peace travail rest find
 tancred thee see thee yet thine eyes
 looked upon thy love handmaid kind
 undo doors lids fast closed sever
 alas find thee lose thee ever

 cvi
 "i never thought mine eyes dear
 thou couldst grievous unpleasant
 would blind rather dead
 thy sad plight might unknown unseen
 alas thy mirth smiling cheer
 thine eyes' clear beams sparkles sheen
 thy fair cheek purple red
 forehead's whiteness gone dead

 cvii
 "though gone though dead love thee still behold
 death wounds kills love yet thou live
 sweet soul still breast follies bold
 ah pardon love's desires stealths forgive
 grant pale mouth kisses cold
 since death doth love reward deprive
 thy spoils sad death afford
 let mouth pale cold bloodless kiss

 cviii
 "o gentle mouth speeches kind sweet
 thou didst relieve grief woe pain
 ere weak soul frail body fleet
 ah comfort one dear kiss twain
 perchance alive happed meet
 given stolen vain
 feeble life betwixt lips fly
 oh let kiss thee first let die

 cix
 "receive yielding spirit thine
 guide heaven true love hath place"
 said sighed tore tresses fine
 eyes two streams poured face
 man revived showers divine
 awaked opened lips space
 lips open fast shut eyes
 sighs one sigh upflies

 cx
 dame perceived tancred breathed sighed
 calmed grief somedeal eased fears
 "unclose thine eyes" says "my lord knight
 see last services plaints tears
 see dies see thy woful plight
 thy pain part portion bears
 look small gift crave
 last thou canst give have"

 cxi
 tancred looked closed eyes
 heavy dim renewed woe
 quoth vafrine "cure first complain
 medicine life's chief friend plaint foe"
 plucked armor vein
 joint sinew felt handled
 searched well thrust cut wound
 hope life love skill soon found

 cxii
 weariness loss blood spied
 greatest pains anguish proceed
 naught veil amid deserts wide
 bind wounds great need
 love could bands though strange provide
 pity wept joy see deed
 amber locks cut wound
 tied happy man cured bound

 cxiii
 veil short thin deep
 cruel hurts fasten roll blind
 salve simple yet keep
 knight live strong charms wondrous kind
 said drove deadly sleep
 eyes lifted turned twined
 saw squire saw courteous dame
 habit strange wondered whence came

 cxiv
 said "o vafrine tell whence com'st thou
 gentle surgeon disclose"
 smiled sighed looked wist
 wept rejoiced blushed red rose
 "you shall know all" says "your surgeon
 commands silence rest soft repose
 shall sound prepare guerdon meet"
 head laid bosom sweet

 cxv
 vafrine devised might bear
 master home ere night obscured land
 lo troop soldiers appear
 descried tancredi's band
 argant met
 went combat hand hand
 bade stay behind obeyed
 came seek long stayed

 cxvi
 besides many followed enquest
 alone found rightest way
 upon friendly arms men addressed
 seat whereon sat leaned lay
 quoth tancred "shall strong circassian rest
 broad field wolves crows prey
 ah defraud champion brave
 praise due tomb grave

 cxvii
 "with dead bones longer war
 boldly died nobly slain
 let us honor deny
 death alonely doth remain"
 pagan dead lifted high
 tancred bore plain
 close virgin chaste vafrine ride
 squire guard guide

 cxviii
 "not home" quoth tancred "to wonted tent
 bear royal town pray
 cut short human accident
 die may see latest day
 place christ upon cross rent
 heaven perchance may easier make way
 ere yield death's fortune's rage
 performed shall vow pilgrimage"

 cxix
 thus city tancredi borne
 fell sleep laid bed
 vafrino damsel might sojourn
 chamber got close secret near
 done came mighty duke beforn
 entrance found till news known
 naught concluded mongst knights lords
 counsel hung report words

 cxx
 weak weary wounded raymond laid
 godfrey set upon couch's side
 round man ring made
 lords knights filled chamber wide
 squire late discovery said
 break talk none answered none replied
 "my lord" said "at command went
 viewed camp cabin booth tent

 cxxi
 "but mighty host number true
 expect descry
 covered armies might view
 fields plains dales mountains high
 saw way soe'er went drew
 spoiled land drunk floods fountains dry
 whole jordan could given drink
 grain syria bread think

 cxxii
 "but yet amongst many bands found
 horse foot little force might
 keep order know trumpet's sound
 draw sword far shoot fight
 yet persian army doth abound
 many footman strong hardy knight
 doth king's troop framed
 soldiers old immortal squadron named

 cxxiii
 "immortal called band right
 number never wanteth one
 empty place knight
 steps man dead gone
 army's leader emireno hight
 like wit strength none
 hath charge plain pitched field
 fight make fly yield

 cxxiv
 "and well know army host
 within day two arrive
 thee rinaldo behoveth
 keep thy noble head strive
 chief arms courage boast
 queen armida give
 gives price
 hire many hands work entice

 cxxv
 "the chief thy murder sworn
 altamore king samarcand
 adrastus whose realm lies near morn
 hardy giant bold strong hand
 king upon elephant borne
 horse stir stand
 third tisipherne brave lord
 ever put helm girt sword"

 cxxvi
 said young rinaldo's angry eyes
 flew sparks wrath flames visage shined
 longed amid enemies
 rest reason heart could find
 duke vafrine talk applies
 "the greatest news lord yet behind
 thoughts crafts counsels tend
 treason false bring thy life end"

 cxxvii
 point point gan expose
 false compact made wrought
 arms ensigns feigned poison close
 ormondo's vaunt praise thank sought
 reward satisfied
 would demand inquire ask aught
 silence made awhile godfrey thus
 "raymondo say counsel givest thou us"

 cxxviii
 "not purposed late next morn" quoth
 "let us scale round besiege tower
 within may issue free
 sally hurt us power
 camp well rested refreshed see
 provided well gainst last storm shower
 pitched field fight
 delay keep fortress still

 cxxix
 "but lest endangered hurt slain
 cares take care save
 camp doth live doth win doth reign
 else rule guide squadrons brave
 traitors shall noted plain
 command guard change arms
 shall guile known net
 shall fall caught snare set"

 cxxx
 "as hath ever" thus duke begun
 "thy counsel shows thy wisdom thy love
 left doubt shall thus done
 force pitched battle prove
 closed wall trench fight shun
 doth ill camp beseem worse behove
 strength manhood assay
 try open field open day

 cxxxi
 "the fame great conquests sustain
 bide looks threats able
 army subdued slain
 empire settled firm stable
 tower shall yield resist vain
 fear anchor despair cable"
 thus concludes rolling west
 fast set stars called rest



 twentieth book

 argument
 pagan host arrives cruel fight
 makes christians faithful power
 soldan longs field prove might
 old king quits besieged tower
 yet slain eternal night
 famous hand gives fatal hour
 rinald appeased armida first field
 christians win praise god yield



 sun called world idle sleep
 day ten hours gone past
 bold troop tower keep
 espied sudden mist overcast
 earth mirksome clouds darkness deep
 saw egyptian camp last
 raised dust hills valleys broad
 host overspread overload

 ii
 therewith merry shout joyful cry
 pagans reared besieged hold
 cranes thrace rumor fly
 hoary frost snow hyems old
 pours fast warmer regions hie
 sharp winds fierce storms tempests cold
 quick ready new hope aid
 hands shoot tongues threaten made

 iii
 whence ire wrath hardy threat
 proceeds french well knew plain espied
 walls ports army great
 saw strength number pomp pride
 swelled breasts valor's noble heat
 battle fight wished "arm arm" cried
 youth give sign fight prayed
 duke displeased delayed

 iv
 till morning next refused fight
 haste heat bridled brake
 yet sudden fray skirmish light
 new foes would vain trial make
 "after many wars" says "good right
 one day's rest least take"
 thus vain foes cherish would
 hope strength hold

 v
 see aurora's gentle beam appear
 soldiers armed prest ready lay
 skies never half fair clear
 breaking blessed day
 merry morning smiled seemed wear
 upon silver crown sun's golden ray
 without cloud heaven redoubled light
 bent see field fray fight

 vi
 first saw daybreak show shine
 godfrey host good array brought
 besiege tyrant aladine
 raymond left faithful rout
 towns come palestine
 serve succor deliverer stout
 left hardy troop beside
 gascoigns strong arms well proved oft tried

 vii
 godfredo's countenance cheer
 eye sure conquest flames streams
 heaven's gracious favors looks appear
 great goodly erst seems
 face forehead full noblesse
 cheek smiled youth's purple beams
 gait grace acts eyes
 somewhat far mortal lives lies

 viii
 marched far ere espied
 proud foes mighty host draw nigh
 hill first took fortified
 left hand stood army
 broad front behind strait uptied
 army ready stood fight try
 middle ward well armed brings
 footmen strong horsemen served wings

 ix
 left wing spread underneath bent
 steep hill saved flank side
 roberts twain two leaders good sent
 brother middle ward guide
 right wing person went
 plain dangerous broad wide
 foes great numbers would
 perchance environ round squadrons bold
 x
 lorrainers men might
 best armed placed chosen bands
 horse footmen armed light
 archers used service stands
 adventurers battle fight
 well tried squadron famous lands
 right hand set somedeal aside
 rinaldo leader lord guide

 xi
 duke "in thee hope laid
 victory thou must conquest gain
 behind mighty wing far displayed

 cxxxii

 unless chains thou lead captive dame
 dame ta'en force betrayed
 thy greatest glory greatest fame
 time thee love life prayed
 let death end love life shame
 yet let thy false hand bereave breath
 thy gift hateful death

 cxxxiii
 "cruel hundred ways find
 rid thy malice thy hate
 weapons sharp poisons kind
 fire strangling fail estate
 yet ways enough know stop wind
 thousand entries hath house fate
 ah leave flatteries leave weak hope move
 cease cease hope dead dead love"

 cxxxiv
 thus mourned watery eyes
 disdain love dropped rolled tears
 pure fountains ran two streams likewise
 wherein chaste pity mild ruth appears
 thus sweet words queen pacifies
 "madam appease grief wrath fears
 crowned scorned life save
 foe nay friend knight slave

 cxxxv
 "but trust speech oath word
 yet mine eyes zeal truth behold
 throne whereof thy sire lord
 restore thee crown thee gold
 high heaven would much grace afford
 thy heart cloud veil unfold
 paganism east dame
 equalize thy fortune state fame"

 cxxxvi
 thus plaineth thus prays desire
 endears sighs fly tears fall
 warmth titan's fire
 snowdrifts consume tops mountains tall
 melts wrath love remains entire
 "behold" says "your handmaid thrall
 life crown wealth use pleasure"
 thus death life became loss proved tensure

 cxxxvii
 captain egyptian host
 saw royal standard laid ground
 saw rimedon ensign's prop post
 godfrey's noble hand killed one wound
 folk discomfit slain lost
 coward last battle found
 rode sought sought vain
 famous hand might slain

 cxxxviii
 lord godfrey boldly flew
 nobler foe wished could spy
 desperate courage showed tokens true
 where'er joined stayed passed
 cried duke near drew
 "behold thy strong hand come die
 yet trust overthrow thee fall
 castle's ruins shall break thy wall"

 cxxxix
 said forth spurred high advance
 swords aloft struck hit
 left arm wounded knight france
 shield pierced vantbrace cleft split
 pagan backward fell half trance
 left ear foe hugely smit
 sought rise godfredo's sword
 pierced died army's lord

 cxl
 great host emiren dead
 fled small remnant alive remained
 godfrey espied turned steed
 great altamore foot blood stained
 half sword half helm upon head
 gainst hundred fought yet one gained
 "cease cease strife" cried "and thou brave knight
 yield godfrey yield thee might"

 cxli
 till proud haughty heart
 act humbleness never bend
 great name heard north part
 wide world renowned aethiop's end
 answered "i yield thee thou worthy art
 thy prisoner fortune thy friend
 altamoro great thy conquest bold
 glory shall rich rich gold

 cxlii
 "my loving queen wife lady kind
 shall ransom jewels gold treasure"
 "god shield" quoth godfrey "that noble mind
 praise virtue profit measure
 thou hast persia inde
 enjoy still therein take pleasure
 set rent life price blood
 fight sell war gold good"

 cxliii
 said gave knights keep
 fled course bent
 rampiers fled trenches deep
 yet could death's cruel stroke prevent
 camp blood doth steep
 blood rivers streamed tent tent
 soiled defiled defaced prey
 shields helmets armors plumes feathers gay

 cxliv
 thus conquered godfrey yet sun
 dived silver waves golden wain
 daylight served fortress
 victorious host turn
 bloody coat put run
 high temple noble train
 hung arms bows
 knees prayed performed vows
 title orlando furioso

 author lodovico ariosto

 translator william stewart rose

 posting date october 8 2008 ebook #615
 release date august 1996

 language english

 character set encoding ascii

 *** start project gutenberg ebook orlando furioso ***




 produced douglas b killings









 orlando furioso

 "orlando enraged"




 ludovico ariosto

 14741533



 translated william stewart rose

 introduction

 work continuation "orlando innamorato" matteo
 maria boiardo left unfinished upon author's death
 1494 begins less point boiardo left


 brief synopsis boiardo's work omitting
 numerous digressions incidental episodes associated
 events

 court king charlemagne comes angelica daughter
 king cathay india brother argalia angelica
 beautiful woman peers ever seen
 want however order take wife must first
 defeat argalia combat two stricken
 orlando ranaldo "rinaldo" rose

 argalia falls heathen knight ferrau angelica flees
  orlando ranaldo hot pursuit along way
 angelica ranaldo drink magic waters  angelica filled
 burning love ranaldo ranaldo indifferent

 eventually orlando ranaldo arrive angelica's castle
 others also gather angelica's castle including agricane king
 tartary sacripant king circassia agramante king
 africa marfisa "marphisa" rose asian warriorqueen
 except orlando ranaldo heathen

 meanwhile france threatened heathen invaders led king
 gradasso sericana whose principal reason going war
 obtain orlando's sword durindana king rodomonte
 sarzia holy war pagans christians ensues

 ranaldo leaves angelica's castle angelica
 lovesick chaste proper orlando set
 france search waters
 drunk time reverse  ranaldo burns
 angelica angelica indifferent ranaldo orlando
 begin fight king charlemagne fearing
 consequences two best knights kill combat
 intervenes promises angelica whichever two fights
 best heathen leaves care duke
 namus orlando ranaldo arrive paris time
 repulse attack agramante

 namus' camp overrun heathen angelica escapes
 ranaldo pursuit also pursuit ferrau
 defeated argalia considers angelica
 point poem breaks

 orlandoranaldoangelica triangle going
 stories knights loves mixed
 important female knight bradamante
 sister ranaldo falls love noble heathen
 knight named ruggiero "rogero" rose ruggiero said
 descendent alexander great hector also falls
 love bradamante fighting
 opposite sides felt love hopeless
 nevertheless prophecised shall wed found
 famous este line shall rise become one major
 families medieval renaissance italy worth noting
 estes patrons boiardo ariosto
 opposed prophecy atlantes african wizard seeks
 derail fate keep ruggiero becoming christian
 end poem ruggiero imprisoned atlantes' castle
 however bradamante decided follow heart
 pursuit love far away
 bradamanteruggiero story eventually takes center stage
 ariosto's work

 characters importance astolfo peer friend
 orlando kidnaped evil witch morgana sister
 alcina mandricardo fierce hotheaded heathen young
 knight named brandimarte falls love wins
 heart beautiful fiordelisa "flordelice" rose
 play major semimajor roles events ariosto's poem

 dbk

 *****************************************************************

 canto 1

 argument
 angelica pressing danger frights
 flies disorder greenwood shade
 rinaldo's horse escapes following fights
 ferrau spaniard forest glade
 second oath haughty paynim plights
 keeps better first made
 king sacripant regains longlost treasure
 good rinaldo mars promised pleasure



 loves ladies knights arms sing
 courtesies many daring feat
 ancient days story bring
 moors afric passed hostile fleet
 ravaged france agramant king
 flushed youthful rage furious heat
 king charles' roman emperor's head
 vowed due vengeance troyano dead

 ii
 strain roland tell
 things unattempted yet prose rhyme
 strange madness rank fury fell
 man esteemed wise former time
 like cruel pass well
 nigh brought feeble wit fain would climb
 hourly wastes sense concede skill
 strength daring promise fulfil

 iii
 good seed hercules give ear deign
 thou age's grace splendour art
 hippolitus smile upon pain
 tenders humble heart
 though hope quit score vain
 pen pages may pay debt part
 jealous eye offering scan
 scorn gifts give thee

 iv
 amid worthiest shalt thou hear
 fitting praise prepare grace
 record good rogero valiant peer
 ancient root thine illustrious race
 thou wilt lend willing ear
 worth warlike feats shall retrace
 thou thy graver cares little time
 postponing lend thy leisure rhyme

 v
 roland long lady catay
 angelica loved brand
 raised countless trophies damsel gay
 india median tartarian land
 westward measured back way
 nigh pyrenees many band
 germany france king charlemagne
 camped faithful host upon plain

 vi
 make king agramant penance smite
 cheek rash marsilius rue hour
 trained lance sword fight
 led africa swell power
 pushed fell despite
 realm france spain's martial flower
 'twas thus orlando came charles tented
 evil hour soon deed repented

 vii
 seized dame peerless charms
 often human judgment wanders wide
 long warfare kept harms
 western climes eastern shores guide
 land 'mid friends kindred arms
 without contest severed side
 fearing mischief kindled eyes
 prudent emperor reft prize

 viii
 bold orlando cousin free
 rinaldo late contended maid
 enamored beauty rare since
 alike glowing breast either swayed
 charles little liked rivalry
 drew omen thence feebler aid
 abate cause quarrel seized fair
 placed bavarian namus' care

 ix
 vowing warrior content
 conflict fatal day
 good hand gainful succour lent
 slew paynims martial fray
 counter hopes battle went
 thinned squadrons fled disarray
 namus christian captains taken
 pavilion rout forsaken

 x
 lodged charles gentle bonnibel
 ordained valiant victor's meed
 event sprung sell
 combat turned time need
 presaging wisely fortune would rebel
 fatal day christian creed
 entering thick wood discovered near
 close path horseless cavalier

 xi
 shield upon arm knightly wise
 belted mailed helmet head
 knight lightly forest hies
 halfclothed churl win cloth red
 cruel snake swiftly flies
 timid shepherdess startled tread
 poor angelica bridle turns
 approaching knight foot discerns

 xii
 paladin good aymon's seed
 mount albano command
 late baiardo lost gallant steed
 escaped strange adventure hand
 soon seen maid rode speed
 warrior knew yet distant scanned
 angelic features gentle air
 long held fast cupid's snare

 xiii
 affrighted damsel turns palfrey round
 shakes floating bridle wind
 panic seeks choose ground
 open grove prefers thicket blind
 reckless pale trembling astound
 leaves horse devious way find
 forest bore dame
 till sylvan river's bank came

 xiv
 stood fierce ferrau grisly plight
 begrimed dust bathed sweat blood
 lately withdrawn fight
 rest drink refreshing flood
 tarried despite
 since bending bank hasty mood
 dropped helmet crystal tide
 vainly regain treasure tried

 xv
 thither speed drives evermore
 wild panic utters fearful cries
 voice upleaping shore
 saracen lovely visage spies
 pale cheek troubled sore
 arriving quickly warrior's eyes
 though many days news shown
 beautiful angelica known

 xvi
 courteous haply gifted breast
 warm either cousins two
 bold brows steel dressed
 succour sought lent drew
 faulchion rinaldo pressed
 saw little fear champion true
 known sight
 proved arms foeman's might

 xvii
 thus foot warriors vie
 cruel strife blade blade oppose
 marvel plate brittle mail fly
 anvils stood deafening blows
 behoves palfrey swift ply
 feet knights combat close
 vexed utmost speed goading spurs
 waste wood frighted damsel stirs

 xviii
 two struggled long throw
 strife vainly still
 since neither valiant warrior
 opposite force knightly skill
 first parley spanish foe
 good master albano's hill
 one within whose raging breast pent
 reckless fire struggled vent

 xix
 "thou think'st" said "to injure alone
 know thou wilt thyself much molest
 fight yon rising sun
 raging heat kindled thy breast
 thy gain guerdon
 though yield life stoop crest
 shall never thy glorious meed
 flies vainly battle bleed

 xx
 "then much better since stake's
 thou loving like should'st mount stay
 wait battle's end lovely dame
 fly yet way
 lady taken repeat claim
 naked faulchion peerless prey
 else long toil see gain
 simple loss unrequited pain"

 xxi
 peer's proposal pleased paynim well
 hot contention foregone
 fair truce replaced discord fell
 mutual wrongs forgot mischief done
 departure seated sell
 foot spaniard left aymon's son
 mount courser's crupper prayed
 united chased royal maid

 xxii
 oh goodly truth cavaliers old
 rivals different faith bred
 yet weary warriors' wounds cold 
 still smarting strokes fell dread
 yet together ride waste wold
 unsuspecting devious dingle thread
 four spurs infest foaming sides
 courser brings way divides

 xxiii
 warlike pair fault
 knew might palfrey goad
 since without distinction survey
 recent print hoofs either road
 commit chase fortune way
 paynim pricked rinaldo strode
 fierce ferrau bewildered wood
 found late stood

 xxiv
 beside water stoop'd drink
 dropt knightly helmet  cost
 sunk stream since could think
 retrieve late hopes crossed
 treasure fell descends brink
 swift stream seeks morion lost
 casque lies bedded sands
 'twill ask light endeavour hands

 xxv
 bough severs neighbouring tree
 shreds shapes branch pole
 sounds stream anxiously
 fathoms rakes ransacks shelf hole
 angered sore heart restless
 lingered troubled waters roll
 breasthigh mid river rose upright
 apparition angry knight

 xxvi
 armed points except head
 better hand helmet bore
 casque river's bed
 ferrau sought vainly toiling long sore
 upon spanish knight frowned said
 "thou traitor thy word thou perjured moor
 grieve goodly helmet resign
 due long since justly mine

 xxvii
 "remember pagan thine arm laid low
 brother angelica knight
  thy word plighted throw
 arms helmet bright
 fortune compel thee forego
 prize thy despite
 grieve rather grieve thou
 art found perjured traitor thy vow

 xxviii
 "but thou seek'st helmet thy task
 win wear thy renown
 noble prize good orlando's casque
 rinaldo's yet fairer crown
 almontes' mambrino's iron masque
 make one force arms thine
 good helm fitly bestowed
 thy promise long owed"

 xxix
 bristled paynim's every hair view
 grim shade uprising tide
 vanished fresh healthful hue
 lips halfformed accents died
 next hearing argalia slew
 warrior hight stream beside
 thus unknightly breach promise blame
 burned flushed rage shame

 xxx
 time falsehood excuse
 knowing well true phantom's lore
 stood speechless remorse words infuse
 lanfusa's life warrior swore
 never fight foray would use
 helmet good orlando bore
 aspramont bold almontes paid
 life forfeit christian blade

 xxxi
 new vow discharged faithfully
 vain promise whilom plight
 stream departing heavily
 many days sore vexed grieved sprite
 still intent seek orlando
 roved wheresoe'er hoped find knight
 different lot befel rinaldo
 chanced another pathway pursue

 xxxii
 far warrior fared ere spied
 bounding across path gallant steed
 "stay bayardo mine" rinaldo cried
 "too cruel care loss thee breed"
 horse returned side
 deaf prayer flew better speed
 furious chase rinaldo hies
 follow angelica flies

 xxxiii
 dreary woods dark damsel fled
 rude unharboured heath savage height
 every leaf spray rustled bred
 oak elm beech new affright
 foaming palfrey sped
 strange crooked paths furious flight
 shadow seen valley blind
 mountain feared rinaldo behind

 xxxiv
 young roe fawn fallow deer
 mid shelter native glade
 seen hungry pard tiger tear
 bosom bleeding dam dismayed
 bounds forest green ceaseless fear
 destroying beast shade shade
 sapling touched amid pangs
 believes monster's fangs

 xxxv
 one day night half following day
 damsel wanders wide whither knows
 enters deep wood whose branches play
 moved lightly freshening breeze blows
 two clear murmuring rivers stray
 upon banks fresher herbage grows
 twin streams passage slowly clear
 make music stones please ear

 xxxvi
 weening removed way wends
 thousand miles loathed rinaldo's beat
 rest maid intends
 wearied long flight summer's heat
 saddle 'mid spring flowers descends
 takes bridle courser fleet
 loose along river lets pass
 roving banks search lusty grass

 xxxvii
 behold hand thicket surveys
 gay flowering thorn vermeil rose
 tuft reflected stream strays
 beside overshadowing oaks enclose
 hollow within safe vulgar gaze
 seemed place constructed repose
 bows interwoven light
 pierced tangled screen far less sight

 xxxviii
 within soft moss herbage form bed
 delay rest traveller woo
 'twas limbs weary damsel spread
 eyeballs bathed slumber's balmy dew
 little time eased drooping head
 ere weened courser's tramp knew
 softly rises river near
 armed capapie beholds cavalier

 xxxix
 friend foe nothing comprehends
 hope fear doubting bosom tear
 adventure's issue mute attends
 even sigh disturbs air
 cavalier upon bank descends
 sits motionless lost care
 visage propt upon arm sight
 changed senseless stone appeared knight

 xl
 pensive hour drooping head
 rested mute ere began moan
 piteous tale sorrow said
 lamenting soft sweet tone
 tiger's breast pity bred
 mournful wailings rent stone
 sighed wept like rivers flowed
 tears bosom like aetna glowed

 xli
 "thought makes burn freeze hate
 gnaws heart rankles root
 what's left me" said "arrived late
 one favoured bears away fruit
 bare words looks scarce cheered hopeless state
 prime spoils reward another's suit
 since fruit blossom hangs
 longer pine hopeless pangs

 xlii
 "the virgin image rose
 sheltered garden native stock
 solitude safe repose
 blooms unapproached sheperd flock
 earth teems freshening water flows
 breeze dewy dawn sweets unlock
 wistful youth bosom dresses
 enamored damsel braids tresses

 xliii
 "but wanton hands sooner displace
 maternal stem grown
 withered whatsoever grace
 found man heaven bloom beauty gone
 damsel hold higher place
 light life flower
 suffering spoiler's hand crop prize
 forfeits worth every other's eyes

 xliv
 "and cheap except wight
 large boon bestow
 ah false cruel fortune foul despite
 others triumph drown'd woe
 treasure slight
 life forego
 let die 'twere happiness
 longer life must cease love"

 xlv
 ask made sorrowing
 pour'd stream many tears
 answer fair circassia's king
 sacripant oppressed amorous cares
 love source troubles spring
 sole occasion pains fears
 lover's service paid
 well remembered royal maid

 xlvi
 sake orient's farthest reign
 roved thither sun descends rest
 told india pain
 orlando followed west
 learned france charlemagne
 secluded champion rest
 fit guerdon mewed knight
 protect lilies best fight

 xlvii
 warrior field viewed
 short time king charlemagne's disgrace
 vainly angelica pursued
 damsel's footsteps found trace
 weeping monarch rued
 bewailed doleful case
 hence words lamentations run
 might pity stop passing sun

 xlviii
 sacripant laments plight
 makes tepid fountain eyes
 deem needful recite
 pours forth yet plaints piteous cries
 propitious fortune lady bright
 hear youth lament wise
 thus moment compassed without
 chance long ages brought

 xlix
 deep attention warrior weeps
 marks fashion grief tears
 words whose passion never sleeps
 first confession hears
 plaint heart measure keeps
 cold column builder rears
 like haughty maid holds
 world deems none worthy love

 l
 harm amid woods keep
 damsel weened might guidance need
 poor drowning caitiff chindeep
 implores help obstinate indeed
 let occasion sleep
 find escort stand stead
 king long experience knew
 lovers kind true

 li
 maid intends
 heal mischief charms wrought
 past ills furnish glad amends
 full bliss pining lover sought
 keep king play ends
 help device fiction bought
 purpose taxed daring
 reassume wont haughty bearing

 lii
 apparition bright unforeseen
 stood like venus diana fair
 solemn pageant issuing scene
 shadowy wood murky lair
 "peace you" cried youthful queen
 "and god preserve honour care
 suffer blindly entertain
 opinion fame false vain"

 liii
 wonderment mother eyes
 excessive bliss son mourned
 dead lamented still tears sighs
 since thinned files without boy returned
  rapture king's surprise
 ecstasy joy discerned
 lofty presence cheeks heavenly hue
 lovely form broke upon view

 liv
 full fond eager passion pressed
 towards lady divinity
 clasped warrior breast
 catay haply less free
 maid thoughts addressed
 towards native land empery
 feels hope revived bosom beat
 shortly repossess sumptuous seat

 lv
 chances damsel said
 since eastward sent sericane
 seek martial monarch's aid
 swayed sceptre fair domain
 told oft orlando's friendly blade
 saved dishonour death pain
 preserved virgin flower
 pure blossomed natal hour

 lvi
 haply tale true yet seem
 likely one sober sense possessed
 sacripant waked worser dream
 without cavil acquiesced
 since love sees without one guiding gleam
 spies broad day likes best
 one sign afflicted man's disease
 give ready faith things please

 lvii
 "if good anglante's lord prize forbore
 seized fair occasion might
 loss fortune never
 enjoy fair prize invite
 imitate lord little lore
 think not" said apart circassa's knight
 "to quit proffered good shame
 afterthought blame

 lviii
 "no pluck fresh morning rose
 tarry may overblown
 woman experience shows
 deed sweet welcome done
 whatsoever scorn damsel shows
 though awhile may weep make moan
 unchecked anger false true
 sharp repulse bold design pursue"

 lix
 said soft assault prepares
 loud noise within greenwood shade
 beside rang astounded ears
 sore monarch stayed
 donned helm arms wears
 aye wont rove steel belted blade
 replaced bridle courser fleet
 grappled lance sprang seat

 lx
 bold semblance valiant knight
 behold warrior threads forest hoar
 stranger's mantle snowy white
 white alike waving plume wore
 balked bliss full fell despite
 monarch ill interruption bore
 spurred horse meet mid space
 hate fury glowing face

 lxi
 defies fight approaching nigh
 weens make stoop haughty crest
 knight whose worth rate high
 warlike prowess puts present test
 cuts short haughty threats angry cry
 spurs lays levelled lance rest
 tempest wheels circassia's valiant peer
 foeman's head aims spear

 lxii
 brindled bulls tawny lions spring
 forest warfare deadly
 two knights stranger king
 spears alike opposing bucklers thrill
 solid ground encountering
 trembles fruitful vale naked hill
 well mail dressed
 bodies proof saved breast

 lxiii
 swerved chargers destined course
 met like rams butted head head
 warlike saracen's illfated horse
 well valued alive dropt short dead
 stranger's fell senseless perforce
 roused rowel grassy bed
 paynim king extended straight
 lay battered lord weight

 lxiv
 upright upon steed knight unknown
 encounter horse rider threw
 deeming enough conflict done
 cares worthless warfare renew
 endlong readiest path gone
 measures pricking frith forest
 mile little less furious heat
 ere foiled saracen regains feet

 lxv
 bewildered astonished clown
 held plough thunder storm o'erpast
 deafening bolt beat
 nigh deathstricken cattle wakes aghast
 sees distant pine without crown
 saw clad leafy honours last
 rose paynim knight troubled face
 maid spectatress cruel case

 lxvi
 sighs groans yet mischief sore
 endured wounded arm foot bled
 mere shame never
 dyed cheek deep red
 rued fall grieved
 dame lift courser dead
 speechless remained ween
 prisoned tongue voice set free

 lxvii
 "grieve not" said "sir monarch thy fall
 let blame upon thy courser
 welcome forage stall
 rest joust jeopardy
 well thy foe loser may call
 shall glory gain
 first quit ground aught
 angelica fighting fields taught"

 lxviii
 seeks saracen cheer
 behold messenger pouch horn
 panting hackney  man horse appear
 long journey weary forlorn
 questions sacripant approaching near
 seen warrior pass borne
 shield crest white search
 wide forest pricked weary groom

 lxix
 king sacripant made answer "as see
 threw went way
 tell warrior's name may
 informed whose valour foiled fray"
 groom  "that ask
 shall relate without delay
 know combat prostrate laid
 tried valour gentle maid

 lxx
 "bold maid fairer yet bold
 redoubted virgin's name veil
 'twas bradamant marred praise old
 prowess ever sword mail"
 said spurred story told
 left little gladdened tale
 recks says shame
 flushed visage kindles flame

 lxxi
 woeful warrior long thought
 upon cruel case still vain
 found woman defeat wrought
 thinking increased monarch's pain
 climbed horse spake aught
 silently uplifted plain
 upon croup bestowed damsel sweet
 reserved gladder use safer seat

 lxxii
 two miles rode hear
 sweeping woods spread sound
 loud crash trample far near
 forest seemed tremble around
 shortly see steed appear
 housings wrought gold richly bound
 clears bush stream furious force
 whatsoever else impedes course

 lxxiii
 "unless misty air" damsel cries
 "and boughs deceive sight yon noble steed
 sure bayardo us flies
 parts wood impetuous speed
  yes 'tis bayardo's self recognize
 well courser understands need
 two riders ill foundered jade would bear
 hither speeds horse end care"

 lxxiv
 bold circassian lighted applied
 hand seize flowing rein
 swiftly turning heels replied
 like lightning wheeled upon plain
 woe king leaps aside
 smite would lash vain
 bone sinew shock
 good heels split metal rock

 lxxv
 maid goes submissively
 gentle blandishment humble mood
 dog greets lord frolic glee
 short season past viewed
 good bayardo memory
 albracca hands prepared food
 time damsel loved rinaldo bold
 rinaldo ungrateful stern cold

 lxxvi
 left hand takes bit
 pats sides chest
 good steed marvellous wit
 lamblike obeyed damsel caressed
 meantime king sees moment fit
 leapt knees courser pressed
 palfrey eased half weight
 lady left croup gained seat

 lxxvii
 hazard directs sight
 sounding arms man foot espies
 glows sudden anger despite
 son aymon eyes
 life esteems youthful knight
 like crane falcon flies
 time lady sighed passion slighted
 'tis rinaldo loves ill requited

 lxxviii
 effect two different fountains wrought
 whose wonderous waters different moods inspire
 spring arden rare virtue fraught
 fills heart amorous desire
 taste fountain untaught
 love change ice former fire
 rinaldo drank first vainly sighs
 angelica last hates flies

 lxxix
 mixed secret bane waters glide
 amorous care convert sudden hate
 maid sooner rinaldo spied
 laughing eyes deep darkness sate
 sad mien trembling voice cried
 sacripant prayed wait
 near approach detested knight
 wood pursue flight

 lxxx
 saracen anger hot
 "is knightly worship sunk low
 thou should'st hold valour cheap
 sufficient make yonder champion flee
 already albracca's fights forgot
 dread night singly stood thee
 night though naked thy shield
 king agrican field"

 lxxxi
 answers knows fear
 'tis rinaldo nigh
 afar furious cavalier
 threats bold saracen angry cry
 soon known steed damsel dear
 whose charms flame kindled meet eye
 ensued haughty pair
 another canto shall declare


 canto 2

 argument
 hermit parts means hollow sprite
 two redoubted rivals' dangerous play
 rinaldo goes love hope invite
 dispatched charles another way
 bradamont seeking devoted knight
 good rogero nigh becomes prey
 pinabel drops damsel brave
 dungeon living grave



 injurious love still mar accord
 desires thy favourite feat
 please thee perfidious lord
 two hearts different measure beat
 thou wilt let take certain ford
 dragging stream deep fleet
 abandon love desires
 hates respect love inspires

 ii
 thou rinaldo show'st damsel fair
 seems hideous gentle dame
 lady's pride care
 paid back deepest hate amorous flame
 pines victim despair
 scorned turn reward
 changed damsel sort abhorred
 would choose death hated lord

 iii
 pagan cries "forego thy theft
 false felon pilfer'd steed
 wont let reft
 seeks dearly pays deed
  shall take thee yon lovely weft
 leave thee prize foul misdeed
 horse maid whose worth outstrips belief
 ill methinks relinquished thief"

 iv
 "thou liest" haughty saracen retorts
 proud burning fierce flame
 "a thief thyself fame truth reports
 let good deeds decide dubious claim
 steed damsel fair assorts
 best proved valiant deeds though dame
 nothing precious thee
 search wide world throughout may well agree"

 v
 two fierce dogs somtimes stand gaze
 hate springs strife inspire
 grind teeth foe surveys
 sidelong glance eyes red fire
 either falls bites hoarsely bays
 stiff bristles stand end ire
 reproach menace sword
 pass sacripant clermont's angry lord

 vi
 thus kindling wrath knights engage
 one foot horse
 small gain inexperienced page
 would better rein charger course
 baiardo's sense wage
 war master put force
 voice hand manage stir
 rebellious rein goading spur

 vii
 king would urge takes rest
 curbs runs giddy rings
 drops head beneath spreading chest
 plays spine runs anend flings
 furious saracen distressed
 sees 'tis time tame beast springs
 one hand pummel ground
 clear restless courser bound

 viii
 soon sacripant welltimed leap
 fury bayardo freed
 may believe battle sleep
 champions matched heart deed
 sounding blades changeful measure keep
 hammerstrokes vulcan less speed
 descend dim cavern heats
 jove's red thunders anvil beats

 ix
 sometimes lunge feign thrust parry
 deep masters desperate game play
 rise upon furious stroke carry
 swords aloft stoop stand bay
 close exhausted tarry
 hide show give way
 one knight inch ground granted
 foeman's foot upon inch planted

 x
 lo rinaldo impatient grown
 strikes full sacripant lifted blade
 puts forth buckler made bone
 well strong stubborn steel inlaid
 though passing thick fusberta cleaves groan
 greenwood covert close sunny glade
 paynim's arm rings senseless blow
 steel bone like ice shivers go

 xi
 fair damsel saw timid eye
 ruin follow faulchion's sway
 like criminal whose doom nigh
 changed fair countenance sore dismay
 deemed little time left fly
 would rinaldo's prey
 rinaldo loathed much
 doats scornful damsel miserably

 xii
 turned horse gloomy chase
 drove rough path tangled ally
 oftentimes bent back bloodless face
 saw rinaldo thicket sally
 flying long urged frantic race
 met hermit valley
 devotion aspect expressed
 long beard descended breast

 xiii
 wasted much fasts age
 ass mounted slow sure
 visage warranted never sage
 conscience precise passing pure
 though arteries time stilled rage
 blood spake feeble demure
 sight delighted damsel
 inly stirred charity

 xiv
 lady prayed kindly friar
 would straight conduct near
 land france might flee
 never loathed rinaldo hear
 hermit skilled sorcery
 ceased soothe gentle damsel's fear
 promise deliverance shook
 pocket drew forth secret book

 xv
 opened quick mighty marvel wrought
 leaf finished sage
 spirit bidding brought
 waits command likeness page
 magic writ constrained taught
 hastes warriors face face engage
 cool shade  cool disport 
 steps stops battle short

 xvi
 "in courtesy" cried "let either show
 foe's death either avail
 guerdon conquest bestow
 battle shall prevail
 roland though struck blow
 snapt fight single link mail
 paristown conveys damsel gay
 engaged bitter fray

 xvii
 "within easy mile saw peer
 pricking paris lady bright
 riding merry mood laugh jeer
 mocking fierce fruitless fight
 sure better yet near
 follow peer damsel flight
 paris place prize
 lady never shall meet eyes"

 xviii
 might seen angry cavaliers
 change demon's tale rage shame
 curse wanting eyes ears
 let rival cheat dame
 towards horse good rinaldo steers
 breathing forth piteous sighs seem flame
 joins orlando  ere part 
 swears fury heart

 xix
 passing prompt bayardo stood
 leaps back leaves swift wind
 without farewell rival wood
 much less invites seat behind
 goaded charger heat blood
 forces whate'er eager course confined
 ditch river tangled thorn marble block
 swims river clears rock

 xx
 let sir sound strangely ear
 rinaldo took steed thus readily
 long vainly followed far near
 endued reasoning faculty
 vice lured following peer
 fled cherished lord
 might guide whither went gentle dame
 heard nursed flame

 xxi
 angelica random dread
 pavilion winged rapid flight
 bayardo marked damsel fled
 saddle lightened mount alban's knight
 foot equal combat sped
 matched baron meaner might
 chased maid woods floods strands
 hopes place warrior's hands

 xxii
 desire bring maid
 gallopped still rampant play
 would let master mount afraid
 might make take another way
 luring rinaldo shade
 twice brought unexpected prey
 twice foiled endeavour bold
 ferrau sacripant lately told

 xxiii
 good bayardo believed tiding
 fair damsel produced accord
 devil's cunning tale confiding
 renewed wonted service lord
 behold rinaldo fury riding
 pushing still courser parisward
 though fly fast champion's wishes go
 faster wind seemed slow

 xxiv
 night rinaldo rests steed pain
 meet anglante's lord burned sore
 lent credit tidings vain
 false courier wizard hoar
 day next flowing rein
 rode till royal city rose
 eyes charlemagne taken post
 sad remnant broken host

 xxv
 fears afric king's pursuit
 sap siege upon vassals calls
 gather fresh victual recruit
 cleanse ditches repair walls
 may best annoy foes suit
 safety without delay forestalls
 plans embassy england thence
 gather fresher forces defence

 xxvi
 bent try fate
 arms tented field though lately shamed
 send rinaldo neighbouring state
 britain england named
 ill liked paladin cross strait
 people land blamed
 king charles sudden day
 would grant valiant envoy delay

 xxvii
 rinaldo never executed thing
 less willingly prevented quest
 fair visage following
 whose charms heart ravished breast
 yet obediance christian king
 prepared royal hest
 calais good envoy wends speed
 day embarks steed

 xxviii
 scorn cautious pilot's skill
 impatience regain home
 launched doubtful sea boded ill
 rolled heavy billows white foam
 wind enraged opposed
 stirred waves 'mid gathering gloom
 loud storm tempest's fury grew
 topmasthigh flashing waters flew

 xxix
 watchful mariners wary sort
 haul mainsail attempt wear
 would put back panic port
 whence ill hour loosed little care
  "not so" exclaims wind stops short
 "so poor penance pay dare"
 fain would veer fiercer roar
 pelts back reeling prow blusters

 xxx
 starboard larboard bears fitful gale
 never thought ire assuages
 strained vessel drives humble sail
 billows tempest rages
 still pursue varying tale
 must leave awhile paladin wages
 weary warfare wind flood
 follow fair virgin blood

 xxxi
 speak famed damsel whose spear
 o'erthrown king sacripant earth flung
 worthy sister valiant peer
 beatrix good duke aymon sprung
 daring deeds puissance less dear
 charlemagne france since proved among
 first prowess tried many test
 equal good rinaldo's shone confessed

 xxxii
 cavalier suitor dame
 afric passed agramant
 rogero valiant father's name
 mother child agolant
 bear lion came
 disdained child love plant
 though cruel fortune ill wishes meeting
 granted pair single greeting

 xxxiii
 alone thenceforth sought lover
 named owed birth
 roved safe company
 thousands trusting single worth
 made king circassy
 salute visage old mother earth
 traversed wood wood past mountain
 stopt length beside lovely fountain

 xxxiv
 delicious mead fountainrill
 ancient trees o'ershaded glides away
 whose ear pleasing murmurs fill
 invites drink banks stay
 left side cultivated hill
 excludes fervors middle day
 first damsel thither turns eyes
 youthful cavalier seated spies

 xxxv
 cavalier underneath shade
 seems lost melancholy dream
 bank gaudy flowers displayed

 bough shield helmet gleam
 moist eyes sad downcast air
