 xxxvi
 urged passion lodged every breast
 restless curiosity know
 others' cares gentle maid addressed
 knight sought occasion woe
 secret grief confessed
 gentle speech courteous show
 gallant bearing sight
 prepared saw nimble knight

 xxxvii
 "fair sir band horse foot" said
 "i brought charlemagne thither pressed
 ambush marsilius spread
 descending pyrenean crest
 company damsel led
 whose charms fervid love fired breast
 journey rhone's current
 rider winged courser spy

 xxxviii
 "the robber whether man shade
 goblin damned everlasting woe
 soon beheld dearloved maid
 like falcon descending aims blow
 sank thought rose soaring laid
 hands prize snatched
 quick rape appeared dream
 heard air damsel's scream

 xxxix
 "the ravening kite swoops plunders
 hovering shelterd yard spies
 helpless chicken near unwatchful hen
 vainly dins thief cries
 cannot reach mountainrobber's den
 compassed cliffs follow one flies
 besides wayfoundered weary steed
 'mid rocks wasted wind speed

 xl
 "but like one bleeding side
 would liefer far seen heart outtorn
 left good squadrons masterless ride
 along cliffs passes least forlorn
 took way love served guide
 appeared ruthless thief born
 ascending den lovely prey
 time snatched hope peace away

 xli
 "six days rode morn setting sun
 horrid cliff bottom dark drear
 giddy precipice path none
 sign vestiges man near
 last dark barren vale
 caverned mountains rude cliffs appear
 middle rose rugged block
 fair castle planted rock

 xlii
 "from far shone like flame seemed dight
 marble brick eye
 wonderful work fair sight
 walls appeared approached nigh
 learned built sprite
 potent fumes raised sorcery
 rock towers steel fix
 casehardened stream fire styx

 xliii
 "each polished turret shines ray
 defies mouldering rust rain
 robber scours country night day
 harbours sure domain
 nothing safe would bear away
 pursued curses threats vain
 fruitless every hope foil art
 felon keeps love oh say heart

 xliv
 "alas left eye
 prison cliff's aerial crest
 like shefox hears offspring cry
 standing beneath ravening eagle's nest
 since wings rise fly
 runs round rugged rock hopeless quest
 inaccessible wild dominion
 whatsoever plume pinion

 xlv
 "while lingered rocks aspire
 saw dwarf guide two goodly strain
 whose coming added hope desire
 alas desire hope alike vain
 barons bold fearful ire
 one gradasso king sericane
 next youthful vigour knight
 prized moorish court rogero hight

 xlvi
 "the dwarf exclaimed `these champions assay
 force dwells yonder steep
 strange unattempted way
 spurs winged courser mountainkeep'
 approaching warriors say
 `pity fair sirs cruel loss weep
 trust yon daring spoiler slain
 give lost lady arms again'

 xlvii
 "then love ravished make known
 vouching bitter tears deep distress
 proffer aid path stone
 winds craggy mountain press
 upon summit left alone
 look pray god success
 beneath wily wizard's castle strong
 extends little plain two bowshots long

 xlviii
 "arrived beneath craggy keep two
 contend warrior shall begin fight
 whether first lot gradasso drew
 young rogero held honor light
 king sericane bugle blew
 rock rang fortress height
 lo apparelled fearful course
 cavalier upon winged horse

 xlix
 "upwards little little springs
 winged courser pilgrim crane
 finds first balance wings
 running scarcely rising plain
 flock launched scattered flings
 pinions wind soars amain
 straight necromancer's upward flight
 eagle scarce attempts bold height

 l
 "when seems fit wheels courser round
 shuts wings falling sky
 shoots like well trained falcon ground
 sees quarry duck pigeon fly
 parting air whizzing sound
 rested lance darted high
 gradasso scarcely marks foe
 hears swooping near feels blow

 li
 "the wizard gradasso breaks spear
 wounds empty air fury vain
 feathered monster breeds fear
 distance shifts swoops
 encounter made alfana rear
 thrown back upon haunches plain
 alfana indian monarch rode
 fairest ever man bestrode

 lii
 "up starry sphere swift ascent
 wizard soars pounces sky
 strikes young rogero intent
 upon gradasso deems danger nigh
 beneath wizard's blow warrior bent
 made deal generous courser ply
 smite shifting foe turned
 sky reach discerned

 liii
 "his blows rogero gradasso bruise
 forehead bosom back flanks
 warrior's empty blows eschews
 shifting quickly scarce seen
 wizard seems choose
 monster makes spacious rings clean
 enchanter deceives knights
 view know whence smites

 liv
 "between two earth o' sky
 hour warfare lasted
 spreading wide veil dusky dye
 throughout world discolours things fair
 beheld say add
 tittle tale yet scarcely dare
 tell stood saw
 strange seems passing nature's law

 lv
 "well covered goodly silken case
 celestial warrior bore shield
 delayed mantle displace
 know lucid orb concealed
 since sooner blazes face
 foe tumbles dazzled field
 like lifeless body lies
 becomes necromancer's helpless prize

 lvi
 "like carbuncle magic buckler blazed
 glare ever seen shone bright
 could warriors choose fall amazed
 blinded clear dazzling light
 distant mountain gazed
 fell senseless regained sight
 long time saw neither knights page
 aught beside dark empty stage

 lvii
 "this fell enchanter supposed
 dragged warriors prisoncell
 strange virtue shield disclosed
 hope freedom fell
 thus turrets enclosed
 heart departing bade last farewell
 sum griefs say love combine
 distress grief match mine"

 lviii
 knight relapsed first disease
 melancholy tale done
 count pinabel maganzese
 anselmo d'altaripa's faithless son
 blood ran foul degrees
 disdained virtuous one
 played simple part among base
 passing vice villains race

 lix
 aspect changing still beauteous dame
 hears mournful maganzese narrates
 first mention rogero's name
 radiant face eager joy dilates
 full pity kindles flame
 pinabel cruel durance states
 finds though twice told story stale
 makes oft repeat piece tale

 lx
 deemed clear
 cried knight "repose upon say
 thee may arrival well dear
 thou fortunate account day
 straight wend keep sir cavalier
 holds jewel rich ray
 shalt thou grudge thy labour thy care
 envious fortune play fair"

 lxi
 knight replied "then nought remains
 yonder mountainpasses show
 sure 'tis little loss lose pains
 every thing lost prize
 would climb yon cliffs gains
 find prisonhouse
 whate'er betide blame alone
 go forewarned meet fate foreshown"

 lxii
 said cavalier remounts horse

 protect straightened shore

 counsel comfort captain's hand

 lxiv
 goodly town many miles plain
 lie 'twixt var rhone upon sea
 given royal charlemagne
 trust placed fidelity
 still wont wonder tented plain

 rode marseilles ask lady's aid

 lxv
 whether call obey
 youthful damsel doubts little space

 softer thoughts fame duty chase
 length resolved emprize assay
 free rogero enchanted place

 would cherished lover share jail

 lxvi
 excuse post appay
 contented wait
 turned bridle resume way

 since line knows damsel gay

 detected maganzese

 lxvii
 'twixt maganza's old clermont's line
 ancient deadly feud
 oft blows rival houses came
 oft civil blood hands embrued
 hence treason gentle dame
 foul heart wicked county brewed
 first occasion served would stray
 road leave way

 lxviii
 traitor's troubled fancy rack
 fear doubt native rancorous mood
 unawares issued track
 found within gloomy wood

 whose stony peak forest stood
 daughter dodona's duke behind
 dogging footsteps thicket blind

 lxix
 saw within brake
 thought abandon unweeting foe
 dame  " 'twere better make
 shelter ere gathering darkness grow

 expect peak
 measure remembered place seek"

 lxx
 said pushed courser height
 lone mountain evil mind
 revolving went scheme sleight
 rid gentle dame behind
 lo rocky cavern met sight
 amid precipices dark blind

 worked smooth bottom door

 lxxi
 void bottom wide
 portal conducted inner room
 thence light shone every side
 torch illumining gloom

 came upon felon stood
 fearing lest might lose wood

 lxxii
 approach county's first intent
 made vain wily traitor sought mend
 toils new stratagem invent
 rid thence bring end
 meet approaching lady went
 showed cave prayed ascend
 said bottom seen
 gentle damsel bewitching mien

 lxxiii
 lovely semblance rich vest
 appeared lady mean degree
 melancholy weeping distressed

 towards entrance pressed
 learn unhappy maid might
 one melancholy damsel flew
 within inner cavern drew

 lxxiv
 beauteous bradamant bold
 wary gave ready ear bent
 help maid imprisoned hold
 sought means try deep descent

 lopt long branch shaped sword

 lxxv
 severed end count commended

 lxxvi
 pinabel
 cruel lot fair bradamant assayed
 striking bottom cell
 stout elmbough long weight upstayed
 though split splintered fell
 broked fall saved gentle maid
 astounded lady lay
 ensuing canto display


 canto 3

 argument
 restored sense beauteous bradamant
 finds sage melissa vaulted tomb
 hears many famous plant
 warrior shall issue womb
 next release rogero haunt
 old atlantes learns groom
 brunello hight virtuous ring take
 thus knight's others' fetters break



 vouchsafe voice shall ascend
 high would raise noble theme
 afford befitting words lend
 wings verse soar pitch scheme
 since fiercer fire illustrious end
 wont may well song beseem
 fair portion lord due
 sings sires lineage grew

 ii
 whose fair line 'mid heavenly grace
 chosen minister earth
 see phoebus daily race
 one peace war doth fairer show
 lineage hath longer kept place
 still shall keep lights glow
 within aright inspire soul
 blue heaven shall turn pole

 iii
 seek full worth blaze
 mine needful noble lyre
 sounded touch thunderer's praise
 time giants sank penal fire
 yet instruments fit raise
 votive work bestow desire
 labour thought combine
 shape shadow forth great design

 iv
 till chisel may suffice scale
 stone give lines right direction
 haply future study may avail
 bring stubborn labour perfection
 return mail
 hawberk shield helm small protection
 speak pinabel maganzeze
 hopes damsel's death whose fall sees

 v
 wily traitor thought damsel sweet
 perished darksome cavern's floor
 pale visages hurried retreat
 contaminated door
 thence returning clomb seat
 like one wicked spirit bore
 add another sin evil deed
 bore warlike virgin's steed

 vi
 leave sometime wretch layed
 snares another wrought proper doom
 turn damsel betrayed
 nigh found death tomb
 rising rock dismayed
 shrewd fall gazing gloom
 beheld passed inner door gave
 entrance spacious cave

 vii
 first cavern second ended
 fashioned form church large square
 roof cunning architect extended
 shafts alabaster rich rare
 flame clearburning lamp ascended
 central altar glare
 illuminating space
 shone gate lit cave without

 viii
 touched sanctifying thoughts wait
 worthy spirit holy place
 prays eager lips heart elate
 disposer earthly grace
 kneeling hears secret wicket grate
 opposing wall whence face face
 woman issuing forth maid addresses
 barefoot ungirt dishevelled tresses

 ix
 "o generous bradamant" matron cried
 "know thine arrival hallowed hold
 unauthorized heavenly guide
 prophetic ghost merlin told
 thou cave shouldst come path untried
 covers renowned magician's mould
 long time awaited thee
 tell heavens' pronounced decree

 x
 "this ancient memorable cave
 merlin enchanter sage make
 thou may'st heard magician brave
 cheated lady lake
 beneath cavern grave
 holds bones lady's sake
 limbs wizard spread
 living laid lies dead

 xi
 "yet lives spirit immortal strain
 lodged enchanter's corpse till skies
 trumpet call endless pain
 dove raven's wing shall rise
 yet lives voice thou shalt hear plain
 sepulchral case marble cries
 since still past future taught
 every wight counsel sought

 xii
 "long days passed since distant land
 course cemetery steer
 solemn mysteries scanned
 merlin truth better clear
 compassed design planned
 month beyond thee tarried
 since merlin still certain knowledge summing
 events prefixed moment thy coming"

 xiii
 daughter duke aymon stood aghast
 silent listened speech
 knew sore marvelling passed
 'twere dream reality
 length modest brow eyes cast
 replied like one modesty
 "and wrought merit
 worthy workings prophetic spirit"

 xiv
 full joy adventure strange pursues
 moving ready haste behind dame
 brings sepulchre mews
 bones spirit erst merlin's name
 tomb hardest stone masons use
 shone smooth lucid red flame
 although sunbeam pierced gloom
 splendour lit subterraneous room

 xv
 whether native operation
 certain stones shine like torch i' dark
 whether force spell fumigation
 guess seems come near mark
 sign made mystic constellation
 blaze came sepulchral ark
 discovered sculpture colour gems gilding
 whatsoever else adorned building

 xvi
 scarcely bradamant sill
 lifter foot trod secret cave
 live spirit clear tones thrill
 addressed martial virgin grave
 "may fortune chaste noble maid fulfil
 thine every wish" exclaimed wizard brave
 "since thy womb princely race shall spring
 whose name italy earth shall ring

 xvii
 "the noble blood derived ancient troy
 mingling thee two glorious streams
 shall ornament flower joy
 every lineage phoebus beams
 genial stars lend warmth cold annoy
 indus tagus nile danube gleams
 thy progeny long drawn line
 shall marquises counts dukes caesers shine

 xviii
 "captains cavaliers shall spring thee
 knightly lance prudent lore
 shall widowed italy
 ancient praise fame arms restore
 realms lords shall seated
 numa augustus yore
 government benign sage
 shall recreate earth golden age

 xix
 "then heaven duly brought
 fair end thee fitting date
 first bless thy love wrought
 destined young rogero thy mate
 let nothing interpose break thought
 boldly tread path perscribed fate
 let aught stay thee till thief thrown
 thy good lance keeps thee thine own"

 xx
 merlin ceased solemn feat
 melissa might prepare fitting spell
 show bold bradamant aspect meet
 heirs illustrious race swell
 hence many sprites chose seat
 evoked know called hell
 gathered one place bade dame
 various garb guise shadows came

 xxi
 done church called maid
 drawn magic ring wide
 might contain damsel prostrate laid
 full measure palm beside
 head lest spirit invade
 pentacle assurance tied
 bade hold peace stand look
 read schooled demons book

 xxii
 lo forth first cave countless swarm
 presses upon circle's sacred round
 would magic rampart storm
 finds way barred fosse mound
 back rabble turns various form
 thrice bending march wound
 circle troops cave
 stands beauteous urn wizard's grave

 xxiii
 "to tell large puissant acts worth
 name figured sprite
 present eyes birth"
 said sage melissa damsel bright
 "to tell deeds shall act earth
 labour finish night
 hence shall call worthies thy line
 time fair occasion shall combine

 xxiv
 "see yonder firstborn thy noble breed
 well reflects thy fair joyous face
 first thine rogero's seed
 shall plant italy thy generous race
 behold shall distain mead
 good sword blood pontier base
 mighty wrong chastised traitor's guilt
 princely father's blood spilt

 xxv
 "by king desiderius shall pressed
 valiant leader lombard horde
 fiefs calaon este
 imperial charles shall make lord
 hubert thy grandson comes behind best
 italy arms belted sword
 shall defend church barbarous foes
 assure safe repose

 xxvi
 "alberto next unconquered captain see
 whose trophies shall many fanes array
 hugh bold son sire
 shall conquer milan snakes display
 azo next approaching form shall
 good brother dead insubri sway
 lo albertazo whose rede undone
 see berengarius banished son

 xxvii
 "with shall imperial otho join
 wedlock worthily daughter fair
 lo another hugh noble line
 sire succeeded equal heir
 thwarting cause ill design
 shall thrash romans' pride overbear
 shall hands sovereign pontiff take
 third otho leaguer break

 xxviii
 "see fulke brother convey
 italian birthright command
 take mighty dukedom far away
 fair home almayn's northern land
 house saxony shall stay
 prop ruin saving hand
 mother's right shall possess
 progeny maintain bless

 xxix
 "more famed courtesy warlike deed
 azo second next repairs
 bertoldo albertazo seed
 lo father walkes heirs
 parma's walls see germans bleed
 second henry quelled trophy bears
 one renowned story's future page
 next shall wed matilda chaste sage

 xxx
 "his virtues shall deserve fair flower
 age wot common grace
 hold half italy dower
 descendent first henry's race
 rinaldo shall succeed power
 pledge bertoldo's wedded love chase
 fierce frederick barbarossa's hireling bands
 saving church rapacious hands

 xxxi
 "another azo rules verona's town
 fair fields two great chiefs
 one wears papal one imperial crown
 baron marquis ancona style
 show rear gonfalon
 consistory amid file
 task long long tell deed
 achieved rome thy devoted seed

 xxxii
 "see fulke obyson azos hughs
 henrys  mark father boy
 two guelphs first fair umbria's land subdues
 shall spoleto's ducal crown enjoy
 behold princely phantom ensues
 shall turn fair italy's long grief joy
 speak fifth azo thy strain
 shall ezelin quelled slain

 xxxiii
 "fierce ezelin inhuman lord
 shall deemed men child hell
 work evil thinning sword
 ausonia's wasted cities dwell
 rome shall anthony record
 marius sylla nero cajus fell
 fifth azo shall scathe shame
 put frederick second caeser name

 xxxiv
 "he better sceptre well contented
 shall rule city seated streams
 phoebus plaintive lyre lamented
 son illtrusted father's beams
 cygnus spread pinions scented
 amber wept fabling poet dreams
 honour shall church decree
 fit guerdon works valour's fee

 xxxv
 "but laurel brother twine
 aldobrandino carry cheer
 rome otho ghibelline
 troubled capital strikes fear
 make umbri piceni sign
 shame sack cities far near
 hopeless relieve sacred hold
 sue neighbouring florentine gold

 xxxvi
 "and trust noble brother hands
 boasting dearer pledge pact bind
 next victorious o'er german bands
 give triumphant ensigns wind
 afflicted church restore lands
 take due vengeance celano's kind
 die cut manhood's early flower
 beneath banners papal power

 xxxvii
 "he dying leaves brother azo heir
 pesaro fair ancona's reign
 cities 'twixt tronto
 green isauro's stream mount main
 heritage rich rare
 greatness mind faith without strain
 else fortune's mortal state
 virtue soars beyond love hate

 xxxviii
 "in good rinaldo equal worth shall shine
 promise early fire
 hope thine exalted line
 dark fate fortune wreck ire
 alas naples distant shrine
 naples hostage sire
 dirge heard stripling thy race
 young obyson shall fill grandsire's place

 xxxix
 "this lord dominion shall unite
 gay reggio joined modena's bold land
 redoubted valour lend light
 willing people call command
 sixth name azo rears upright
 church's banner noble hand
 fair adria's fief dower shall bring
 child second charles sicilia's king

 xl
 "behold yonder friendly group agreed
 many fair princes illustrious name
 obyson albert famed pious deed
 aldobrandino nicholas lame
 may pass better speed
 faenza conquered feats fame
 adria better held surer gain
 gives title neighbouring main

 xli
 "and fair town whose produce rose
 rose gives name grecian speech
 fishy marshes round enclose
 po's two currents threat double breach
 whose townsmen loath lazy calm's repose
 pray stormy waves may lash beach
 pass mid towns towers countless store
 argenta lugo thousand

 xlii
 "see nicholas tender age
 willing people shall elect lord
 shall laugh scorn civil rage
 rebellious tideus horde
 whose infantine delight shall wage
 mimic fight sweat spear sword
 discipline nurture yields
 shall flourish flower martial fields

 xliii
 "by rebellious plans overthrown
 turned upon rash contriver's head
 stratagem warfare blown
 vainly shall cunning toils spread
 third otho late known
 parma pleasant reggio dread
 shall spoiled sudden strife
 possessions wretched life

 xliv
 "and still fair dominion shall increase
 without wrong spreading bounds augment
 glad subjects violate peace
 unless provoked outrage resent
 hence wealth welfare shall cease
 divine disposer content
 let flourish heavenly love
 celestial spheres revolve

 xlv
 "lo lionel lo borse great kind
 first duke thy fair race realm's delight
 reigns secure shall triumphs find
 peace warlike princes win fight
 struggling fury's hands shall tie behind
 back prison mars removed sight
 fair endeavours bent bless stay
 people sovereign rule obey

 xlvi
 "lo hercules may reproach neighbour
 foot half burnt halting gait slow
 budrio protecting sabre
 saved troops fatal overthrow
 guerdon glorious labour
 distress vex foe
 chased barco hard say
 shine peace martial fray

 xlvii
 "lucania puglia calabria's strand
 shall rumour prowess ring
 shall strive duel hand hand
 gain praise catalonia's king
 wisest captains land
 worth shall class fame actions bring
 fief shall win like valiant knight
 thirty years right

 xlviii
 "to grateful city owes debt
 greatest subjects lord owe
 moves marsh set
 stones ceres' fruitful treasures grow
 shall enlarge bounds yet
 shall fence walls foe
 theatre dome repairs
 beautifies streets goodly squares

 xlix
 "not keeps lordship well defended
 winged lions' claws fierce attacks
 gallic ravage extended
 invader italia sacks
 happy state alone unoffended
 unharassed ungalled toll tax
 blessings recount
 grateful realm shall hercules adore

 l
 "so much shall spring pair
 brothers leagued less love blood
 shall leda's children
 alphonso hippolite good
 twin resigned vital air
 fellow redeem stygian flood
 would gladly spend breath
 brother brave perpetual death

 li
 "in two princes' excellent affection
 happy lieges assurance feel
 noble town protection
 girded twice vulcan's works steel
 alphonso good direction
 justice knowledge love shall deal
 astrea shall appear returned heaven
 low earth varying seasons given

 lii
 "well wisdom shines bright
 good sire's valour less
 since usurping venice arms fight
 full troops scanty numbers press
 know justly hight
 mother stepmother brings new distress
 mother scarce mild
 progue medea child

 liii
 "this chief time soever shall go
 forth faithful crew night day
 water land shame foe
 memorable rout disarray
 late romagna's sons shall know
 led former friends bloody fray
 shall bedew campaign blood
 santern po zaniolus' flood

 liv
 "this shall spaniard know dismay
 'mid bounds papal gold shall gain
 shall bastia win slay
 cruel rage hapless castellain
 city taken shall dearly pay
 crime town retrieved victor slain
 since rescued city groom
 left alive bear news rome

 lv
 " 'tis counsel lance
 shall win honours romagna's plain
 open chivalry france
 victory julius leagued spain
 paunchdeep human blood shall steeds advance
 fierce strife struggle slain
 'mid crowded fields scarce grace supply
 greek italian frank spaniard die

 lvi
 "lo priestly vesture clad crowned
 purple hat conferred hallowed dome
 'tis wise liberal renowned
 hippolitus great cardinal rome
 whose actions shall every region sound
 where'er honoured muse shall find home
 whose glad era indulgent heaven
 augustus' maro given

 lvii
 "his deeds adorn race car
 glorious sun illumes subject earth
 silver moon lesser star
 far others transcends worth
 see captain ill bested war
 go forth afflicted return mirth
 backed foot fewer cavaliers
 homeward barks fifteen gallies steers

 lviii
 "two sigismonds first second see
 alphonso's five good sons succeed
 whose glories spread o'er seas land shall
 first shall wed maid france's seed
 second hercules
 may know every name deed
 hippolitus light shall shine
 wise uncle gilding line

 lix
 "francis third comes next two
 alphonsos  yet say
 thy line branches pursue
 fair virgin would long protract thy stay

 would quench light lamp day

 dismiss shades hold peace"

 lx

 whose precepts spirits bent

 since divine enchantress gave consent
 "and who" cried "that pair sorrowing mien

 thus streaming eyes exclaim'd last
 "ah luckless youths vain illusions fed
 whither wicked men's bad counsel led

 lxii

 many prevailing pity turn scale"
 sad softer tone pursued
 "i press painful tale

 bitter chase sweet

 lxiii
 "soon tomorrow's sun shall gild skies

 long deep woods thy journey lies
 till sea arrived shall bestow
 new instructions future way
 thou shalt need melissa's stay"

 lxiv
 night maid reposes cave

 persuasive voice wizard grave
 rogero's honest love commends
 till vault goes forth virgin brave
 sky rising sun ascends
 path long space obscure either side
 weird woman still faithful guide

 lxv
 gain hidden glen heights inclose
 mountains inaccessible man
 day toil without repose
 precipices frowned torrents ran

 sweet subjects discourse together scan

 rugged road less dismal severe

 canto 4

 argument
 old atlantes suffers fatal wreck
 foiled ring young rogero freed
 soars air till appears speck

 followed love's imperious lead
 rinaldo disembarks british land
 saves genevra doomed stake brand



 though ill mind appear simulation
 quality offends
 'tis plain many situation
 found beneficial ends
 save blame danger vexation
 since converse always friends
 less clear clouded mortal life
 beset snares full envious strife

 ii
 painful proof scarcely find
 real friend various chances sought
 may communicate mind
 keeping watch upon wandering thought
 young rogero's lady kind
 brunello sincere fraught

 good enchantress truly painted

 iii

 watches thievish hands fear doubt
 follows every motion eyes

 "what thing hear" quickly springs

 vi
 "he sometimes towering soars skies
 seems descending skim ground

 vii

 necromancer keeps work spell"
 host relates "of steel fair bright

 canto 5

 argument

 ii

 iii

 iv
 ruffians two
 good rinaldo damsel scared
 conducted valleys view
 none might wot foully snared
 ended damsel fair hue
 tell occasion scathe prepared
 good paladin brought release
 conclusion thus story piece

 v
 "of direr deed ever yet done"
 gentle dame began "sir cavalier
 thebes mycene argos upon

 vi
 "all times shown man still pursued

 vii
 " 'tis fitting know spring

 xi

 xix
 "the passion bore lord preferred
 loved perfect truth heart

 xxi
 "this polinesso many times heard
 scottish baron's name

 despiteful rage hatred turned

 xxii
 "between geneura faithful knight
 discord ill schemed shed
 put betwixt pair foul despite
 time heal quarrel bred
 bringing scandal damsel bright
 stain cleave alive dead
 bent wreck fatal shelf
 counselled

 xxiii
 " `dalinda mine' said project brewed
 dalinda name `you needs must know
 root although trunk hewed
 successive suckers many times grow
 thus unhappy passion renewed
 tenacious still life buds although
 cut ill success new increase
 till compass desire cease

 xxiv
 " `nor hope pleasure much wrought
 compass design would please
 effect least thought
 thrive would interpose little ease
 every time bower sought
 bed geneura slumbers seize
 puts still care
 dress daily wear

 xxv
 " `dispose locks deck
 goes decked cunning heed
 imitate gallery
 furnished corded stair shall speed
 shall ascend phantasy
 wear weed
 hope putting cheat
 short time shall quench amorous heat'

 xxvi
 "so said knight distraught
 beside aware
 design help besought
 manifestly foul snare
 geneura's clothes disguised taught
 let oft used corded stair
 traitor's foul deceit perceived
 deadly mischief achieved

 xxvii
 "the duke ariodantes' ears

 leagued friendship cavaliers
 till rivals pursued common quest
 "i marvel since peers
 must honoured caressed
 held high regard cherished still
 benefits repay ill

 xxviii
 " `i assured comprehend know
 mine geneura's love old accord
 legitimate espousal
 claim lord
 disturb suit bestow
 heart offers reward
 heaven respect claim place
 condition mine mine case'

 xxix
 " `and i' cried ariodantes `marvel more'

 xxii
 king daughter degrees
 sir rinaldo large welcome paid
 next warrior better ease

 xxiii

 taxed utmost powers might
 means charlemagne's disposal lay
 honour empire right
 within days array

 save waxed old would lead

 xxiv
 `nor like consideration would appear
 worthy stop possessed
 son charge cavalier
 measured wit force worthiest
 though within kingdom peer

 would yet preparing band
 return find mustered hand'

 xxv

 treasures levy men steeds

 leaving courteous king england speeds

 xxvi

 till thames' waters waxing bitter meet

 sure channel fair london's seat
 safely mariners course explore

 emperor charles king otho grave
 charles siege paris pressed
 broad commission rinaldo brave

 whole calais' port conveyed

 canto 10

 argument
 another love assails bireno's breast

 next angelica beholds frees



 loves fidelity
 yet proved constant hearts true
 lovers felicity

 truer love present times old

 ii
 many proofs clear
 made apparent zealand lord

 trusty guides round

 sought fruitless care

 xl

 thou brutish sot behold bare

 thou should'st perceive fare"

 should'st thou take sovereign care
 said unhelmed prove true
 single you"

 xli

 "thy morion man let entreat
 till driven folly head
 never like madness meet"

 "but indeed deem suit discreet
 lend thine shall less fit
 haply thee school lack wit"

 xlii
  "fools you" fierce ferrau replied
 "as wear helm delight
 would without casques pride
 already reft despite
 know thus much vow tied

 roaming without till fine casque win
 worn orlando charles's paladin"

 xliii

 wouldst forego casque give
 knight thine arms let thee live"

  sometimes think things unwished

 canto 13

 argument
 count orlando damsel bland
 loves zerbino hears piteous woes
 next puts death felons hand
 pent duke aymon's daughter goes
 seeking rogero large band

 impounds deceived fictions new

 ancient cavaliers right happy
 born age gloomy wood
 valley cave wherein bear
 serpent lion hid savage brood
 could find palace rare
 hardly found judges proved good
 women wit freshest days
 beauty worthily deserve praise

 ii
 told gentle maid
 orlando discovered ground
 asked thither conveyed
 pursuing tale tell drowned

 iii
 "though sure" said "o cavalier

 iv

 daughter gallicia's hapless king

 v

 condemned wretched poor vile

 fitting thee
 first root troubles rehearse

 help thou compassionate sorrow

 vi
 "my father city bayonne
 today twelve months tourney dight
 hence led spreading rumour town

 mid manifest renown
 love deceived sight

 vii
 "when field espied
 performing wondrous feats chivalry
 surprised love ere descried
 freedom love rash guide
 lay unction phantasy
 unseemly place heart possest
 fixed worthiest world best

 viii

 speak common wishes frequently
 could still heart mind unite
 although disjoined one another's sight

 ix
 "hence concluded festal show

 thou know'st love thou well may'st know

 x
 "for different faith forbade side
 saracen christian
 ask father bride
 stealth purposed elope
 amid green fields wealthy town beside
 garden seated sea

 might ocean hills descry

 xi
 "a fitting place effect different creed
 law forbade us esteemed site

 make future life's delight

 leader approved sea land

 xii
 "unable person
 father forced wend
 succour king france lieu

 chosen faithful friends true
 faithful truest friend

 goodly deeds friendship mankind

  thus arrived wished day

 xiv
 "to pitched bark party sped

 slain helpless band

 severed native land
 hoping brief zerbino possess
 cannot tell thee happiness

 xv

 ere squall took us larboard side
 round clear horizon troubled
 stirred tost heavenhigh foaming tide

 starboard larboard boots course

 xvi
 "it steads strike sail lash mast
 lowered gangboard castles fell

 towards pointed rocks rochelle
 save assist us last

 xvii
 "our peril well biscayan note
 tries often evil end
 lowers galley's skiff afloat
 descends makes descend
 two follow troop would throng boat
 first prevent defend
 entrance naked faulchions
 sever rope forthwith put sea

 xviii
 "driven landward shore safely light
 skiff embarked band
 rest split vessel sink outright
 goods seaswallowed upon strand
 eternal love goodness infinite

 xix
 "though left shipboard matters rare
 precious nature gem vest

 dwelling beach appears
 pathway seen footsteps pressed

 xx
 "here fell tyrant love aye prompt range
 faithless every promise still
 watches ever may derange
 mar every reasonable
 converts woeful disastrous change

 "whether desire nursed sea
 dared exhibit

 xxii

 "sir odoric war well taught bred
 gained blows vantage fray

 many prayer glozing flattery taught

 xxvii
 "but vain fixed bent
 rather sate ill desire die

 lord's faith wretch remind

 xxviii

 could hope aid

 xxix

 xxx

 comes aid guise
 homely saw falling pan

 'tis true lost clan
 accursed minds iniquity
 violate person sought
 though nothing good virtuous wrought

 sultan shall sold"

 xxxii
 gentle damsel tale pursues
 sobs sighs oft interposing break

 compassion asp venomed snake

 armed huntingspear bill

 xxxv

 unmarked merchant's books arms shalt buy"
 snatched brand full heat

 xxxvi

 xxxviii

 another head arm leg thigh

 xxxix

 xl

 xli

 xlii

 threading green labyrinth without end

 xliv

 xlv

 xlvi
 time long past lying place
 hoped rogero would appear
 beholding space
 many evil chances lived fear
 one day mid others woeful case
 lady wept alone drew near
 dame healing ring made sound
 bosom rankling alcina's wound

 xlvii
 saw without love returned
 time elapsed mission incomplete
 sore trembling faint pale heart yearned
 scarce strength stand upon feet
 enchantress kind discerned
 fear advanced smiles maid meet
 console glad visage wore
 messenger joyful tidings bore

 xlviii
 "fear thy rogero well
 safe cried ever worships thee
 wonted thy foe wizard fell
 yet deprives liberty
 behoves thee climb sell
 would'st thou posses follow
 thou wendest lead
 whither thee rogero shall freed"

 xlix
 next pursued relating
 frauds magic atlantes hoar
 wearing fair face seemed thrall

 told dames cavaliers cheats
 thither make resort like deceits

 l
 seeing sage think see squire
 companion ladylove absent friend
 whatever several wight's desire
 since scope wishes never tend
 hence searching every tire
 labour sore frustrate end
 cannot desire hope deceive
 without missing good palace leave

 li
 "as soon thou pursued dame art near
 place built magic seat
 resembling thy rogero cheer
 every look atlantes thee shall meet
 make ill art appear
 suffering stronger arm defeat
 thou may'st aid peril feigned
 thus among others detained

 lii
 "to end thou may'st escape ambush
 many many thus betrayed
 fallen though rogero seem beware
 lend faith demand thine aid
 sage presents forbear
 take worthless life lifted blade
 think slay rogero blow
 works thee still cruel woe

 liii
 "hard seem slay full well know
 wight rogero descry
 truth lying show
 trust sight magic blears eye
 fix ere forest go
 change traitorous foe nigh
 never shall rogero wive
 weakly wizard leave alive"

 liv
 valorous maid intent slay
 false enchanter plan decides
 snatches arms follows way
 melissa sage confides
 thus fruitful field forest gray
 forced journeys enchantress guides
 studies beguile weary course
 ever best may sweet discourse

 lv
 fairest topic
 might grateful damsel's ear
 future offspring rogero's chose
 race demigods prince peer
 melissa secrets knows
 eternal gods rule sphere
 good enchantress discover
 many ages hence befall

 lvi
 "oh best guide" exclaimed damsel bold
 weirdwoman aid came
 "as thou hast many years foretold
 men shall glorify race name
 pray thee lady unfold
 praise virtues noble dame
 lineage shall rise"
 melissa courteously replies

 lvii
 "chaste dames thee descended survey
 mothers wear imperial crown
 mighty kings column stay
 glorious realms houses renown
 thy sons shine arms
 less fame deserve female gown
 piety sovereign prudence graced
 noble hearts incomparably chaste

 lviii
 "and length relate thee
 praise thy root ascend
 long tale would hold see
 could pass fame pretend
 thousand two three
 choose tale may end
 cave thy wish made known

 lix
 "to hear one thy famed race prepare
 liberal studies good works engage

 may entitled chaste sage

 glorious rays day night

 lx
 "where worthiest consort strain

 'tis said gauls delivered italy

 lxi

 lxvi

 canto 14

 argument
 two squadrons lack muster
 king agramant single roland slain
 hence furious mandricardo full wonder
 envy seeks count hill plain
 next joys doralice plunder

 paris assaulted moor



 many fierce assault conflict dread
 'twixt spain afric gallic foe
 countless slain whose bodies fed

 forced champaigne country forego
 paynims purchased cost
 good princes bold barons lost

 ii
 bloody price victory
 small ground left triumphs prepare
 unconquered duke alphonso
 may modern things ancient deeds compare
 battle whose illustrious palm may
 well worthily assigned wear
 whose remembrance sad ravenna trembles
 aye shall weep loss field resembles

 iii
 calesians picards yielding

 stormed almost victorious flags spain

 iv
 glorious hearts slow
 follow far gorgeous oak
 seized shook golden acorns

 festive laurels owe

 fabricius preserved rome

 v
 rome's mighty column valiant hand
 taken kept entire praise shed
 predatory band
 routed single valour bled
 flocked fat ravenna's land
 masterless without banner fled
 arragon castile navarre
 vain lance cannon's thundering car

 vi
 dearbought victory brought relief
 joy event much outweighed
 loss french captain chief
 dead fatal field surveyed
 swallowed one storm grief
 many glorious princes arrayed
 safeguard neighbouring lands
 poured frozen alps friendly bands

 vii
 present safety life held fear
 see assured us victory
 saved us wintry tempest drear
 would whelmed us jove's angry sky
 ill rejoice yet tear
 standing full many widow's eye
 weeping attired sable vents
 throughout grieving france loud laments

 viii
 'tis meet king lewis find new supplies
 chiefs troops may arrayed

 hands rapaciously preyed
 brethren black white shameful wise
 outraged sister mother wife maid

 ix

 thine faenza warn rimini

 tell ills license still bred
 heaping ample italy dead

 lxiii

 lxiv

 lxv

 lxvi

 unless 'tis made aids arrive

 lxvii

 lxviii

 lxix

 lxx
 "and suffer thy
 due penance undergo

 thine enemies deal blow

 us deemed thy friends paynim foe

 lxxi
 "and one faithless found thy sway
 hundred shall throughout world rebel
 false babel's law way
 thus thy blessed faith put quell
 defend thy suffering people
 purged thy tomb heathen hounds fell
 many times oft foes offended
 thy holy church vicars defended

 lxxii
 "that deserts unfitting place
 i' scale mighty debt know

 aid gift redeeming grace

 mind thy saving mercy bear"

 lxxiii
 spake holy emperor aloud
 humbleness heart deep contrition
 added prayers withal vowed
 fitted great needs high condition
 supplication disallowed
 good genius hears king's petition
 best seraphs spreads wings
 saviour's feet offering brings

 lxxiv

 like couriers godhead's ear
 borne blessed spirits heard
 together gazed pitying cheer
 eternal loving lord stirred

 christian people seeking aid

 lxxv

 never sought faithful heart eye

 seek christian host crost main

 lxxvi
 "find silence first bid part
 emprize attend thee thy side
 since quest happiest art
 know fitting provide
 next sojourns instantly impart
 discord command supplied
 steel tinder 'mid paynims go
 fire flame encampment blow

 lxxvii
 "and throughout among said
 mightiest spread strife
 together may contend dead
 remain hurt taken fray
 leave camp wrath led
 yield sovereign little stay"
 nothing blessed wingedone replies
 swoops descending starry skies

 lxxviii
 where'er angel michael turns wing
 clouds scattered sky turns bright
 person forms golden ring
 see summer lightning gleam night
 courier heavenly king
 thinks way may best alight
 intent find foe speech
 first high behest would teach

 lxxix
 upon thought posting angel brooded
 sought used dwell
 thinking much last concluded
 find church convent cell
 social speech mode excluded
 silence cloistered brethren swell
 anthems sleep sit
 meat everywhere fine writ

 lxxx
 weening shall find plies
 greater speed plumes gilded scale
 deems well peace guested lies
 charity quiet without fail
 finds deceived surmise
 soon past cloister's pale
 silence 'tis said found
 longer except writing ground

 lxxxi
 love peace surveys
 piety quiet humility
 dwelt 'twas ancient days
 chased hence avarice anger gluttony
 pride envy sloth cruelty amaze

 narrowly hideous squadron eyed
 discord amid rest espied

 lxxxii
 even eternal sire well
 found silence bade repair
 believed avernus' cell
 harboured damned must fare
 discerned hell
 would believe amid mass prayer
 strange michael thought see enshrined
 believed must go far find

 lxxxiii
 partycoloured vest knew
 unequal strips many formed gown
 opening walk wind blew
 showed hid unsown
 hair appeared strife hue
 like silver like gold black brown
 part tress riband part comprest
 shoulders flowed breast

 lxxxiv
 examinations summons store
 writs letters attorney
 hearings hands bosom bore
 consultation authority
 weapons substance poor
 never safe walled city
 behind wait
 attorney notary advocate

 lxxxv
 michael calls give command
 among strongest paynims go
 find occasion whence amid band
 warfare memorable scathe may grow
 next silence makes demand
 motions easily might know
 one one land hied
 kindling scattering fire either side

 lxxxvi
 "i recollect ever viewed
 anywhere" quoth discord reply
 "but oft heard mentioned shrewd
 greatly commended general cry
 fraud makes one multitude
 sometimes kept company
 think furnish news thee
 and" pointing finger "that she"

 lxxxvii
 pleasing mien grave walk decent vest
 fraud rolled eyeballs humbly head
 benign modest speech possest
 might gabriel seem ave said
 foul deformed rest
 mantle long widely spread
 concealed hideous parts evermore
 beneath stole poisoned dagger wore

 lxxxviii
 good archangel made demand
 way search silence pursue
 said "he virtues scanned
 dwelt elsewhere aye guested crew
 benedict blest elias' band
 abbeys conventcells new
 whilom schools long time pass
 sage archytas pythagorus

 lxxxix
 "but philosophers saints yore
 extinguished former stay
 good habits used
 passed evil ones began stray
 changing life night lovers bore
 thieves company sinned every way
 oftentimes consorts treason
 even beheld leagued murther

 xc
 "with coiners oftentimes may see
 harbour obscure close repair
 oft changes home company
 light would fortune rare
 yet hope point thee
 sleep's house thou wilt midnight fare
 wilt thou surely find repose
 night ever harbour goes"

 xci
 though fraud alway wont deal lies
 like simple truth appears say
 angel yields tale belief flies
 forth monastery without delay
 tempers speed schemes withal wise
 finish appointed time way
 house sleep mansion blind
 full well knew silence may find

 xcii
 blest arabia lies pleasant vale
 removed village city's reach
 two fair hills o'ershadowed dale
 full ancient fir sturdy beech
 thither circling sun without avail
 conveys cheerful daylight breach
 rays make boughs spread thickly round
 cave runs ground

 xciii
 beneath shadow forest deep
 rock runs grotto wide
 widely wandering ivysuckers creep
 cavern's entrance multiplied
 harboured within grot lies heavy sleep
 ease corpulent gross upon side
 upon sloth earth made seat
 cannot go hardly keeps feet

 xciv
 mindless oblivion gate found
 lets none enter agnizes none
 message hears bears ground
 without distinction chases every one
 silence plays scout walks round
 equipt shoes felt mantle brown
 motions distance meet
 circuit dim retreat

 xcv
 angel approaches quietly
 " 'tis god's bidding" whispers ear
 "that thou rinaldo company
 brought sovereign's aid paris steer
 thou deed silently
 saracen cry shall hear
 army come upon foe
 ere fame arrival know"

 xcvi
 silence otherwise replied
 signing head obeyed
 took post behind heavenly guide
 one flight picardy conveyed
 angel moved bands valour tried
 short tedious distance made
 paris safe transports none
 conscious miracle done

 xcvii
 silence advancing troop kept skirting round
 front flank rear array
 band spread mist profound
 everywhere beside 'twas lightsome day
 impeding fog shrilling sound
 horn heard without trumpet's bray
 next hostile paynims went find
 know made deaf blind

 xcviii
 haste band rinaldo led
 angel well might seem guide
 silence moved nought said
 heard upon paynim side
 king agramant infantry spread
 throughout fair paris' suburbs beside
 foss underneath walls day
 make upon place worst assay

 xcix
 moorish monarch's force would tell
 charlemagne day meet
 wooded apennine might count well
 trees upon back waves beat
 time troubled waters highest swell
 mauritanian atlas' feet
 watch midnight many eyes
 furtive works lovers heaven espies

 c
 larumbells loudsounding air
 stricken frequent blows town affray
 crowded temples every
 movement lips hands upraised pray
 seen treasure seemed god fair
 foolish thoughts upon day
 holy consistory bid mould
 every statue upon earth gold

 ci
 lamenting may heard aged
 reserved woe
 calling happy sacred dust
 buried many many year ago
 bold youths valiant robust
 small thought upon approaching ills bestow
 scorning elders' counsel
 hurrying fury walls repair

 cii
 might paladin baron ken
 king duke marquis count chivalry
 soldier foreigner citizen
 ready honour christ die
 eager assail saracen
 charlemagne lower bridges cry
 witnesses joy martial beat
 permit sally deems meet

 ciii
 ordered convenient post
 advance barbarians impede
 would ill suffice numerous host
 content speed
 worked machines wildfire tost
 ranged according separate need
 charles never one place restless care

 civ
 paris seated spacious plain
 i' midst  heart france justly say
 stream flows forth
 first passing waters stray
 island form secure main
 better part dividing way
 two three separate quarters note
 within river girds without moat

 cv
 town whose walls miles circuit run
 might well attacked many side
 yet would assail one
 willingly scattered troops divide
 westward beyond stream troyano's son
 retired thence assailing bands guide
 neither city plain
 behind far spain

 cvi
 where'er walls paris wound
 large ammunition king charles purveyed
 strengthening dyke quarter held doubt
 within trench drain casemate made
 river entered went
 thickest chains across channel laid
 prudent cares appear
 greatest cause present fear

 cvii

 cix

 cx

 cxi

 mighty masses whole bulwarks fall
 top tower huge piece bastion

 insufferably advancing paynims gall

 cxii

 cxvii
 'tis thus 'mid fire ruin assay
 mount wall others assure
 safer passage seek
 least pain peril endure
 rodomont scorns way

 desperate case others made
 offerings cursed god prayed

 cxviii

 cxx

 cxxii

 canto 15

 argument
 round paris every spread
 assailing hosts africa spain
 astolpho home logistilla sped
 binds first caligorantes chain
 next orrilo's trunk divides head
 sir aquilant warred vain
 gryphon bold next sansonet discerns
 ill tidings lady gryphon learns



 though conquest fruit skill fortune
 conquer always glorious thing
 'tis true indeed bloody victory
 chief less honour wont bring
 fair field famed eternally
 wins merits worshipping
 saving harm without
 loss followers puts foe rout

 ii
 sir earned worthy praise o'erbore
 lion might sea
 guarded either shore
 francolino mouth po
 though yet heard roar
 present fear forego
 fields fitly made plain
 rescued foemen slain

 iii
 paynim little skilled
 daring proper loss
 moat impelled meiny
 one perished burning fosse
 mighty gulf contained crew
 devouring sought cross
 dust flame reduced room
 might within crowded tomb

 iv
 twenty thousand warriors thither sent
 died nineteen thousand fiery pit
 fosse descended ill content
 leader willed little wit
 extinguished amid blaze spent
 devouring flame christians lit
 rodomont occasion woes
 exempted mighty mischief goes

 v
 inner bank foes possest
 across ditch vaulted wonderously
 within among rest
 sure last assault eye
 turns wildfires infest
 infernal vale sees ascend high
 hears people's moan dying screams
 imprecations dread heaven blasphemes

 vi
 band king agramant brought
 make fierce assault upon gate
 cruel battle fought
 wherein many sufferers met fate
 haply unprovided thought
 fitting guard upon monarch wait
 king bambirago 'mid knights price
 baliverso sink every vice

 vii
 corineus mulga prusion
 wealthy monarch blessed isles
 malabuferzo fills throne

 naked base whose hearts martial fields
 found shelter thousand shields

 viii

 person girded gallant crew

 ix
 inferior count withal horde
 lombards french germans without end
 every one presence lord
 rank among valiantest contend
 another place record
 mighty duke perforce attend
 signs far prays
 omit history

 x
 'tis time measure back way
 thither astolpho left yore
 long exile loathing stay
 burnt desire tread native shore
 hopes given sober fay
 quelled alcina better lore
 care would send warrior back
 securest freest track

 xi
 thus barque fitted
  better galley never ploughed sea

 till arabian sea beneath care

 xii

 coast nabataean reign
 content round veer

 angry winds aye vex rude domain

 months together light none

 xiii

 license depart prudent fay

 might charms stayed

 useful book fair purveyed
 ever love wear prayed

 xv

 wheresoe'er 'tis heard fly fear

 xvi

 land thomas pilot veers
 ready tiller northward steers

 xvii

 marks coasts wealthy land ease

 makes distant cochin favouring wind
 issues beyond boundaries ind

 xviii

  could wight loosed indian strand

 xix

 "know earth girt seas
 one another yield supplies
 whether circling waters boil freeze
 since aethiops' land us lies
 extending southward many long degrees
 across waters one supposed
 barrier neptune interposed

 xx
 "hence bark levant ind none
 weighs shape course europe's shore
 navigates europe one
 oriental regions explore
 fain retrace alike course begun
 mid land extending wide
 weening limits length appear
 must join another hemisphere

 xxi
 "but course circling years view
 farthest lands catch western ray
 new argonauts put forth tiphys new
 opening till undiscovered way
 others see coast afric pursue
 far negroes' burning shore
 pass far sign whence return
 sun moves hither leaving capricorn

 xxii
 "and find limit length land
 makes single sea appear two
 scouring frigates every strand
 pass ind arab isles persian
 others see leave either hand

 manner circling sun
 seek new lands new creations run

 xxiii
 "the imperial flags holy cross know
 fixed verdant shore see upon
 shattered barks keep guard others go
 afield new countries
 ten chase thousand flying foe

 xxiv
 "that way hidden god's
 old ere 'twas known long time run
 suffer discovery till
 sixth seventh century done

 justest fraught prudent lore
 emperors since augustus

 left bank rhine monarch bred
 sovereign famed history
 whose goodly deeds heard read
 astraea reinthroned 
 rather restored life long seeming dead
 virtues exile sent
 shall recalled banishment

 "for desert heaven's bounty alone
 designs imperial garland bear 
 augustus' trajan's mark's severus' crown

 extends yet unknown

 wills time christ's scattered sheep
 one flock beneath one shepherd's keep

 writ skies eternity

 xliii

 pursued hermit bloody seat

 lxi

 memphis renowned pyramids sight
 marks populous cairo opposite

 lxii

 see drag unmeasured wight along

 lxiv

 lxv

 lxvi

 lxvii

 lxviii
 necromancer say
 truth vantage side begun

 lxx

 lxxi

 lxxii
 two ladies meetly clad fair array
 one damsel black one white
 occasion fray
 stood gaze upon cruel fight
 either benignant fay
 whose care nourished one knight
 oliver's children babes forlorn
 claws two huge birds torn

 lxxiii
 since gismonda conveyed
 borne distance native sky
 say needless since displaid
 whole world history
 though author father's name missaid
 one another know
 mistaking fearful strife pair
 warriors waged ladies' prayer

 lxxiv
 though noon happy islands day
 vanished clime displaced night
 underneath moon's uncertain ray
 illdiscerned things hid sight
 fort orrilo took way
 since sable sister white
 pleased furious battle defer
 till new sun horizon stir

 lxxv

 sight many vigorous blow

 baron pard styled court

 lxxvi
 ladies repose warriors led
 fair palace near sumptuous seat
 thence issuing courtly squire damsel sped
 lit torches midway meet
 goodly steeds quit well bested
 put arms garden sweet
 discern ready supper duly laid
 fast refreshing fountain played

 lxxvii
 bid bind giant green
 fasttethered strong weighty chain
 tough oak whose ancient trunk ween
 may well proof single strain
 ten good serjeants overseen
 lest night get loose train
 assault haply harm careless
 without guard unsuspecting lay

 lxxviii
 abundant sumptuous board
 costly viands least pleasure fraught
 longest topic discourse afford
 orrilo's prowess marvel wrought
 head arm dissevered sword
 upon recent wonder thought
 might think dream see reunite
 return furious fight

 lxxix
 astolpho book found exprest
 prescribed remedy spell
 one hair deprived pest
 could battle hope quell
 plucked sheared breast
 parforce felon's spirit would expell
 says volume instructs
 'mid locks thickly set find hair

 lxxx
 duke less hope conquest glows
 palm already
 hopes small expense blows
 pluck hair wizardwight undone
 hence youthful pair propose
 burden enterprize upon
 take orrilo slay
 two brethren nought intent gainsay

 lxxxi
 willingly yield emprize
 assured toil bestowed vain
 new aurora climbs skies
 walls orrilo plain
 drops  strife begins  orrilo plies
 mace duke sword 'mid rain
 strokes would body one blow
 divorce spirit enchanted foe

 lxxxii
 together mace lops fist
 arm falls ground
 sometimes cleaves corslet's iron twist
 piecemeal shares maims felon round
 orrilo reunites portions missed
 found champagne sound
 though hundred fragments hewed
 astolpho sees thought renewed

 lxxxiii

 one stroke shoulders
 chin lopt away helm head
 lights duke less swiftly foe
 grasps hair defiled gore red
 springs moment horse lo
 upstream along nile's margin hies
 thief cannot retake prize

 lxxxiv

 searching dust find head
 heard charger retreat
 forest plunder fled

 duke borne mouth away

 lxxxv

 borne heels pursues flowing rein

 lxxxvi

 straiter crisper rest seen

 since scissors lacked razor keen
 wanting resorted glaive

 lxxxvii
 holding nose severed head
 closesheared behind eke
 found among rest fatal thread

 turned eyes signals sore dread

 shuddered last courser fell

 c

 ci

 ciii

 evermore bemoaned day night
 whatever pleasure wight pursues

 ashamed grief tell

  bad women worst

 canto 16

 argument

 love's penalties manifold dread
 endured greater part
 cost well read
 speak 'twere art
 hence say ever said
 speech living page thoughts impart
 "one ill grievous another light"
 yield belief deem judgment right

 ii
 say said live say
 "he fettered worthy chain
 though desire lady gainsay
 every way averse suit disdain
 though love deprive praised pay
 long time trouble spent vain
 heart placed well worthily
 needs lament though waste die"

 iii
 let lament plays slavish part
 two bright eyes lovely tresses please
 beneath beauties lurks wanton heart
 little pure much lees
 wretch would fly bears dart
 like wounded stag whichever way flees
 dares confess yet cannot quench flame
 worthless love shame

 iv

 sees error cannot right
 sees vilely heart place

 free subdued appetite

 city secret rode

 canto 17

 argument
 charles goes king rodomont
 gryphon norandino's tournament
 mighty deeds martano turns front
 showing recreant natural bent
 next gryphon bring affront
 stole knight arms went
 hence kindly monarch much esteemed
 gryphon scorned martano deemed



 god outraged rank iniquity
 whenever crimes past remission's bound
 mercy may justice mingled
 monstrous destructive tyrants crowned
 gifted force subtlety
 sinful world punish confound
 marius sylla end nursed
 rome two neros caius cursed

 ii
 domitian latter antonine
 lifted lowest rabble's lees
 imperial place puissance maximine
 hence thebes cruel creon bent knees
 mezentius ruled subject agiline
 fattening fields blood pests like
 italy given later day
 lombard goth hun bleeding prey

 iii
 shall fierce attila say
 wicked ezzeline hundreds
 men still trod crooked way
 god sent pain torment sore
 made clear assay
 well lived days yore
 consigned ravening wolves ordained keep
 us illnurturing unuseful sheep

 iv
 served fill
 hungry maw invite foreign wood
 beyond mountain wolves greedier
 partakers food
 bones thrasymene trebbia fill
 cannae seem strewed
 fattened field bank way
 adda mella ronco tarro stray

 v
 god permits feel spite
 people haply worse
 errors multiplied infinite
 foul pestilent iniquity
 time come may ill requite
 upon shores shall better
 transgressions ever prove
 long endurance aeternal love

 vi
 christian people god's placid front
 must disturbed excesses sore
 since slaughter rape rapine hunt
 quarters plundering turk moor
 unsparing rage rodomont
 proves worse ills endured
 said charlemagne made repair
 search towards city square

 vii
 charles way people's butchery
 beholds  burnt palaces ruined fanes 
 sees large portion city lie
 unexampled wreck  "ye coward trains
 whither heartless panic would ye fly
 none loss contemplate remains
  place refuge say left
 shamefully reft

 viii
 "then shall one man alone prisoned foe
 cannot scale walls round spread
 unscathed unquestioned city go
 vengeful arm laid dead"
 thus charlemagne whose veins anger glow
 shame strong brook fury said
 spacious square made good way
 beheld foe people slay

 ix
 thither large portion populace
 climbing palace roof made resort
 strongly walled furnished place
 ammunition long support
 rodomont mad pride chace
 scared burghers singly cleared court
 one daring hand scorned world
 brandished sword  wildfire hurled

 x
 smote thundered 'mid fearful shower
 sublime royal house's gate
 life's peril crumbling roof tower
 tost summit wait
 fears ruin hall bower
 wood stone endure one common fate
 marbled column slab gilded beam
 sire grandsire held high esteem

 xi
 rodomont stands portal bright
 steel head bust secured mail
 like serpent issued light
 cast slough diseased stale
 ever joying might
 renewed youth proud polished scale
 darts three tongues fire flashing eyes
 every frighted beast flies

 xii
 bulwark stone arbalest bow
 upon paynim smote beside
 sufficed arrest sanguinary foe
 broke hewed shook portal wide
 fury let daylight
 'twas easy espy  might spied 
 visages o'ercast deathlike sort
 full people palace court

 xiii
 fair chambers echoed shouts dread
 feminine lament dame distrest
 grieving house pale women fled
 wept afflicted sore beat breast
 hugged doorpost genial bed
 soon stranger lords possest
 matter state peril hung
 thither came king peers among

 xiv
 charles turned round vigorous hand
 found former peril true
 "are erst stand
 'gainst agolant aspramont
 vigour spent said band
 troyano almontes slew
 hundreds fear face
 one blood race

 xv
 "why contest foe
 less strength behold might
 upon hound pursued monarch show
 hound preys man  generous sprite
 thought death  approach fast slow 
 dies well holds cheap light
 doubt fortune ill
 succour conquered still"

 xvi
 said spurred courser couched spear
 charged paynim life less free
 sir ogier joined king career
 namus oliver three
 avino avolio otho berlinghier
 one without rest never see
 bosom flanks front
 smote together king rodomont

 xvii
 let us sir love heaven forego
 anger death noisome lore
 deemed said enow
 saracen
 cruel strong 'tis time trace go
 gryphon left origille
 damascus' gate came
 adulterer brother dame

 xviii
 cities eastern skies
 wealthy populous fairly dight
 'tis said damascus distant lies
 salem seven days' journey fair site
 fertile plain abundant fruits supplies
 winter summer sojourn delight
 shading city dawning day
 mountain intercepts early ray

 xix
 two crystal streams wealthy city scower
 whose currents parted many rill
 infinite gardens never bare flower
 stript leaf grateful murmur fill
 'tis said perfumed waters power
 plenteously swell turn mill
 whoever wander streets
 scent issuing home cloud sweets

 xx
 highstreet gay signs triumph wore
 covered showy cloths different dye
 deck walls sylvan leaves store
 scented herbs upon pavement lie
 adorned every window every door
 carpeting finest drapery
 ladies fair richly drest
 costly jewels gorgeous vest

 xxi
 within city gates frolic sport
 many seen ply festive dance
 burghers better sort
 upon gay welltrapt coursers prance
 fairer show remains sumptuous court
 barons bold vassals advance
 garnished could procured ore
 pearl ind erythraean shore

 xxii
 forward sir gryphon pricked array
 surveying whole ease
 knight arrested way
 wont natural courtesies
 obliged beneath palaceroof stay
 let nought wanting might please
 chearfully guests bath restored
 next welcomed costly supperboard

 xxiii
 told norandino hight
 damascus syria's kingdom swayed
 native foreigner bade invite
 sword knighthood laid
 fair joust morrow's light
 ensuing square made
 might show without faring
 valour equal bearing

 xxiv
 gryphon though came joust see
 accepts challenge cavalier
 occasion serves cannot
 evil use make worth appear
 questioned solemnity
  'twere wonted feast held every year
 new emprise martial course
 monarch would assay warriors' force 

 xxv
 "the gorgeous feast monarch display
 fourth succeeding moon" baron said
 "this first survey
 none held beside cause bred
 solemn usage day
 king sovereign peril saved head
 four months consumed doleful wise
 'mid tears groans death eyes

 xxvi
 "our monarch named king norandine
 fully matter recite
 many many year pine
 damsels fair bright
 king cyprus' daughter fine
 espoused bride dame knight
 wait upon home fair array
 towards syrian realm shaped way

 xxvii
 "but scoured fell carpathian sea
 flowing sheet distance shore
 storm assailed us cruelty
 tempest even scared pilot hoar
 drifting three days nights random
 devious course 'mid threatening waves explore
 wet weary land 'mid verdant hills
 wellshaded refreshing rills

 xxviii
 "we pavilions pitch 'mid groves
 joyfully strain awnings overhead
 kitchens construct rustic stoves
 carpets intended banquet spread
 meanwhile neighbouring vale monarch roves
 secret wood scarce pervious tread
 seeking red deer goat fallowbuck doe
 following two servants bear bow

 xxix
 "while much solace seated round
 chace expect lord's return
 approaching us along shore astound
 orc fearful monster discern
 god grant fair sir never may confound
 eyesight semblance foul stern
 better fame hear
 behold approaching near

 xxx
 "to calculate griesly monster's height
 measureless exceeds skill
 fungushue place orbs sight
 sockets two small bones like berries fill
 towards us say speeds outright
 along shore seems moving hill
 tusks jutting like savage swine shows
 breast drivel foul pointed nose

 xxxi
 "running monster comes bears snout
 guise brach enters trail
 behold fly helpless rout
 wherever terror drives visage pale
 'tis little comfort without
 eyesight winds plunder gale
 better aught possest scent sight
 wing plume needed flight

 xxxii
 "some make little gain
 flying swifter pest
 south wind forty ten pain
 swimming aboard bark safety rest
 arm wretches train
 packed empty left lap breast
 loaded capacious scrip beside
 like shepherd's waist tied

 xxxiii
 "us den sightless monster carried
 hollowed within rock upon shore
 snowy marble cavern quarried
 white leaf unstained inky score

 marked grief pain visage wore
 wife maid numerous court
 fair foul every age sort

 xxxiv
 "large grotto near
 almost upon summit rock
 another cavern contrived rear
 weather fend woolly flock
 still herded changeful year
 numerous hard count stock
 wont due season pen loose
 play shepherd sport use

 xxxv
 "the flesh man savoured sheep
 reached cave seen
 three youths ere yet climbed steep
 alive rather swallowed clean
 moved stone closed cavern deep
 lodged us pasture green
 flock led wont meads among
 sounding pipe neck hung

 xxxvi
 "our lord meanwhile returning strand
 loss suffered comprehends
 deep silence upon every hand
 empty tent hut monarch wends
 robbed understand
 full terror beach descends
 whence sailors offing sees
 unmoor spread canvas breeze

 xxxvii
 "as soon norandino view
 launched sent pinnace convey
 monarch thence sooner knew
 fell orc made prey
 without thought would pursue
 follow wheresoe'er bent way
 lose lucina cruel pain
 life loathsome save regain

 xxxviii
 "when newly printed sand eyes
 norandine fixt swiftness sped
 rage love man supplies
 reached cave said
 enduring greater agonies
 e'er suffered await dread
 orc deem every sound hear
 famished brute reappear

 xxxix
 "the monarch cave fortune guide
 orc's wife alone lair

 `should orc take thee'  `woeful every
 cannot choose be' king replied
 `whether take miss kill spare
 hither chance wandered
 come desire beside wife die'

 xxx

 orc taken shore

 future safety dread
 orc flesh woman never fed

 xli
 " `of may behold proof
 dames dwell
 orc offends
 depart ever caverned cell
 vainly would prison flee
 hopes peace pardon tyrant fell

 xlii

 females males severed

 lest women slay others' lot

 sure greedy orc make prey

 xliii

 lady content thyself hear
 danger life

 go love heaven son lest thee

 subtle scent wind mouse'

 xliv

  seeing nothing supply
 fitted shake purpose peer

 pursued pains wits

 xlv

 suet members pay
 drove natural scent away

 xlvi
 "and thought imbibed smell
 rank goat exhales took hide
 made creep shaggy fell
 well covered mantle wide
 strange disguise cell
 crawling command guide
 prisoned stone retreat
 hid beauteous lady's visage sweet

 xlvii
 "kin norandine bid took ground
 cavern greensward laid
 might enter flock wound
 homeward longing sore till evening stayed
 eve hears hollow elder's sound
 upon whose pipes wonted tune played
 calling sheep pasture rock
 fell swain stalked behind flock

 xlviii
 "think heart trembling core
 norandino hears approaching strains
 advancing cavern door
 sight terrific face sustains
 fear shook pity moved
 see loves well feigns
 orc removed stone unbarred cote
 king entered amid sheep goat

 xlix
 "his flock housed us orc descended
 first care cavern door close
 scented ended

 remembrance meal offended
 makes tremble yet done goes

 casts folds lady breast

 l
 "whereas pleasure descry
 seeing suffers grief pain
 sees thither arrived die
 cannot hinder slain
 ` "twas small joy 'mid woes that'
 exclaimed lucina 'here sustain

 hither brought monster's prey

 li
 " `for though find leave
 life bitter afflict sore
 common instinct grieve
 whether thee

 assure thyself thy death pain
 mine' thus dame persists moan
 norandino's danger

 lii

 `to save thee thy followers every one
 cannot better dead
 living without light thee sun
 trust scape hither spied
 ye shall done
 compass design shrink
 imbue bodies loathsome stink'

 liii
 "the trick told wherewith monster's smell
 cheat first wife told
 case cloathe us fell
 may feel issueing fold
 many men women cell
 slay persuaded monarch bold
 many goats number square
 stink oldest

 liv
 "we smeared bodies fruitful grease
 round fat intestines lay

 viewed shepherd dawning ray
 giving breath sonorous reeds

 lv
 "he held hand opened lair
 lest herd issued den
 stopt us short feeling wool hair
 upon bodies let us go
 strange device rescued
 cloathed shaggy fleeces dames men
 issuing thence monster kept
 till thither sore alarmed lucina crept

 lvi

 like us others loathed smear
  whether slower gait went

 known well inform

 lvii
 "so intent case
 another's danger eyes

 force cavern retrace

 verdant mountains pleasant meads

 lviii

 secure saw beaked orc asleep

 unless faithful consort regained

 lix

 saw prisoned cave alone
 orc's wide throat
 spring grief reason overthrown
 advanced even monster's snout
 little scaped grinding stone
 yet hope detained amid flock
 trusting bear lucina rock

 lx

 brings herd finds us stall
 knows must supperless remain

 looks pines  cannot die

 ever unhappy lover might survey

 could thing assist wife

 lxii

 gradasso agrican's redoubted son

 lxiv

 lxv

 near egypt turkey afric lay

 lxx

 lxxi

 provided landlord's courtesy

 lxxii

 better see martial gallants ride

 cruel kind revealed

 lxxiii
 syrians' practise age
 arm fashion west
 haply sprung vicinage

 god incarnate presence blest

 wretched christians heathen hounds profane

 lxxiv

 furtherance holy faith true
 other's breast spear advance

 lxxv

  speak catholic hight

 fairest portion world possest

 lxxvi
 thou spain hast thou fruitful afric nigh
 sooth offended
 italy yet scathe high
 noble enterprize wilt thou give o'er
 alas thou sleepest drunken italy
 every vice crime fetid sewer
 grievest handmaid obey
 turn nations owned thy sway

 lxxvii

 switzer thee lombardy convey
 thou among people dost crave

 turk ready wealth across wave
 drive europe greece away

 feed thy hunger nobly fall

 lxxviii

 say say thee wealth o' west
 constantine brought rome 
 brought choicest gave away rest 
 golden hermus pactolus

 many tales many praises note

 lxxix

 keys paradise weighty care

 lxxx

 one topic stray

 lxxxix
 pursue brindled beast ten

 princes present fair array

 xc

 thinks knight's disgrace

 c

 cii

 cxxii

 eternal gods truly swear

 wont make fellows share

 cxxiii
 vessel filthy vices
 made answer "mighty sir cannot say
 stranger fell

 deemed warlike semblance led astray

 cxxiv
 "which moved little lacked

 put case ply

 cxxv
 "whose former fellowship appears stain

 princely deed worthy praise"

 cxxvi
 voucher origilla
 well without sign purpose read
 "i deem not" cried king "his works bad
 cost stranger knight head
 enough people glad
 penance weighty sin" said
 quickly called baron crew
 enjoined deed

 cxxvii

 citygate descending
 collects troop attempt prepares
 waiting coming cavalier
 surprises unawares

 detains mockery scorn

 cxxviii

 uplifted ancient nurse's breast
 beginning upon alpine regions bare
 chase shades gild mountaincrest
 martan' fearing gryphon might declare
 wrong king truth attest
 retorting upon slander cast
 took leave thence upon journey past

 cxxix
 ready wit fit excuse supplies
 stays see recreant shown
 gifts beside prize
 rewarded victory
 letters patent drawn ample wise
 wherein lofty honours wide blown
 let depart promise shall meet
 guerdon worthy treacherous feat

 cxxx
 gryphon brought shame square
 fully thronged gazing wight
 cuirass helmet bare
 leave simple cassock meanly dight
 slaughter conducted
 place wain conspicuous sight
 harnessed two sluggish cows seen
 weary weak long hunger lean

 cxxxi
 thronging ignoble car appear
 brazenfaced boy girl evil fame
 turn play charioteer
 assail knight bitter blame
 boys might cause greater fear
 joined mocks mows words shame
 warrior volleyed stones would slay
 wiser fury stay

 cxxxii
 disgrace ground
 though true evidence guilt mail
 plate dragged due dishonour round
 suspended shameful waggon's tail
 wain stopt trumpet's sound
 heralds front tribunal's pale
 shame eyes amid crowd
 another's evil deed proclaim aloud

 cxxxiii
 take prisoner thence repair
 front temple dwellinghouse store
 cruel name mockery spare
 leave unsaid word filthy lore

 ii

 xlv

 xlvi

 among shoals"  reckoning nigh

 whose coast makes many patrons weep sigh"

 xlvii

 xlix

 l

 li

 till enduring cruel wise

 lii

 sable mouth fiercely blew
 bore swift stream strong
 vext waters hurried
 tumbling waves shattered bark along
 faster gentle falcon ever flew
 sore patron feared world's brink
 would transport bark wreck sink

 liii
 master finds remedy
 bids cast spars veer away
 line holds float flee

 canto 20

 argument

 ii
 women reached pinnacle glory
 every art professed well seen
 whosoever turns leaf story
 finds record neither dim mean
 evil influence transitory
 long deprived world

 worth haply hid honours due

 whence dispersed future years shall

 lxvi
 cried "the english duke astolpho

 lxvii

 near kin welcomed dismay
 beholds mournful face
 knowing survives fray
 astolpho doomed slavery base
 fate deferred till following day
 shall perish duke free

 lxviii
 grieves well cavaliers
 means ever captive
 slain martial peers
 deliver death slavery

 enslaved slain

 lxix
 hand stripling's age may

 resolved well spill

 lxx
 "join thou us" sir guido cried
 "and hence sally"  "from within
 walls sally"  guido side
 answered "ne'er hope lose win"
 " fear i" martial maid replied
 "to execute whatever begin
 know securer path afford

 lxxi
 "such proof thy fair prowess made

 tomorrow palisade
 crowds assembled circus
 let us every side mob invade
 whether fly defence prepare
 give town fire bed
 earth wolf vulture leave dead"

 lxxii
 "ready shalt thou find strife
 follow thee perish thy side
 let us hope escape life
 enough vengeance somedeal satisfied
 ere death oft ten thousand maid wife
 place witnessed outside
 many castle wall port defend
 know certain way hence wend"

 lxxiii
 "and marphisa made reply
 xerxes led squadrons oppose
 rebel spirits sky
 cast dwell amid perpetual woes
 one day weapon die
 wert thou least foes"
 "no project must fail
 sir guido said know save avail"

 whose love perfect friendship tied

 canto 21

 argument
 zerbino gabrina heart
 asp appears bear contends o'erthrown
 fleming falls upon part
 cause despised odious crone
 wounded sore writhing smart
 beldam's treason prince makes known
 whose scorn hatred hence derive new force
 towards loud cries zerbino spurs horse



 cord well believe wound tight
 round chest nails plank fastly hold

 secure inextricable fold
 holy faith seems except white
 mantled days old
 ancient limner ever painted
 one speck one single blemish tainted

 ii

 one thousand men united
 well given grot forest hoar
 remote town hamlet plighted

 sufficient pledge troth

 xxxii

  sees judges every thing

 " `and wedded lord's' cries
 `i feel alarm

 xlii
 " `and erst messenger sought
 today sued face face

 xlv

 xlvi
 "the impious woman answered ` 'tis
 thou slay would us foul despite

 certain mean tell aright
 return purpose fulfil
 third hour darkest night

 xlvii
 " `let irk thee await peer
 within chamber light
 till shall make doff warlike gear

 wife quicksand steer

 cruel fury sprung hell

 xlviii
 "she drew brother forth guilty night
 good arms hand
 secreted chamber without light
 till thither came wretched castellain
 ordered fell aright
 seldom ill design schemed vain

 morando took castle's lord

 xlix
 "one blow divided head neck nought
 helm warrior defend

 unhappy life's disastrous end
 slew never thought
 would believed aid friend
 intent strange chance wrought blow
 worst could done mortal foe

 l
 "when unknown earth argaeus lay
 brother gabrina gave blade

 li
 "and threatens save desires comply

 would unable deny

 like traitor assassin die
 upon tale ignominious way

 lii
 "philander stood oppressed grief fear

 slain wrath went near
 long doubted choler glowed

 enemy's abode
 lack faulchion empty sheath
 would torn piecemeal teeth

 liii
 "as sometimes vessel two winds blow
 different points vext upon main
 one speeds bark anend
 another squall impels back
 still poop assailed prow
 till strongest flies amain
 philander distraught two designs
 takes pregnant least ill opines

 liv
 "reason demonstrates peril fraught
 case death lasting stain
 castle murder taught
 time sift brain
 nill conclusion nought
 left bitter cup drain
 thus troubled heart prevailing
 fear resolution overbore

 lv
 "the fear shameful punishment's pursuit
 made many protestations swear
 grant every thing gabrina's suit

 fair bradamant gentle cousin knew
 afar hailed joyful cheer
 nigh embrace warrior flew
 named raised vizor high
 let plainly espy

 xi
 none could astolpho found
 leave horse content
 knowing would guard steed care
 lord return present
 believed heaven care
 duke aymon's daughter pleasure sent
 wont pleasure aye see
 necessity

 xii
 embracing twice thrice cousins stand
 fraternally other's neck
 other's welfare made demand
 much affection ere duke 'gan say
 "would see winged people's land
 upon earth make long delay"
 opening dame thought brewed
 flying horse astolpho shewed

 xiii
 scarce marvelled plain
 saw rising steed wings unfold
 since upon former time mastering rein
 charged dame wizard old
 made eye eyelid sorely strain
 hard gazed movements behold
 day bore wonderous range
 rogero journey long strange

 xiv
 astolpho says bestow
 rabican passing swift kind
 courser started bow
 drawn left feathered shaft behind
 well panoply forego
 may mount alban consigned
 preserve martial weed
 since arms present need

 xv
 bent since course air flown
 best make light
 yet keeps sword horn although alone
 horn every risque might shield knight
 lance abandons son
 galaphron wont bear flight
 lance whoever course
 touched fell headlong hurtling horse

 xvi
 backed astolpho ascending slow
 hippogryph yielding aether flew
 next rider stirred courser
 thought vanished view
 thus pilot patron go
 fearing gale rock till
 reefs left shore behind
 hoists every sail shoots wind

 xvii
 bradamant departed peer
 remained distressed mind since way
 knew good kinsman's warlike gear
 courser mount alban convey
 heart inflame tear
 warm desire greedy yet prey
 see child find
 vallombrosa thought

 xviii
 standing suspense chance spied
 churl came towards plain
 best astolpho's armour tied
 best might laid rabicane
 next behind bade peasant guide
 one courser loaded one loose twain
 two steeds
 horse pinnabel bore

 xix
 vallombrosa direct way
 thought hopes find rogero
 fearing evermore go astray
 knew thither might best repair
 churl country small assay
 sure bewildered wend pair
 yet venture thitherward hies
 believes place meeting lies

 xx
 way pursued
 turned found none question road
 saw midday issuing wood
 fort far removed abode
 summit mountain stood
 lady like mount alban showed
 mount alban sure repair
 one brothers mother

 xxi
 recognized place became
 sadder heart power say
 delays discovered dame
 thence allowed wend way

 consumes prey
 see rogero compass aught
 vallombrosa wrought

 xxii
 deal doubted turn steed
 resolved upon mount alban's castle near
 thence way could deftly read

 fortune good evil decreed
 maid vale clear
 one good brethren spied

 xxiii
 came billeting bands lay
 dispersed province foot horse
 surrounding district obey

 next mount alban side side

 xxiv

 time never mind efface

 xxv
 could go one stead
 send vallombrosa devised
 thither damsel's name speed
 young rogero apprised
 kept thence prayed prayer need
 love would baptised
 next concerned would intend
 might bridal bring happy end

 xxvi
 purposed messenger bear
 well rogero good steed
 ever wonted hold dear

 beauteous courser far near

 xxvii
 valiant rogero bold sprite
 backed hippogryph soared air
 frontino left frontino hight

 hence ne'er sleek well case

 xxviii

 tasked together sew

 piece silk white sable hue
 trapt horse chose maid
 old callitrephia's daughter crew
 whose mother whilom bradamant nursed
 damsel secrets versed

 xxix
 graven heart rogero lies
 thousand times confessed
 extolled deities
 manners worth beauty possessed

 said called damsel rest
 "nor one hippalca mine sage
 sure three embassage"

 xxx

 afterwards informs maid aright
 rogero say
 abbey failed knight
 must bad faith ascribe stay
 fortune charge decides
 conduct guides

 xxxi

 put hand frontino's rein
 met one rude mad
 deprive steed fain
 proclaim owner bade
 might suffice make sane
 believed cavalier
 rogero's name would make fear

 xxxii
 many many things whereof treat
 good rogero stead showed
 instructed well palfrey fleet
 hippalca stirred longer abode
 highway field wood gloomy beat
 ten weary miles damsel rode
 ere crossed path mischief bent
 even questioned witherward went

 xxxiii
 noon day descending mount
 streight ill declivity
 led dwarf encountered rodomont
 afoot harnessed capapee
 moor towards raised haughty front
 straight blasphemed eternal hierarchy
 horse richly trapped passing fair
 found knighterrant's care

 xxxiv
