 sworn solemn oath hands lay
 first steed could light
 fairer fitter yet take away

 doubtful stands covets sore prey
 eyes surveys says often "why
 well courser's master by"

 xxxv

 "for haply would make thee change thy thought
 better knight thee horse doth ride
 vainly would match earth sought"
  "who tramples thus other's fame"  cried
  "rogero"  said taught

 since champion rides renown

 xxxvi

 surprises beside might

 xxxvii

 xxxviii

 xxxix

 xl

 xlii

 xliii

 xliv

 stopt pair halted night

 lii

 liv

 lvi

 lvii

 anselm count altaripa done

 lxxiii

 lxxiv

 lxxv

 couldst without behold apart
 lay helm points thy

 lxxvi

 c

 ci

 cii

 writing deity

 place described

 ciii

 credits despite

 civ

 cv

 cvi
 splayfooted ivy mantling spray

 often hottest noon day

 cvii

 cviii

 grateful cool shade thou gloomy cave

 cix

 benignant fostering sun

 cx
 arabic writ blessing said
 known orlando like latin tongue
 versed many languages best read
 speech oftentimes wrong
 injury shame saved head
 time roved saracens among
 let boast former boot
 o'erbalanced present bitter fruit

 cxi
 three times four six lines imprest
 upon stone wretch perused vain
 seeking another sense exprest
 ever saw thing clear plain
 within troubled breast
 felt icy hand heartcore strain
 mind eyes close fastened block
 length stood differing rock

 cxii
 wellnigh lost feeling prey
 wholly o'ermastering woe
 pang believe experienced say
 speaks griefs outgo
 pride forehead passed away
 chin fallen upon breast
 found grief barred natural vent
 moisture tears utterance lament

 cxiii
 stiffed within impetuous sorrow stays
 would quickly issue abide
 water seen imprisoned vase
 whose neck narrow whose swell wide
 time one turns inverted base
 towards mouth hastes hurrying tide
 streight encounters stop
 scarcely works passage drop drop

 cxiv
 somewhat returned thought
 possibly thing might untrue
 one hoped desired sought
 think lady would shame pursue
 weight jealously wrought
 whelm reason undo
 whosoe'er thing planned
 counterfeited passing well hand

 cxv
 vain hope sought cheat
 manned deal spirits awoke
 prest faithful brigliadoro's seat

 ere eddying roof saw smoke

 cxvi
 languid lit left brigliador
 discreet attendant one undrest
 limbs one doffed golden spurs wore
 one bore clean iron vest
 homestead young medore
 lay wounded supremely blest
 orlando food unfed
 supt full sorrow sought bed

 cxvii
 wretched sufferer seeks ease
 finds much distress pain
 every loathed handwriting sees
 wall door window would fain
 question host holds peace
 sooth dreads clear plain
 make thing would rather shrowd
 may less offend cloud

 cxviii
 little availed count selfdeceit
 one spake unsought
 sheperdswain allay heat
 saw guest troubled thought
 tale wonted repeat
  two lovers  listener taught
 history many loved hear
 without reserve 'gan tell peer

 cxix
 angelica's persuasive prayer
 farm carried young medore
 grievously wounded arrow
 little space healed angry sore
 exercised pious care
 love heart lady wounded
 kindled small spark fierce fire
 burnt restless desire

 cxx
 thinking mightiest king born
 ruled east heritage
 forced puissant love thought scorn
 consort poor footpage
  story done proof borne
 gem reward harbourage
 extended kind abode
 angelica parting bestowed

 cxxi
 deadly axe unhappy close
 single stroke lopt head
 satiate innumerable blows
 cruel hangman love hate fed
 orlando studied conceal woes
 yet mischief gathered force spread
 would break parforce tears sighs
 would would mouth eyes

 cxxii
 give rein raging woe
 alone other's presence unreprest
 full eyes tears descending flow
 wide stream flood troubled breast
 'mid sob groan tosses fro
 weary bed search rest
 vainly shifting harder rock
 sharper nettle found flock

 cxxiii
 amid pressure cruel pain
 past wretched sufferer's head
 oft ungrateful lady must lain
 together leman bed
 less loathed couch disdain
 upstarted less dread
 churl close eyes
 springs turf serpent spies

 cxxiv
 forthwith deadly hatred breed
 bed house swain stay
 till morn break till dawn succeed
 whose twilight goes approaching day
 haste orlando takes arms steed
 deepest greenwood wends way
 assured alone
 gives utterance grief shriek groan

 cxxv
 never tears never sorrowing
 paused found peace night day
 fled town forest harbouring
 open air hard earth lay
 marvelled spring
 water eyes could stream away
 breath many sobs supplied
 thus ofttimes amid mourning cried

 cxxvi
 "these longer real tears rise
 scatter full vein
 tears ceaseless sorrow lacked supplies
 stopt midheight scarce rose pain
 vital moisture rushing eyes
 driven fire within would gain
 vent expend
 sorrows life end

 cxxvii
 "no index woes
 sighs sighs fail
 times season repose
 feel breast never less exhale
 sorrow love pinions blows
 fire heart creates gale
 love miracle thou contrive
 wastes fire thou keep'st alive

 cxxviii
 "i  seem sight
 roland dead ground
 slain ungrateful lady's spite
 whose faithlessness inflicted wound
 divided flesh sprite
 hell tormented walks round
 shadow left
 warning thrust love"

 cxxix
 night forest roved count
 break daily light brought
 unhappy fortune fount
 inscription young medoro wrought
 see wrongs inscribed upon mount
 inflamed fury nought
 turned hatred phrensy rage spite
 paused bared faulchion bright

 cxxx
 cleft writing solid block
 sky tiny fragments sped
 wo worth sapling caverned rock
 medore angelica read
 scathed shepherd flock
 thenceforth shall never furnish shade bed
 sweet fountain late clear pure
 tempestuous wrath ill secure

 cxxxi
 turf stone trunk shoot lop
 cast without cease beauteous source
 till turbid bottom top
 never clear troubled course
 length lack breath compelled stop
 bathed sweat wasted force
 serves fury falls lies
 upon mead gazing upward sighs

 cxxxii
 wearied woebegone fell ground
 turned eyes toward heaven spake aught
 ate slept till daily round
 golden sun broken thrice sought
 rest anew ever ceased wound
 rankle till marred sober thought
 length impelled phrensy fourth day
 limbs tore plate mail away

 cxxxiii
 helmet shield bestowed
 arms far farther rest
 cuirass greenwood wide strowed
 good gear fine next vest
 rent fury naked showed
 shaggy paunch back breast
 'gan phrensy act passing dread
 stranger folly never shall said

 cxxxiv
 fierce rage fierce fury grew
 obscured remained warrior's sprite

 canto 25

 argument

 fully cause death led

 bertolagi sold hire fee



 oh mighty springs war youthful breast

 ii

 canto 27

 argument
 good rogero paynims three
 defeated charlemagne paris flies
 already throughout chivalry
 mad spite hatred jars arise
 strife means still enmity
 sovereign unable devise
 departs monarch argier
 rejected lady dear



 woman part reasons best
 upon sudden motion untaught
 special grace sex blest
 'mid many gifts wherewith 'tis fraught
 man less nimble wit possest
 ill counsel save sober thought
 ruminates thereon content spend
 care time trouble mature end

 ii
 seemed good counsel ill indeed
 malagigi's said
 albeit rescued need
 cousin richardet odds o'erlaid
 paynim monarchs freed
 ready demon hest obeyed
 sure never deemed borne
 would work christian army scorn

 iii
 little prize counsel stayed
 success may well suppose
 cousin might furnished aid
 yet brought christian host foes
 evil sprite might well made
 embodied palfrey goes
 eastward west far lady bear
 france hear pair

 iv
 two lovers following flies
 place paris might brought
 calamity surprise
 malagigi little thought
 fiendish malice banished skies
 ever blood fire ravage sought
 guided way charles' disaster
 left choice wizard master

 v

 bears frighted doralice amain
 river yet yawning ditch swamp
 wood rock rugged cliff steed restrain
 till traversing french english camp
 squadrons mingled train
 beneath holy flag christ arraid
 granada's king fair conveyed

 vi
 sarzan tartar first day
 royal damsel long pursue
 distant form yet survey
 finally lose lady's view
 like lymedog hunters lay
 hare roebuck's trail valiant two
 follow upon track halt till told
 harboured father's hold

 vii
 guard thyself charles lo thee blown
 storm refuge see
 redoubted monarchs come alone
 sericane circassy
 fortune would probe thee bone
 taken two shining stars thee
 kept thee wisdom light
 thou remainest blind wrapt night

 viii
 'tis valiant cousins would speak
 orlando wit bereft

 ix

 x

 drove king agramant works behind

 searched convent tower house save confined

 yet orlando descries
 forth desire seek hies

 xi

 deemed count enjoyed mirth play

 xii

 finds orlando comes

 inquiring tidings royal fair

  twice hundred times  run

 forbidden fruit eve raised hand

 xv

 xvii

 see banners shaking wind

 spite charlemagne's beleaguering crew

 xviii
 thickest camped lay charles's host spurred
 closing files christian foe
 "afric spain" assailants' word
 points franks paynims know
  "to arms arms" throughout camp heard
 first felt moorish sabre's blow
 even rearguard falls vengeful stroke
 charged alone routed beat broke

 xix
 christian host throughout overthrown
 know tumultuous wise
 wonted insult done
 switzer gascon surmise
  since reason unknown 
 several nation standard flies
 drum trumpet's sound
 shriek shout earth heaven redound

 xx
 armed charlemagne except head
 girt paladins faithful stay
 arrived demanding alarm bred
 disorder host disarray
 stopt menace fled
 many fugitives upon way
 maimed face breast arm hand espied
 head throat lifeblood dyed

 xxi
 advancing earth saw many
 rather lake crimson laid
 horribly weltering dark gore
 beyond leech's magician's aid
 busts dissevered heads bore
 legs arms  cruel show  surveyed
 first cantonments last
 saw slaughtered men sides past

 xxii
 small band advances wise
 deserving well eternal praise gain
 vouching deeds longdrawn furrow lies
 signal record might main
 army's cruel slaughter surprise
 anger rage viewed charlemagne
 whose shattered walls felt force
 throughout mansion tracks lightning's course

 xxiii
 ramparts paynim crew
 agramant yet pierced aid
 side two

 canto 28

 argument
 whatsoever evil tongue tell

 ladies ladies prize

 ii
 omit canto  tale untold

 v
 "he much rejoiced height

 beauty throughout world confest
 pleased monarch praise conferred
 wherein delighted heard

 vi
 "faustus latinus one array
 pleased king roman cavalier
 hearing ofttimes astolpho display
 beauties hand cheer
 questioned monarch day
 ever lifetime far near
 beauty espied
 thus unexpectedly replied

 vii
 "faustus replied `by see
 hear said every one
 beauty rival thee
 rather confine one
 jocundo one brother
 well ween saving alone
 thou leavest beauty far behind
 thy peer better find'

 viii
 "impossible astolpho deemed thing
 hitherto thought palm
 longing seized lombard king
 know youth whose praises blown
 prest till faustus promised bring
 brother praised throne
 though 'twould much thither repaired
 courier added cause declared

 ix
 "because youth ne'er known measure
 life single pace rome
 fortune gave lived leisure
 contented paternal dome
 diminished encreased treasure
 wherewith father endowed home
 distant would paris deem
 tanais another would esteem

 x
 "and greater difficulty
 tear jocundo consort
 love united fair
 husband knew
 yet sovereign's hest would repair
 seek stripling utmost
 suit offers gifts crowned
 youth's refusal left ground

 xi
 "faustus set forth days' ride
 reached rome paternal mansion gained
 entreaties brother plied
 journey consent obtained
 wrought well though difficult guide
 silent even young jocundo's wife remained
 showing good would thence ensue
 besides gratitude would due

 xii
 "jocundo names time wend way
 servingmen meanwhile purveys steeds
 provision makes fair array
 beauty borrows grace glorious weeds
 beside night day
 aye weeping lord lady reads
 knows ever sustain
 long absence die pain

 xiii
 "for mere thought produced misery
 seemed ravished heart's core
  `alas love jocundo cried let
 thy sorrows'  weeping evermore 
 `so may journey prosper thee
 return ere yet two months o'er
 day o'erpass term prescribed
 though king half kingdom bribed'

 xiv
 "this brought troubled consort small content
 period distant said
 'twould mighty wonderment
 return found dead
 grief day night bosom rent
 lady neither slept fed
 pity oft youth repented
 brother's wishes consented

 xv
 "she neck unloosed costly chain
 gemmed cross holy reliques bore
 one pilgrim bohemia's reign
 gathered upon many distant shore
 sire sickness entertain
 returning jerusalem yore
 hence made dying pilgrim's heir
 undoes gives lord wear

 xvi
 "and round neck entreats sake
 chain memory wind
 gift husband well pleased take
 token needs love bind
 neither time absence e'er shake
 whatsoever fortune behind
 memory rooted fast deep
 still kept death keep

 xvii
 "the night morning streaked sky
 fixt journey sore dismay
 husband deemed arms would die
 wife wend way
 slumbered last goodbye
 bade yet lacked hour day
 mounted nag journey sped
 afflicted spouse returned bed

 xviii
 "jocundo two miles road
 jewelled cross recalled mind
 beneath pillow bestowed
 forgetfulness left behind
 `alas youth bethought mode
 shall excuse omission find
 consort shall deem
 little unbounded love esteem

 xix
 "he pondered excuse weened' twould
 little value exprest
 page  save embassy
 brother addrest
 `  baccano ride leisurely

 trust overtake way

 doubt shall speedily back'
  servant took adieu

 "he without saying aught curtains drew
 least believed within espied

 forthwith jocundo adulterer knew
 practice features certified
 footboy train
 nourished come humble strain

 xxii
 "to imagine distress wonderment
 warrant may believe
 better make experiment
 like wretch cruel proof receive

 ere reach inn rejoins train

 saw heart heavy yet one

  well accompanied

 xxvi

 retire encreased woes

 ne'er return whilom fame
 lovely visage seems

 xxvii
 "his eyeballs seem deepburied head
 nose seems grown  cheeks pined sore 
 even remains beauty fled
 enough warrant
 fever burns sorrow bred
 halts arbia's arno's shore

 withered like rosebud plucked noon

 xxviii
 "besides faustus sorrowed descry
 bested worse cause sorrowing

 seemed

 xxx

 friend's arrival could

 xxxi

 studious honour bids purvey

 melancholy man music's strain

 xxxii
 "above chambers upper floor

 thither solitary mood sore
 pastime company stripling gall
 aye betakes evermore
 sad thoughts newer cause grief recall
 would believe story found
 remedy unhoped made sound

 xxxiii

 laid eye saw slighted
 hard credit hearsay
 hears descries
 yet hardly believe eyes

 xxxiv
 "he queen's apartment sight
 choicest priviest chamber
 never introduced whatever wight

 canto 29

 argument
 isabel makes paynim take head
 rather wicked gain

 seeks appease wounded spirit vain

 thence regardless endlong speeds
 road achieves prodigious deeds



 feeble unstable minds men
 quickly intentions fluctuate

 ii

 xliii
 gentle damsel sought place
 towards bridge across river rode
 richly arraid beautiful face
 sage reserve demeanor showed
 'tis brandimart chase
 remember sir every road
 place lover seeks anxious wise
 excepting paris warrior lies

 xliv
 flordelice bridge tower near
 name wandering damsel hight
 grappling roland stood sarzan peer
 would river pitch knight
 conversant brava's cavalier
 miserable county knew aright
 mighty marvel dame raised
 see rove naked man crazed

 xlv
 stopt issue strife know
 wherein two puissant warriors vied
 opposite might main throw
 stream doughty champion tried
 "how fool mighty prowess show"
 teeth furious paynim cried
 shifting seen strain
 brimfull pride anger disdain

 xlvi
 hand puts
 take new hold vantage spies
 within roland's legs without
 locks right foot left skilful wise
 thus resembles wrestling bout
 stupid bear fury tries
 tree whence tumbled o'erthrow
 deeming sole occasion woe

 xlvii
 roland whose better wit lost withal
 know used force alone
 utmost force earthly ball
 haply affords paragons none
 let backwards struggle fall
 embracing stood ulien's son
 together foaming stream sank
 high flashed wave groaned echoing bank

 xlviii
 quickly stream asunder bore pair
 roland naked like fish could swim
 shot feet arms extended
 gained bank upon brim
 halted mark adventure
 achieved praise shame evil trim
 pagan arms impeded sore
 heavier pain trouble toiled ashore

 xlix
 along bridge spanned foaming tide
 flordelice meantime securely pace
 vainly sought every side
 brandimart's bearing since iron case
 vest anywhere espied
 hoped find knight place
 return count tell
 left behind stream bridge tower cell

 l
 'twere phrensy every frantic feat
 promise relation one one
 many many  repeat
 know story would done
 yet notorious deeds meet
 mention song make known
 wondrous one recount
 near thoulouse pyrenaean mount

 li
 much country traversed knight
 urged furious rage misguides
 last reached hill whose boundary height
 arragonese neighbouring frank divides
 thither directing aye course outright
 descending sun visage hides
 reached path upon rugged steep
 overhung valley dark deep

 lii
 chance encountered mid road
 two youths wood men drove
 ass along pathway load
 logs marking well scanty store
 brain poor orlando's head stowed
 called approaching knight threatened sore
 bidding stand aside else go back
 hindrance block common track

 liii

 save foot beast applied
 smote midbreast vigour fraught
  force exceeding every force beside 
 tost hight beholders thought
 bird air descried

 liv

 better luck wit one woodman shear

 moist patch brambles flight

 lv

 gain higher steep would strive
 hopes crags among
 keep fool may contrive

 stretched arms rent prey twain

 lvi
 even mode often descry
 falconer heron puller
 whose entrails plucks satisfy
 merlin falcon game pursue
 happy die

 handed us wondrous word

 lvii
 marvels count bends

 seeking long path length descends

 near arragon beside rumbling main
 ever prompted phrensy rank
 make dwelling bank

 dry powdery seasand covered o'er

 told former lay

 lix
 different sight
 nought orlando surveyed

 lx

 seize damsel upsprang haste

 lxii

 lxiii

  smote horse's head fearful blow

 lxiv

 whipt spurred evermore slow
 would esteem albeit palfrey
 yet faster shaft dismist bow

 placed mouth failed virtue
 putting lips like light
 extinguished puff past sight

 lxv

 neither surely weet

 lxvi
 two inches short fallen prey
 upon would pounced orlando near
 would crushed furious way
 kind fortune saved peer
 let theft purvey
 palfrey whilere
 never courser
 chased swift orlando scours shore

 lxvii
 doubt another provide
 follow mad orlando's rear
 whose rage fury nevermore subside

 touches lo mane
 grasps secures rein

 lxviii

 man might seize damsel fair
 bit bridle adjusts aright
 springs back o'er seabeach bare
 many miles impels palfrey's flight
 without repose pause
 ever sell bridle displaced
 let grass heartening forage taste

 lxix
 course o'erleap ditch sought
 head heels rider went
 harmed felt tumble aright

 long bear thence orlando thought
 end upon shoulders hent

 carried three bowshots' length

 lxx
 next felt weight irksome grow
 put lead rein
 followed limping gait slow

 lxxi
 'tis thus comforts drags mare
 may follow ease led
 whiles despoiled flesh whiles hair
 scathed stones ill road o'erspread

 rude rocks suffering sore lies dead

 anywise headlong course retards

 lxxii
 drag palfrey ceased though dead
 continuing still course towards west
 sacked hamlet farm stead
 whenever hunger distrest
 aye glut meat bread
 fruit every one force opprest
 one hand slain one foully shent
 seldom stopt ever onward went

 thousand borne

 women ground
 one ingrates best

 canto 30

 argument
 great feats achieve orlando way
 tartar king rogero slain
 fair bradamant spouse stay
 fate forbade wounded lay
 plighted promise maintain
 boldly brethren made
 lord rinaldo need aid



 reason giving way heat blood
 hasty choler ill defends
 hurried blind furious mood
 tongue hand molest friends
 though offence wept rued
 penance pay poor amends
 alas sorrow lament vain
 said angry strain

 ii
 like sick man sore bested
 suffering patience many many day
 pain make head
 yields rage curses pain give way
 impetuous wrath fled
 moved ready tongue ill say
 left willful rage rue
 cannot done undo

 iii
 well hope sovereign courtesy
 pardon since crave ladies bright
 excuse moved madness
 rave passion let censure light
 foe treats despiteously
 could reduced worser plight
 prompts sore repents heaven
 knows wrongs knows well love

 iv
 less beside brava's peer
 less pardon obtain
 mead mountain far near
 scowered large portion land spain
 dragging jennet wild career
 dead behind rein
 river joined sea parforce
 abandoned bank mangled corse

 v
 could like otter swim
 leapt rose upon side
 behold mounted shepherd brim
 arrived horse water tide
 saw orlando coming
 eschewed naked alone spied
  "my jennet thy hackney fain
 barter" cried madman swain

 vi
 "her show thee thou wilt dead
 upon river's margin fell
 leisure may'st thou cured" said
 "and fault tell
 give thy hackney boot instead
 prythee dismount thee likes well"
 peasant laughing answered word
 left fool pricked towards ford

 vii
 "hearest thou hola want thy steed"
 cried roland advanced wrathful cheer
 solid staff knotted need
 shepherd wherewith smote peer
 whose violence ire bounds exceed
 seems withal wax fierce e'er
 cuff levels rustic's head
 splits solid bone lays dead

 viii
 leaping horse different way
 country scowers make spoil wrack
 palfrey never tastes corn hay
 days exhaust famished hack

 many finds many steeds
  masters slain  presses needs

 ix
 came last malaga
 mightier scathe done elsewhere
  besides infuriate peer
 people left country bare
 ravage could another year
 desperate havoc fool repair 
 many houses burnt cast
 sacked third unhappy town

 x
 departing thence insane orlando flees
 zizera seaward town whose site
 gibraltar's bay please
 say gibletar's either way 'tis hight
 loosening land boat sees
 filled party pleasure dight
 solace morning gale
 upon summer sea spread sail

 xi
 "hoah boat put back" count 'gan cry
 mind go aboard barge
 vainly ears clamours die
 freight none willingly take charge
 swiftly swallow cleaves sky
 furrowing foamy wave boat goes large
 orlando urges straightening knee

 xii
 plunged waves last parforce
 vainly would shun waters green
 bathed knees paunch croup till horse
 scarcely head wave seen
 let hope measure back course
 smitten whip ears
 woe worth must founder way
 africa load convey

 xiii

 launched shallops wide

 xiv
 sinks would draw load

 breathed softly water gently flowed
 well needed weather fair

 whelmed waxing tide orlando dies

 xv
 fortune madmen guide

  sir befel lady catay

 xvii
 say many things intent
 mean pursue cavalier
 mandricardo fair argument

 happily enjoyed rival spent
 beauty left europe without peer
 since fair angelica hence wended
 virtuous isabel heaven ascended

 xviii
 king mandricardo proud right
 lady adjudged amorous suit
 enjoys award full delight
 since others points dispute
 young rogero claimed eagle white
 one disastrous quarrel root
 another moves king sericana
 tartar king durindana

 xix

 labour sore tangle undo

 cannot make valiant child refrain
 claiming hector's buckler due
 yet gradasso move sword lend
 'till till quarrel end

 xx
 rogero brooks fight
 shield braced gradasso bear
 save tartar knight
 wield sword orlando used wear
 "see fine chance light
 cries agramant words forbear
 fortune rules matter let us see
 choose shall chosen

 xxi
 "and  would ye would delight
 obligation evermore 
 shall casting lots decide right
 premising whose lot drawn
 shall upon two quarrels fight
 wins companion's score
 shall win well
 loses battle lose alike two

 xxii
 "between rogero gradasso
 deem little difference rather none

 rest let doubtful victory
 descend heaven pleased
 upon vanquished knight blame shall fall
 fortune impute all"

 xxiii
 rogero gradasso say
 agramant stood silent agreed
 whose lot first issued assay
 undertake listed mead

 names writ destined succeed

 much shake topsy turvy turn

  gradasso's left behind  cannot tell

 l

 lxxii

 lxxiii

 lxxviii

 lxxix

 lxxx

 ` lxxxii
 "alas alas rogero
 hast evermore prized

 lxxxvi

 one cause long detained

 lxxxvii

 lxxxviii

 might beauty voiced marphisa's praise

 lxxxix

 together till time
 't marvel rogero loved maid

 xc
 mount alban's prince castellain
 rinaldo first fair brotherhood
  say honour age twain
 right birth warrior stood
  sun illumes starry train 
 deeds ennobled aymon's blood
 one day noon none beside page
 serve reached famous fortilage

 xci
 hither good rinaldo repaired
 returning paris ward
 brava whither often fared
 said seek angelica vain
 pair evil news heard

 hence agrismont way bent

 xcii

 canto 31

 argument
 rinaldo dudon fight friendship make
 fitting honour pay
 agramant's host united champions break
 scatter like chaff disarray

 good baiardo pain
 contend rinaldo sericane



 sweeter gladder state could possest
 falls enamoured bosom's share
 happier mode life lot blest
 evermore chains love wear
 lover 'mid joys distrest
 suspicious fear cruel care
 martyrdom racks suffering sprite
 phrensied rage jealousy hight

 ii
 bitters else interpose
 enjoyment choicest sweet
 love augmented perfection grows
 takes finer edge drink eat
 hunger thirst palate dispose
 flavour beverage meat
 feebly wight estimate charms
 peace never knew pain arms

 iii
 heart aye sees though undiscerned
 human eye support peace
 long absent love returned
 longer absence joy's increase
 service may endured though nought earned
 hope guerdon cease
 worthy service end paid
 albeit wages long delaid

 iv
 scorn repulse finally pain
 suffering love every martyrdom
 recollection make us entertain
 delights greater rapture come
 weak mind poisoned bane
 filthy pest conceived stygian home
 though joy ensue festive pleasures
 wretched lover ill comfort measures

 v
 cruel envenomed wound
 neither salve portion soothes smart
 figure made witch murmured sound
 star benign observed friendly part
 aught beside zoroaster found
 inventor magic art
 fell wound every woe
 makes wretched man despair lays low

 vi
 o' cruel wound incapable cure
 inflicted ease lover's breast
 less false suspicion sure
 wound whose pangs wofully molest
 reason better wit obscure
 natural bent judgment wrest
 wound reason didst destroy
 damsel dordona's every joy

 vii
 speak fatal mischief wrought
 hippalca's brother's bitter blow
 speak fell cruel tidings brought
 days former woe
 weighed thing nought
 digression show

 viii

 towards evening lady side
 sable shield sable gear
 whose ground bar silver divide
 foremost seeming force peer

 ix

 "him saddle quickly cast
 firm footing mine arm prove true"
 within young richardetto cries
 encounter ends wise

 x
 underneath vizor's sight offends

 xi

 ye unseated one one"

 xiii

 career rinaldo thrown

 inch champions backward bent

 xiv

 xvi

 canto 32

 argument
 rogero stay
 tidings brought irk damsel sore
 fair marphisa caused youth's delay
 bent slay grieving evermore
 departs overtakes upon way
 ullania three kings rode
 o'ercomes o'ercome maid
 evil law disobeyed



 recollect bound sing
 promised escaped mind
 suspicion fraught suffering
 bradamant displeasing kind
 made keener venomed sting
 caused wound wherewith pined
 hearing richardet news impart
 pierced breast preyed upon heart

 ii
 bound sing begun
 another song rinaldo crossed way
 deeds savage guido done
 kept employed caused small delay
 subject subject run
 forgot bradamant say
 remember tell ere
 rinaldo gradasso hear

 iii
 behoves ere said
 awhile agramant discourse
 night's raging fire conveyed
 arles remnant scattered force
 since unite troops furnish aid
 victual 'twas place much resource
 seated upon river nigh shore
 spain front africa

 iv
 horse foot good evil sort
 marsilius throughout spain loss repairs
 armed back barcellona's port
 furnished love fear sea prepares
 moor council daily calls court
 care cost watchful monarch spares
 meanwhile sore taxes repeated cess
 africa's o'erburdened towns oppress

 v
 offers rodomont side
 return offers vain
 renowned almontes' daughter bride
 cousin portion oran's reign
 lures bridge knight pride
 many sells plate chain

 vi

 nay redoubted damsel hearing said

  choicest warriors taken chased dead

 proffered purse person aid

 vii
 free gift martial fair
 brunello bore done wrong
 ten days nights swing air
 sorely feared lofty gallows hung
 seeing unhelped force prayer
 one amid paynim throng
 thought foul scorn stain generous hands
 base blood loosed losel's bands

 viii
 pardoned every ancient injury
 agramant arles conveyed
 well may fancy joy glee
 monarch greeted brought aid
 brunello's fate wills shall see
 esteem holds warlike maid
 earnest upon foe
 fierce marphisa menaced show

 ix
 hangman hung corpse desert field
 craving vulture crow feed
 rogero erewhile shield
 noose caitiff would freed
 heaven's justice willed lay wound unhealed
 could assist craven need
 news known knot tied
 brunello unassisted died

 x
 good duke aymon's daughter mourn
 twenty days slowly trail
  term elapsed  rogero return
 received church's pale
 time halts foreign bourne
 exiled prisoner pent noisome jail
 pines poor wretch liberty light
 loved land desired gladsome sight

 xi
 aye sick hope deferred expecting maid
 phoebus' steeds foundered one deemed
 wheels frame stayed
 beyond wonted term chariot seemed
 yet longer day faith delayed
 sun righteous hebrew beamed
 night alcides conceived
 every day every night believed

 xii
 oft dormouse badger bear
 heavy slumber would fain partake
 time sleep would waste wear
 prolonged repose desired break
 wished damsel sound hear
 rogero's voice awake
 alone beyond power
 cannot close eyes one single hour

 xiii
 throughout livelong night
 tosses turns ever finds repose
 still impatient dawn light
 time time window goes
 see tithon's spouse lily white
 yet scatters mingled crimson rose
 less desires damsel 'tis morn
 see golden stars heaven adorn

 xiv
 saving four days term ended
 appointed youthful warrior's stay
 full hope messenger attended
 hour hour arrive say
 "behold rogero comes" oft ascended
 turret whose top might survey
 gay champaign wood mid wide expanse
 portion road led france

 xv
 shining arms distance perceives
 thing speaks cavalier
 'tis desired rogero believes
 fair eyes brows seen clear
 footman unarmed maid conceives
 courier youthful peer
 though fallacious every hope feeds
 another another aye succeeds

 xvi
 arms warrior meet
 hill descends plain
 finds montalban's seat
 hopes road way ta'en
 design wherewith moved feet
 thence fort returns vain
 finds meanwhile expired
 period whose approach desired

 xvii
  period prefixt o'erpast one
 two three six eight twenty days 
 seeing spouse tidings none
 receiving youth laments 'gan raise
 snakehaired furies pity
 dark realms rhadamanthus sways
 smote eyes divine bosoms fair
 rent tresses golden hair

 xviii
 "can true"  cried  "shall fain
 follow one strives hide fly
 esteem man disdain
 pray never hears suppliant cry
 suffer hates o'er heart reign
 one lofty virtues holds high
 'twere need heavenborn goddess descend
 realms stubborn heart bend

 xix
 "proud youth knows worship love
 lover slave
 cruel stripling knows pangs prove
 yet aid till grave
 let tell sorrows lest move
 perverse evil wave
 shunning like malignant asp fears
 change mood charmer hears

 xx
 "ah love arrest wight runs free
 outstripping slow feet install
 condition whence thou tookest
 ere thine other's thrall
  alas vain hope thou shouldst
 ever pity moved suppliant call
 sport yea feed live streams rise
 distracted lover's brimming eyes

 xxi
 "but woe alas
 save irrational desire lament
 makes soar pitch passing high
 reach region plumes brent
 unsustained fall headlong sky
 ends woe flight intent
 imp wings soar
 flame fall tormented evermore

 xxii
 "yea rather complain
 desire bared breast
 whereby reason hunted reign
 powers stronger force opprest
 thus borne bad worse without rein
 cannot unbridled beast arrest
 makes see destruction haste
 bitterness death may taste

 xxiii
 "yet ah blame wherein
 ever offended save loving thee
 wonder suddenly
 woman's feeble sense opprest
 fence guard lest bearing high
 wise words beauty rare pleasure
 wretched mortal would shun
 look upon visage sun

 xxiv
 "besides destiny entrained
 words worthy credence moved much drew
 picture rare happiness ordained
 meed fair unless ensue
 persuasive words false feigned
 famous merlin's counsel untrue
 wrath wizard may well profess
 cannot therefore love rogero less

 xxv
 "both merlin melissa need
 blame shall ever blame twain
 exhibit suckers seed
 conjured spirits infernal reign
 empty hope fancy feed
 perpetual bondage detain
 cause suppose
 save grudge safe sweet repose"

 xxvi
 sorrow maid wholly occupies
 room none comfort rest
 yet maugre affliction hope rise
 form lodgement harassed breast
 damsel's memory still supplies
 rogero's parting words addrest
 makes seeming facts' despite
 await hour hour youthful knight

 xxvii
 month's space beyond twenty days
 hope affords fair bradamant content
 hence sorrow heavy weighs
 would else harassed soul shent
 one day along road strays
 oft meet rogero went
 hears tidings hope  last comfort left 
 like every good breast bereft

 xxviii
 bound homeward hostile camp lay
 king agramant met gascon knight
 prisoner paynims day
 fought nigh paris famous fight
 damsel prest knew say
 point covets led knight
 asks rogero theme abides
 listens aught inquires besides

 xxix
 full account afford
 well acquainted court said
 matched mandricardo strove lord
 layed martial king combat dead
 sore wounded tartar's sword
 month stripling kept bed
 stranger closed news
 well might tale missing knight excuse

 xxx
 subjoins gascon cavalier
 moorish camp damsel lies
 name marphisa hight beauteous cheer
 bold skilled arms every guise
 loves rogero dear
 host rarely sundered spies
 every one throughout paynim train
 deems betrothed wedlock twain

 xxxi
 hope healed shall youthful knight
 marriage lovers succeed
 sure pleasure sincere delight
 tidings paynim prince monarch read
 since knowing either's superhuman might
 augur loins spring breed
 little season shall pass worth
 mightiest race ever earth

 xxxii
 rehearsed gascon knight believed
 without cause believed news bore
 rumour universally received
 bruited squadrons moor
 notion love conceived
 signs kindness witnessed evermore
  good bad  though one mouth flows
 fame boundless torrent quickly grows

 xxxiii
 brought paynim aid
 ne'er seen without cavalier
 first foundation rumour layed
 confirmed fame every ear
 camp conveyed
 thief brunello sang whilere
 alone see rogero brought
 camp returned uncalled unsought

 xxxiv

 visit sickbed smarted
 alone often day
 passed maid eve departed
 gave yet greater cause say
  known one haughty hardhearted
 world despised  grown
 benign humble child alone

 xxxv
 bradamant gascon's story heard
 lady suffered tormenting pain
 cruel woe inmost bosom stirred
 falling preserved pain
 turned courser round without word
 inflamed jealousy fierce disdain
 hope wretched damsel spurns
 chamber breathing wrath returns

 xxxvi
 turned face body bed
 armed th4e grieving damsel throws
 sad lament sorrow bred
 may unheard bites clothes
 repeating stranger said
 pitcher smothered anguish grows
 plaints longer able restrain
 vents maid parforce piteous pain

 xxxvii
 "who ever trusted woe
 false cruel well may esteemed
 thou rogero false cruel
 pious faithful deemed
 foul felon act treachery
 ever yet tragic poet dreamed
 fall short thine thou wilt set
 sum desert thy debts

 xxxviii
 "wherefore rogero since cavalier
 mates thee beauteous form daring feat
 since thou matchless valour hast peer
 none thee gentleness compete
 cannot 'mid godlike gifts clear
 allow thee truth thy graces complete
 praise spotless truth thee allow
 virtues yield bow

 xxxix
 "knowest thou without worthless
 gentle bearing martial might
 nothing howsoever fair
 seen without aid light
 easily mightest thou maid ensnare
 lord thou idol sight
 thy honied words thou might'st
 deem cold darksome sun

 xl
 "cruel sin trouble thee thou
 do'st murder loved thee repent
 held lightly breach vow 
 beneath burden thy heart bent
 treatment thine adversary know
 one loves like thou torment
 justice none heaven well may say
 heaven vengeance wrongs delay

 xli
 "if human sins deepest dye
 fell ingratitude doomed smart
 fairest angel sky
 banished foul darksome part
 mighty sins mighty vengeance cry
 due atonement cleanses heart
 beware lest thou beneath vengeance groan
 ingrate wouldest thy sin atone

 xlii
 "cruel rogero theft beside
 sins may justly thee arraign
 thou heart ravished form side
  offence complain 
 made mine thou defied
 right took away thy gift
 restore well thou know'st pains requite
 sin keeps another's right

 xliii
 "thou hast left rogero thee leave
 alas neither power possess
 power life reave
 scape o'erwhelming wretchedness
 die strife thee alone grieve
 gods pleased lot bless
 require life loved thee
 never welcome death me"

 xliv
 resolved die 'twas damsel cried
 starting bed passion warmed
 left breast naked sword applied
 recollected wholly armed
 meanwhile better spirit side
 persuasive words fury charmed
 "o lady born illustrious name
 would'st thou conclude thy life foul shame

 xlv
 "were better field go
 aye thy breath glory may spent
 rogero chance lay thee low
 slain thee haply may repent
 faulchion deal mortal blow
 death could ever yield thee content
 reason thou should'st slain
 dooms thee living passing pain

 xlvi
 "haply marphisa
 thou die thou yet may deadly vengeance take
 dishonest love treacherous lore
 thy beloved rogero's fealty shake"
 seemed please mournful lady
 first thought forthwith bade make
 mantle arms imply
 desperation desire die

 xlvii

 gathered branch dried

 whose sole touch unhorsed champions

 xlix

 l
  cadurci cahors city left behind 
 bradamant sees mountain far near
 whence dordogne's waters valley wind

 buckler damsel's saddle swung

 li
 lady behind ride
 squires maids numerous company
 fair bradamant one past beside
 demanded stranger dame might
 "that lady king france" replied
 squire "is sent upon embassy
 lost isle lies mid seas roll
 restless waves beyond northern pole

 lii
 "some lost isle iceland call reign
 whereof royal lady fills throne
 whose charms charms beauties wane
 heaven dealt alone
 shield see sends charlemagne
 pact purpose plainly shown
 confer knight whose worth
 judgment fairest upon earth

 liii
 "she deems true
 fairest womankind
 cavalier heart thew
 surpass warriors fain would find
 resolved hundred thousand woo
 none shall unfix purpose mind
  held worthiest world's accord

 liv
 "in france royal charles's famous court
 damsel hopes find cavalier

 shown excels puissant peer
 three monarchy dame escort
 kingdoms ye well shall hear
 one sweden rules one gothland norway one
 surpast martial praise none

 lv
 "these three whose kingdoms distance lie
 yet least distant lie lost isle

 little known island style

 valour win lady's smile
 illustrious deeds done fame shall sound
 heaven shall circle wonted round

 lvi
 "yet wed cavalier
 deems else excell
  `lightly hold proof valour here'

 therefore hold fierce alarms
 living men bravest knight arms

 lvii

 lviii

 spouse lord confess'

 lix

 widedistant sea monarchs bold

 lxiv

 whereto could direct near hand

 lxvi

 worst warlike arms shall ply

 lxvii

 first arrive peace quarters take
 follows harder game play

 one mansion stay

 many others succeed
 thus strength shall sorely need

 alone accompanied

 housed must without abide"
 bradamant asked kindly shepherd

 well words pointed hand
 five six miles wide tower stand

 lxix

 lxx

 lxxiii

 lxxiv

 lxxv

 yea mars mars contend mortal course

 lxxvi

 lxxvii

 lxxx

 lxxxi

 lxxxii

 new ancient castle's style

 lxxxiii
 "when pharamond france possessed throne
 son prince clodion mistress rare

 io's shepherd charge whilere

 lxxxiv

 kept rarely issued rest

 france boldest best
 hither castle abode

 furious giant need
 short time gentle knight freed

 lxxxv
 "sir tristram lady reached hall
 sun seville left behind
 admission porter call
 since ten miles round shelter find

 sore jealous determined mind
 stranger keep ever inn
 long fair lady lodged therein

 lxxxvi
 "when long entreaties made vain
 castellain refused house knight
 said `what supplication cannot gain
 hope make thee despite'
 loudly challenged train

 lxxxvii

 warder warlike rout

 losers tristram bars gate

 lxxxviii

 whereof spake dear clodion's eyes
 equalled loveliest fair

 lxxxix

 saving yseult please sight

 xc
 " `and sir clodion grieve beneath tree
 lodge alone company demand
 although less beautiful
 fair youthful damsel hand
 well content mate shall
 things shall command
 fair strong

 xci

 rendered back relieved sorrow

 xcii
 "because said made plain appear
 found returned fair
 though discourtesy whilere

 outwatch weary night open air
 accepting cavalier's excuse
 would thrown love castle's use

 xciii
 "for love make churlish nature kind
 transform rude gentle breast

 xciv
 "that cavalier greater heart power

 endures seen" tale
 bradamant recounts castle's lord

 xcv

 none fairer world beside

 xcvi

 xcvii

 c
 moment's time cloud obscure
 steams bottom marshy dale

 fair mirthful maid

 ci

 generous bradamant prudent guise

 cii
 "i cause take defend
 say whether fairer less fair

 saving undress shall pretend
 say

 least works another woe

 ciii

 yet therefore women guest

 civ

 cv

 yields beauty tower must wend

 cvi

 disagree

 behold prompt gainsayer's

 canto 33

 argument
 bradamant sees picture future fight
 gained admission spear
 combat cease upon baiardo's flight
 gradasso montalban's cavalier
 soaring world english knight
 arrives nubia's distant realm
 driving harpies royal board
 hunts mouth hell impious horde



 timagoras parrhasius polygnote
 protogenes renowned apollodore
 timanthes apelles first note
 zeuxis others famed heretofore
 whose memory stream time float
 wreck labours lost deplore
 whose fame flourish still fate's despite
 grammercy authors men read write

 ii
 yet living earlier day
 mantegna leonardo gian belline
 dossi skilled carve pourtray
 michael less man angel divine
 bastiano raphael titian
 urbino venice makes cadoro shine
 whose works resemble hear
 credit spirits famed whilere

 iii
 painters seen others
 thousands years ago honour stood
 things matchless pencil drew
 working upon wall wood
 never amid masters old new
 ye pictures heard pictures viewed
 things come yet pourtrayed
 deeds done displayed

 iv
 yet let artist whether new old
 boast skill wondrous works make
 leave feat spell wherewith controlled
 spirits infernal bottom quake
 hall whereof strain told
 volume sacred avernus' lake
 norsine grot throught subject demons' might
 made merlin single night

 v
 art whereby ancient erst pourtrayed
 wonders extinguished day
 troop surveyed
 painted chamber return say
 squire attendant signal made
 bore thither lighted torches whose ray
 scattered hall shades night
 open day shown bright

 vi
 thus castle's lord addressed crew
 "know adventures chamber wrought
 days yet witnessed
 warfare storied fields unfought
 limned battles well foreknew
 defeats come victories taught
 whate'er italy host befalls
 may discern painted walls

 vii
 "the wars wherein french armies appear
 beyond alps foul event fair
 even days thousandth year
 prophetic merlin painted
 hither great britain's monarch sent seer
 king marcomir heir
 hither sent hall made
 time shall displayed

 viii
 "king pharamond first passed
 rhine amid franks' victorious train
 gaul bethought cast
 restive italy curbing rein
 evermore wasting fast
 beheld roman empire's feeble reign
 reigned would make accord
 compass design britain's lord

 ix
 "the royal arthur nought done
 without ripe advice merlin sage
 merlin say devils mighty son
 well versed chance future age
 knowing pharamond made known
 would many woes host engage
 entering region rugged mound
 apennine parts alp sea surround

 x
 "to sage merlin shows well nigh
 monarchs france reign
 murderous steel see people fall
 consumed famine fever slain
 short joy long sorrow profit small
 boundless ill shall recompense pain
 since vainly lily seek shoot
 italian fields withered root

 xi
 "king pharamond trusted seer
 resolved turn arms elsewhere
 merlin beheld sight clear
 things things whilom
 'tis said brought magic art rear
 painted chamber monarch's prayer
 wherein whatever deeds franks shall
 already done plain view

 xii
 "that king succeed might comprehend
 renown victory would obtain
 whene'er friendly squadrons defend
 barbarians else italian reign
 damage descend
 thinking bind griding chain
  might comprehend say read doom 
 beyond hills find tomb"

 xiii
 said leads listening ladies
 pictured histories begin show
 sigisbert arms southward bear
 imperial maurice shall bestow
 "behold mount jove repair
 thither ambra ticino flow
 eutar behold alone repels
 puts foe flight routs quells

 xiv
 "where clovis tread mountain way
 hundred thousand warriors trace
 see benevento's duke monarch stay
 whose thinner files hostile army face
 lo feign retreat ambush lay
 lo danger havoc disgrace
 franks lombard winefat hie
 drugged bait like poisoned mullets die

 xv
 "where childibert boundary hills crost
 heading bands france captains see
 yet shall baffled clovis boast
 conquest spoil lombardy
 heaven's sword descends heavy host
 choked bodies every road shall
 pined watery flux withering sun
 ten unharmed returns one"

 xvi
 shows king pepin shows king charlemagne
 italy march bend
 one fair success obtain
 land came offend
 stephen one adriane
 injured leo would defend
 quells astolpho takes heir
 reestablishes papal chair

 xvii
 youthful pepin royal line
 shows seemed spread host
 even kilns isle palestine
 bridge achieved mighty cost
 malamocco bestride brine
 rialto's shore battle post
 fly leave drowning bands behind
 bridge destroyed wasting waves wind

 xviii
 "burgundian lewis ye behold descend
 thither invading squadrons
 vanquishing taken nevermore offend
 hostile arms compelled swear
 behold slights solemn oath  wend
 anew reckless steps snare
 lo leaves eyes array
 blind moldwarp hence lord convey

 xix
 "you see named arles victorious hugh
 italy berengari chase
 quelled broken twice thrice anew
 bavarians huns replace
 o'ermatched peace fain sue
 long survives fills place
 berengarius yielding domains
 repossest kingdom reigns

 xx
 "you see goodly pastor sustain
 another charles set fire italy
 two kings two fierce battles slain
 manfred conradine see
 bands seem vex newwon reign
 many wrongs dispersedly
   different cities dwell
 slain rolling vesperbell"

 xxi
 shows next interval
 'twould seem many many age years
 alps captain gaul
 war upon great viscontis steers
 seems straiten alexandria's wall
 girt forces foot cavaliers
 garrison within ambuscade
 without works warlike duke laid

 xxii
 french host decoyed cunning wise
 thither surrounding toils spread
 conducted evil enterprise
 armagnac gallic squadron's head
 slaughtered throughout spacious champaign lies
 alexandria captive led
 swoln water blood
 tanarus purples wide po's ample flood

 xxiii
 successively castellain displayed
 one hight marca anjouites three
 "marsi daunians salentines" said
 "and bruci shall oft molest see
 yet frank latian's friendly aid
 shall one delivered destruction
 lo realm oft attack
 alphonso gonsalvo beat back

 xxiv
 "you see eighth charles amid martial train
 flower france alpine pass pressed
 liris fords takes naples' reign
 yet draws sword lays lance rest
 save rock  typheus' endless pain 
 lies giant's belly arms breast
 inigo del guasto withstood
 derived avalo's illustrious blood"

 xxv
 warder castle makes clear
 beauteous bradamant history
 says shown ischia's island "ere
 lead things see
 i'll tell greatgrandfather whilere
  child  wont tell
 like manner greatgrandsire said
 well father whilome read

 xxvi
 "and sire grandsire heard recite
 son sire even baron
 heard related wight
 fair pictures without pencil drew
 see painted azure red white
 pharamond
 shown castle rocky mount
 heard relate things recount

 xxvii
 "heard relate fortilage
 good knight spring 'twould appear
 guards well scorns fires rage
 even pharo flaming far near
 within short space age
 named week day well year
 noble warrior unexcelled worth
 yet appeared earth

 xxviii
 "nereus less fair achilles less strong
 less ulysses famed daring feat
 nestor knew much lived long
 less prudent nimble ladas less fleet
 less liberal less prompt pardon wrong
 caesar whose praises ancient tales repeat
 compared ischia born
 might appear vaunted virtues shorn

 xxix
 "and illustrious crete rejoiced old
 giving birth coelus' godlike heir
 thebes hercules bacchus bold
 delos boasted heavenly pair
 nought well happy isle withhold
 lifting high glorious head air
 great marquis shall born
 every grace shall heaven adorn

 xxx
 "sage merlin said  oft renewed say 
 reserved flourish age
 opprest roman empire lay
 might free holy heritage
 deeds must display
 hereafter presage
 spake wizard renewed story
 told charlemagne's predestined glory

 xxxi
 "lewis learned merlin said woe
 brought italy king charlemagne
 called harass o'erthrow
 ancient rival goodly reign
 return declares foe
 leagued venice would king detain
 behold valiant monarch couch spear
 foes' despite passage clear

 xxxii
 "but new kingdom leaving band
 far destiny awaits throng
 mantuan's friendly succour manned
 gonsalvo war returns strong
 leaves months sea land
 one living head slaughtered troops among
 one treason spent
 appears joy triumph shent"

 xxxiii
 saying guests cavalier
 alphonso pescara hight displayed
 "who thousand feats shine clear
 resplendent carbuncle" said
 "behold deceived faithless treaty
 mid snares malignant aethiop laid
 transfixt deadly dart warrior lies
 age's worthiest champion dies"

 xxxiv
 italian escort next see
 twelfth lewis o'er hills gone
 roots uptorn mulberry
 viscontis' land lilies sown
 "treading charles's steps shall
 bridges athwart garigliano thrown
 yet shall mourn army's slaughter
 dispersed drowning fatal water"

 xxxv
 lord pursues "with less overthrow
 broken puglia see gallic train
 twice entraps routed foe
 gonslavo behold pride spain
 fortune lewis fair face shall show
 late troubled mien upon plain
 even vext adria pours tides
 po alp apennine divides"

 xxxvi
 host reproved said
 pieced tale left untold
 things first order next displayed
 royal castle warder sold
 prisoner faithless switzer made
 shows lord hired gold
 double treason without couching lance
 given victory king france

 xxxvii
 warder shows caesar borgia grown
 puissant italy king's grace
 rome's peerage lords
 sway exile seems chase
 shows king saw take
 papal acorns bologna place
 genoa's burghers monarch broke
 rebel city stooping yoke

 xxxviii
 "you see" pursued warder "how dead
 covered ghiaradada's green champaign
 seems city opes gates dread
 venice scarce freedom maintain
 see suffers church's head
 passing narrow confines romagne
 modena ferrara's duke reave
 would prince remnant leave

 xxxix
 "nay bologna rescues sway
 whither bentivogli betake
 next see lewis siege brescia lay
 closestraitened city storm take
 felsina almost time stay
 succour papal army break
 next 'twoud seem either hostile band
 lies tented upon chassis' level strand

 xl
 "on side france upon spain
 extend files battle rages high
 fast fall men arms either train
 green earth tinged crimson dye
 flooded human gore seems every drain
 mars doubts give victory
 alphonso's worth spaniards yield
 victorious franks maintain field

 xli
 "and ravenna sacked ravaged lies
 roman pastor bites lips woe
 called hills tempest's guise
 swoop fierce germans fields
 seems frenchman unresisting flies
 chased bands beyond mountain snow
 set mulberry's thriving shoot
 whence plucked golden lily's root

 xlii
 "behold frank returns behold
 broken faithless swiss betrayed
 royal father seized sold
 whose succour dearly youth paid
 false fortune's wheel rolled
 erewhile beneath another king arraid
 behold preparing efface
 vengeful deed novara's late disgrace

 xliii
 "and see better auspices return
 valiant francis foremost train
 shall break haughty switzer's horn
 little short spent bands remain
 shall nevermore style adorn
 usurped foul troop churlish vein
 scourge princes faith's defence
 rustics rude shall make pretence

 xliv
 "lo takes milan league's despite
 lo youthful sforza makes accord
 lo bourbon fair city keeps right
 francis furious german horde
 lo high emprize fight
 elsewhere occupied royal lord
 knows pride license host
 city shall anew lost

 xlv
 "lo french grandsire's vein
 inherits generous name alone
 church's favour regain
  gaul expelled  land

 italy wont flown
 mantua's noble duke foe shall stay
 ticino's passage bar way

 xlvi
 "though cheek youth's blossoms scarce appear
 worthy immortal glory frederick shines
 well praise deserves since spear
 care skill pavia's lines
 french defends cavalier
 frustrates sealion's bold designs
 see two marquises italia's boast
 alike terror host

 xlvii
 "both one blood one nest
 foremost bold alphonso's seed
 led false black snare
 late beheld purple torrent bleed
 see defeated counsel ware
 oft franks italy recede
 next visage benign bright
 lord guasto alphonso hight

 xlviii
 "this goodly knight whose praise heard
 rugged ischia's island displayed
 sage merlin prophetic word
 pharamond mighty matters said
 whose birth season deferred
 ever champion's aid
 barbarous enemy's attack
 vext italy church empire lack

 xlix
 "he cousin pescara's rear
  prosper colonna chief emprize 
 makes rude switzer pay bicocca dear
 paid frenchman yet dearer wise
 behold france prepares fresh career
 repair many losses tries
 behold one host lombardy descend
 behold naples wend

 l
 "bust moves us like dust flies
 restless wind whirls round
 lifts aloft awhile skies
 blows back anew rising cloud ground
 hundred thousand swells francis' eyes
 soldiers pavia's walls surround
 monarch sees commands
 marks wax waste leaguering bands

 li
 " `tis thus greedy servant's sin
 easy sovereign's goodness side
 files beneath banners muster thin
 midnight camp `to arms' cried
 wary spaniards charged within
 ramparts foes guide
 avalo's fair lineage would assay
 make heaven hell desperate way

 lii
 "you see best nobility
 fair france extinguished field
 many swords many lances see
 spaniards round valiant monarch wield
 behold horse falls yet
 neither subdued yield
 though assault sides run
 wrathful bands succour none

 liii
 "the monarch well defends foe
 bathed blood hostile vein
 valour stoops last numbers lo
 king taken conveyed spain
 upon pescara's lord bestow
 inseparable twain

 liv
 "this host o'erthrown upon pavia's plains
 bound naples halts upon way
 illnourished lamp taper wanes
 want wax oil flickering ray
 lo king leaves sons spanish chains
 home returns domain sway
 lo italy leads band
 another wars upon native land

 lv
 "in every part see rome woe
 mid ruthless rapine murder fire rape
 see wasting rack ruin go
 nothing human divine escape

 hostile fires lo backward shape
 course hurry way

 lvi
 "lautrec monarch sends bands
 yet anew war lombardy
 deliver rapacious hands

 slowly performs king's commands
 next overrun kingdom see
 strong arms city turned
 wherein syren's body lies inurned

 lvii
 "lo imperial squadrons thither steer
 aid leaguered city convey
 lo burnt sunk destroyed disappear
 encountered doria midway
 behold fortune light shift veer
 friendly frenchman till day
 slays host fever lance
 thousand one returns france

 lviii
 histories pictures shew
 tell would ask long strain
 beauteous colours different hue
 since hall could well contain
 painting twice thrice guests review
 leave knows lingering train
 'twould seem perusing oft behold
 inscribed beauteous work gold

 lix
 pictures sight fed
 talked long  ladies rest 
 chambers lord led
 wont much worship every worthy guest
 already sleeping bed
 last duke aymon's beauteous daughter prest
 restless body throws
 right left vainly seeks repose

 lx
 yet slumber toward dawn dream
 form rogero seems view
 vision cries "why vex deem
 things real hollow untrue
 backwards shall sooner flow mountainstream
 turn thought
 love unloved
 heart apples mine eyes

 lxi
 "hither repaired seemed said
 baptized professed
 lingered delaid
 wound love opprest"
 vanished martial maid
 vision broken rest
 new floods tears awakened damsel shed
 sad fashion said

 lxii
 "what pleased dream alas sheer
 reality waking bane
 joy dream prompt disappear
 dream cruel tormenting pain
 ah wherefore seemed see hear
 cannot waking see hear
 ails ye wretched eyes closed ye show
 unreal good open woe

 lxiii
 "sweet sleep promised peace soul buoy
 bitter warfare wake anew
 sweet sleep brought fallacious joy
  sure bitter  waking ills ensue
 falsehood delight truth annoy
 never may see hear what's true
 sleeping brings weal watching woe
 pains waking may never know

 lxiv
 "blest animals sleep half year
 ope heavy eyelids night day
 tedious sleep like death appear
 watching like life say
 since  lot beyond wont severe 
 death watching life sleep assay
 oh death sleep resemble death
 even pray three stop fleeting breath"

 lxv
 clouds gone horizon overspread
 glowing crimson newborn sun
 signs unlike past read
 better promise day begun
 bradamant upstarted bed
 armed journey done
 thanks first rendered courteous lord
 kind cheer hospitable board

 lxvi
 found lady messenger maid
 squire issued castled hold
 afield arrival stayed
 three good warriors damsel bold
 eve champaign laid
 cast horses lance gold
 suffered mighty pain
 night freezing wind pattering rain

 lxvii
 add ill hungering sore food
 horses livelong night
 trampling mire chattering teeth stood
 wellnigh engendered despite
  say well nigh  moved warrior's mood
 knew damsel would recite
 unhorsed hostile lance
 first course run france

 lxviii
  resolved die else name
 forthwith new encounter retrieve 
 ulany messagebearing dame
 whose style longer unmentioned leave
 fairer notion knightly fame
 heretofore might haply conceive
 bold bradamant anew fight defied
 drawbridge clear descried

 lxix
 thinking howsoe'er maid
 look act maid confest
 duke aymon's daughter loth delaid
 refuses traveller pressed
 often sorely prayed
 could ill refuse kings' request
 lance levels three strokes extends
 three earth thus warfare ends

 lxx
 bradamant courser wheeled
 turned back upon foes o'erthrown
 intent gain golden shield
 sought land distant
 rising sullen silence field
 speech hardihood gone
 appeared stupefied surprise
 ulania dared lift eyes

 lxxi
 thither course addrest
 vaunted maid boasting vein
 paladin knight lance rest
 worst saddle could maintain
 make vail yet haughty crest
 look upon world less disdain
 tells paladin peer
 unhorsed woman's spear

 lxxii
 "now roland's rinaldo's might
 without reason held renown
 ought think said thus fight
 ye female hand overthrown
 say buckler one requite
  better woman ye done
 ye redoubted warriors
 think haply think

 lxxiii
 "this may suffice need none
 clearer proof prowess display
 desires rashly one
 desires valour assay
 would add scathe shame made
 today yesterday
 unless perchance thinks praise gain
 illustrious warriors slain"

 lxxiv
 ulany certified
 woman's hand caused overthrow
 deeper black pitch dyed
 honour heretofore fair show
 ten story testified
 one sufficed  o'erwhelming woe
 possest fury burned
 well nigh weapons turned

 lxxv
 arms upon unbound
 cast strung rage fury sore
 moat girt castle round
 even kept faulchions wore
 since woman cast ground
 o'erwhelmed rage shame warriors swore
 crying shame clear
 without bearing arms would pass year

 lxxvi
 evermore afoot would fare
 hill mountain plain
 year ended would wear
 knightly mail climb steed
 save force bear
 battle steeds chain
 without arms punish misdeeds
 wend afoot others steeds

 lxxvii
 lodged township fall night
 duke aymon's daughter journeying parisward
 hears king agramant foiled fight
 good harbourage withal bed board
 hostel found small delight
 comforts else afford
 sad damsel meat sleep foregoes
 finds resting place far less repose

 lxxviii
 story dwell
 seek anew valiant twain
 consent beside lonely well
 tied goodly coursers rein
 war somedeal tell
 war waged empire domain
 best buckle side
 good durindana baiardo ride

 lxxix
 signal trumpet attend
 blow lists master
 teach foin fend
 wake sleeping wrath swords drew
 one boldly wend
 lifted blades quick dextrous two
 already 'gan champions' fury heat
 fast hard swords heard beat

 lxxx
 none e'er proof two faulchions chose
 sound solid able endure
 three strokes alone conflicting foes
 passing means measure pure
 perfect temper blows
 repeated trial secure
 thousand strokes might clash high
  nay yet solid metal fly

 lxxxi
 mickle industry mighty pain
 art rinaldo shifting
 avoids deadly dint durindane
 well knowing 'tis wont cleave tear
 gradasso struck greater might main
 well nigh strokes spent air
 sometimes smote smote part
 durindana wrought less harm smart

 lxxxii
 rinaldo skill blade inclined
 stunned arm sericana's lord
 oft reached casque coat confined
 often raked haunches sword
 adamantine corslet's rind
 link restless faulchion broke bored
 impassive paynim's scale
 know charmed magic stubborn mail

 lxxxiii
 without reposing long time
 upon deadly battle intent
 save one another's troubled mien
 angry eyes warriors bent
 despiteous war deadly spleen
 diverted another strife spent
 hearing mighty noise champions turn
 good baiardo sore bested discern

 lxxxiv
 good baiardo monster view
  bird bigger courser  prest
 three yards length appeared view
 monster's beak bat rest
 equipt feathers black ink hue
 piercing talons winged pest
 eye fire cruel look
 like shipsails two spreading pinions shook

 lxxxv
 perhaps bird
 another bird resembling seen
 know
 except turpin heard
 hence fiend upper air
 evoked depths nether hell ween
 malagigi raised magic sleight
 might disturb champions' fight

 lxxxvi
 deemed rinaldo contest sore
 'twixt malagigi hence begun
 would confess charge nay swore
 even light lights glorious sun
 might clear blame bore
 imputed done
 whether fiend fowl pest descends
 good baiardo talons rends

 lxxxvii
 quickly steed possessed mickle might
 breaks loose fury despair
 monster strives kick bite
 swiftly retires soars air
 thence returning prompt wheel smite
 circles beats courser
 wholly unskilled fence sore bested
 baiardo swiftly monster fled

 lxxxviii
 baiardo neighbouring forest flies
 seeking closest shade thickest spray
 feathered monster flaps eyes
 intent mark widest way
 good horse greenwood threads lies
 last within grot concealed day
 winged beast lost baiardo's traces
 soars aloft quarry chases

 lxxxix
 rinaldo gradasso descried
 baiardo's flight conqueror's destined meed
 battle suspend either side
 till regained goodly horse agreed
 saved fowl chased far wide
 conditioning whichever found steed
 anew fountain wend
 beside whose brim battle end

 xc
 quitting fount follow view
 new prints upon forest greensward made
 much baiardo distances two
 whose tardy feet wishes ill obeyed
 king alfana threw
 near hand tethered glade
 leaving foe behind evil plight
  never malcontent vext sprite

 xci
 rinaldo ceased little time spy
 baiardo's traces strange course run
 made thorny thicket wet dry
 tree rock river design shun
 cruel claws pouncing sky
 outrage scathe done
 rinaldo labour vain sore
 await fount returned

 xcii
 case erst concerted twain
 king thither steed resort
 sought little gain
 fared camp afoot piteous port
 return sericane
 sped withal sort
 judgement guided prey
 rare fortune heard baiardo neigh

 xciii
 found shrowded caverned lair
 sore moreover fright opprest
 feared issue open air
 thus horse king possest
 well remembered conditions
 bring fount little pressed
 knight keep promise made
 thus within secret said

 xciv
 "win war strife
 desire peace make steed
 world's side yore
 wend hitherward end alone
 courser mistakes sore
 thinks prize foregone
 would rinaldo conquer let fare
 ind france made repair

 xcv
 "for less secure sericane
 twice france" said
 pricked arles along road plain
 found fleet arrayed
 freighted steed durindane
 wellrigged galley harbour weighed
 hereafter  call
 quit rinaldo king france

 xcvi
 astolpho flight pursue
 made hippogryph like palfrey flee
 reins sell quick welkin
 hawk eagle soar course less free
 o'er wide land gaul warrior flew
 pyrenees rhine sea sea
 westward mountains turned aside
 france's fertile land spain divide

 xcvii
 arragon past navarre
  beheld sore wondering sight 
 leaves tarragon behind far
 upon left biscay upon right
 traversed castile gallicia lisbon
 seville cordova rapid flight
 city seashore inland plain
 unexplored throughout realm spain

 xcviii
 beneath cadiz strait spied
 whilom good alcides closed way
 atlantic side
 egypt bent o'er africa stray
 famous balearic isles descried
 ivica passage lay
 toward arzilla turned rein
 sea severs spain

 xcix
 morocco fez oran looking
 hippona argier bugia told
 cities bear away crown
 palm parsley wreath crown gold
 noble biserta next tunistown
 capys alzerba's isle warrior bold
 tripoli berniche ptolomitta viewed
 asia's land nile pursued

 c
 'twixt atlas' shaggy ridges shore
 viewed regions spacious round
 turned back upon carena hoar
 skimmed cyrenaean ground
 passing sandy desert moor
 albajada reached nubian's bound
 left battus' tomb behind plain
 ammon's dilapidated fane

 ci
 tremizen posts bred
 well people mahound's style
 aethiops pinions spread
 face first lie beyond nile
 coallee dobada sped
 bound nubian city's royal pile
 threading two ranged either land
 moslems christians watch arms hand

 cii
 aethiopia's realm senapus reigns
 whose sceptre cross cities brave
 men gold possest broad domains
 red sea's extremest waters lave
 faith well nigh like king maintains
 man primaeval doom may save
 save err rites require
 swarthy people baptized fire

 ciii
 astolpho lighted spacious court
 intending nubian king wait
 less strong sumptuous wealthy fort
 wherein royal aethiop keeps state
 chains serve drawbridge support
 bolts bars hinges gate
 finally whatever behold
 herewrought iron wrought gold

 civ
 high prized withal albeit abound
 best metal lodges built air
 sides wealthy pile surround
 clear colonnades crystal shafts upbear
 green white crimson blue yellow ground
 frieze extends galleries fair
 due intervals rich gems combine
 topaz sapphire emerald ruby shine

 cv
 wall roof pavement scattered
 full many pearl full many costly stone
 thrives balm plants ever rare
 compared jewry grown
 musk possess thence bear
 fine products clime brought
 regions prized sought

 cvi
 soldan king egyptian land
 pays tribute sovereign head
 say since nile command
 may divert stream bed
 hence district upon either hand
 forthwith might cairo lack daily bread
 senapus nubian tribes proclaim
 priest prester john sovereign name

 cvii
 aethiop monarchs beyond measure
 first riches might
 puissance treasure
 alas miserably lost sight
 yet monarch's least displeasure
 vexed direr worse despite
 harassed though richest nubian kings
 perpetual hunger's cruel stings

 cviii
 whene'er eat drink wretched man
 prepared resistless need pursued
 forthwith  infernal avenging clan 
 appeared monstrous harpies' craving brood
 armed beak talons overran
 vessel board preyed upon food
 wombs suffice receive
 foul defiled loathsome monsters leave

 cix
 upborn tide
 full blown honours unripe age
 excelled heart nerve beside
 riches royal heritage
 like lucifer monarch waxed pride
 war upon maker thought wage
 host mountain went
 egypt's mighty river finds vent

 cx
 upon hill wellnigh kissed skies
 piercing clouds king heard recite
 seated terrestrial paradise
 first parents flourished delight
 camels elephants footmen hies
 thither king confiding might
 huge desire peopled land
 bring nations command

 cxi
 god marred rash emprise high
 sent angel whose destroying sword
 hundred thousand chivalry
 slew endless night condemned lord
 emerging next hellish caverns fly
 horrid harpies assault board
 still pollute waste royal meat
 leave monarch aught drink eat

 cxii
 plunged uttermost despair
 one erewhile prophesied
 loathsome harpies daily fare
 leave unpolluted astride
 winged horse arriving air
 armed cavalier descried
 impossible appears thing
 devoid hope remains mournful king

 cxiii
 wonderment followers spy
 english cavalier make way
 o'er every wall o'er every turret high
 swiftly king news convey
 calls mind ancient prophecy
 heedless staff wonted stay
 joy outstretched arms tottering feet
 comes forth flying cavalier meet

 cxiv
 within castle court astolpho flew
 spacious wheels earth descended
 king conducted courtly crew
 warrior knelt arms extended
 cried "thou angel send god thou new
 messiah sore offended
 mercy yet bethink thee 'tis bent
 sin thine pardon repent

 cxv
 "knowing sin ask
  grace dare ask  restored light
 well ween power resides thee
 accepted thy maker's sight
 let suffice longer see
 let perpetual hunger fight
 least expel harpies' loathsome horde
 let pollute ravaged board

 cxvi
 "and build thee royal hold
 holy temple made marble swear
 portals roof gold
 decked within jewels rare
 shall thy mighty miracle told
 sculpture thy name dome shall bear"
 spake sightless king nubia's reign
 sought kiss stranger's feet vain

 cxvii
 "nor angel"  good astolpho made reply 
 "nor new messiah heaven descend
 less mortal sinner
 high grace unworthy pretend
 slay monsters means try
 drive realm offend
 shall prosper thy praises paid
 god alone sent thine aid

 cxviii
 "offer vows god well due
 thy churches build thine altars rear"
 discoursing together wend two
 'mid barons bold king cavalier
 nubian prince commands menial crew
 forthwith bring hospitable cheer
 hopes foul rapacious band
 dare snatch victual hand

 cxix
 forthwith solemn banquet prepare
 within gorgeous palace king
 seated alone guest sovereign
 attendant troop viands bring
 behold whizzing sound heard air
 echoes beat savage wing
 behold band harpies thither flies
 lured scent victual skies

 cxx
 bear female face pallid dye
 seven number horrid band
 emaciated hunger lean dry
 fouler death pinions expand
 ragged huge shapeless eye
 talon crook'd rapacious hand
 fetid large paunch many fold
 like snake's long knotted tails rolled

 cxxi
 fowls heard air swoops amain
 covey well nigh instant rends
 food o'erturns vessels rain
 noisome ordure board descends
 stop nostrils king duke fain
 insufferable stench offends
 greedy birds wrath excites
 astolpho brandished faulchion smites

 cxxii
 croup collar aims blow
 strikes neck pinion
 smote upon bag tow
 strokes without effect languid fall
 dish goblet forego
 void ravening fowls regal hall
 till feasted full left food
 waste polluted rapine rude

 cxxiii
 king firmly hoped cavalier
 would royal seat harpies scare
 hope foregone nought cheer
 laments sighs groans despair
 good horn remembers peer
 whose clangours helpful aye peril
 deems bugle fittest mean
 free monarch birds unclean

 cxxiv
 first fill ears king train
 melted wax astolpho gives command
 every one hears deafening strain
 may panic terror fly land
 takes reins courser backs
 grasps enchanted bugle hand
 sewer next signs board
 anew hospitable victual stored

 cxxv
 meats open galley bears
 banquet spreads ground
 behold wont harpysquad appears
 astolpho quickly lifts bugle's round
 unguarded harassed ears
 harpies proof sound
 terror form royal dome speed
 meat aught beside monsters heed

 cxxvi
 spurs haste valiant peer
 winged courser forth flown
 leaving beneath swift career
 royal castle crowded town
 bugle ever pealing far near
 harpies fly toward torrid zone
 light reach loftiest mountain
 springs anywhere nile's secret fountain

 cxxvii
 almost aerial mountain's feet
 deep earth extends gloomy cell
 surest pass repeat
 would time descend hell
 hither predatory troop retreat
 safe refuge deafening yell
 far farther cocytus' shore
 descending till horn heard

 cxxviii
 dark hellish inlet way
 opens would abandon light
 terrifying bugle ceased bray
  courser furled wings stopt flight
 ere astolpho convey
  depart accustomed rite 
 since sides paper overflows
 shall conclude canto repose


 canto 34

 argument
 infernal pit astolpho hears
 lydia's woe smoke wellnigh opprest
 mounts anew courser bears
 terrestrial paradise addrest
 john advised heaven steers
 lost sense repossest
 orlando's wasted wit well takes
 sees fates spin threads earthward makes



 fierce hungry harpies blind
 erring italy full fed
 scourge ancient sins designed
 haply heaven every board sped
 innocent children pious mothers pined
 hunger die see daily bread
  orphan's widow's scanty food 
 feed single feast filthy brood

 ii
 foul fault unclose
 cave long shut made passage free
 whence greediness filth arose
 italy's infection doomed
 good life extinguished repose
 banished strife poverty
 fear trouble still perplext
 shall many future year vext

 iii
 till sons shaken hair
 lethaean sloth life restored
 exclaiming "will none imitate pair
 zethes calais avenging sword
 rescue claws stench goodly fare
 cleanse glad anew genial board
 king phineus fowls released
 england's peer restored nubian's feast"

 iv
 hunting hideous birds cavalier
 aye scared bugle's horrid sound
 till mountaincave long career
 closed ran monstrous troop ground
 attentive vent held ear
 troubled cavern heard rebound
 weeping wailing eternal yell
 proof certain entrance led hell

 v
 astolpho doubts within shall wend
 see wretched ones expelled day
 central pit earth descend
 infernal gulfs around survey
 "why fear horn depend
 certain succour" warrior say
 "satan pluto confound
 drive threeheaded hound"

 vi
 speedily winged horse forsook
 sapling near hand ties
 cavern entered next first took
 horn whereon knight relies
 far advanced smoke
 obscure foul offends nose eyes
 ranker pitch sulphur stench
 yet thereat good astolpho blench

 vii
 descends lair
 much finds smoke vapour worse
 appears fare
 nay backward must retrace way parforce
 lo something knows air
 espies seems motion like corse
 upon whose wasted form long time beat
 winter's rain summers scorching heat

 viii
 dim cavern little light
  yea wellnigh might said light none 
 nought sees comprehends english knight
 wavers vapour dun
 surer proof stroke two would smite

 seemed strike amid misty gloom

 ix
 melancholy voice addressed
 "ah without harming downward wend
 sore sable fumes molest
 hither form hellish fires ascend"
 thereat duke amazed steps represt
 spirit cried "so may heaven send
 respite vapours exhale
 thou shalt deign tell thy mournful tale

 x
 "and known earth shouldst thou fain
 thee satisfy" sprite
 sweet seems fame
 thus return glorious light
 huge desire favour obtain
 forces words despite
 constraining tell things ye seek
 though 'tis annoyance fatigue speak

 xi
 "lydia child lydia's king
 proud estate princely honours born

 murky smoke eternally mourn
 kindly lover's constancy

 sin condemned woe

 xii
 "yet lower harsh anaxarete

 daphne learns rashly done

 xiii
 "of hosts ingrate women cell

 one one upon dwell

 xi
 know recollect
 speak whose story erewhile suspended
 ancient visage swift limb

 names turbid tide

 xxxvii

 xxxviii

 xxxix

 constant i'faith swear

 xl

  seen guard bugle blew

 where'er hearts gentle strain

 ii
 among warriors antiquity

 lxxix

 lxxx

 lxxxi

 leave king delay

 lxxxii
 every day sought bed
 must truth fittest witness

 canto 37

 argument

 seeking gift gain
 nature without study yieldeth nought
 mighty diligence mickle pain

 good success female train
 fair end homely task brought
  studies wake 
 mortal attributes immortal make

 ii
 sufficient
 praises posterity show
 borrowed authors' aid whose bosoms
 envy hate corroded
 oft hide good might declare
 tell every place ill know
 pitch would mount female name

 iii

 many would lend light

 would hinder rising

 iv

 cx

 cxi

 cxii

 cxiii

 cxiv
 would dragged  like others
 armed men thither brought beneath guide
 unhappy women brothers' tomb 
 sacrifice knife died

 cxv

 assemble inhabitants swear
 wives rule domain
 leave well every care
 chastise heavy pain
 whoever oppose law shall dare
  fine man's privileges whatsoe'er

 cxvi
 make promise never bestow

 sex's cause would aye defend

 cxvii
 wived ever
  sooner later  linked nuptial noose

 ere trees foliage lose

 cxviii

 wherein lay drusilla's corse borne

 cxix

 graved mad cruel law pair

 cxx

 law graved different frame
 upon stone imprest
 every woman doom'd death shame
 intention replace vest
 band divides islandick dame
 deems court 'twere shameful appear
 unless adorned mantled whilere

 cxxi
 ulany remained power
 remained wicked tyrant marganor
 lest evil hour
 break bonds injure damsel
 made one day leap headlong tower
 never took still leap
 crew

 cxxii

 till forenoon proceed banded friends
 mainroad branches one way
 towards camp arles tends

 damsels seek camp arles gone
 rogero canto done


 canto 38

 argument
 arles child charles marphisa wends
 baptized bradamant guide
 astolpho holy realm descends
 sight nubian supplied
 agramant's land troop offends
 africk realm wide

 two knights strife quarrel decide



 ye courteous ladies unto strain
 kind audience lend  read cheer 
 good rogero depart
 suddenly held dear
 displeases ye scarce inflicts less pain
 bradamant endured whilere
 read also argue shame
 feebly burned amorous flame

 ii
 side cause gone
 lady's youthful lord
 though hope treasure
 swelled rich croesus' rich crassus' hoard
 deem dart cupid thrown
 heartcore rogero gored
 sovereign joy prize high
 silver gold could ever buy

 iii
 yet preserve honour alone
 deserves excuse also merits praise
 preserve say done
 wise might shame scandal raise
 fair bradamant reluctance shown
 obstinately interposed delays
 certain sign served prove
 lady's little wit little love

 iv
 life gentle woman loves
 life values
 speak one young cupid roves
 arrows beneath mantle gore
 honour pleasure behoves
 woman prefer much
 man beyond life honour treasures
 esteemed pleasures

 v
 duty good rogero satisfied
 following royal lord came
 fair cause quit side
 could leave paynim without shame
 sire almontes died
 king agramant blame
 parents' every past offence
 made rogero mighty recompense

 vi
 perform duty repair
 liegelord martial maid
 reiterated prayer
 might done rogero stayed
 stripling may appay warlike fair
 season appaid
 twice two hundred years atone
 crying sin honour foregone

 vii
 arlestown whither king conveyed
 remnant host pricked anew
 since kindred displayed
 close friendship formed  damsels two 
 thither together go charles made
 mightiest effort christian crew
 hoping siege fight break foe
 free kingdom form long woe

 viii
 bradamant camp appeared
 greeted welcome warm kind
 sides hailed cheered
 head inclined
 rinaldo coming heard
 met young richardo stayed behind
 richardet others race
 received maid joyful face

 ix
 next 'tis known second twain
 marphisa arms renowned
 catay unto bounds spain
 journeyed thousand laurels crowned
 rich poor within tents remain
 curious crowd encompassing round
 press harm heave

 x

 first day turpin shown
 marphisa seen bend knee
 pepin's royal son alone
 deserving duty seemed
 mid emperors kings filled throne
