 mighty riches valour famed

 xi
 kindly charlemagne received wide
 pavilions met open view
 king prince peer beside
 monarch placed damsel true
 go dismist none abide
 little time except good
 paladins lords remain without
 left unrespected rabblerout

 xii
 marphisa first began grateful strain
 "unconquered caesar glorious august
 alcides' strait indian main
 mak'st scythian's pale aethiop's race adust
 revere thy christian cross snowy grain
  earthly monarchs thou sage 
 hither thy glory limits bound
 brought world's extremest ground

 xiii
 "and avow truth jealous mood
 alone came alone thee fight
 grudged king puissant shou'd
 exist earth save observed rite
 hence reek ravaged fields christian blood
 yet greater rancour despite
 like cruel foe purposed offend
 chanced one changed friend

 xiv
 "when worst harm scaith thy bands doom
 find leisure show

 evil brother traitorously laid low

 till seventh year wizard nourished
 stolen thieves araby

 xv

 died beneath faulchion
 would fain taken virginity
 grown king court slew
 chased ill race seized royalty
  fortune  month two

 xvi
 "and moved envy thy glorious fame
 heart resolved thou hast heard
 abate grandeur mighty name

 chance served tame
 clip fury's wings heard
 since arrived christendom
 bound ties consanguinity

 xvii
 "and father thee kinsman served
 thou kin servant hast

 whilom guilty death
 unhappy pair gave breath"

 xviii
 adds christian faith receive

 cheating mahound termagant

 ii
 rinaldo unimpeded thought
 strove ways rogero o'erthrow

 vii

 xi

 xii

 touched gold lance overthrew

 xiii

 divided horrid sword cleft

 xiv

 highminded virgin warriors two

 xix

 xx
 monarchs could haste engage
 raked africa host contained
 whether fitting feeble age
 scarce impressing women refrained

 feeble dispirited array

 xxi
 proved foe scarce view
 levy broke panic dread
 like sheep quailing bands astolpho slew
 charging martial squadrons' head

 xxii
 grieved bucifaro's loss alone
 lost rest arms arrayed
 wide want ramparts town
 could ill raised without aid
 fain ransom thinks upon
 means stands afflicted dismayed
 recollects paladin
 dudon many month prisoner

 xxiii
 monaco upon shore
 first passage sarza's monarch took
 thenceforth prisoner evermore
 dudon derived danish stock
 paladin royal moor

 knowing sure spy astolpho led

 xxiv
 paladin astolpho knows
 gladly ought paladin free
 case moorish envoy shows
 king branzardo's offer agree
 dudon prison loosed thanks bestows
 whatsoe'er pertains land sea
 bestirs accomplish accord
 illustrious chief english lord

 xxv
 astolpho leading countless band
 might well seven africas opprest
 recollecting 'twas saint's command
 upon whilere imposed quest
 fair provence aquamorta's strand
 reaving saracen wrest
 made numerous host second draught
 least inapt sea thought

 xxvi
 filling next full could
 hands many different sorts leaves
 plucked palm olive bay cedar tree
 approached shore cast waves
 oh blessed souls oh great felicity
 grace rarely man god receives
 strange wondrous miracle sprung
 leaves upon waters flung

 xxvii
 wax number beyond esteem
 becoming crooked heavy long wide
 hard timber turn solid beam
 slender veins branch either side
 taper masts moored salt stream
 thought transformed vessels ride
 diverse qualities appear
 plants whereon grew whilere

 xxviii
 miracle see grown
 galliot galley frigate ship boat
 wondrous tackling
 found well barks afloat
 lack men govern blown
 blustering winds  islands remote 
 sardinia corsica every rate
 pilot patron mariner mate

 xxix
 twentysix thousand troop manned
 ready barks every sort kind
 dudon's government sea land
 leader sage navy consigned
 yet lay anchored moorish strand
 expecting favourable wind
 put sea freighted load

 xxx
 carried bridge dread
  narrow place battle met 
 rodomont took often said
 valiant olivier set
 orlando's kin prisoners led

 tell whereof need
 german gascon italian seed

 xxxi
 patron yet unweeting find
 foes port entered unload
 left argier many miles behind
 minded made abode
 boisterous overblowing wind
 driven bark beyond destined road
 deeming safe welcome guest
 progne seeks noisy nest

 xxxii
 arrived imperial eagle spread
 pards golden lilies descries
 countenance sicklied o'er dread
 stands one unwary guise
 chanced fell poisonous snake tread
 grass opprest slumber lies
 pale startled hastens retire
 ill reptile swoln bane ire

 xxxiii
 retreat peril
 patron keep prisoners
 thither brandimart olivier
 sansonet others drag known
 greeted friends joyful cheer
 england's duke danish ogier's son
 read brought shore
 pains sentenced oar

 xxxiv
 king otho's son kind welcome afford
 unto christian cavaliers said
  honoured hospitable board 
 arms things needful purveyed
 going sake danish lord
 deferred deemed voyage well delayed
 parley peers though cost
 one two good days harbour lost

 xxxv
 charles state order
 affairs france gave advices true
 told best could disembark
 advantage christian crew
 cavaliers news declare
 noise heard ever louder grew
 followed fierce alarm withal
 fears one gave rise

 xxxvi
 duke astolpho goodly throng
 discourse occupied
 armed moment coursers sprung
 hurried nubians loudest cried
 seeking wherefore wide larum rung
  warlike lords espied
 savage man one strong hand
 naked sole troubled band

 xxxvii
 naked savage whirled sapling round
 hard heavy strong grain
 every time weapon went ground
 warrior maimed opprest plain
 hundred dead strewed around
 defence routed hands maintain
 save war distant parts try
 none wait champion nigh

 xxxviii
 astolpho brandimart danish knight
 hastening towards noise olivier
 remain astounded wondrous might
 courage wild man appear
 posting thither palfry light
 seen damsel clad sable gear
 brandimart haste lady goes
 arms warrior throws

 xxxix
 fair flordelice whose bosom
 burned love monodantes' son
 left prisoner foe
 streight bridge nigh distracted gone
 france past hither  given know 
 proud paynim deed done
 brandimart many cavaliers
 prisoner city algiers

 xl
 harbour would weighed
 eastern vessel marseilles found
 thither ancient knight conveyed
 monodantes' household long round
 seek brandimart lord made
 sea upon many distant ground
 upon way heard told
 france find warrior bold

 xli
 knowing old bardino wight
 bardino monodantes' court
 little brandimart taken flight
 reared nursling sylvan fort
 hearing thither brought knight
 made loosen port
 relating elder chance
 brandimart africk passed france

 xlii
 soon landed biserta lies
 besieged good astolpho's band hear
 brandimart emprize
 learn learn matter clear
 haste damsel flies
 beholds faithful cavalier
 plainly shows joy woes o'erblown
 made mightiest ever known

 xliii
 gentle baron less gladly eyed
 faithful beloved consort's face
 prized things beside
 clipt welcomed loving grace
 warm wishes would satisfied
 first second third embrace
 spied bardino came
 france together faithful dame

 xliv
 stretched arms would embrace knight
  wherefore come  would bid say
 prevented sudden flight
 sacred host fled disarray
 club mad naked wight
 brandished sapling cleared way
 flordelice viewed furious man front
 cried brandimart "behold count"

 xlv
 time withal astolpho bold
 good orlando plainly knew
 signs whereof ancient saints told
 earthly paradise tokens true
 none others knight behold
 courteous baron madman view
 long selfneglect wild ran
 visage beast man

 xlvi
 breast heart transfixed pity cried
 valiant astolpho  bathed many tear 
 turning danish dudon side
 afterwards valiant olivier
 "behold orlando" awhile eyed
 straining eyes lids knew peer
 seeing piteous plight
 filled grief wonder sight

 xlvii
 grieve lament greater part
 good warriors eyes o'erflow
 " `tis time" astolpho cried "to find art
 heal indulge useless woe"
 courser sprang bold brandimart
 olivier sansonet dudon
 leap ground together make
 roland warriors fain would take

 xlviii
 seeing circle round grow
 levels club furious paladin
 makes fierce dudon feel  couched
 buckler  madman would break
 grievous staff's descending blow
 olivier orlando's kin
 broke sort force stake accurst
 shield helmet head body burst

 xlix
 burst shield thunder
 broke casque dudon prest shore
 sir sansonet cut clean asunder
 sapling shorn two clothyards
 vigorous warrior's stroke
 bosom brandimart girt roland sore
 sinewy arms body flung
 champion's legs astolpho clung

 l
 orlando shook england's knight
 ten paces reversed upon ground
 yet loosed brandimart might
 better hold clasped madman round
 olivier forward fight
 dealt furious fell wound
 clenched fist pale marquis fell
 purple streams eyes nostrils well

 li
 save morion good
 bold olivier breathed last lies
 battered fall seemed wou'd
 bequeath parting soul paradise
 astolpho dudon upstood
 albeit swoln dudon's face eyes
 sansonet plied well sword
 made together anglantes' lord

 lii
 dudon orlando behind embraced
 foot furious peer would throw
 astolpho others seize arms waste
 strength attempts hold foe
 seen bull mastiffs chased
 gore bleeding ears fury lowe
 dragging dogs bait
 yet tusks unable get clear

 liii
 let imagine orlando drew
 astolpho banded knights along
 meanwhile upstarted oliviero
 fell fistycuff earth flung
 seeing could ill roland
 sought good astolpho throng
 meditates compasses way
 frantic paladin earth lay

 liv
 many hawser made thither bring
 running knots quickly tied
 count's waist arms legs fling
 among ends divide
 conveyed amid ring
 compassing roland upon every side
 warriors thus orlando flung parforce
 farrier throws struggling ox horse

 lv
 soon upon
 hands feet tightly constrain
 shakes plunges
 efforts relief vain
 astolpho bade hence prisoner bear
 would heal said warrior's brain
 shouldered sturdy dudon load
 beach's furthest brink bestowed

 lvi
 seven times astolpho makes wash knight
 seven times plunged beneath brine goes
 cleanse away scurf blight
 stupid limbs visage grows
 done herbs occasion dight
 stop mouth wherewith puffs blows
 save nostrils would astolpho leave
 passage whence count might air receive

 lvii
 valiant astolpho prepared vase
 wherein orlando's senses contained
 nostrils mode conveys
 drawingin breath county drained
 mystic cup withal oh wondrous case
 unsettled mind ancient seat regained
 glorious reasonings yet clear
 lucid waxed wisdom whilere

 lviii
 one seems troubled sleep see
 abominable shapes horrid crew
 monsters cannot
 seems strange unlawful thing
 yet marvels slumber free
 recovered senses play true
 good orlando made sound
 remains yet full wonder astound

 lix
 aldabelle's brother monodantes' son
 brain cure wrought
 wondering marked word spake none
 brought thither thought
 turned restless eyes
 withal imagined aught
 marvelling naked cast
 wherefore tethered neck heels fast

 lx
 said erst silenus said  seen
 taken sleeping cave yore 
 solvite visage serene
 look much less wayward
 bonds delivered clean
 raiment naked warrior bore
 comforting friend grief opprest
 delusion possest

 lxi
 former self recovered
 wiser manlier mind e'er
 love well freed enamoured lord
 gentle deemed fair whilere
 renowned orlando adored
 worthless thing appear
 love lost reacquire
 whole study whole desire

 lxii
 meanwhile bardino told brandimart
 monodantes good sire dead
 brother gigliantes' part
 call kingdom sped
 well isles apart
 lands eastern seas spread
 prince's fair inheritance
 none pleasant populous rich

 lxiii
 said mid many reasons prest
 home sweet  warrior fain
 taste sweet  ever would detest
 wandering life brandimart
 replies war rest
 serving roland king charlemagne
 lives see end
 matters better attend

 lxiv
 upon following day provence steer
 shipping danish dudon's care
 duke retired anglantes' peer
 heard lord warfare's state declare
 prest siege biserta far near
 let good england's knight honour wear
 every vantage astolpho still
 guided orlando's

 lxv
 order taken attack town
 huge biserta side
 first assault walls
 orlando palm divide
 lament shall leave unshown
 since short time lay tale aside
 meanwhile fierce overthrow
 moors received france pleased know

 lxvi
 well nigh abandoned royal lord
 worst peril arles
 gone many paynim horde
 sage sobrino king spain
 deemed land unsafe aboard
 barks sought refuge numerous train
 barons cavaliers served moor
 moved example put shore

 lxvii
 yet royal agramant fight maintains
 longer make stand
 turns combat directly strains
 arles far remote upon strand
 rabican pursues flowing reins
 aymon's daughter drives heel hand
 would slay often crost
 martial maid rogero lost

 lxviii
 marphisa desire stirred
 thoughts tardy vengeance placed
 dead sire fiercely spurred
 made hot courser feel rider's haste
 neither martial maid amid herd
 flying moors well monarch chased
 o'ertake swift retreat
 first arles aboard fleet

 lxix
 two fair generous pards crag
 together dart stretch across plain
 perceive vigorous goat stag
 nimble quarry pursued vain
 ashamed chase lag
 return repentant high disdain
 sigh return damsels two
 paynim king safety view

 lxx
 yet therefore halt fury go
 amid crowd flies possest dread
 feeling every blow
 many never uprear head
 evil pass brought broken foe
 safety even fled
 since agramant sure retreat gain
 bade shut citygate faced plain

 lxxi
 bade rhone break bridges
 unhappy people ever held cheap
  weighed tyrant's want wears crown 
 worthless herd goats silly sheep
 sea river drown
 blood thirsty fallows steep
 franks prisoners made many slew
 ransom battle

 lxxii
 great multitude either train
 christened paynim killed last fight
 though unequal parts slain
 far saracens killed flight
 hands redoubted damsels twain
 signs even day remain sight
 hard arles sleeps lazy rhone
 plain rising sepulchres strown

 lxxiii
 meanwhile heavy ships deepest draught
 king agramant made put forth sea
 leaving barks port  lightest craft 
 would aboard navy flee
 stays two days stragglers waft
 winds wild contrary
 third day sail give command
 trust make return africk's land

 lxxiv
 royal marsilius fatal hour
 fearing costs fall upon spain
 clouds big tempest lower
 end burst upon fields grain
 makes valentia town tower
 begins fortify mickle pain
 war prepares ends
 destruction friends

 lxxv
 king agramant sails africk bent
 barks illarmed almost empty go
 empty men full discontent
 threefourths perished foe
 cruel weak proud shent
 king still happens like woe
 hate privily fear
 fury presence mute appear

 lxxvi
 yet sometimes two three lips unclose
  knot friends relies 
 pent choler rage expose
 yet agramant beneath illusion lies
 love pity overflows
 befalls still espies
 false faces hears voices applaud
 nought adulation lies fraud

 lxxvii
 biserta's port host land
 sage king africa's intent
 sure news shore nubia's band
 held far meant
 steer moorish squadron strand
 steep rugged descent
 would disembark thence would aid
 forthwith people broken dismaid

 lxxviii
 favoured foul destiny
 intention provident wise
 willed fleet leaves greenwood tree
 produced upon beach wondrous guise
 bound france ploughed foaming sea
 meet king night surprise
 dark dismal hour amid crew
 worse panic disorder might ensue

 lxxix
 yet tidings conveyed
 squadrons force billows plow
 would believed said
 hundred barks sprung one small bough
 hence africa king weighed
 fearing encounter hostile prow
 watchmen tops spy
 make report hence descry

 lxxx
 `twas ships england's peer supplied
 dudon manned good armed crew
 see moorish fleet eventide
 strange armament forthwith pursue
 assailed unawares far wide
 among barks grapplingirons threw
 linked chains opponents clung
 known moors foemen tongue

 lxxxi
 bearing impelled winds blow
 propitious danish chief's intent
 weighty ships shocked paynim foe
 many vessels bottom went
 taxing wits hands work woe
 fire sword stones christians shent
 ships wide ruin pour
 like tempest never vext sea

 lxxxii
 bold dudon's men unwonted might
 daring imparted high
 since hour come paynims requite
 one ill deed far nigh
 moors pestilently gall smite
 agramant finds shelter sky
 thick clouds whistling arrows strike
 around gleam hook hatchet sword pike

 lxxxiii
 king hears huge heavy stones descend
 charged machine thundering engine sent
 falling poop prow broadside rend
 opening ravening seas mighty vent
 furious fires offend
 fires quickly kindled slowly spent
 wretched crews would fain danger shun
 ever direr peril run

 lxxxiv
 one headlong plunged pursued fire sword
 perished mid waters one wrought
 faster arms feet passage oared
 barque already overfraught
 repulsed wretch fain would board
 whose hand importunately sought
 clamber grasped side lopt arm
 body stained wave lifeblood warm

 lxxxv
 save life i' waters thought
 worst perish less pain
 since swimming profited caitiff nought
 perceived strength courage drain
 hungry fires refuge sought
 fear drowning hurries back
 grasps burning plank dread
 dying either death sped

 lxxxvi
 vainly sea resorts spear
 hatchet brandished close hand dismay
 stone arrow following rear
 permit craven make little way
 haply yet delights ear
 'twere well wisely done end lay
 rather harp upon theme long
 annoy tedious song


 canto 40

 argument
 fly royal agramant fain
 sees biserta burning far away
 landing finds royal sericane
 faith gives goodly warrant
 defy orlando backed champions twain
 bold gradasso firmly trusts slay
 seven kings' sake fast prisoners foes
 rogero dane exchange rude blows



 diverse chances seafight dread
 rehearse would take weary
 discourse upon head
 great son hercules samos' isle
 carry earthen vessels 'tis said
 athens owls crocodiles nile
 lord vouched
 things saw things made others see

 ii
 faithful people gazed long show
 night day wherein crowded stood
 theatre hemmed po
 twixt fire sword hostile navies viewed
 outcries may heard sounds woe
 rivers may run red human blood
 suchlike combat many mode
 men die saw many showed

 iii
 saw compelled course
 evermore changing nags six days
 rome heat haste helpful force
 mighty pastor implore
 need none foot horse
 lion's beak claws tore
 day unto hear said
 trouble land bread

 iv
 trotto present victory
 afranio moro albert hannibal
 zerbinat bagno ariostos three
 assured mighty feat withal
 certified ensignry
 suspended holy temple's wall
 fifteen galleys riverside
 thousand captive barks spied

 v
 wrecks blazing fires discerned
 sore slaughter different shows
  venging us hall palace burned 
 bark remained raged wide among foes
 might also deem africk's people mourned
 agramant mid diverse deaths woes
 dark night redouted dane
 assaulted mid sea moorish train

 vi
 'twas night gleam anywhere descried
 first fleets furious strife blended
 lit sulphur pitch tar side
 poop prow sky ascended
 destructive wildfire scattered wide
 fed upon ship shallop ill defended
 things descried clear
 night changed day 'twould appear

 vii
 hence agramant dark deceived
 rated high foes' array
 encounter force believed
 would 'twere opposed last give way
 wide darkness cleared perceived
 least weened upon first affray
 twice many ships fought
 moorish barks took thought

 viii
 boat descends
 brigliador precious things flee
 twixt ship ship silence wends
 finds safer sea
 far fiery dudon shends
 reduced sad sore extremity
 steel destroys fires burn waters drown
 mighty slaughter's cause flown

 ix
 agramant flies old sobrine
 agramant grieving believed
 time sage foresaw eye divine
 told woe wherewith aggrieved
 turn valiant paladine
 aid received
 counsels duke biserta destroy
 may christian france annoy

 x
 hence public order said
 camp arms third day stand
 many barks bested
 placed dane's command
 fleet worthy sansonetto led
 good warrior sea land
 mile port overight
 biserta anchored knight

 xi
 orlando duke like christians true
 dare danger without god guide
 fast prayer made army
 ordain proclamation cried
 upon third day view
 signal shall bown far wide
 biserta's royal city attack
 taken doom fire sack

 xii
 devoutly done
 vigil vow holy prayer fast
 kin friends one another known
 together feast glad repast
 wasted bodies refreshed begun
 embrace weep acts speeches past
 upon banquet's close amid crews
 best friends sever use

 xiii
 holy priests within biserta's wall
 pray grieving people tears
 aye beat bosoms succour call
 upon mahomet nothing hears
 vigils offerings gifts withal
 promised silently amid fears
 temples statues images vowed
 memory bitter woes aloud

 xiv
 cadi hath blessing said
 people arms rampart hies
 yet reposing tithon's bed
 aurora dusky skies
 posts several troops head
 sansonetto astolpho flies
 hear orlando's signal blown
 assault furious force biserta's town

 xv
 washed sea upon two quarters
 city walls two stood dry shore
 construction excellent rare
 wherein seen work days yore
 bulwarks town nigh bare
 since branzardo sceptre bore
 masons command little space
 monarch fortify place

 xvi
 nubian king charged england's peer
 sling arrow moors gall
 none upon works shall dare appear
 protected ceaseless fall
 stone dart safety cavalier
 footman may approach wall
 loaded plank rockstone
 beam weightier burden come

 xvii
 thing nubians bore
 degrees filledup channel wide
 whose waters cut day
 many parts ooze spied
 filled ditch haste shore shore
 forms level side
 cheering footmen works mount
 stand olivier astolpho count

 xviii
 nubian upon hope gain intent
 impatient delay heeding
 pressing perils compassed went
 protected sheltering boar sow
 battering ram instrument
 break gate make turret bow
 speedily city wall post
 unprovided find paynim host

 xix
 steel fire roof turret
 guise tempest nubians fell
 plank beam dread engines tear
 made annoyance infidel
 ill beginning dim air
 much injury christened host befell
 sun rich mansion breaks
 fortune faction moor forsakes

 xx
 assault reinforced every side
 count orlando sea land
 fleet sansonetto guide
 entered harbour approached strand
 sorely various engines plied
 arrows slings paynim band
 sent assailants scalingladder spear
 naval stores every needful gear

 xxi
 orlando oliviero brandimart
 air daring heretofore
 fierce furious battle part
 lies furthest inland shore
 leads portion aethiops swart
 ordered equal bands beneath four
 walls gateways elsewhere
 give prowess shining proofs rare

 xxii
 better could seen warrior's claim
 confused combat
 reward worthy shame
 thousand watchful eyes clear
 dragged upon wheels towers wooden frame
 others welltrained elephants uprear
 o'ertop turrets foe
 bulwarks stand mighty space

 xxiii
 brandimart walls ladder brought
 climbed climb withal others cried
 many succeed bold assurance fraught
 none fear beneath good guide
 one marked one thought
 marking weight would abide
 brandimart foes intent
 clambered fought grasped battlement

 xxiv
 clang hand foot daring knight
 sprang embattled wall whirled sword
 showing mickle tokens might
 paynims charged o'erthrew hewed gored
 o'erburthened weight
 ladder breaks beneath assailing horde
 saving brandimart christians
 ditch headlong ruin fall

 xxv
 therefore blenched valiant cavalier
 thought retreat albeit none
 band followed rear
 although mark town
 many prayed warrior would hear
 prayer turn mid foes leapt
 say city took leap
 townwall thirty cubits deep

 xxvi
 without harm hard ground
 feathers straw light
 like cloth shred shorn paynims round
 fury shreds shears valiant knight
 springs vigorous bound
 betake flight
 without seen leap made
 late save deem human aid

 xxvii
 throughout squadrons deep rumour flew
 murmur whisper
 mouth mouth fame motion grew
 told magnified tale fear
 upon many quarters stormed crew
 good orlando olivier
 otho's son flew pinions light
 ever paused upon nimble flight

 xxviii
 warriors orlando
 love prize gentle brandimart
 hearing defy upon call
 would renowned comrade part
 scalingladders plant mount wall
 rivalry shows kingly heart
 carry terror look
 sight foemen shook

 xxix
 loud ocean lashed boisterous gale
 billows rash bark assault still 
 threatening poop threatening prow  assail
 rage fury fain would fill
 pilot sighs groans dismaid pale
  aid heart skill 
 length surge pinnace sweeps swallows
 wave wave long succession follows

 xxx
 thus win wall leave space
 wide beneath conduct go
 safely may follow base
 thousand ladders reared
 meanwhile battering rams many place
 breached wall mighty blow
 bold assailant many part
 bear succour gallant brandimart

 xxxi
 even rage wherewith stream reigns
 king rivers  breaks mound
 makes way mantuan plains 
 greasy furrows glad harvests round
 sheepcotes flock dogs swains
 bears o'erwhelming waters drowned
 elm's high top fishes glide
 fowls erewhile nimble pinions plied

 xxxii
 even rage rushed impetuous band
 many breaches wall wrought
 slay burning torch trenchant brand
 people evil pass brought
 murder rapine violent hand
 dipt deep blood plunder thought
 destroy sumptuous triumphant town
 africk wore royal crown

 xxxiii
 filled dead bodies paynim horde
 blood issued many gaping wound
 fouler fosse formed worse ford
 girdles infernal city round
 house house fire fury poured
 mosque portico palace went ground
 spoiled empty mansions clang
 beaten breast groan outcry rang

 xxxiv
 victors laden mighty prey
 unhappy city's gates gone
 one fair vase one rich array
 silver plate ancient altar
 mother bore child away
 rapes thousand evil things done
 much cannot hinder hear
 renowned orlando fair england's peer

 xxxv
 olivier amid slaughter wide
 fell bucifaro paynim band
  every hope comfort cast aside 
 branzardo slew brand
 pierced three wounds whereof shortly died
 folvo taken astolpho's hand
 monarchs three intrusted whose care
 agramant's african dominions

 xxxvi
 agramant left without guide
 fleet sobrino fled
 wept biserta spied
 fires royal city fed
 nearer king certified
 cruel strife town sped
 thought dying slain
 sobrino's words arm restrain

 xxxvii
 "what victory lord" sobrino cries
 "could better thy death christian cheer
 whence might hope joy quiet wise
 fair africa annoyance clear
 thy yet alive hope denies
 hence shall evermore cause fear
 well foeman knows save thou art gone
 short time fill thine africk throne

 xxxviii
 "thy subjects thy death deprived
 hope good store
 thou thou liv'st trust shalt set us free
 redeem trouble joy restore
 captives ever thou diest
 africk tributary evermore
 although thyself yet give
 liege annoyance thy followers live

 xxxix
 "the soldan thy neighbour
 surely men money thee aid
 evil eye king pepin's son
 strong africa surveyed
 efforts restore thee thy throne
 norandine thy kinsman made
 turk persian armenian arab mede
 prayed assist thee thy need"

 xl
 like words wary art
 hope quickly winning back reign
 sobrino soothed king heart
 thought perchance entertain
 well knows pass evil mart
 lord brought often sighs vain
 whoe'er foregoes sceptre swayed
 barbarians hath recourse aid

 xli
 jugurtha martial hannibal
 ancient times good proof afford
 era lewis hight moor
 delivered lewis' ward
 brother duke alphonso wiser lore
 learned fate  speak lord 
 wont madmen decry
 others rely

 xlii
 therefore aye throughout warfare drear
 waged pontiff fierce disdain
 albeit upon feeble powers peer
 could ill depend though italian plain
 driven friend aided whilere
 foe possessed naples' reign
 menace promise steeled
 ne'er another would dukedom yield

 xliii
 eastward king agramant turned prow
 seaward steered bark africk wide
 land wicked wind 'gan blow
 took reeling vessel one side
 master seated helm brow
 raised towards heaven monarch cried
 "i see fell fierce tempest form
 pinnace cannot face pelting storm

 xliv
 "if lords listen lore
 isle lefthand
 seems well make shore
 till overblown tempest's fury be"
 advice assents royal moor
 makes larboard land peril free
 sailor's weal tempests rise
 'twixt vulcan's lofty forge africk lies

 xlv
 juniper myrtle overgrown
 habitations islet bare
 pleasing solitude alone
 harbour wild stag roebuck deer hare
 save fishermen little known
 oftentimes shorn brambles
 hang moist nets meanwhile untroubled sleep
 scaly fishes quiet deep

 xlvi
 vessel sheltered main
 found tempest tost upon land
 conveyed king sericane
 erewhile arles one hand
 reverent wise worthy twain
 valiant kings embraced upon strand
 friends monarchs late
 walls paris arms together bore

 xlvii
 much displeasure sericana's knight
 heard king agramant griefs displaid
 consoled cause fight
 like courteous king kindly offer made
 brooked nat egypt's people light
 lacking faith resort aid
 "that thither perilous wend
 exiles said warned pompey's end

 xlviii
 "and senapus' aethiopian crew
 come beneath astolpho ye show
 wrest fruitful africa
 burnt laid chiefest city low
 squadrons orlando
 wandering void wit short ago
 fittest cure whereby scape
 trouble meseems shape

 xlix
 "i love undertake quest
 count single combat appear
 vainly would wot contest
 wholly made copper steel
 rate christian church rest
 wolf rates lambs hungering meal
 next thought nubian band
  brief easy task  free land

 l
 "i make nubians hold
 another faith divided nile's course
 arabs macrobians rich gold
 men herds horse
 chaldaean perse many controlled
 good sceptre mighty force
 make war upon nubians' reign
 reavers shall land remain"

 li
 gradasso's second offer seemed
 opportune king troyano's son
 much blest chances sea
 upon desert isle thrown
 yet would upon pact agree
  nay repossess biserta's town 
 gradasso fight contend
 deeming sore honour 'twoud offend

 lii
 "if roland defied due
 battle king replies
 prepared let god
 good evil wise"
 "  follow mode another mode new
 comes mind" gradasso cries
 "let us together wage fight
 orlando another knight"

 liii
 "so left care
 first last said agramant know
 arms better find thee
 though seek comrade high low
 sobrino cried becomes
 expert old show
 evermore peril good
 force counsel neighbourhood"

 liv
 stricken years yet vigorous sage
 well proved sword spear
 said found gray old age
 green supple youth whilere
 claim embassage
 forthwith courier find bid steer
 africa camped christians lie
 count orlando part defy

 lv
 equal number armed knights
 matching foes lampedosa's shore
 quarters circumfluent sea
 inisled heard roar
 paynim messenger unceasingly
 like one needful haste used sail oar
 till found roland biserta
 host beneath eye plunder share

 lvi
 three monarchs cavalier
 invitation public told
 pleasing anglante's valiant peer
 herald liberal gold
 companions heard whilere
 durindane gradasso's hold
 hence retrieve faulchion foe
 india count resolved go

 lvii
 deeming find king elsewhere
 heard sailed french shore
 nearer place offered
 hopes gradasso shall prize restore
 moved also almontes' bugle rare
 accept challenge herald bore
 less brigliadoro since knew
 agramant's possession two

 lviii
 chose companions fight
 faithful brandimart olivier
 well proved one other's might
 knows alike passing dear
 good horses good armour seeks knight
 goodly swords lances far near
 meseems known
 none three warriors

 lix
 orlando oft certified
 fury scattered wide far
 rodomont took others' beside
 river locked high turret
 throughout africa could provide
 well france long war
 king agramant born away best
 africa possest

 lx
 could armour rusted o'er
 brown age orlando bids unite
 meanwhile companions shore
 walks discoursing future fight
 wandering camp three miles
 chanced turning towards sea sight
 full sail approaching descried
 helmless barque nought course guide

 lxi
 without pilot without crew alone
 wind fortune ordered bound
 vessel neared shore sails fullblown
 furrowing waves took ground
 ere three warriors shown
 love wherewith child bound
 story brings back bids record
 past 'twixt clermont's warlike lord

 lxii
 spake good pair warriors
 retreated martial fray
 beholding pact treaty broken
 every troop band disarray
 leader oath first untrue
 occasion evil
 study learn passing train
 king agramant emperor charlemagne

 lxiii
 meanwhile servant child's hand
  faithful expert wary wight
 shock either furious band
 ever warlike lord lost sight 
 bold rogero bore horse brand
 might aid comrades flight
 rogero backed steed grasped sword
 battle mixed martial lord

 lxiv
 thence departed first renewed
 compact montalban's knight 
 agramant convinced perjury stood 
 evil sect would forego
 day feats hardihood
 rogero perform foe
 demands make arles
 first broke faith king agramant charles

 lxv
 hears repeated far near
 agramant broke promise plight
 loves king side veer
 believes would error light
 moors broke scattered whilere
 rehearsed giddy height
 revolving wheel downward hurled
 pleasure rolls nether world

 lxvi
 rogero ponders remain
 rather sovereign lord attend
 love lady fits rein
 bit lets africk wend
 wheels counter course
 spurs threats restive mood shend
 save maintains treaty troth
 pledged paladin solemn oath

 lxvii
 wakeful stinging care side
 scourges goads less cavalier
 lest agramant divide
 taxed baseness fear
 many deem well abide
 many many would ill appear
 many would say oaths unbinding
 'tis unlawful unjust swear

 lxviii
 day ensuing night
 remains alone following day
 forever sifting doubtful sprite
 better depart stay
 lastly agramant decides knight
 africk wend way
 moved love liegelady sore
 moved honour duty

 lxix
 made arles yet hoped would ride
 fleet africa might bear
 port offing ships espied
 saracens save dead beheld
 agramant swept roadstead wide
 burnt vessels
 rogero takes road hope fails
 along seabeat shore toward marseilles

 lxx
 upon boat hoped lay hand
 love force thence convey
 already ogier's son made land
 barbarians' fleet captive prey
 could cast grain sand
 vessels moored closely lay
 mighty squadrons harbour brought
 conquerors prisoners fraught

 lxxi
 vessels moor made
 food fire water night
 saving fled conveyed
 safe marseilles victorious knight
 seven kings moorish sceptres swayed
 seen squadron put flight
 seven ships yielded foe
 stood mute weeping overwhelmed woe

 lxxii

 bent find charlemagne day

 round stood nubian victors gay

 lxxiii

 believed fleet agramant

 lxxiv

 good faulchion forged stubborn grain

 win better audience rhyme
 canto defer time

 ii
 drink cost good icarus drew
 yore sunburned sicklemen cheer
 'tis said lured celts boi
 alpine hills untouched toil whilere
 well shows cordial draught new
 since preserves virtue year
 tree wintry foliage cleaves
 well shows verdant spring tide leaves

 iii
 famous lineage many years
 courtesy great lasting light
 ever brightening burns appears
 shine flame clearly sight
 well proves sire este's noble peers
 must amid mortals shone forth bright

 glad sun mid glittering orbs high

 iv

  toward dane virtues stood confest

 v

 wish slay youthful knight
 spared open side

 vi

 contention cannot fall 
 cannot mine confess
 conquered captive thy courtesy"
 rogero answered "and less

 upon condition seven
 freed bondage given"

 vii
 showed seven whereof spake
 bound drooping heads sad array

 seven allowed bear away
 bark well likes best chooses
 amid vessels africk looses

 viii
 looses bark sail bold wise
 trusting fickle wind seaward stood
 first due course vessel flies
 fills pilot full hardihood
 beach retreats sailors' eyes
 fades sea appears shoreless flood
 upon darkening day wind
 displays fickle perfidious kind

 ix
 shifts poop beam beam prow
 even short season doth remain
 reeling ship confounds pilot
 struck fore aft beam
 threatening billows rise haughty brow
 neptune's white herd lows main
 many deaths appear daunt rout
 waves beat troubled bark

 x
 blows wind front rear
 drives wave anend back
 others reeling vessel's side o'erpeer
 every billow threatens equal wrack
 pilot sighs confused pale fear
 vainly calls aloud shift tack
 strike jibe yard hand
 signs crew thing would command

 xi
 sound signal little boots eye
 sees amid dim rainy night
 voice unheard ascends sky 
 sky louder larum smite
 troubled sailors' universal cry
 roar waters together fight
 unheard every hest
 starboard larboard upon poop prow

 xii
 strained tackle sounds hollow roar
 wherein struggling wind fury breaks
 forked lightning flashes evermore
 fearful thunder heaven's wide concave shakes
 one rudder runs one grasps oar
 several office betakes
 one make fast another let go
 water water others throw

 xiii
 lo howling horribly sounding blast
 boreas sudden fury blows
 scourges tattered sail reeling mast
 almost high heaven water flows

 tempest pelts prow leeward goes
 ungoverned vessel's battered side
 undefended foaming tide

 xiv
 fallen starboard side beam ends
 turn keel uppermost lies
 meanwhile soul heaven recommends
 surer sure sink piteous cries
 scathe upon scathe malicious fortune sends

 many part hostile water streams

 xv
 fierce assault cruel coil doth keep
 upon sides wintry tempest fell
 sight high billows leap
 seems heaven would swell
 plunging wave sink deep
 appear spy gulfs hell
 small hope none faultering breath

 xvi
 despiteous sea livelong night
 drifted wind fury blew

 lo bare rock ahead appears sight

 towards cliff despite impel
 raging tempest roaring swell

 xvii
 three times four palefaced pilot wrought

 lower ease bellying canvas aught

 hard mortal peril prest

 xviii

 many invade boat

 xx

 whence issues sad clamour lament

 c

 ci

 canto 42

 argument
 victory count orlando lies
 good rinaldo bradamant heart
 one angelica sighs
 young rogero suffer cruel smart
 chase indian damsel hies
 disdain preserves thence depart
 towards italy courteous cheer
 welcome guested cavalier



 bit iron curb found
 could adamantine rein
 make wrath keep order due bound
 within lawful limits contain
 one constant heart bound
 linked love solid bolt chain
 see violence foul deceit
 mortal damage dishonour meet

 ii
 mind sometimes possest
 ill savage action led astray
 may deserve excuse breast
 reason's sovereign sway
 achilles beneath borrowed crest
 saw patroclus crimsoning way
 murderer's slaughter ill content
 till mangled corse dragged shent

 iii
 unconquered duke alphonso anger
 inflamed thy host day weighty stone
 wounded thy forehead grievous blow
 believed rest gone
  inflamed fury foe
 rampart fosse wall defence none
 one within works lay dead
 wight left woeful news spread

 iv
 seeing thy fall caused thine mighty pain
 fury moved hadst thou lord
 maintained thy footing haply might thy train
 less licence plied murderous sword
 enough thee thy bastia regain
 fewer hours replaced beneath thy ward
 cordova's fierce granada's band
 took days erewhile wrest thy hand

 v
 haply heaven's vengeance ordered befel
 case thy wound hindered thee
 end cruel outrage foul fell
 done band punished
 unhappy vestidel
 wearied hurt sought clemency
 among mostly unchristened train
 mid hundred swords unarmed slain

 vi
 end say rage none
 weighed equal wise
 kindles injury done
 kinsman friend lord eyes
 justly orlando's heart one
 dear might sudden fury rise
 saw extended sand
 slain stroke fierce gradasso's brand

 vii

 slippery line horrid snake seen
 young son amid sands play
 killed venomed tooth enflamed spleen

 fury grasped anglantes' knight

 viii

 ix

 x

 extended shore gradasso's viewed

 xi

 beneath lowest rib faulchion bright
 crimsoned hilt hand's breadth wide
 flank sword appears sight
 well mighty puissance testified
 spoke strongest living knight
 stroke warrior undone
 better paynimry none

 xii
 little victory good orlando cheers
 quickly saddle throws
 face disturbed wet tears

 helmet cleft hatchet's blows

 would defended worse mail

 xiii

 cleft even nose eyes

 whose manly cheeks wet many tear

 xiv
  "roland thy helping orisons
 beseech thee remember me" cried
 "nor recommend thee less warmly "
  flordelice would could say  died
 sounds songs angels sky

 xv

 xvi

 stout courser jammed limb lain

 xvii

 shift withal wounded foot

 without assistance cannot move

 xviii

 heavily hardly weighed

 fast crimson blood drained

 benignly comforts speaks fair

 erewhile board squadron landed

 parts mountainous drear

 says whereon single boot place

 xxii

 canto 43

 argument
 rinaldo courteous landlord hears
 folly destroyed every good
 next learns another story steers
 toward ravenna falling flood
 last arrives conqueror o'er foes
 orlando joyful mood
 child christian made whilere
 christens sobrino heals olivier



 execrable avarice vile thirst
 sordid gold doth astound
 easily thou seizest soul immersed
 baseness taint unsound
 thy chain bind amid worst
 thy talon strike wound
 one loftiness mind would
 worthy praise avoided thee

 ii
 earth sea heaven us square
 know nature's causes works properties
 beginnings endings
 soar till heaven open eyes
 yet steadier aim better care
 stung thy venom sordid wise
 gather treasure single scope
 every comfort every hope

 iii
 armies broken pride
 gates warlike towns triumph past
 foremost breast furious tide
 fearful battle retire last
 yet cannot save stied
 till death thy dark dungeon prisoned fast
 others would shine thou dimm'st praise
 studies arts would raise

 iv
 shall high beauteous dames said
 lovers' worth charms secure
 long service behold staid
 motionless marble shafts endure
 avarice comes spells hath laid
 see stoop directly lure
  could believe  unloving day
 fall elder's fall monster's prey

 v
 without reason raise cry
  read read 
 beaten pathway tread awry
 thus matter song forego
 shown apply
 saying show
 return paladine
 taste enchanted wine

 vi
 fain would think awhile speak
 said ere lips vase bore
 thought thus "when finding seek
 displeases 'tis folly explore
 wife's woman every woman's weak
 let hold faith held
 faith still brought yet contentment brings
 proof better profit springs

 vii
 "from small good much evil foresee
 tempting god moves sometimes disdain
 know wise foolish
 know needs fain
 put away enchanted cup
 neither would goblet drain
 heaven's command much strife
 adam's deed robbed tree life

 viii
 "for sire tasted tree
 god's word eating disobeyed
 fell sorrow felicity
 misery evermore o'erlaid
 husband would know see
 whatever wife done said
 passes happiness grief pain
 ever uplift head again"

 ix
 meanwhile good rinaldo saying
 pushing cup abhorred
 beheld tears plenteous fountain flow
 full eyes fair mansion's lord
 cried somewhat calmed woe
 "accursed persuaded whose word
 alas fortune made assay
 whereby cherished wife reft away

 x
 "wherefore ten years ago wast thou known
 counselled might thee
 sorrows grief begun
 nigh quenched eyes raised shall
 curtain scene thou upon
 pain mayst look mayst lament
 thee mine unheardof woe
 argument head show

 xi
 "above left neighbouring city pent
 within limpid stream forms lake
 widens wherein po finds vent
 way waters benacus take
 built city ruin went
 walls founded agenorean snake
 gentle line mother bore
 small means humble home poor

 xii
 "if fortune's care denied
 upon birth wealthy boon
 nature went graceful form supplied
 beauty rival none
 enamoured youth's early tide
 erewhile dame damsel one
 beauty coupled winning ways
 though becomes man praise

 xiii
 "a sage within city dwelled wight
 beyond belief every science great
 closed eyes phoebus' light
 numbered one hundred years one score eight
 savage life led sight
 impelled love senior late
 dint gifts obtained matron fair
 secretly daughter bare

 xiv
 "and prevent child
 erewhile mother gain
 bartered chastity whose worth alone
 excels gold earth's ample veins contain
 ways man gone
 spies loneliest place train
 demons forces enchantment skilled
 dome spacious fair rich build

 xv
 "by ancient chaste dames made rear
 daughter sovereign beauty grew
 suffered see even hear
 man beside view
  lest lights lack whereby course steer 
 senior every modest lady
 e'er unlawful love barrier shut
 made limn picture sculpture cut

 xvi
 "nor alone virtuous dames sage
 chaste adorned antiquity
 whose fame preserved historic page
 never doomed dying day see
 well future age
 everywhere beautify fair italy
 made fashion wellknown form mien
 eight round fount thee seen

 xvii
 "what time damsel ripe husband shows
 fruit may gathered
 chance misfortune dispose
 worthiest found broad lands lie
 without walls fair town enclose
  fishy flat less upland dry 
 extending twenty miles water
 gives dowry daughter

 xviii
 "she mannered fair hue
 none could desire gifts bring
 well broider taught sew
 minerva knew better sing
 play walk hear view
 seems heavenly mortal thing
 liberal arts skilled well
 sire scarce behind fell

 xix
 "with genius high beauty less bright
 might served stones move
 love sweetness maid unite
 thinking thereof meseems heart clove
 greater pleasure delight
 rest rove
 twas long ere strife fine
 quarrelled fault alas mine

 xx
 "five years consort's father dead
 since yoke stooped pledged vow
 short time manner shall said
 began sorrows feel even
 pinions overspread
 love dame whose praises thus blow
 noble townswoman love
 smit sorely smitten none could

 xxi
 "she magic versed skill
 never enchantress say
 moved solid earth made sun stand still
 illumined gloomy night darkened day
 yet never could work upon
 salve could give except scathe
 erewhile pledged faith

 xxii
 "not right gentle bright
 believed love true
 large gift promise often plight
 yet never ceased sue
 could obtain one spark light
 first flame gentle consort blew
 mates masters every
 knowledge wife's fidelity

 xxiii
 "i hope belief certitude
 wife faithful evermore
 contempt beauty eschewed
 famed daughter fair leda bore
 wit wealth wherewith wooed
 illustrious shepherd upon ida hoar
 repulse withal avails
 ever side assails

 xxiv
 "one day beyond palace sees
 weird enchantress melissa hight
 discourse ease
 finds way whereby peace blight
 goading evil jealousies
 faith nursed heart puts flight
 'gan commending intent
 faithful faithful

 xxv
 " `but faithful ye cannot say
 save faith ye assurance true
 fails withal fail may
 faithful modest may deemed
 never side away
 permitted man view
 boldness come would
 warrant untried modesty

 xxvi
 " `go forth awhile go forth come home alone
 bruit town village spread

 let lovers let couriers head

 though deem unseen

 "i words suchlike words plied

 xxx
 "the offer accept vase
 given trial made full success
 hitherto hoped confirmed see
 gentle consort's worth faithfulness
 'leave awhile melissa said

 xxxi
 "i thought hard leave consort's side
 much truth pain
 could two days abide
 nay hour without could remain
 ` another way melissa cried
 guided truth shall ascertain
 voice vesture shall change sight
 present disguised like wight'

 xxxii
 "sir fair city nigh hand defends
 twixt fierce threatening horns foaming po
 whose jurisdiction shore extends
 sea's briny waters come go
 yields ancientry well contends
 neighbouring towns rich gorgeous show
 trojan remnant foundations placed
 scaped attila's destructive waste

 xxxiii
 "a rich youthful handsome knight

 bore impress heart away

 "and declare gift small
 may hope make

 long recall

 loving faith end

 xxxviii

 sure unseen watchful eye

  bethink thee hue wife became

 xl

 night stream haste descends

 xlii
 "and morn presents
 loved cavalier
 whose semblance whose borrowed face wore

 xliv

 "impatient treated disdain
  loved life said

  behold present cause pain

 ever woman heard"

 xlvii
 tale mournful cavalier taught
 closed history

 xlviii
 "if thy wife avarice inclined

 xlix

 behold brave defence thou sought

 l
 ends rinaldo  parley done 
 rises rest desires go

 house might pleasure lie

  would take counsel guide 
 comfort might sleep throughout night
 yet advance miles "for thou" cried
 "shalt pinnace rapid flight
 without risque shall current glide
 therein shalt thou night pursue thy way
 thy journey gain withal day"

 lii

 cleaves water bird air

  time took way whilere

 cxxxviii

 cxxxix

 erst adonio argia made

 cxl
 "the wife argia hid fast
 sin husband descries

 springs forth saith `ah worthy deed
 found foul filthy work espy'
 bethink thee kindling blushes rise

 central womb earth wretch swallow

 cxli
 "to clear shame doth stun
 anselmo never ceasing upbraid
 `what pain thyself undergone
 filthy deed argia said
 thou would'st take life done
 nature prompted lover prayed
 one fair gentle brought
 gift compared wherewith dome nought

 cxlii
 " `if worthy one death thou deemest
 worthy art thou hundred deaths die
 though pleasure might thee
 passing puissant place
 worse vengeance done shall
 upon side thy delinquency
 give take husband place
 'twas granted thee grant grace

 cxliii
 " `and peace us accord
 forgetfulness consigned
 thee thy fault deed word
 mine henceforward thou remind'
 seemed goodly bargain lord
 pardon disinclined
 thus peace concord home restore
 love dearly evermore"

 cxliv
 said mariner brief fit
 laughter montalban's master stirred
 made visage burn 'twas lit
 fire anselmo's shame heard
 rinaldo greatly praised argia's wit
 quaint device trapped bird
 fell net wherein dame
 erewhile fallen less shame

 cxlv
 sun climbed steeper road knight
 ordered board food supplied
 good mantuan landlord overnight
 took care largest plenty provide
 fair town upon left sight
 retired right marish wide
 argenta come gone circling walls
 stream whose bed santerno falls

 cxlvi
 fair bastia built deem
 little cause boast affords spain
 banner raised high
 causes deeper sorrow romagne
 thence strait line bark seems fly
 right shore boatmen drive amain
 next stagnant channel make near
 ravenna brings noon cavalier

 cxlvii
 though oft money small supply
 knight well bested made
 weary rowers courtesy
 parting present ere farewell said
 changing horse guide rimini
 rinaldo rode eye stayed
 montefiore till night done
 well nigh reached urbino sun

 cxlviii
 frederick gentle lore
 elizabeth guido good
 francis maria sage leonore
 would courteous haughty mood
 forced famed paladin
 one short eye make abode
 long unto day
 dames cavaliers pass way

 cxlix
 since none takes rein rinaldo bends
 course anend cagli o'er height
 rifted gaurus metaurus wends
 past apennine longer right
 umbri tuscans rome descends

 thence city sails wherein grave
 pious son old anchises gave

 cl
 changes back thence haste goes
 bound towards lampedosa's islandshore

 cli

 useful glorious deed done

 hard bloody conquest

 clii

 cliii

 cliv
 fair conquest roland's blade

 clv

 clvi

 mode strange view"

 till sansonetto came

 clvii
 entered sees show

 clviii
 hair life returns
 fastens hand lovely cheeks
 repeating beloved name vain
 force scorn fury wreaks
 uproots tears locks pain

 bacchante horn's rude sound
 erewhile seen run restless round

 clix
 one prayer
 made knife wherewith heart smite
 aboard pinnace would repair
 brought corse either paynim knight
 would either lifeless
 cruel scathe vent fierce despite

 clx
 "ah wherefore brandimart let thee
 without wend dire emprize
 ne'er thy departure see
 flordelice aye followed thee" cries
 "well aided mightest thou
 thee still kept eyes
 gradasso came behind thee
 thee might succoured single cry

 clxi
 "and haply nimbly might made
 stroke might caught
 head buckler stayed
 little ill dying would wrought
 anyhow shall die  debt paid 
 melancholy death profit nought
 died defending thee strife
 could better bestowed life

 clxii

 heaven's host thee sought aid

 ere amid blessed hierarchy

 where'er thou art swiftly shall repair'

 clxiii
 "is brandimart reign
 whose honoured sceptre thou wast take
 thee dommogire thy fair domain
 thus went thus welcome dost thou make
 alas hope today thou renderest vain
 ah designs fell fortune dost thou break
 ah wherefore fear since lot blest
 lost lose well worthless rest"

 clxiv
 repeating plaint spite

 clxvii

 clxviii

 clxix

 redoubled mourning louder grew

 fixing stedfast eyes county said

 clxx
 "o comrade bold true liest slain
 dost live heaven know
 rewarded life thy glorious gain

 clxxi

 clxxii

 clxxxiii

 clxxxv

 three christian warriors homeward borne

 clxxxvi

 might ease wound warlike olivier
 beginning could ill

 clxxxvii

 whose isle none seeking succour vainly tread

 cxcii

 canto 44

 argument
 rinaldo sister child hath plight
 marseilles warrior gone
 crimsoned wide field fight
 therein arrives king otho's valiant son
 paris thence squadron bright
 mighty grace wonderous honour done
 child departs resolved leo's slaughter
 duke aymon betrothed daughter



 poor abode mid paltry walls bare
 amid discomforts calamities
 often friendship heart united
 better roof lordly guise
 royal court beset snare
 mid envious wealth ease luxuries
 charity spent every side
 friendship unless counterfeit spied

 ii
 hence ensues peace pact
 princes peers shortlived wear
 today king pope emperor leagued seen
 marrow deadly foemen
 outward mien
 heart spirit sovereigns bear
 since wholly careless right wrong
 profit look faithless throng

 iii
 though little prone friendship sort
 loveth dwell
 talk earnest sport
 speak except cozening tale tell
 yet together poor resort
 prisoned fortune false fell
 friendship speedily discern
 though years past yet learn

 iv
 retreat ancient eremite
 could bind inmates faster noose
 true love firmly unite
 could domes courtiers use
 enduring knot tight
 nothing short death tie could loose
 benignant hermit found crew
 whiter heart swans outward hue

 v
 kind found courteous lore
 untainted iniquity wise
 painted nevermore
 go forth unless concealed disguise
 injuries among done
 memory comrades buried lies
 could better love one womb
 one seed warlike band come

 vi
 rinaldo lordly train
 rogero graced lovingly caressed
 well listed plain
 proved peer strong martial gest
 courteous humane
 knight e'er laid lance rest
 much many ground
 mighty obligation bound

 vii
 fearful risk richardetto run
 knew rogero bested
 time spanish monarch's hest done
 daughter seized bed
 delivered either son
 good duke buovo erewhile said
 bertolagi maganza's hand
 evil followers paynim band

 viii
 honour hold rogero dear
 sir rinaldo thought debt constrained
 could done whilere
 warlike lord sorely grieved pained
 one africk's monarch couched spear
 one cause royal charles maintained
 rogero christian knew
 could done would

 ix
 welcome endless proffers side
 honour good rogero paid
 prudent sire kindness spied
 opening made pass assayed
 "and nothing else remains" hermit cried
 "nor trust counsel gainsaid
 conjoined friendship shall
 yet faster coupled affinity

 x
 "that two bright progenies none
 equal illustrious blood
 race may spring brighter sun
 shine wherever bright sun may glow
 years ages run
 course yet endure fairer show
 orbits burn heavenly fires
 instruction god inspires"

 xi
 discourse pursuing still seer
 spake moves rinaldo rede
 give sister cavalier
 albeit either small entreaties need
 together orlando olivier
 counsel lauds would union speed
 king charles aymon hopes approve
 france welcome wide wedded love

 xii
 spake together peer paladine
 knew aymon king charles' consent
 unto grecian emperor constantine
 give gentle daughter intent
 young leo lofty line
 heir hope crave maid sent
 warmth praises worth inspired
 love unseen leo fired

 xiii
 hath aymon answered alone
 cannot conclude thereon sort
 first hath spoken son
 rinaldo absent charles's court
 winged haste deems thither run
 joy kinsman high report
 high regard bears heir
 nought resolve till thither repair

 xiv
 good rinaldo father wide
 imperial practice knowing nought
 promised beauteous sister bride
 upon well roland's thought
 others harboured cell beside
 hermit wrought
 marriage 'twas peer's belief
 could choose pleasure clermont's chief

 xv
 day night following day
 great part sage monk warriors spent
 scarce mindful crew coming stay
 albeit wind blew fair intent
 impatient long delay
 one message warriors sent
 return barons urged sore
 parforce parted hermit hoar

 xvi
 child long banished stayed
 lone rock whereon waters roared
 farewell holy master made
 taught true faith anew sword
 orlando girt side blade
 frontino martial hector's arms restored
 knowing horse arms whilere
 well kindness peer

 xvii
 though enchanted sword better right
 would worn good anglantes' chief
 fearful garden might
 blade mickle toil grief
 rogero faulchion bright
 received good frontino thief
 willingly thereof rest
 soon asked warrior repossest

 xviii
 hermit blessings band implores
 bark fine return sails
 give winds waves oars
 clear skies gentle gales
 vow prayer patron makes moors
 pinnace marseilles
 safely harboured let chiefs remain
 till conduct astolpho train

 xix
 bloody dearbrought victory
 scarcely joyful tale astolpho knew
 seeing evermore fair france would
 secure mischief moorish crew
 homeward send king aethiopy
 devised together army
 sandy desert selfsame track
 led biserta's sack

 xx
 erewhile restored afric waters ride
 sir dudon's ships paynims rout
 whose prows new miracle poop side
 soon sable crews
 changed anew leaves far wide
 raised sudden breeze blown
 scattered midair like light gear
 go eddying wind disappear

 xxi
 home horse foot nubian host arraid
 squadrons wasted africk go
 king first thanks astolpho paid
 said eternal debt owe
 person given aid
 might main foe
 skins astolpho gave confined
 turbid tempestuous southern wind

 xxii
 say enclosed skins wind gave
 fury blows noon high
 moves shifting plain many wave
 fills eddying sand troubled sky
 carry scathe save
 squadrons lest dusty whirlwind fly
 bids arrived home unnoose
 bladder's vent let prisoners loose

 xxiii
 lofty atlas passes
 horses nubian riders bear
 turpin relates changed stone
 steeds return
 time duke france gone
 thus provided care
 main places moorish land
 made hippogryph anew wings expand

 xxiv
 reached sardinia one flight shear
 corsica sardinia o'er
 foaming sea venturous course steer
 inclining somewhat left griffin's soar
 seamarshes last light career
 stopt rich provence's pleasant shore
 hyppogryph done
 erewhile enjoined sainted john

 xxv
 charge sainted john commit
 provence winged courser borne
 nevermore saddle bit
 gall let lair return
 already planet whither flit
 things lost earth sound deprived horn
 hoarse mute remained
 soon holy place astolpho gained

 xxvi
 thence marseilles came came day
 orlando rinaldo olivier
 arrived therein upon homeward way
 good sobrino better peer

  sad disaster  would done

 xxvii

 news sicily charles blown

 less good rogero shown
 charles stood jocund fate gladsome heart
 rejoicing shoulders thrown
 intolerable load whereof weight
 long time prevent standing straight

 xxviii
 honour fair pillars sustain
 state  holy empire's cornerstone 
 nobles kingdom charlemagne
 dispatched meet knights far saone
 city worthiest train
 king duke partner throne
 issued amid fair gorgeous band
 noble damsels upon either hand

 xxix

 lords paladins people kinsmen friends

 sooner mid kind festal show
 interchange fond embracements ends

 mid lords present king

 xxx

 vouch valour father's peer

 best tell prowess spear"

 warrior honour mid martial train

 first paladins set foot ashore

 xxxii

 troop returns within citywalls
 leaves garlands green streets appear

 herbs flowers mingled rain where'er
 wend upon conquering squadron falls
 full hands stand window throw

 xxxiii
 every turn various places
 sudden structure arch trophy high
 whereon biserta's sack painted fair
 ruin fire feat chivalry

 merrimake stageplay meet eye
 writ truth
 empire's saviours everywhere seen

 xxxiv
 sound shrilling pipe trumpet proud
 festive music laughter light
 applause favour following crowd
 scarce found room begirt dames knight
 mighty emperor mid greetings loud
 royal palace alight
 many days feasted high hall
 lords mid tourney mummery mask ball

 xxxv
 son aymon day made known
 sister would make rogero's bride
 olivier milo's son
 child promise affied
 think kindred none
 wherewith league side
 valour nobility blood
 better nay none passing good

 xxxvi

 without concert alone
 dared plight daughter fain
 would marry grecian emperor's son
 kingly reign
 nay ought call
 know little nobleness
 valued without wealth virtue less

 xxxvii
 beatrice wife despite
 arraigns son calls arrogant
 moves open way hidden sleight
 break rogero's match bradamant
 resolved tax every means might
 make empress wide levant
 firm purpose montalban's lord
 ought forego plighted word

 xxxviii
 beatrice believes highminded fair
 hest exhorts reply
 rather constrained pair
 poor knight resolved die
 wrong rinaldo bear
 regard mother's eye
 let refuse keep stedfast course
 free rinaldo cannot force

 xxxix
 silent stands mournful bradamant dares
 meanwhile ladymother's speech gainsay
 reverence respect bears
 thinks choice left obey
 yet foul fault eyes appears
 falsely say
 cannot since
 guidance great small mighty love

 xl
 deny dared yet seem content
 sighed spake  uncontrolled
 could  gave secret sorrow vent
 eyes tears like billows rolled
 portion pains torment
 inflicting breast locks gold
 beat uptore brake
 thus made lament thus spake

 xli
 "ah shall wills right
 sovereign mistress
 shall hold cheaply slight
 mother's satisfy
 alas blemish foul sight
 damsel ill affy
 husband reckless
 'tis duty ever fulfil

 xlii
 "wo worth shall thee
 filial love forced untrue
 rogero surrender
 new hope new love new
 desire rather ties break free
 good children good parents due
 observance reverence cast aside measure
 duty happiness pleasure

 xliii
 "i know alas know
 duteous daughter doth behove
 know avails
 reason moves senses move
 retires stronger foe
 dispose love
 think dispose strict sway
 saving dictates say

 xliv
 "aymon beatrice's child slave
 love ah miserable
 parents hope
 pardon pity fault
 anger love whose prayer shall save
 fury till one plea
 mine godhead shall vouchsafe hear
 doom dead soon appear

 xlv
 "alas long obstinate pursuit
 faith draw rogero wrought
 finally drawn boot
 fair deed other's good wrought
 yearly bee whose labour's fruit
 lost hive honey fraught
 die ere child forsake
 husband rogero take

 xlvi
 "if shall obey father's hest
 mothers brother's shall obey
 greater wisdom far possest
 time hath made warrior's wit prey
 wills roland profest
 one side
 pair feared honoured far wide
 members house beside

 xlvii
 "if flower clermont's noble tree
 glory splendor account
 believe chivalry
 head o'ertops foot surmount
 would aymon dispose
 rather good rinaldo count
 much less affied
 leo rogero's promised bride"

 xlviii
 cruel thoughts afflicted maid torment
 rogero's mind enjoys repose
 albeit sad tidings vent
 yet city secret knows
 o'er humble fortunes makes lament
 enjoying good oppose
 unendowed riches reign
 dispensed widely worthless train

 xlix
 goods nature's hand supplies
 acquired man's study
 portion espies
 large never other's share
 beauty beauty vies
 resistance might rare
 palm none challenged
 regal splendour magnanimity

 l
 whose disposal honours lie
 give take away renown
 vulgar herd vulgar
 except prudent man distinguished none
 emperor pope king raised high
 sceptre mitre crown
 save prudence save judgement given
 favoured partial heaven

 li
 vulgar say would say
 honours wealth therewith smit
 worldly thing beside
 aught heed aught esteem ungraced
 beauty daring may
 dexterity prowess worth wit
 goodness  yet vulgar stands confest
 whereof speak rest

 lii
 rogero said "if aymon disposed
 empress bradamant see
 let treaty quickly closed
 leo let year granted
 meanwhile hope deposed
 shall leo royal father
 encircled forfeit crown
 shall aymon unworthy son

 liii
 "but give without delay said
 daughter son constantine
 promise regard paid
 good rinaldo paladine
 cousin erst hermit made
 marquis olivier king sobrine
 shall grievous wrong shall
 endure rather endure die

 liv
 "what shall father pursue
 vengeance grave outrage cries
 heed deed hard
 attempt weak wise 
 presuppose kindred crew
 slain hand unjust elder dies
 nothing content
 nay wholly frustrate intent

 lv
 " `twas ever intent still 'tis
 love hatred fair
 aymon slay bring woe
 plot practice house heir
 justly hold foe
 foeman lord forswear
 shall endure injury
 ah heaven far rather die

 lvi
 "nay die better right
 shall leo die disturbs joy
 unjust sire less dear flight
 helen paid paramour troy
 yet older time foul despite
 done proserpina cost annoy
 bold pirithous i've lost
 grief heart shall son father cost

 lvii
 "can true life forsake
 thy champion greek grieve thee
 could thy father force thee take
 though joined thy brethren thy sire
 'tis fear thou would'st rather make
 accord withal aymon
 seemeth better thy sight
 wed caesar simple wight

 lviii
 "can true royal name blind
 imperial title pomp majesty
 taint bradamant's egregious mind
 mighty valour virtue high
 cheaper cast behind
 plighted faith promise fly
 sooner foe love made
 longer say said"

 lix
 things rogero said beside
 discoursing strain
 oftentimes afflicted warrior cried
 standerby o'erheard knight complain
 grief signified
 occasion pain
 less cruel woe known
 lamented sorrows

 lx
 sorrows said
 vex rogero works woe
 hear afflicts dread
 lest grecian prince forego
 hence belief error head
 drive comfort knight bestow
 trustiest bowerwomen one day
 rogero bade words convey

 lxi
 "rogero till death
 faithful
 deals love kindness scorn
 hath doubtful fortune good ill store
 rock faith sea
 winds unmoved round roar
 changed calm storm
 ever change eternity

 lxii
 "sooner shall file chisel made lead
 rough diamond various forms impart
 stroke fickle fortune sped
 love's keen anger break constant heart
 sooner return alp fountainhead
 troubled streams summit part
 e'er change chances good nought
 shall wander way stedfast thought

 lxiii
 "all power o'er bestowed
 rogero others may divine
 know prince whose throne new
 never fealty sworn true mine
 ever surer state wide world
 king keysar possest thine
 thou need'st dig ditch build tower
 fear lest rob thee power

 lxiv
 "for thou hire aids assault none
 thereon shall aye made vain
 shall riches
 vile price gentle heart gain
 nobility kingly crown
 dazzle silly vulgar train
 beauty puissant weak light
 shall ever make thee slight

 lxv
 "thou hast cause amid thy griefs fear
 heart ever bear new impress
 deeply thine image graven
 cannot removed heart's core
 wax proved love whilere
 smote hundred times
 blows single scale displaced
 time therein hand thine image traced

 lxvi
 "ivory gem every hardgrained stone
 best resists griding tool may break
 save form hath taken none
 ever graver's iron take
 heart like marble thing least prone
 beneath chisel's trenchant edge flake
 love may wholly splinter ere may
 another's beauty core enlay"

 lxvii
 many words comfort rife
 full love faith said beside
 might thousand times given life
 albeit thousand times knight died
 clear tempestuous strife
 friendly port hopes appeared ride
 hopes foul furious wind anew
 far sheltering land seaward blew

 lxviii
 gentle bradamant fain
 would far hath signified
 wonted daring armed heart
 boldly casting respect aside
 one day stood king charlemagne
 "sire ever yet" damsel cried
 "i found favour eyes deed
 done heretofore deny meed

 lxix
 "and entreat claim fee
 royal promise plight
 grant prayer fain would see
 shall demand right"
 "thy valour damsel dear deserves
 boon wherewith thy worth requite"
 charles answered "and content thee swear
 though kingdom thou should'st claim share"

 lxx
 "the boon highness sue
 let parents accord
 pursued martial damsel save shew
 prowess lord
 let contend tourney
 would assay sword
 wife let wins wear
 let loses pair"

 lxxi
 cheerful face emperor made reply
 entreaty well worthy maid
 tranquil mind might rely
 would accord boon prayed
 audience given secretly
 news others conveyed
 day withal told
 ears beatrice aymon old

 lxxii
 bradamant fury flame
 alike sudden anger fraught
 plainly perceive claim
 rogero leo wrought
 active prevent damsel's aim

 sounded grecian latin lays
 points thy peer
 none well know vaunt raise

 upon bestowed thee

 dear wast thou ladylove ah

 saving worst thought

 canto 46

 argument

 ii

 lxxx

 lxxxii

 direr ill done tales report

 wherewith egypt's land made resort

 lxxxiv

 fair italy heavens rolled

 melissa namesake withdrew

 lxxxv

 assisted delivery queen
 four ages earthly round

 lxxxviii

 places strigonia's crozier hand

 whether doth court camp command
 whether turk german crew

 gathers virtue generous guide

 lxxxix
 seen blooming age
 divides mid arts wholesome discipline
 secret spirit ancient page

 say  "if thou immortally wouldst shine"
 fashioned withal much skill care
 wrought work gestures

 xc
 cardinal next seen though young
 years council vatican
 deep wisdom graced eloquent tongue

  "when ripened man
 oh st peter's mantle fall
 blest aera happy call"

 xci
 brave youth's liberal pastimes designed
 place alpine mountain hoar
 affronts bear rugged kind
 rushy bottom bays boar

 drives goat gallant hind
 falls o'ertaken dusty plain
 descending faulchion cleft twain

 xcii
 descried amid fair array
 poets philosophers elsewhere
 pricks wandering planets' way
 earth heaven instruction square
 chant sad elegies verses gay
 lays lyric heroic singers
 rich music hears moves pace
 every step sovereign grace

 xciii
 first part storied walls pourtraied
 noble prince's gentle infancy
 cassandra beside overlaid
 fears justice prudence modesty
 valour fifty virtue hath made
 fair sisters closest amity
 speak gives bestows
 virtues gilt stripling glows

 xciv
 part princely youth espied
 unhappy duke insubri's head
 peace sit council side
 together armed serpentbanner spread
 youth one unchanging faith tied
 ever well ill bested
 followers still flight foe
 guide peril support woe

 xcv
 another quarter descry
 ferrara duke fear
 strange proofs doth sift certify
 brother vouched tokens clear
 close device ill treachery
 hatched kinsmen held dear
 hence justly becomes title's heir
 rome yet free bade righteous tully bear

 xcvi
 elsewhere martial panoply shone
 hasting help church lifted blade
 scanty tumultuous levy gone
 wellordered host arms arraid
 lo coming chief alone
 affords priestly band present aid
 extinguished fires spread
 came saw conquered may said

 xcvii
 elsewhere stands upon native strand
 fighting mightiest armament
 whensoever argive land
 turkish venetian harbour went
 scatters overthrows hostile band
  spoil prisoners brother sent 
 nothing reserves save unfading bay
 prize cannot give away

 xcviii
 upon figures gazed courtly crew
 read meaning storied wall
 one shew
 things hereafter befall
 fair quaintly fashioned forms view
 pleasure peruse scrolls withal
 bradamant whole known
 wise melissa taught rejoiced alone

 xcix
 though instructed history
 like gentle bradamant affianced knight
 remembers amid progeny
 atlantes often praised hippolyte
  faithfully could verse courtesy
 charlemagne vouchsafed every wight
 various games solemn feast cheered
 charged viands aye board appeared

 c
 valiant knight descried
 daily broke thousand lances lay
 singly combat troops ride
 horseback afoot mix fray
 worthiest rogero espied
 always conquers jousting night day
 wrestling dance every deed
 still rivals bears away meed

 ci
 last day festive cheer
 seated solemnly assembled band
 charles' left placed wedded peer
 bradamant upon better hand
 across fields armed cavalier
 semblance haughty stature grand
 seen ride towards royal table
 courser wholly clothed sable

 cii
 king argier scorn
 received bridge fell
 never clothe arms sworn
 draw faulchion bestride sell
 till like anchoret outworn
 year month day lowly cell
 chastise like crimes
 cavaliers accustomed times

 ciii
 albeit charles agramant moor
 heard several fortunes away
 foreswear armed
 nought concerned affray
 year month wholly o'er
 wholly past succeeding day
 courser harness sword lance
 king betook court france

 civ
 neither lighted horse bowed
 head without sign reverence due
 scorn charlemagne gestures showed
 high presence fair crew
 astound full wonder stood crowd
 license haughty man view
 leave meat leave talk hear
 purpose stranger cavalier

 cv
 charles rogero opposite
 loud voice proud accent "i
 rodomont sarza" said knight
 "who thee rogero field defy
 sun withdraws light
 prove thee thine infidelity
 thou traitor thy lord
 deserv'st honour board

 cvi
 "albeit thy felony plain clear
 thou christened canst disavow
 nathless make yet plain appear
 prove upon thee thou
 canst find knight combat thee
 accept  one enow 
 four nay six accept maintain
 words listed plain"

 cvii
 rogero leave pepin's son
 uprose appeal thus replied
  alone  every one
 thus impeached traitor lied
 king ever done
 none could justly blame side
 prepared listed field shew
 evermore done due

 cviii
 defend need crave
 another warrior's help course run
 'tis hope show would
 enough perhaps would much one
 thither orlando rinaldo brave
 olivier white sable son
 thither good dudon marphisa wend
 fain fierce paynim contend

 cix
 tell rogero newly wed
 combat person refuse
 "take ye pains" warrior said
 "for would foul excuse"
 tartar's arms brought cut thread
 delay truce
 spurs orlando deck'd youthful lord
 king charlemagne begirt sword

 cx
 marphisa bradamant corslet case
 breast clothe gear
 astolpho led horse noble race
 sir dudon held stirrup far near
 rinaldo namus made mob give place
 assisted marquis olivier
 crowded lists drive speed
 evermore kept order need

 cxi
 palefaced dames damsels troop guise
 pigeons round lists timid show
 homeward bound fruitful field rise
 scared widesweeping winds loudly blow
 mid flash clap sable skies
 threat hail rain harvest's waste woe
 timid troop rogero fear
 ill matched deem fierce cavalier

 cxii
 deemed rabble
 bold cavalier barons thought
 yet memory lost
 paynim paris wrought
 singly fire sword warrior tost
 much fair town ruin brought
 whose signs remained yet long remain
 ever greater havoc plagued reign

 cxiii
 bradamant's heart others' beat
 deemed saracen might
 valour heartcore hath seat
 prowess youthful knight
 oft gives success martial feat
 paynim better right
 yet cannot ill misgivings quell
 upon love fear sits well

 cxiv
 oh fear willingly
 battle rogero would done
 lifeless listed field lie
 surer sure  fight ulien's son
 one death would consent die
 withal could suffer one
 rather unhappy strife
 would see cherished consort risk life

 cxv
 prayer availed damsel's part
 make rogero leave quest
 mournful face beating heart
 stood view pair fight addrest
 right left peer paynim start
 run lance rest
 spears seem ice shivers fly
 fragments birds mount middle sky

 cxvi
 rodomont's lance smote career
 upon midshield yet harmed little
 perfect famous hector's iron gear
 hardened vulcan's hand safe blow
 well shield levelled spear
 rogero guides good buckler  though
 well steeled within bone
 nigh palm thickness  pierces clean

 cxvii
  lance resists fierce shock
 first assault splinters fly
 bits fragments shivered stock
 seem fledged feathers ascend high
 arms hewn adamantine rock
 spear would pierce paynim's panoply
 end battle breaks withal
 croups staggering coursers fall

 cxviii
 bridle spur martial pair
 raise proud horses nimbly ground
 broke spears faulchions bare
 return bandy fierce cruel wound
 wheeling wondrous mastery
 bold ready coursers round
 warriors biting swords begin
 try either's armour thin

 cxix
 rodomont hard dragonhide
 heretofore cased warrior's breast
 nimrod's trenchant sword side
 accustomed helm temples prest
 bridge spanned narrow tide
 loser dordona's lady vest
 arms suspended votive stone
 left meseems erewhile shown

 cxx
 clad king goodly mail
 yet like first panoply secure
 neither harder scale
 could balisarda's deadly dint endure
 neither workmanship avail
 enchantment temper prime steel pure
 rogero plied sword
 paynim's armour bored

 cxxi
 rodomont beholds fierce close
 widely crimsoned arms restrain
 greater portion griding blows
 biting quick plate chain
 fury rage o'erflows
 mid winter tempestrous main
 flings shield hands outright
 lays rogero's helm might

 cxxii
 excessive force wherewith gin
 erected two barges upon po
 raised men wheels deafening din
 descends upon sharpened piles
 might smote paladin
 either hand never direr blow
 charmed helmet helped  force 
 stroke would divided man horse

 cxxiii
 fall youthful lord
 twice nodded opening legs arms anew
 rodomont smote would afford
 foe time spirits renew
 threatened stroke fine sword
 bore hammering shivers flew
 bold saracen bereft brand
 combat left unarmed hand

 cxxiv

 swoops upon child unheeding aught
 sore astounded rogero's brain
 wholly overclouded thought
 paynim well awakes
 neck strong arm caught
 gripes grapples mighty force
 falls earth pulled headlong horse

 cxxv

 far less shame gentle bride
 turned eyes fair face serene

 well nigh sight lady died

 clutches sword faces rodomont

 past paynim's bridle took

 right rider struck
 belly flank breast would wound

 flank thigh good rogero's sword

 layed rogero's helmet might

 pulled paynim steed

 cxxviii

 stood match rather ought say
 fell feet rogero's sword
 gave 'twas deemed advantage fray
 rogero stands aloof wary ward
 fain keep paynim king bay
 wise champion let wight
 talk bulky close fight

 cxxix

 wounds hoped would failed
 little little welled
 finally prevailed

 paynim might scaled
 young rogero smote sore
 stripling never stunned

 smote face bosom brand

 cxxxii

 weakened vigour moorish king

 cxxxiv

 battered head spine champion smote

 rogero holding fortune front

 sometimes work golden vein
 within pannonian iberian cave

 naked poniard's point threatening cry
 slay save yields content
 let live grace apply
 rodomont rather shent
 least deed shame preferred die
 writhed struggled vigour tried
 pull rogero nought replied

 cxxxviii

 fixed gullet fast holding bite
 sorely bestirs vainly tries

 vainly strives monarch argier
 rise underneath cavalier

 admiration

 latter qualification especially boiardo however
 inferior poet must considered superior artist
 ariosto weaving complicated web successor
 curious observe much excels storyteller
 tales indeed ariosto want connexion among
 eyes essential defect many loose
 episodes may compared parallel streams flowing
 towards one reservoir separate independent
 channels boiardo contrary like waters
 however may diverge preserve relation
 parent river accession always seems necessary
 reunite previous discharging contents
 common restingplace short example may serve
 illustrate laid damsel _innamorato_

 boiardo's art though indeed cannot said excel
 ariosto conspicuous also direction strange
 undercurrent allegory pervades poem

 doctrines conveyed gives mysterious interest even

 indeed case many fables odyssey

 picturesque effect allegory rather spirit
