 following extract illustrating philosophical dogma
 age taken opening fortysixth canto
 another description may serve specimen variety
 vein odd ingenuity winds
 argument sometimes bearing harbour
 middle digression seems feel
 sure retreat indulging new sally however
 never entirely loses sight port

 1
 name little world applied
 man approved subtle wit
 since save round things beside
 exactly happy symbol fit
 may say long deep wide
 middling good bad found
 various elements combined
 dominant snow rain mist wind

 2
 clear overcast 'tis land
 yield fruit bears rich supply
 mixt soil marle barren sand
 haply moist dry
 foaming hoarse murmur bland
 streams glide torrents tumble high
 man's appetites convey notion
 since infinite still motion

 3
 two solid dikes invading streams repel
 one reason arid shame
 torrents banks swell
 wit discretion weak tame
 crystal waters smoothly well
 appetites things devoid blame
 winds rains snows night day
 ye learned clerks divine ye may


 4
 among elements misfortune wills
 nature earth
 moved influence heaven sun instils
 subject power less
 star barren hills
 produces mines rich variety
 human nature wisely scan
 may discern peculiarly man

 5
 would believe various minerals grew
 many metals rugged mind
 gold nitre yet thing true
 alas rub find
 ore letters wealth pursue
 fancy steeds dream ease reclined
 song delights cittern's sound
 mines world abound

 6
 worthier less
 abound lead gold practised wight
 various soil accustomed survey
 fitted best find substance bright
 apulia way
 heal suffering spider's bite
 strange vagaries play like men possessed
 _tarantulated_* 'tis express'd

 * tarantula known harmless cause
 supposed mischievous effects efficacy mode
 curing perhaps easily explained people
 countries though imagined peculiarly
 england exposed attacks melancholy arise
 physical cause whether indigestion bodily complaint
 doctors calabria attributed sting
 tarantula assuredly extravagant popular
 english medical author's ascribing jaundice bite mad
 dog patient delighted find cause complaint
 easily leading questions brought recollect
 time felt prick probably proceeded
 sting tarantula dancing remedy prescribed
 exciting animal spirits &c may well
 operated cure real disease patients
 played berni states till tune struck pleased
 fancy animated exertion tarantella air
 supposed particularly stimulating case still
 popular dance south italy modern philosophers
 found tarantula venom

 7
 'tis needful touching sharp flat
 seek sound may patients please
 find merry music pat
 dance till sweat away foul disease
 thus allure _this_ man _that_
 still various offer tempt tease
 wot little time would ascertain
 sound different mortal's mine vein

 8
 'twas brunello rogero wrought
 offered armour steed
 thus cunning greek _his_ aid bought
 laid fair ilion smoking mead
 yore clearer numbers taught
 shall repeat upon reed
 furrow let ploughshare stray
 unheeding moments glide away

 9
 first pilot shore creep
 launched boat upon billows dark
 liquid ocean least deep
 without sails impelled humble barque
 seaward next foaming waters leap
 little little steered ark
 nothing wind stars guide
 round glorious wonders spied

 10
 thus still sung humble strain
 kept little barque within bounds
 find fit launch main
 sing fearful warfare resounds
 africa pours swarthy train
 wide world mustered troops abounds
 fanning fire forge land nation
 sends forth dreadful note preparation

 next extract shall give though commences
 favourite figure barque serve specimen
 different style forms opening second book two
 first lines reader trace dante find
 remainder translation neadum genetrix lucretius

 1
 launched deeper sea pinnace rear
 thy sail prepared plough billows dark
 ye lucid stars steer
 feeble vessel destined mark
 shine forth upon course benign clear
 beam propitious daring barque
 stem ocean profound
 praises works resound

 2
 holy mother neas
 daughter jove thou bliss gods
 men beneath venus makest grow
 green herb plant fillest love
 thou creatures would else cold slow
 dost thy sovereign instinct warm move
 thou dost jarring things peace unite
 world's eternal spirit life light

 3
 thine appearance storm rain ceased
 zephyr unlocked genial ground
 leap wild herds'tis wanton nature's feast
 green woods singing birds resound
 strange pleasure stung savage beast
 lives love time greenwood round
 creatures rove couch upon sward
 discord hate forgot sweet accord

 4
 thee kind gentle star thy suppliant prays
 thee sue every bolt flies
 thro' fifth planet* melting thy rays
 panting thy lap godhead lies
 lock'd within thine arms upward gaze
 feeds thy visage desiring eyes
 thou wilt gain grace grown
 propitious _his_ grace accord thine

 * mars

 5
 since 'tis thee sing said
 thy praise pleasures dream
 well pleased fruitful field led
 sure could choose sweeter theme
 thou thy clear ample bed
 dost run grateful murmur rapid stream
 awhile thine impetuous course refrain
 thy banks tune mingled strain

 concluding address river apostrophizes
 adige whose banks might said writing
 living town verona watered
 service cardinal di bibbiena

 one specimen poetical prefaces done
 introduction third book reader
 recognize passage _ars poetica_ horace may
 observe well berni translates applies classical
 recollections

 1
 unhappy task fulfil
 mines england hungary spain
 deeper dig mountain still
 find richer treasure securer gain
 wayfaring man climbs hill
 surveys ascends wider plain
 shores oceans open eye
 exalted nearer starry sky

 2
 book indited pleasure
 believe listen lore
 advancing shall discern new treasure
 catch new lights landscapes evermore
 former scale promise measure
 judge strain went
 since still caves rugged rocks unfold
 richer vein jewels pearls gold

 3
 winds mountain's side
 still spies new lands seas glorious sight
 patient industry courage guide
 valley frowning height
 like prospect poet's supplied
 flame smoke instead smoke light
 wise ulysses' acts fill ears
 wonderment hears

 much poetry berni life
 reflected lustre works reject foul
 imputations cast upon say least
 disreputable however certain last
 established canonry florence lived high
 accomplished society fact however profligate age
 like flourished proves nothing favour
 listened stories biographers might
 suppose even courted vicious
 propensities one writers tells us excited
 cardinal ippolito de' medici poison duke alexander
 private pique another would us
 believe tempted duke poison cardinal
 complicate matter yet cardinal
 duke poison administered berni upon
 refusal dates however respective deaths

 * technical phrase stag taking water usually
 distressed hence viewhollo "tayo"

 swamp" "tally ho" fox derived

 orlando innamorato
 book iii
 argument

 third book opens introduction new character
 mandricardo son agrican tartar king pursuing
 way france order avenge father's death made
 prisoner fairy frees acquires arms
 hector well knights involved various
 adventures till story returns invasion france
 suddenly interrupted middle


 book iii

 author opens book stating called away
 north mighty storm gathering france already
 sorebested suddenly threatened new storm
 remote quarter tartary

 emperor region named mandricardo wasted
 violences proceeding course imperious tyranny
 old man threw way reproaching
 outrages bade desist warring upon innocent
 defenceless seek revenge death father upon
 one worthy wrath wit upon orlando
 murderer king agrican

 stung heart old man's reproaches mandricardo
 determining owe success enterprise
 resolved individual valour leaves kingdom
 incognito departs without horse arms towards west
 travelling thus alone afoot passed confines
 armenia spied upon day pavilion pitched near
 fountain imagining might find
 determined win force entered view searching
 horse arms stood need none
 defend entrance already within pavilion
 voice heard murmur waters
 prisoner power whose possession violated

 mandricardo however heard else disregarded voice
 pursuing search found suit armour disposed upon
 carpet courser fastened neighbouring pine

 immediately clothed arms seized upon
 steed departing fire suddenly sprang
 spreading destroyed pine left
 fountain pavilion alone untouched mandricardo
 embraced flames destroy armour clothing even
 shirt escape torture leaps horse
 every thing consumed casts
 water received arms naked
 damsel incomparable beauty kisses bids
 good cheer informing taken snare
 fairy heart discretion may rescue
 many damsels cavaliers shall
 reap immortal glory achievement

 pursued story informing fountain
 work fairy imprisoned king gradasso
 sericane gryphon aquilant many knights ladies
 "beyond hill" said "which see
 situated castle fairy laid arms
 hector exception sword slain
 treacherously achilles queen named penthesilea possessed
 death passed almontes
 taken orlando weapon called durindana
 remainder arms saved carried neas
 received recompence marvellous
 service bestowed upon courage
 attempt acquisition arms secured yonder castle
 enchantment guide"

 mandricardo enraptured proposal hesitated
 idea exposing naked difficulty however
 got lady letting hair bound
 head braids furnished complete covering
 cavalier sheltered sight
 issued linked arm arm water took way
 together pavilion

 entering said remained untouched fire
 reposed time upon flowers length damsel gave
 signal departure clothed mandricardo
 armour conducted courser waiting upon
 leapt armed lady mounted
 palfrey set forward enterprise

 ridden mile damsel explaining
 dangers quest informed mandricardo would
 combat gradasso conqueror gryphon first
 maintained field comers

 thus speaking arrived castle alabaster
 overlaid gold lawn enclosed
 barrier live myrtles sat armed knight horseback
 gradasso mandricardo upon seeing dropt
 vizor laid lance rest champion
 castle ready spurred towards opponent
 splintered spears equal force returning
 charge encountered swords contest long
 doubtful mandricardo determining bring
 issue threw arms gradasso two horsemen
 grappling together tumbled ground struggle
 however mandricardo fell uppermost preserving advantage
 made gradasso prisoner damsel interfered proclaiming
 victory new comer consoling vanquished
 could discomfiture

 meantime sun set upon strife
 late mandricardo enter enchanted castle
 damsel informed would accessible sunrise
 invites therefore lie amongst flowers
 meadow enamelled proffering guard informs
 harbourage obtained neighbouring
 castle though purchased exposure notable
 peril says kept kind courteous lady
 often disturbed exercise hospitality giant
 named malapresa would well avoid already
 sufficient toil danger hands

 mandricardo rejects kind intimation insists upon
 guided lady's lodging
